# comments:	The first two digits of the identifier refer to the book, the next three digits to the chapter, and the last three digits to the verse. See Mayer & Cysouw (2014) for a list of book identifiers.

01012001	Adaa Aa-me Abram-para lalo : Nena kantri-para nena onaa-para nena apaa amenu page gimoa . Neme watoade supara paina .
01012002	Neme nemadare ruru adapu ma-ralalua . Goa pua ne ma-epealua . Nena biri ma-adaayalua . Ne madaare onaa adaapu ma-epealua .
01012003	Ne epea paliminuri nimu page epea palua . Ne waea paliminuri nimu page waea palua . Ne madaare go suna onaa rayo ma-epealua .
01012004	Abrame-me Adaa Aa-na agaa pagoa ame-na si Lot rapu pisipi . Nipu mali 75 patinaloa Aran su gimoa pisa .
01012005	Nipu-na ore Sera-para ame-na si Lot-para nipuna kogono onaa para oyae rayo-para Aran su-para kabisimi oyae rayo page mea pisimi . Gore nimu mo Kenan supara polalo pisimi . Goa pua nimu pua opapaisimi .
01012006	Abrame mo Sekem su-para ipua More adaa repena oak regepea pisa . Go raburi Kenan onaare go su-para asimi .
01012007	Adaa Aa Abram piri ipua lalo : Go suri nena madu ma-ralalide onaa katoa . Go pare Adaa Aa nipu piri ipisa rabu aana reke meda wariasa .
01012008	Go pare aemeare nipu nare ipula nane rudu Betel regepea pua sele ada go pare pisa . Betel nare pabala nane asa . Aire nare opala nane asa . Goa pua Adaa Aa-na aana reke meda warimea Adaa Aa-na bi loa lotu sa .
01012009	Go pare awa Abram nipu puamama pua Negep opapasa .
01012010	Go raburi go su-para reae adaa pabisada , Abram no Isip ata pisa . Gore mo reae ora adaa pabisa pulu .
01012011	Nipu Isip regepea ipisipi raburi , ore Sarai-para lalo : Nere ora epe ona meda yade .
01012012	Isip onaame ne adoa goa teme gore nipuna ore teme . Goa pua niri talimi pare nere pa ma-aalimi .
01012013	Goa peaga na baani lape . Go rabu nimumi ni waru surubalimi . Neme goa te rabu ni rabameali .
01012014	Abram Isip ipisa raburi Isip onaame mo ona epe ona meda adisimi .
01012015	Go raburi Pero-na kogono surube aanumi adoa , nimumi epe ona meda adoa ipulumalo Pero pua lakisimi . Gore nipu Perome mo ona pua meatepa loa nipuna ada-para aainasa
01012016	Abram-re Serana baani kone isapulu Abram waru surubisa . Go rabu Abram nipu mena sipisipi-para doki mena para gawanu meme menanuna ru wai lapona page , kemele menanu-para kogono onaa page kasa .
01012017	Goa pisa pare Adaa Aa-me yaina igi wae meda Pero-para nipuna onaa piri popenasa . Gore Pero-me Abram-na ore misa-pulu goa pisa .
01012018	Go rabu Pero-me Abram-para ipuloa lalo : Na ore yade lore akolo nalae pae ?
01012019	Akepeada na baani epa laeya ? Goane ni meawadega abiare nena ona wala mea . Goa pua mea pu .
01012020	Go rabu Pero-me nipu-na kogono aanu-para loa apo repaya-para nipuna oye rayo page nipuna epapenane wala pena pua rapatepa sa .
01013001	Go rabu Abram Isip awa wala Negep pisa . Ore-para nipuna oyae rayo page mea pisa . Lot page nipu rapu pisa .
01013002	Go raburi Abram-re gawana page gol silpa lapona page amonaki meda asa .
01013003	Oropere Negep gimoa Abram nipu sumeda-para puamama pua Betel epa opapasa . Nipumi abaripia sele ada Betel-para Ai lapona rikirana pisaya .
01013004	Go parere aana reke meda ririnane warisade pare . Gore Abram-me go pare Adaa Aa-na bi loa lotu sa .
01013005	Lot nipuna ruru-para nipuna kogono onaanu page Abram rapu pamisimi . Nipumi page gawa sipisipi meme menanu page adapu punisa .
01013006	Su regepesa pulu nipu lapo padane-para ape awi naisa .
01013007	Go su-parare Kenan ruru-para Peris ruru page asimi . Go rabu Abram-para Lot lapona mena surube aanumi ratu yawala-pasimi .
01013008	Go rabu Abram-me Lot-para lalo : Sana rikirana ratu nayawapana , sare aaraya yapulu sana kogono aanumi page ratu nayawena .
01013009	Suri dina apo iyada , abia sare apupapana rana-paliade nanere meania . Medane ne palidare gore medanere ni pono .
01013010	Lot-me adamonisa pare mo Jordan suri paune ipa segene su epe meda isa . Adaa Aa-na maapumi adesa . Go suri Soar regepea isapulu Isip sumi adesa . Go raburi Adaa Aa-me Sodom Gomora lapo ambi natiaina .
01013011	Mo aa lapo apupaisipi pulu Lot-re nare ipulanane isa Jordan awaro paune suna pisa .
01013012	Abram Kenan su-para aisa raburi Lot-re Sodom ada kagure regepea nipuna sele ada mo Sodom awaro paune suna pisa .
01013013	Go rabu Sodom onaanumi waeanu waru pisimi , goa pua Adaa Aa-para page waea waru pisimi .
01013014	Lot aba penaloa Adaa Aa-me Abram-para lalo : Apo ayepare awa iniminipa , goa pua nare opea nane page , pabea nane page sula popea lapona page ada .
01013015	Apo adae su rayo , ne para nena madu maralalide ruru repara gudiayato .
01013016	Neme nena maralalide onaare , dorupa maralalua . Goa pua dipiaperupa page maralimi .
01013017	Apo surayo abi pua ada , go nepamuae su rayo ne gialo .
01013018	Gore Abram-me nipuna sele ada yokoria Hebron pua , mo Mamre repena oak puti regepea pua pisa . Goa pua Adaa Aa-na aana reke meda warisa .
01014001	Go raburi Amrapel Sina-na aamudu-para , Ariok Elasa-na aamudu-para , Kedolaoma Elam-na aamudu-para , Tidal Goim-na aamudu alare ,
01014002	nimumi Bera Sodom-na aamudu-para , Bisa Gomora-na aamudu-para , Sinap Adma-na aamudu-para , Semeber Seboim-na aamudu-para , Bela ( abiare Soar teme ) gona aamudu-para go ruru ala rapu yada pula pisimi .
01014003	Go adare supuna yadapi aanuri , Sidim awaro paune suna kiritasimi . Go parere abiare Aipa Ipa teme .
01014004	Yada abi napi aware Kedolaoma-na rolopara mali 12 pirisimi . Wala malinare nimumi agaa napagesimi .
01014005	Wala mali meda popenalomea Kedolaoma rapu ralasimi aa mudunumi yada pua pumea go ruru wini pisimi . Repaim ruru Estorot Kanaim aisimi-para , Susi ruru Am adare-para pati page , mo Em ruru awaro paune su Kiriataim pati page ,
01014006	mo Or ruru so Seir rudu pati page , ora pua mo kapune suna rugi Elparan pua pabo tu kiritisimi .
01014007	Goa pua nimumi wala pereketua En Mispat pisimi ( go suri abiare Kedes teme ) . Goa pua aamudu malapu-na rurumi Ameleke-na su ada luabu pabotu rubisimi . Nimumi mo Asason Tama su-para pati Amori ruru page pabo rubisimi .
01014008	Go rabu Sodom Gomora lapo-para , Adma-para , Siboim-para , Bela nipuna bi meda Soa-para , go aamudununa yadapi aanumi , yada roborobo maga-ari ipua , Sidim awaro paune pare kiratawa ,
01014009	Kedolaoma Elamana aamudu-para , Tidal Goimana aamudu-para , Amrapel Sinana aamudu-para , Ariok Elasana aamudu aala rapu yada pisimi . Gore nimu aamudu malapu rapu aamudu supu rapu yada pisimi .
01014010	Go raburi mo su Sidimire awaro paune kolta mi naaku adapu isa . Sodom Gomora lapona yadapi aanu-para nimuna aamudunu page pogola pisimi . Medalomare mo kolta mi naaku para lopisimi . Medalomare so rudu rudu pogola pisimi .
01014011	Mo aa mudu mala-na yadapi aanumi Sodom Gomora lapona oyae rayo mea pisimi .
01014012	Abram-na amena si Lot page go Sodom su-para aisa pulu , nipu para nipuna oyae rayo page mea pisimi .
01014013	Aa meda pogola pisa aamere , Hibru aa Abram apo remaa rayo epa lakesa . Go raburi Amorait aa meda Mamri-na repena puti para Abram rapu epa asa . Mamri para nipuna ame Esko-para Ane lapo , nimu Abram rapu upasimi .
01014014	Go rabu amena si Lot iyanumi mea puamelo pagisa raburi , nipumi nipuna ruru para asimi yada pape aanu para madini aanu page 318 yasa . Goa pua mo iyanu nimu Dan adare pua ratu kiritisimi .
01014015	Go ribare Abram-me nipuna aanu epa rumasa . Goa pua yadaa isimi . Go yada wini pua Damaskas regepea ae adare Oba regepea pua ratu kiritisimi .
01014016	Abram-me apo mea pisimide oyae rayo-para Amena si Lot-para ona-repa para pa onaanu page rayo wala mea ipisa .
01014017	Abram-me mo Kedolaoma rapu ralasimi ruru pabo ruboa ipisa raburi , Sodom-na aamudumi Abram mo Save awaro paune pare madaata ipisa . Abiare go parere Aamuduna Awaro Paune su teme .
01014018	Gote Adaa Aa mudu-na miru irae aa pris Melkisadek-me bret wain lapo mea ipisa . Nipuri Salem-na aamudu .
01014019	Nipumi Abram maepeata-awa goa sa : Su yaa lapo warini Gote Adaa Aa Mudu-me ne ora maepeaina .
01014020	Nena iyanu nena kipara mea giaa Gote Adaa Aa Mudu ora so mada pena . Go rabu Abram-me mo mea ipisa yaenu rayona 10 ap Melkisedek kasa .
01014021	Mo Sodom-na aa mudumi Abram para lalo : Oyae rayore nena meainaga niri onaa komea giaina .
01014022	Gore Abram-me mo Sodom-na aa mudu para lalo : Neme Adaa Aa , Gote Adaa Aa Mudu , su yalapo warisa Gote-para ora lalo :
01014023	nena nonapi yaere neme ogeda page namealua gore neme lalo : Abram ma-ama yaisu tepulu .
01014024	Ni yae meda na-mealua pare na aanumi aba nameya yaenu komea meano , go page nirapu puame aa repo Ane-para Eskol-para Mamre aalana komea nina iyanu rapu yada pamega go repare kalaina .
01015001	Goanu aba pinaloare , adea-podena Gote-na agaa gupa ipisa : Abram , pala naomape . Niri nena ralubi yade , Neme nere oyae waru gialua .
01015002	Gore Abram-me lalo : O Adaa Aa mudu neme niri ake gialiya ? Niri naki meda namadu idega , Ninaa oyae rayore Eliesa gode Damaskas aame mealia .
01015003	Gorabu Abram-me lalo : Niri nogo-naki meda nagenede , goa pea pulu nina oyae rayore nina kogono aame rayo mealia .
01015004	Gorabu Adaa Aa-na agaa gupa ipisa : Nena oyae go aame namealia , pare nena madilide nakimi , nena oyae rayo mealia .
01015005	Nipu amanane mea pua goa sa : So yaa-para adasa , mada dipialiri so ubakedonu dipia . Gorabu goa sa : Neme maralalide onaare gorupa ralalimi .
01015006	Abram-me Adaa Aa-na sa agaa kone rulasa . Gorabu , Adaa Aa nipu redepone aa sa .
01015007	Wala Adaa Aa-me nipu-para goa sa : Niri ora Adaa Aa , neme ne Kaldia suna Ur piri mea epawadere , go su ora ne gudiyatalo pawade .
01015008	Gorabu Abram-me lalo : O Adaa Aa mudu , neme go su na yaadelore akepu mada makualuaya ?
01015009	Gore Adaa Aa-me nipupara lalo : Ni piri mena gawa meda para meme mena wai-para , sipisipi yadapu meda page rayo mali repo pati mea ipu , yaa puluma lapo page mea ipu .
01015010	Abram-me mo yaenu rayo Gote piri mea ipua , lapolapolo loralapata pua rikirana pora masawa amupisa . Yalapo komea goa napi pa isa .
01015011	Gorabu yaa itayamame nolalo riya ipisimi pare , Abram-me ratu rubebe pisa .
01015012	Nare pabola popesa raburi , Abram nipu u adaa meda patisa . Gorabu nipu adaa riba medame rigitaniasa rabu pala omesa .
01015013	Gorabu Adaa Aa-me nipu para lalo : Neme go piare waru makuape , neme maralalide onaare ada medanini kimisu onaanurupa awalimi , goapua nimuri go alimide su ada onaana slav kogono pae onaa alimi . Go onaana kogonore mali 400 rupara radapi kogono pualimi .
01015014	Goa palimide su adarenuri neme page nimu keda waru katoa , wala orope nimu gima epalimi raburi , nimumi oyae adapu mea epalimi .
01015015	Go yapare nere lo kumana rupara awa omali .
01015016	Nena ruru onaare go su-para abi naepalimi . Akoloya Amor onaame waea pa palaeme . Nimuna waea waru palaina loare pane ratu rubalua . Go rabu nena rururi kaara maala popenaloa nimu wala epalimi .
01015017	Nare paboa riba saraburi , miru yawapalae repenagaa sosopene-para paa meda page pata paa rupa roriaa ipua mena paaki lapona rikirana popesa .
01015018	Goyapinare Gote-me Abram rapu agaa rogasa . Goapua lalo : Nena rururi go su kalalo , go ipa Isip pua mo ipa Yupritis rupara
01015019	abia go suri Keni onaa-para , Kenis onaa-para , Kadmon onaa-para ,
01015020	Et onaa-para , Peris onaa-para , Repaa onaa-para ,
01015021	Amori onaa-para , Kenan onaa-para , Gigasi onaa-para , Sebus onaa-para , gonu pimi suri ne gialo .
01016001	Abram-na ore Sera nogo-naaki na madiasa . Yapare nipuna kogono pae , Isip nogo Ega asimi .
01016002	Gore Sera-me Abram para lalo : Adaa Aa-me ni nogo-naaki na geadega na kogono nogo rapu patalipina . Nipu mada nina ruru madaa maopaina . Abram-me Sera-na sa agaa ratisa .
01016003	Abram-me nipu Kenan mali 10 awa ore Sera-me nipuna kogono pae Isip nogo Ega mua aani ore ma-aulainalo kasa .
01016004	Abram Ega rapu patisa , goa pua naaki pada pirisa . Nipu naaki pada pirisa makuawa nipuna surube onana rolo para napiri agaa napagisa .
01016005	Gore Sera-me Abram-para lalo : Go adalo kedare neme adape keda rialo . Nina kogono nogore nena kina sawade , goa pua abiare nipu naki pada pilo makuawa nina agaa na pagea . Adaa Aa-me ne-sana rikirana rumaina .
01016006	Abram-me lalo : Nena kogono nogore nena kina iya . Nena kone-para paliare pape , gore Sera-me Ega udipa pisa pulu nipu pogola pisa .
01016007	Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me Ega mo ipa repaa-para su kapune pare adesa . Go ipare mo Sur pora paginane popea .
01016008	Gore Ensol-me lalo : Ega , Serana kogono nogo , apara awa , wala apara polalo pi ? Nina surube ona Sera pogola pulu .
01016009	Gore Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me nipu goa lakesa : Nena surube ona Sera piri wala pua , nipuna agaa pagape .
01016010	Ensol-me lalo : Nena rururi ma-adayalua , goa pua dipiape rupa page maralimi .
01016011	Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me wala lalo : Nere naki pada-pi pulu naki madiali . Nipuna biri Ismael lape , akoloya , Adaa Aa-me nena re-e pagade .
01016012	Nipuri kira mena raa yana rupa alia . Nipu onaa rayo rapu yada-kepealia rabu onaa rayome nipu yada-kepealimi , goa pua nipuna onaa rayo gimua agurapo alia .
01016013	Ega-me Adaa Aa go bi kasa : Akoloya ni Ade Gote . Nipumi lalo : Abiare ni adea Gote-re adalo .
01016014	Go ipa-na biri , Bia La Roi teme , abia page go ipare Kades para Bered lapona rikirana popea .
01016015	Ega-me Abram-na naki madiasa , goa pua Abram-me , Ega-me madiasa nakina biri Ismail sa .
01016016	Abram-na mali 86 patinaloa Ega-me naki madiasa .
01017001	Abram-na mali 99 patinaloa , Adaa Aa nipu piri ipua lalo : Ni Gote purina-re yapulu oroyalo nina rolo-para pirape . Goa pua epeanu pape .
01017002	Nina rogae agaa nerapu ora palua , goa pua nena onaa maadayalua .
01017003	Go rabu Abram nipu suna adaneawa kubuniasa , go rabu Gote-me nipu-para lalo :
01017004	Go rogatepa agaana papeare go lapatoda nere ruru adapuna aara pirali .
01017005	Nere abiare Abram pida wala nateme , nena biri abiare Abraham teme , akoloya nere abia onaa adapuna aara maapiralua .
01017006	Ne madare ini adapu etalia . Goa pua ruru adapu pitimi pare medalomare aa mudu pitimi .
01017007	Go rogatepa agaare oroyalo salia . Goa pua ne sana rikirana page , gome madu saliade nogo nakinuna rikirana page , nimina Gote pitua .
01017008	Go Kenan onaana su ne abia go kimisu ipua epaa ayere , neme nepara nena orope madusalide nogo naki walo diayawa , niri nimina Gote pitua .
01017009	Goa pua Gote-me Abraham-para lalo : Nere neme goapa toadare waru ratape nepara nena ruru orope epaliminu page , neme go rogatepa agaa waru pagoa ratalepape .
01017010	Nerapu agaa gupa rogato . Nena ruru orope epaliminu page , Nimi goa pipape . Aa naki rayona yogane puduri rugutapape .
01017011	Ora rayona yogane puduri rugutapape . Go robore sana roga i-agaana robo .
01017012	Naki rayore yapi 8 popenaloare , yogane puduri rugulatepape , orope maralalimide rayona page komea goa pipape . Pa ruru para kaboria epe onaana sinuna page kogono aanuna sinu page .
01017013	Nena adare-para madininu page kaboria epenuna page go rayona yogane puduri ora rugulatepape . Go robomere nina , nimi rapu rogae agaare ( pa sama lama palia ) .
01017014	Yogane na ruguteade aanakinuri nina ruruda diaga ratu rubape , gore nina rogae agaa ruguta .
01017015	Gote-me Abram para wala lalo : Nena ore Saraina , bi rado ma-ato , abiare nipuna biri Sarah lape .
01017016	Nipu neme maepealua , goa pua nena naki mada madialia . Nipu neme maepealua pulu nipu mada ruru adapu epalimi . Aa mudunu page nipu mada opalimi .
01017017	Go rabu Abram-me kubuniawa , Gote adaa bi kasa , nipume giri-loa kone gupa isa . Gorupa mali 100 pope yomagae-na naki madiata pae ? Sarah page mali 90 yadega naki mada madialia pae ?
01017018	Gore Abram-me Gote para lalo : Nena lae-are Ismael mada na palipae ?
01017019	Go rabu Gote-me lalo : E , yapare , nena ore Sarah-me nena naki mada madialia , goa paliaga , nipuna biri Aisak lape . Nina rogae agare nipurapu palua , go rogalipade aagare orope maralaliade ruru rapu page pa sama lama palia .
01017020	Nena si Ismail-para page , nena laedea pagawade . Nipu page neme epea palua . Nipu nogo-naki page adapu katoa , neme ne madare ruru adapu page maralaina toa . Nimu aamudu 12 page piralimi , goa pua neme nipuna rururi puri waru pabenatoa .
01017021	Go yapare nina rogae aagare Aisak rapu rogalua , mo mali medana Saraha-me madialiade naki rapu .
01017022	Gote-me Abraham rapu aaga lo kirituare nipu pisa .
01017023	Ora go yapinare Abraham-me nipuna si Ismael para , nipuna adarupara madini naki rayo para moneme kaboria epe-naki rayo page nipuna adarepara asimi aanaki rayona yogaene puduri rugulaisa . Gote-me lakisade rupa .
01017024	Abraham nipuri mali 99 patina loa , yogane pudu rugusa raburi ,
01017025	si Ismael-re mali 13 patina loa .
01017026	Abraham para si Ismael lapore meda rabu go yapina yogane pudu rugusipi .
01017027	Go raburi Abraham-na su-ada para asimi aa naki rayopara pa su medapara kaboria ipisa aa nakinuna page rayo nipu rapu yogane rugusimi .
01018001	Adaa Aa Abraham piri wala ipisa , mo Mamre-na adaa repena puti regepea narepame riripu waru pisa pulu Abraham nipuna sele ada poragape para pirisa .
01018002	Abraham-me adasaisa pare aa repo pa go pare reka aina adisa . Nipumi nimu adoare sele ada gimoa aloma madari pua alu pua kubunaisa .
01018003	Nipumi lalo : Naa adaa aanu , epea pamega , nimi nina ada nagimoa pulupape . Ni nimina kogono aa .
01018004	Ipa aba mea gula epono , goa puare nimina age aba radepeano go ada repena repara kitu piramina .
01018005	Neme nimina nape eta meata pono , goa puare puri mua nimina polalo pame nane palimina . Nimi naa adanane epamenada rana piaga nimina eta managolano . Nimumi lalo : Mada , nena laeare paina .
01018006	Gore aipapulu Abraham nipu Sarah piri sele adapara pisa . Nipumi goa-pua sa : Aipapulu plawa 20 kg ora epede waru adaapu managola , pereke-yoa bret waria ira .
01018007	Wala aipapulu nipuna gawa menanu aisimi para aloma pisa , goa pua epe pena apa ae yandapu mena meda pua mua nipuna kogono aa epa kaloa aipapulu managolatepa sa .
01018008	Mo gawa mena aba risa raburi gawana midi para gawana adu ipame warini eta-para mo gawana adu ipa medaloma mea ipisa . Goa pua mo kimisu aa repo epa kasa . Go eta nala pirinare , nipu repena repara suruba adoaisa .
01018009	Nimumi lalo : Nena ore Sarah akepa ? No sele adapara no piada-sa .
01018010	Go rabu mo aa medame lalo : Ora go-dina ne piri para wala malina epalua , nena ore Sarah-me naki meda madu saba piralia . Gore Sarah-re nimuna masanane sele ada poragape para pirua pagaba pirisa .
01018011	Abraham para Sarah lapore onagae yomagae lapo pirina . Sarah nogo-naki page madiape ai nai rabu .
01018012	Sarah-me nipuna agurapo pirua giri loa , goa kone isa . Niri aba ora onagaesi yade , nina adaa aa page ora yomagaesi yande pare ni mada go padane para patape rana salia pae ?
01018013	Go rabu Adaa Aa-me Abraham-para lalo : Neme lalo agaanare Sarah-me giri akolo tapae : Niri onagae yadega neme naki meda madialua yapae ?
01018014	Yae meda Gote-me papeare mada napaliaya ? Wala malina apo epalua lawade raburi Sarah-me naki mada madu saba-piralia .
01018015	Sarah palame omisa pulu yagaa loa : Giri nalawadesa . Nipume lalo : Giri laedega yagaa nalapesa .
01018016	Mo aa repo polalo rekesimi rabure nimumi Sodom adaniasimi . Goa pua Abraham-me nimu pulumi rupa adoa rapatalo nimu rapu puamama pisa .
01018017	Go rabu Adaa Aa-me lalo : Neme pulalo pi-are Abraham-re kudiri palua pae ?
01018018	Abraham-me maralaliade rururi adayoa puri komeada pabalimi , goa pua nipu madare go suada rayo epeama palia .
01018019	Neme nipu aba mada-misu pulu nipumi nipuna nogonaki-para nipuna adare para aeme onaa rayo mana tea . Neme katoa agaa ratinaloa nimumi epea pua ni epe kone gina . Goa pua Adaa Aa-me Abraham-me maralaliade rurunu page palua siade aonuri ora palia .
01018020	Gore Adaa Aa-me lalo : Sodom Gomora supara pimi onaame peme wae-yaenuna , agaa ora adapu epeada .
01018021	Ni gopara pulu , nimuna peme waea adola , goa pua ora yapalo nabipa adaluame .
01018022	Gore aa lapo Abraham gimoa Sodom adarena poranini pisipi . Adaa Aa-re Abraham aisa pare pa aisa .
01018023	Go rabu Abraham nipu Adaa Aa regepea ipua lalo : Neme epe onaa para wae onaa rayo taliya ?
01018024	Go adare para epe onaa 50 pitimire , neme nimu page wae onaa rapu pa taliya ? Neme mogo epe onaa 50 niminawa go adare pa inateya ?
01018025	Nemere epe onaa-re , wae onaa tala-arare nataliya ? Mo wae onaa me pemea madaa , epe onaa rada nanena , neme goa napaina . Nere onaa rayo rumae aa yade pulu ; epea ora paina .
01018026	Adaa Aa-me lalo : Epe onaa 50 piralimi-dare gore pana bina natalua .
01018027	Gore Abraham-me nipu wala lorapisa : Adaa Aa , neme wala rana lapopa agaa mealo . Niri taaga para do lapo rupa yade .
01018028	Goa peaga 45 epe onaa piralimiri mo 50 ma-epapena supu diayaliare pa taliya ? Neme 45 adaluare , gore nataluasa .
01018029	Rana repopa wala Adaa Aa para goa sa : Gore 40 ama yaliare , gopage pa taliya ? Adaa Aa-me lalo : 40 piralimi-dare gimalua .
01018030	Abraham-me lalo : Adaa Aa neme ratu na yawape , wala agaa meano , gore 30 yaliare , ake paliya ? Adaa Aa-me lalo : Neme yada na palua 30 piralimi da page .
01018031	Abram-me lalo : Ratu na yawape neme ne wala apo agaa mealoga . Pa 20 komea yalia-dare ake paliya ? Nipumi lalo : 20 komea piralimi page natalua .
01018032	Abraham-me wala lalo : Adaa Aa neme ni ratu na yawape , pare neme ne rana-komea wala agaa mealo . Gore pa 10 ama yaliare ake paliya ? Nipumi gorupa abusa : Ora 10 ama yalia page na talua .
01018033	Gore Adaa Aa-me Abraham rapu agaa lo kirituare nipu pisa , go rabu Abraham nipu page ada pisa .
01019001	Aebore mo Ensol lapo Sodom pua opapaisipi . Gore Lot-re adarena kerepo para pirisaya . Nipumi nimu adoare , rekataboa nimu madata pisa , goa pua iniaga su kaloa ma kubunaisa .
01019002	Na adaa aa lapo , nipumi lalo : Nipina kogono aana adapara kitumu , age radepe , patalipina . Goa pua ribarekore nipina palipina . Dia nipumi lalo : Mo onaa kiritaemede amaa patalipa .
01019003	Lot-me ora dia loa puri pabisa pulu nipuna adapara pisimi . Nipumi eta managolaisa , bret page ist nai irua nisimi .
01019004	Nimu u pena patulalo pala pirinare Sodom adare para asimi aa rayo , oge adaa rayome ada epa kutapu sabasimi .
01019005	Nimumi Lot yasimi : Go riba epapede aa lapore ake pape ? Amaa nia piri mea ipu , niame nipu pake namona .
01019006	Lot nimu adolalo amaa pulawa poragape waru moganiasa .
01019007	Goa pua lalo : Dia na adami aanu go wae-yaere na palimina .
01019008	Adalepa , niri nogo lapo , aa rapu abi napati madu ide . Nipu amaa mea epono goa pua nimina rana ratalimina . Go aa lapore yae meda na palimina . Nina ada epape pulu neme nipu ora rabamealua .
01019009	Nimumi talo : Pane popa a . Goa pua nimumi lalo : Apo aare pa epa ae aa yade , goa pua abiare nipumi nia surubaluame pana . Aa lapo mada pulaa-pamaare , ne madaa ora waea waru pumuna . Nimumi Lot pane orolo paisimi , goa pua pora gape atubitua rupara odobatalo pisimi .
01019010	No rupara pirisipide aa lapome Lot yolorua pora-gape agolaeme garula sasipi .
01019011	Goa pua nipume mo pora-gape para asimide aanu , oge adaa lapo ratana ini ma-rubu paama pisipi . Goa pisa pulu nimumi pora gape adape rupa marisimi .
01019012	Mo aa lapome Lot-para lalo : Go para nena onaare meda aeme ? Nena siwanenu page , gonuna siwanenu page , o pa nena onaanu page go ada kagure-para meda aeme ? Aipapulu pua lamu-mua , pane pogola pulupa .
01019013	Ake peada ya , go su adare apo pabo tu rubalepada . Go adare-para aeme onaame peme waeare ora adata pulu , Adaa Aa-me go adare pabotu rubaponalo sa mea reparia .
01019014	Go rabu Lote-me wane lapo mulalo pi akua lapo laketa pisa . Nipumi pua lalo : Go su aipapulu gimoa pane pogola baini sa , Adaa Aa-me go ada kagure pabo rubolalo pia ! Gore akua lapome pa makirata kone isipi .
01019015	Riba rekore mo Ensol lapome , Lot aipapulu ma rekaisipi . Nipumi goa sipi : Aipapu tapa ! Go aeme nena ore para wane lapo page . Gore go ada kagure talawa nimi talia .
01019016	Lot-me aipapu na sa raburi , mo Ensol lapome kimina misipi , ore wane lapona ki mina mua aipapulu adarena amanane mea pisipi , gore Adaa Aa-me nimu odome omesa .
01019017	Nimu ama mea ipuare , mo aa medame goa sa : Pogola pulupa ! Goa puare wala napereketua adalepape . Mo paune pare palimi rabu page kitu na piralepape ! Nimi omalimiga so rudu rudu pogola pulupa .
01019018	Naa Adaa Aa-laapo , sogo rudu rudure ora dia .
01019019	Niri aba raba meape-de , go page ni epe kone sua raba meapede pulu , rana sogo rudu rudure pope-ai nasala , pena pulano apo yaeme ni mealia pulu , ni omalua .
01019020	Mogo ayaa oge adare parare mada palua . Ni pogola go para pono , gore ora oge adaresiya ? Goa palua rabu ni mada epealia .
01019021	Nipumi lalo : Madaga apo lae adarere natalipa .
01019022	Goa peaga mogo para aipapulu pogola pulupa , nimi go para abi nape alimina yada napalua . Goane go adarena biri Soa teme .
01019023	Lot Soa opapaisa raburi nare aba raa ipisa .
01019024	Go raburi Adaa Aa-me yapara pirumea repena sula yai rupa Sodom Gomora lapona mea repaisa .
01019025	Nipumi go awaro paunena asa su ada luabu rayo iru rubisa , go adare para asimi onaa rayo para emaapu page iru rubisa .
01019026	Lot-na ore pereketua adamonesa rabu nipu aipaa ana ausa .
01019027	Wala yapipure Abraham aba ribareko rekataboa mode pare pisa , aba Adaa Aa rapu agaa sade pare .
01019028	Nipumi Sodom Gomora lapo adaneasa pare apode awaro paune su rayo page miru kapukapu ropatisada adisa , go mirure adaa repena ropati rupana adisa .
01019029	Gote-me mo ada kagure iru rubala-awa nipumi Abraham-me sa agaa niminasa . Goa pua nipumi Lot pane mupawa nipu ae adare luabu iru rubisa .
01019030	Lot-para nipuna wane lapo Soa gimua so pore-para pua asimi . Nipu Soa ape pala omisa pulu , nipuna wane lapo rapu ana apeda meda para asimi .
01019031	Yapi medame , mupa nogome nipuna aki para lalo : Sana aapare yomagaesi , goa pua saa rumape aa page meda dia . Gore ona rumapeare abade su rayona pia yapulu .
01019032	Goa pea pulu sana aapare ipa waini nena lapana , goa pua sa nipu rapu patapana , goa pua niana ruru same aapa-rapu maralapana .
01019033	Go ribare nipuna aapa ipa waini nenasipi , goa pua mupa nogo araa rapu pua patisa . Nipuna wane nipu rapu epa patua reka pisare namakuasa .
01019034	Wala yapi medame mupa nogome orope nogo para lalo : Ni abala ribare apa rapu patawade . Abia ribare nipu ipa waini wala nena lapana , goa pua ne aaparapu patalipina , goa puare niana ruru , sana aaparapu wala maralapana .
01019035	Go ribare nipuna araa ipa waini wala nena loa wane orope nogo araa rapu pua patisa . Nipuna wane orope nogo epa patua reka pisa page namakuasa .
01019036	Lote-na wane laporata aara rapu awa naki pada pirisipi .
01019037	Mo mupa nogome naki madua nipuna bire Moab sa . Nipuri abia Moab ruru-na ara pia .
01019038	Wala orope nogome page naki madisa , goa pua Ben-Ammi lo bi maaisa . Nipu page Amonite ruru-na aara pia .
01020001	Abraham-me Mamre su gimoa Negep supara pisa . Nipu Kedes para Sar lapona rikirana pua asa , goa pua nipu Gera ogesi pua awa .
01020002	Ore Sarah-re , nina bani yade sa . Gera-na aa mudu Abimalek-me Sarah pua meatepa loa nipu misa .
01020003	Rana meda riba Abimalek piri Gote epana ipumea nipu para lalo : Nere omali . Gore apo meaede onare aa aba pe ona yade .
01020004	Abimalek nipu mo ona piripara abi na pisa , goa pua nipumi lalo : Adaa Aa waea napi onaare pa taliya ?
01020005	Nipuna bipa ni laagiade : Sarah-re nina bani lade . Oname page nina bani lade . Neme waea kone nasawa , epea pikone sawa .
01020006	Gore Gote-me wala epana ipua goa sa : E , gore pa epea pi kone saede , pare ne mo onarapu naa pataedere , ni repara waea palilo neme ma-parude . Goane mo ona naa oraina-laawade .
01020007	Abiare apo ona nipuna ani wala kalape , gore nipuri nina agaa lae aa yade , goa pua nipumi nena beten lalia , goa palia rabu ne epe rupa ali . Go yapare nipu na katedare , ora ria-lalo ne page nena onaa page rayo omalimi .
01020008	Wala yapipu aba ribarekore Abimalek-me nipuna kogono aanu yasa , mo nipuna adisade yae luabu lakelo kiritisa raburi , nimumi pala waru omisimi .
01020009	Go rabu Abimalek-me Abraham-para ipuloa lalo : Nemere niare akepae pae ? Neme neparare waea meda napawade , gore neme kedare nipara naa onanu piri apo mea epaena ? Neme nipara paenare napapea paena .
01020010	Abimalek-me Abraham agaamisa : Goare nemere akena rena pae ?
01020011	Abraham-me lalo : Nina bipa goa lawa , Go adare para Gote pala na-omeme ada kone sawa . Onaame nina ore nimu mulalo niri talimi kone sawa .
01020012	Ora riare nipuri nina bani page yade , sana-aapare komea yapare amare rado rado ; goyapare nipuri abiare nina ore yade .
01020013	Go raburi Gote-me nena aapana su anda gimapu saraburi , neme nipu-para goa su : Nena lo-pu robare ni gupa giape , palipade suluabu parare , niri na bani yade lape .
01020014	Go rabu Abimalek-me sipisipi para gawa para kogono aa onanu page Abraham epa kasia , goa pua nipuna ore Sarah page wala nipuna kasa .
01020015	Abimalek-me lalo : Na suri ogepu apo naiyada , nena rana paliapara ape .
01020016	Sarah parare goa sa : Nena baniri neme mone ini ( tausen ) kina go kalaloda . Go piamere nepara nena rurunu rapuri agaa meda na salia lalo , nerapuri agaa ora ogesida page ora na salia .
01020017	Gote-me Abimalek-na rurupara ona nogo rayore nogo naki na madinasa . Akoloya , Abimalek-me Abraham-na ore Sarah nipu misada . Gore Abraham-me Gote repara beten paisa . Go rabu Gote-me Abimalek-maepeasa , ore para nipuna kogono nogonu page , goa pua nimumi nogo naki wala madisimi .
01020018	
01021001	Abiare Adaa Aa-na rana Sarah-repara nipuna sarupa wala pisa , ora mo Adaa Aa nipuna palua sia rupa ora goa pisa .
01021002	Sarah-me naki pada pirua Abraham-na naki yomagae dina madiaisa , gore ora mo Gote-me madiali sa dina madisa .
01021003	Abraham-me nipuna Sarah-me madiaisa nakina biri Aisak lo bi ma asa .
01021004	Aisak nipu yapidi ( 8 ) popisa raburi Abraham-me yogane mo Gote-me pipape sarupa ruguta pisa .
01021005	Abraham nipu mali 100 popenaloa nipuna si Aisak madisa .
01021006	Sarah-me lalo : Gote-me ni giri malasa , go rabu onaa rayome page go rema pagoa giri nirapu teme .
01021007	Nipumi wala lalo : Apimi Abraham-na naki madiawa adu katea sa pae ? Goyapare nipuna naki yomagae rana apo madiarude .
01021008	Aisak adayoa agina adu adawasa , go rabu adu adawaisa yapinare Abraham-me adaa eta meda iraisa .
01021009	Goyapare Sarah-me adisapare Ega mo Isip oname Abraham-na madiasa nakimi giri giri lala pirisa ,
01021010	go rabu Sarah-me Abraham para lalo : Apo ona-re pakogono ona yadega si-rapu pane raturuba , go kogono onana si-mi naa oyae rayore na si Aisak rapu mada na rumalipiga .
01021011	Go agaa-mere Abraham lokeda waru risa , gore nipuna si mada kone mapirasa pulu .
01021012	Yapare Gote-me nipupara lalo : Neme go naki para apo slav kogono ona lapopara lo-keda ogepu rubape . Goa peaga Sarah-me tea pagape . Apo ma ralali sude rururi gore Aisak mada para sude .
01021013	Neme mo kogono onana si madare ruru adapu warialua , akoloya nena si yada .
01021014	Wala riba-rekore Abraham-me eta-para ipa lapo noria pua Ega na pasana mariasa . Goa pua naki agiaya rapasa . Nipu aagiaya pua Besiba su kapune-pare opopawa pua pamudipiasipi .
01021015	No madisipi ipa diasa-raburi , mo naki repena-re meda-para ma-pirasa .
01021016	Goa pua ogeda mo-pare nenepu pua pirisa , mo naki omaala adape yada , gimoa pua re lala pirisa .
01021017	Gote-me mo nakina re lalaina pagesa . Gote-na Ensol-me yaa-para awa Ega yasaa : Ega , akepeada lae ? Neme pala naomape , Gote-me nena sina re pagade .
01021018	Nena naaki pua mua kimi mea ipu . Gore ne madare neme onaa adaapu maralama pena toa .
01021019	Gorabu Gote-me agina ini rupaina sa rabu nipumi ipa naaku meda adesa . Gore nipumi mo ipa meme mena yogane pe-para norua naki-mi nenalo pua kasa .
01021020	Gote nipu go naki-rapu pirisa-pulu adayabisa . Nipu mo su kapuni-pare aware yaa-yapa piapena makuae aa aisa .
01021021	Nipu mo Paran-su kapune pare aisa raburi , nipuna aagi-mi Isip ona meda yoto kasa .
01021022	Go yapinare Abimelek-para , yadapi aanuna Surube aa Pikol lapome Abraham-para lalo : Gote-re nena oyae meda pulalope-para ne rapu pia .
01021023	Abiare ni Gote-na ini-agaana goa napalualo lapawa ni-na makirape , o nina nogo-nakinu page , o gonumi madialimide page . Neme ne epea pawadeane epaa-aye adare page , epea paluaga neme ni ora epea pape .
01021024	Abraham-me lalo : Neme ora palua-sa .
01021025	Gore Abraham-me nipuna ipa-naaku Abimelek-na Kogono aame misa rabu Abimelek rapu agaa lalapasipi .
01021026	Gore Abimelek-me lalo : Goa panare apimi panapalo marea-sa . Ni aba nalagiaede pare , wala abia go pogolasatoda .
01021027	Gore Abraham-me mena sipisipi-para , mena gawa-para , meapua Abimelek pua kasa rabu , nipu lapo upasipi
01021028	Abraham-me sipisipi mena wai 7 kuta meda-para meamaisa .
01021029	Go rabu Abimelek-me Abraham gupa agaa-misa : Apo mena sipisipi 7 kuta rado para ainalaere , akolo-pi ?
01021030	Nipumi lalo : Go mena sipisipi neme meainalo pi , goa pali rabu mo ipa-naku neme awesade kone ina .
01021031	Goa-peada go suri Besiba teme , akoloya go-pare nipu lapona agaa aba rogaeisipi .
01021032	Abimelek-para yadapi aanuna aa mudu Pikol lapo nipu Wala Pilistia-nuna Su-para pisipi .
01021033	Abraham-me Tamariks repena-wai Besiba poaisa . Go pare-re nipumi Adaa Aa-na bi loa lotu Sa , go Gote-re oroyalo kagaa pia-loa .
01021034	Goa pua Abraham mo Pilistia aanuna Su-para adalupu pa awaisa .
01022001	Yapi medaloma popena loa , Gote-me Abraham kotisa . Gote-me nipu-para lalo : Abraham ! Abraham-me lalo : Ni go ayoda .
01022002	Go rabu Gote-me lalo : Nena si , nena si komea , Aisak , neme kone mapiranedere mo Moria su-para pulupa . Neme watoade pore medana iru madiayae miru pua irape .
01022003	Ribarekore Abraham rekataboa nipuna donki mena managolaisa . Nipumi Aisak-para , nipuna kogono aalaapo lamuripinisa . Nipumi iru madia yape miru irape repena mada rekepuare , nipu Gote-me pope sade-para pisa .
01022004	Repopa yapinare Abraham-me , mo polalo pisade su pua ada monesa .
01022005	Nipuna kogono aalaapo-para lalo : Donki mena-rapu ado atepape , naki sare mogo pare popona . Gote adaa-bi pua kaloa wala epopona .
01022006	Abraham-me iru madia yae miru irape repena kapuri , si Aisak mariawa , repena ega-para , rai napi lapore nipuna ki-para ripinisa . Goa pua nipu komeapara puamama pisipi .
01022007	Aisak-me araa Abraham-para lalo : Apa ? Abraham-me lalo : Na si akeya ? Aisak-me lalo : Mo repena ega-para repena kapu lapore go ripinitipa ga , mo iru madiayae miru irape mena sipisipi ra ?
01022008	Abraham-me lalo : Naa si , apo iru madiayape miru irape mena sipisipiri , Gote-me managolalia . Goa pua nipu padane-para pisipi .
01022009	Gote-me lakesade-para ipisipi raburi , Abraham-me ana reke meda go-para waria , repena kapu ana rekena isa . Goa puare sina ki alapo rogawa , so ana rekena musawa repena kapu mada saniasa isa .
01022010	Goa pua , nipuna ki ridulawa , rai napi mua si awolalo pisa .
01022011	Go rabu Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me soyapara awa yasa : Abraham ! Abraham ! Nipumi lalo : Go ayoda .
01022012	Apo naki mada ki napirape . Nipu mada yae meda napape , abiare makuato , ni Gote mada kone mapirarina , gore nena si padane yade kone nasaede . Ni pagulalo paede .
01022013	Abraham-me adasaisa pare sipisipi mena meda repena pala ubura ipara ima mapalaga tabaisa . Nipumi mo sipisipi pua mua si polo-para iru madiayae miru mea irisa .
01022014	Go rabu Abraham-me go suri : Adaa Aa-me Managolae sa . Gore abia page go pore-re Adaa Aa-me managola-walialo gupa pateme .
01022015	Adaa Aa-na Ensel-me soyapara awaa rana laapopa Abraham yaloa lalo :
01022016	Adaa Aa-me lalara nerapu agaa rogato , akepeadaya gore neme goa padeane , nena si ora naa loma naki padane pida nalade .
01022017	Neme ne ora maepeawa , nena maralalide rururi , uba kedonu yaapara ayade rupa page , ipa mu rupa page maralalua . Go maralalide rurumiri iyanu pabo-tu rubua , nimuna adarenu page nimu minabalimi .
01022018	Nena maralalide onaa madare , go su rayona onaa rayo maepealua . Gore neme na agaa pagaede pulu .
01022019	Abraham nipu wala nipuna kogono aa laapo asipi pare wala ipua Besiba nimuna padane para pisimi . Goa pua Abraham Besiba pua asa .
08001001	Agaa Pagoa rumaae aanumi Israel su surubisimi raburi reae ada meda pabisa . Betlem aa medare nipu Juda aa-ga pa ogepu yapina Moap supara aata pisa . Go aa-re nipuna ore-para si lapo page pisimi .
08001002	Go aana biri Elimalek pare orena biri Naomi yade . Si lapona biri Malon-para Kilion lapo . Pirisimi nimuri Eprata ruru gore Juda ruruna Betlem supara aawoa pisimi . Nimu Moap aata pisimi .
08001003	Go yapare Elimalek omesa raburi Naomi nipu si lapo raapu pirisa .
08001004	Orope naaki lapome Moap ona lapo misipi . Go ona lapona biri Opa-para Rut lapo pirisipi .
08001005	Gore Malon-para Kilion lapo page omesipi . Abiare Naomina aani-para si lapo page omesipi-pulu agurapo aasa .
08001006	Naomi-mi remaa gupa pagesa : Adaa Aa-me nape eta nipuna onaa kaloa epe raana kalalo pagesa . Go rabu nipuna aaya lapo raapu Moap su gima polalo managolasimi .
08001007	MoJudanuna su-para Naomi-para aaya lapo page pisimi pare pora pa pulawa .
08001008	Naomi-mi nipu goa lakesa : Nipi wala nipina ada pua nipina ama lapo raapu pua aatepape . Nipimi ni page na si lapo aba omapede page epea pisipide-pulu Adaa Aa-me page nipi epea mada palia .
08001009	Adaa Aa-me nipi rabamealia rabu nipi page aa pua epe-rupa mada aalipi . Naomi mi ona lapo para patalepape sa rabu nipumi re ora waru sipi
08001010	pare nipumi gipia loa nena onaana ada baina sipi .
08001011	Yapare Naomi-mi lalo : Diaga nipina ada palipina sa . Akepeada nipimi ni ratamea epalipiya ? Dia .
08001012	Niri onagae yade . Ni aa meda wala mada na-palua . Nipina adaa wala palipina . Go page neme abia go ribaa aa meda pua naaki madialua rabu
08001013	nipimi surubaawa go aa mada napalipi . Gore nasurubalipi nipi pa aanu meda palipina . Adaa Aa-me ni waea pisa-pulu , nipi page odo waru pia .
08001014	Rut Opa lapo upia re wala sipi . Opa-me Naomi patape loa pisa pare Rut-ri Naomi raapu pa aisa .
08001015	Go rabu Naomi-mi Rut goa lakesa : Ada , nena akini nipuna onaanuna ada pua nimuna makirae gote-nuya wala mo pulada . Ne page wala pulupa .
08001016	Gore Rut-me agaa gupa abusa : Ni ne minarepaawa ora pulo rutu natape . Ne palide suparare ni page pamuapana . Ne aali-parare ni page aawapana . Nena onaare nina onaa page yalia . Nena Gote-re nina Gote page yalia .
08001017	Ne omali-parare ni page omaluada rogaalimi . Yae medame saa naruguna lapana . Neraapu go rogaato agaada mabebola taluadare Adaa Aa-me ni mabebola talia . Omape yaeme ne saa rugulala paina .
08001018	Rut nipu Naomi raapu polalo agu rapesa-pulu nipu agaa wala meda nasa .
08001019	Goa pua nipu lapo Betlem pua pelapasipi . Naomi nipu Betlem pua opopasipi rabu go ada repara piri onaa reko oyasimi . Go rabu go ada piri ona medame goa sa : Gore Naomi ya ?
08001020	Go rabu nipumi nimu goa lakesa : Nimimi nipara Naomi bi wala natapape . Ni-para bi Mara tapape . Akoloya ? Gote puri rayona reme ni waea pisada lalo . Goa peaga ni kone wae mi ona-yapulu niparare Mara-ya tapape .
08001021	Ni go supara pa aaru raburi oyae adaapu waru oraaru pare Ada Aame ni wala mea epaa raburi oyae meda wala nasaayo . Ni kedaa ma-adasa rabu ni radaa ne .
08001022	Go remaare Naomi Moap su gimoa epena remaa yade . Rut Moap ona raapu nipuna ayaa ona pua nipu Betlem opopasipi . Gore rais bali ini napeyoa kereape yapi dina ipisipi .
08002001	Boas-re Elimalek-na ruru-para ada aa pirisa . Nipuri Naomi-na abana aanina ruru aa .
08002002	Yapi medame Rut-mi Naomi-para goa sa : Niri maapu-para aanumi ponatu amu peme rais balina ini kereta pulu . Kogono aanumida mada temedare gore nimu raapu aawa rais madiaa palua .
08002003	Gore Rut maapu-para mo kogono aanu ratamea pua rais bali-na ini pua makiroatasa . Go maapuri Elimelek-na ame Boas-na maapu kone na-isa . Boas-me Rut epea pisa .
08002004	Boas-me Betlem su gimoa nipuna kogono aanu piri epa pelapaawa go-rupa epe naarepa sa . Adaa Aa nimi raapu pirina sa . Gore nimumi nipuna agaa gorupa abusimi : Adaa Aa-me ne maepeaina .
08002005	Go rabu Boas-me surube aa gupa agaa misa : Go ona inumakua-re ane ruru nogo ya ?
08002006	Surube aame go-rupa abusa : Naomi raapu epape ya pare pa ruru nogo meda yade . Nipu Mopa gimoa epape-ya .
08002007	Nipumi ni agaamea apo aanu raapu pamua bali ini kiratano la . Nipu ora ribaa reko ripima kogono pua kitu ogesi go epa mealada .
08002008	Go rabu Boas-me Rut gupa lakesa : Go nogo , naa agaa paga . Ne wala maapu meda-para napope . Dia pa go maapuna balina ini keraina . Nena kogono ona-repa raapu kogono paina .
08002009	Kogono pimi-rupa adoa nimu raapu aape . Nina kogono aanu aba lakeloa ne waru surubalepapelo lakelawa . Ipa nala paliare apo no imiga nola pope .
08002010	Rut-me rumu pegepua suna kubuniaawa Boas-para goa lakesa : Niri pa ada meda ona yadega akepeada neme ni adoa epea pi ?
08002011	Boas-me agaa gupa abusa : Nena aani omenaloa nena aaya-para paeyade-a rayo aba pagawa . Ni makuaayo . Nena ama aapanu-para nena adare page gimaeyade . Goa pua nina onaanu raapu epa aaye .
08002012	Ne Gote piri epaena Israel-na Adaa Aa nipumi ne surubenalo . Gore nipumi nena pae epe aunu aba ada-pulu ne epe yoto gina .
08002013	Gore Rut-me Boas-na agaa gupa abusa : Neme ni ora epea waru pi . Niri nena epe kogono onanu nonapida dia pare neme ni epe agaa kuma pi lage rabu go-me nina pu robaa ne piri mea epea .
08002014	Eta nape raburi Boas-me Rut wala goa lakesa : Ne go-pare ipua bret meda epa mua wain-para pataawa naa . Go rabu Rut nipu kogono ona meda raapu pirisa . Go rabu Boas-me repena egaana irini bali medaloma kasa . Mea nisa rabu Rut-na robaa rubisada medaloma pa isa .
08002015	Rut-me eta no kiritua balina ini medaloma kirata isa . Go rabu Boas-me nipuna kogono aanupara goa sa : Nimi apo radala pira ia balina iniri Rut-me mea kirata ina tapape . Nimimi nipu ratu nayawalepape .
08002016	Nimimi balina rogorogo medaloma ma lopatepape . Nipumi mea kirataina nimimi nipu naratu rubalepape .
08002017	Rut-me rais balina ini amaa kirita amu pala pirina naare pabola popesa . Makiraata suare ini rada rada malaawa napere kirita isa . Nape iniri ten kilo popesa .
08002018	Rut-me adare-para mea pua aaya pua wasa . Naare-palu nisade etana purapina page aaya pua kasa .
08002019	Go rabu Naomi-mi Rut gupa agaa misa : Abiare balire aapara meae ? Nere kogono akepiane aana maapu-para pae ? Ne adoa kone saana aare Adaa Aa-me nipu epea pina . Go rabu Rut-me agaa gupa abusa : Abiare ni Boas-ne aa-na maapu kogono pawa sa .
08002020	Gore Naomi-mi lalo : Adaa Aa-me go aa ora ma-epeaina sa Adaa Aa nipuna palua ne-are aba omeme onaa page pa pimi onaa mada page ora pea : Naomi-mi wala goa sa : Go aare niana yapi mada ora niana ruru yade .
08002021	Gore Rut-me goa sa : Boas-me nipara wala goa la . Nere nipuna kogono onanu raapu kogono pua bali kirata sape kogono dia yalia rabu pua gimaina la .
08002022	Naomi-mi lalo : Ora lae Aaya . Gore neme aa medana maapu-para kogono pali raburi go aa-na kogono aa-numi ne wae-anu palimi . Goa peaga Boas-na kogono onanu raapu kogono paina .
08002023	Rut-me Boas-na kogono onanu raapu kogono paama pua bali-para wit lapo po kiritisa . Goa pua Rut nipu aaya raapu pa aasa .
08003001	Naomi-mi Rut gupa lakesa : Aaya pagae . Neme ne surubape aa meda asapano pae ? Ne suruboa waru ado aata pea-rupa .
08003002	Abiare paga go aa Boas nipuna kogono onanu raapu kogono paayadere ora nina yapi ria yade . Abia go ribaare rais balina yo kininu waritimi-para kogono palia .
08003003	Gore ne pua wel sada-nupara epe maninanu maraaawa nena yogane ipaa pua radepeape . Goa pua nipuna kogono palia-para pope . Gore nipuna ini aga-nare napope . Dia pare nipu eta ipanu aba no kiritina-lape .
08003004	Nipu u patula paliare pua patala-para waru adape . Pua nipuna aa-nane blaket pua musaawa age regepea pua patape . Orope neme goa papelo lagialia .
08003005	Rut-me agaa gupa abusa : Epeta . Neme nena agaa rayo ratalua .
08003006	Gore Rut-me Naomi-mi mo sade-rupa balina ini yo ada warini-para rekoa pisa .
08003007	Boas-me eta ipanu mada noare nipuna lo robaa epesa . Nipu u patala pisa-pulu rais-bali ubura i regepea pua patisa . Gore Rut pawa pua blaket pua musaawa Boas-na age regepea pua patisa .
08003008	Riba Boas nipu pereke tisa pare ona meda nipuna age regepea go epaa patisa rabu nipu pogolasaasa .
08003009	Go rabu nere api-ya palo agaa misa . Rut-me lalo : Ni Rut nena kogono ona meda yade . Nere Elimelek-na yapiga neme ni raba mua surubape .
08003010	Boas-me pagoa Rut-para agaa go-rupa abusa : Na wane Adaa Aa-me ne ora epea pina . Abia neme go piare nena aaya-para paeyade epea rayo page rabuaniate . Ogegeaa-re adapu aeme pare medalomare oyae imi medalomare na imi . Go yapare neme goanu meda palua kone nasaena .
08003011	Abiare naa wane pala naomape . Neme nena teare rayo palua . Ora lae . Niri nena aanina yapi medaa yapulu ne surubape kogono palua . Onaa rayome nere epe ona yana kone salimi .
08003012	E abiare ora lae . Niri nena aanina yapi meda yapulu neme ne mada surubalua . Go yapare aba ririnane aya aame go kogono rayo palia .
08003013	Abiare ne go-pare aape . Ekeraa yapipuri go aa-na kone adola palua . Ne surubalua teadare mada pare dia teare gore neme ne surubalua . Neme ora lalo Adaa Aa-me makuaaya . Abiare wala abi pata .
08003014	Gore Boas-me wala goa sa : Onanumi ne go-para epaenalo namakuaaena . Gore Rut wala Boas-na age rolopara wala patisa . Gore yapi abi naneaina pisa-pulu oname na-adesimi .
08003015	Wala Boas-me Rut-para lalo : Laplap meda mea ipua suaama epaa rabola sa . Rut-me goa pisa rabu Boas-me bali medaloma koyaasa . Bali-na kedare 20 kilo popisa . Boas-me minasaawa ma-riasa rabu Rut-me ria pisa . Boas nipu wala adare-para pisa .
08003016	Rut ada pua opapasa rabu aayame lalo : Aaya apore ora neya ? Go rabu Rut-me Boas-me goa palo rayo lakesa .
08003017	Rut-me lalo : Boas-me lalaara nena aaya piri pa napainalo bali medaloma rumaawa mea gia .
08003018	Gore Naomi-mi lalo : Aaya ogeda pa adoa . Apo aare pa napiralia . Diaagaa pamu maredepo yalaara pia . Paliare saa na-adepa .
08004001	Oropere Boas adare-na poragape-nane onaa kiritae-pare pua pirisa . Mo aba lade aa Elimelek-na medapara pati repera ipasa . Boas-me adami Aa ya loa go pare ipua epa pira . Nin go pare pua pirisa .
08004002	Boas-me aa mudunu ( 10 ) mua gupa lakesa : Nimi epa piralepa . Gore nimu epa pirisimi .
08004003	Nipumi nipuna yapi medagupa lakesa : Naomi-ri Moap gimoa wala epade pare sana yapi Elimalek-na sudere medame kabenalo rapata .
08004004	Goa lagialua-me lawade . Neme kabali-dare gore go aa mudunu-para pa aanu medaloma go epa pimi-nuna ini agaana kabaina . Nere ora aba repara yapi yade pulu neme kabainalo lawade . Nakabaliri gore ni lagi . Gore mo aame lalo : Kabalua sa .
08004005	Boas lakesa apo Naomi-para Rut lapona su kabalidare apo Moap ona Rut page meape nena ore pirina . Goa pua go suri mo omesade aana ruru repara ina .
08004006	Mo aa nipumi lalo : Gore apo yaere na yapare naa naakinu raapu page pa naki meda raapu nina yaenu pa narumalua . Ni apo su na kabalua pare goa peaga abiare nena iya .
08004007	( Abare Israel ruruna oyae meda kabapenare go page oyae ropo ropo papenare gore goa pala pisimi . Aa medame nipuna age ada koyo rua meda kalala pisimi . Israel onaame agaa rogaa penare goa pala pisimi . )
08004008	Go rabu mode aame Boas gupa lakesa : Go suri nena kabaina . Goa loa nipuna age ada koya paawa Boas kasa .
08004009	Oropere Boas-me aa mudunu-para pa onaa medaloma-para goa sa : Nimi rayome adalepa Abare Naomi-para Elimelek-para Kilion-para Malon aalana oyae rayo sarude . Go yapare abiare go oyae raayome neme apo kabaloda .
08004010	Agaa meda wala lano . Rut page na ore pirinalo go mealoda . Rut-re mo Moap ona Malon-me mua pirina omesade . Rut mealua rabu Malon-na su ruginiri nipuna ruru-para ina . Gore go ome aana onamere nipuna bi pa oroyala niminaina . Abia nimi apo piare royome apo adalemeda .
08004011	Onaa rayome talo : E Goa rayo apo adoa makuatema-da . Aa mudunu-mi lalo : Go onare abia nena ada-para epena gore Adaa Aa-me nipu ma-epeaina . Goa pua Resel-para Lea lapo-rupa ma-epaina . Niaa Israel ruruna aaya lapo rupa pirina . Nere Eprata ruruna adaa aa pirua Betlem suna adaa bi ina .
08004012	Adaa Aa-me nipi nogo naaki adaapu gialia . Goa pua Peres ruru-para Juda-para Tama-na sinu rupa alimi .
08004013	Gore Boas-me Rut misa-pulu Adaa Aame nipu epea pisa . Rut naaki pada pirua naaki meda madisa .
08004014	Gore onanumi Naomi gupa lakesimi : Adaa Aa-na bi minasaamina . Abiare ne naaki meda apo giade . Go naakiri nena aaya naki yapulu nipumi ne mada surubalia . Nipumi go Israel ruruna adaa bi mada mealia .
08004015	Aaya neme raana omae-pulu neme page nipu raaname waru ome . Gore neme naaki seven ( 7 ) madu i lae pare go nena aaya ona raana ome-rupa mada raana na omola pae . Go abia madu sae naakimiri ne waru suruboa onagae pirali rabu epe-rupa surubalia .
08004016	Gore Naomi-mi naaki mua repara mea saba pirisa .
08004017	Go ada onanumi goa simi : Naomi-ri naaki saba pia simi . Mo naakina biri Obet lo bi ma-asimi . Oropere Jesina aaraa pirisa . Jesi-ri Devit-na Aara pirisa .
08004018	Gore Peres na ruru pua Devit mada lo kirutu : Peres-re Esron-na aaraa pirisa .
08004019	Esron-re Ram-na aaraa pirisa . Ram-re Aminadap-na aaraa pirisa .
08004020	Aminadap-re Nason-na aaraa pirisa . Nason-re Salmon-na aaraa pirisa .
08004021	Salmon-re Boas-na aaraa pirisa . Boas-re Obet-na aaraa pirisa .
08004022	Obet-re Jesina aaraa pirisa . Jesi-re Devit-na aaraa pirisa .
20001001	Go buk madaare Devit-na si Israel onaana aa mudu king Solomon-me go epe agaa tu isa . Goa pua onaa epe-rupa pirinalo tu isa .
20001002	Go Epe agaa-me niaa epe kone gua niaa maredepo yalia . Go agaa rayo waru adalima rabu niaa epe kone sua epe pora ratape-rupa mogealia .
20001003	Go buk madaa iya agaa pagoa adoa ratalima rabu onaa rayome peme-rupa epe kone mua ratalima .
20001004	Go yapare aa medaloma kone rudu yalia rabu go buku madaa kone mua nimu epe kone mada mealimi . Goa pua ogegeaa medaloma epe kone mealimi-pulu epe pora mada pamualimi .
20001005	Go buk madaare aa medalomame epe kone ratinalo makuae yae mogealia-pulu epe-rupa makuaalimi . Go buk-miri niaa saa agaa page , mada-mi agaa page paga-i agaa page lagialia rabu makuae aanu-na epe pora adoa makuaalima .
20001006	
20001007	Go yapare neme epe makuae yae meda mulalo paliri neme Adaa Aa madaa kone aba rulape . Aa medaloma epe kone naimiri nimu epe makuae yae meape gimeme .
20001008	Nogo naaki nimimi-ri nimina ama aapa laapo-na agaa waru pagoa ratalepape .
20001009	Nimuna agaame ne epe aa ma-aulalia . Gore epe raguna adipemede-rupa mada adipali .
20001010	Nogo naaki-nu paake pupitagi ne aanumi nimi omeme pua wae-para mea palimi waru adalepape .
20001011	Go piaene wae aanumi gupa teme : Go naaki ne aipapulu ipu . Abia niaame aa meda tamina . Niaame pora-nini suruboa aanu medaloma tu-maomamina . Nimu epe aanu epalimi page , pina pa tu maomamina . Gore niaana kone-me niminaalima yae rayo pa pamina .
20001012	Niaame nimu ora aipapulu tu-maomawa . Onaa omeme robona tu maomaina . Goa palima rabu mo onaa rogaaeme tapa-para rogaaeme-rupa pamina teme .
20001013	Go aanuna oyae luabu muare niana ada rubitabena samina .
20001014	Ne niaa raapu goanu pamina lo epaliri oyaenu adaapu mua nena ada-para rubina saina teme .
20001015	Go naaki pupitagi ne aanumi ne-para goa temere , nimuna agaa napage gimape . Nimuna go waea kone naratamea pope .
20001016	Aanuri nimu waeagu peme . Goa pua oroyalo nimumi pa onaanu agu tu-rubebe pape kone imi .
20001017	Onaame oroyalo pupitagi noalimiri nimu wae yoto mealimi . Gore yapa lokeme nipuna maa-para ope poga marayade-rupa nimuna bipa ope neme . Yaanuri ini rua , poga imi rabu adoa nimu mo poga mada naroaeme .
20001018	
20001019	Go yapare mo pupitagi neme aanumiri , go kone na-i ope nape kone sua pupitagi pa noaeme . Gore nimu paake meme oyaenumi , nimu ma-oyatalia .
20001020	Epe konena porare ona meda-me pora-nini aawa page maket-nini aawa page onaa yaloaaya-rupare epe kone go-rupa epea .
20001021	Nipu adaa ada kagurena pora kerepo-para aawa page onaa adaapu kiritae-pare awa page yaloa agaa ta-rupa mada pea .
20001022	Nimi kone rudu ta onaa page , oroyalo gupa agu mada piralimi ya ? Nimi maeyae onaanumi epe kone namealimiri pa ero agaa agu teme . Arabu nimimi go wae kone gimalimi ya ?
20001023	Nimina wae yaenu gimaliminalo neme agaa puri pane lagialo . Naa agaa pagalimiri neme epe kone epe pora watoa rabu nimi epealimi .
20001024	Neme ni piri ipulupa loa yaato pare nimimi oroyalo gimoa naepeme .
20001025	Nimimi na epe agaa pagoa nina kone ratalepa to pare agaa rasua epe agaa gimeme .
20001026	Go peapulu kedaa adaa medaa nimi madaa epaliare neme page nimimi peme-rupa adoa gimalua . Nimi wae-rupa piralimi page neme giri laawa gimalua .
20001027	Nimi madaare kedaa adaa poripu puri pane epeade-rupa epalia . Kedaa page radaa pi yaenu epalia raburi adaa poripu magomawae-rupa epalia-ga adalimina .
20001028	Kedaa epalia raburi ni ipu loa yateme pare ni mada naepalua . Goa pua nimimi ni asapu piralimi pare nimimi ni mada na-adalimi .
20001029	Nimimi Adaa Aa-na epe kone rolo-para pirape gimeme-pulu nimi gimalua .
20001030	Nimi naa epe agaa rasua neme nimi ma-redepo yatalo-pe rabu agaa rasua gimeme .
20001031	Goa pea-pulu abiare nimina peme waea luabuna yotore nimina bipa mada mealimina .
20001032	Epe kone na-imi onaame ni maasa rilaeme . Goa peme-pulu nimu alupalimi . Goa pua nimuna bipa maeyaawa waea rayo nimumi makuaema kone imi . Go koneme nimuna bipa oyalimi .
20001033	Go yapare onaa medaloma naa agaa pagoa ratalimiri nimu epe-rupa piralimi . Goa palimiri nimu madaa wae kedaa epalia rabu nimu epe-rupa pirua mogo wae yaenu madaa na-adalimi .
20002001	Nogo naakinu nimimi naa agaa waru pago ratua , nimina kone-para waru niminaatepape .
20002002	Epe makuae-yae waru mua teme agaa rayo waru ratua epe naaki nogo mada piralimina .
20002003	Epe konena agaa ne madaa epena go agaa meape . Gore onaa yateme rabu pimide rupa mada piralimina .
20002004	Aa medame kalai-pu kogono pua no su runane pagaa i gol aana mulalo kogono radaa pina pea-rupa epe kone mulalo-re radaa pina kogono go-rupa pape .
20002005	Neme goa rayo pali-dare neme Adaa Aa-na kone rayo mada adasali . Goa paliri neme Gote page nipu kone waru rulaaye .
20002006	Gore akolo ya ? Aa adaa nipuri ora oyae rayona re yade . Nipumi epe kone gua makuae yae page oyae rayo nipumi niaa guaaya .
20002007	Adaa Aa nipuna agaa pagoa rateme onaanuri wae yae epe yaenu page adoa rumaeme . Goa peme-pulu Adaa Aa-me nimu waru suruboa wae-para nalopena epe-rupa pirina tea .
20002008	Gote-me nipuna agaa pogoa rateme onaanuri nipuna surube kuta runane mapiraaya .
20002009	Nogo naaki nimi epe kone adoa ratalimi-dare epe pora luabu adoa pamualimi . Epe agaa rateme aanu medaloma page epe kone rumaawa epe pora mada mea watea .
20002010	Goa pua epe kone adaapu nena robaa-para rubialia rabu raana-me omali .
20002011	Epe kone ratali raburi epea luabumi ne raana gua ne madaa rubia kuma gialia .
20002012	Goa pua waea peme aanu-para agaa wae-rupa teme aa-nu raapu medaa-para napirape .
20002013	Go aanu nimu epe pora gimoa wae ribaane pora ratua waea puaeme .
20002014	Gore nimu wae pora ratulalo pedo pu rana omoaeme .
20002015	Go aanuna konere pugu pua bebolo maeya tea .
20002016	Gore aa medana oreme omeme pua paake nape kone salia-dare epe kone aba go agaa-para epalia . Goa palia raburi neme mogo onana kone adoa mada gimali .
20002017	Go piaene onamere abade ona inumakua pirua aani raapu ki mua pirisipide-agaa gimoa waea pape kone mualia . Gore Gote-na ini agaa madaa ora lalo loa misipide agaa page gimea .
20002018	Go rabu neme go ona rata mea pali-daare neme aba ome onaa ratamea pe .
20002019	Go ona adola peme aanu nimu oro yalo epe-rupa pirape pora gimoa wae pora ratulalo peme-pulu epe pora narateme .
20002020	Epe pora ratamea pope kone salidare neme epe pora ratua mada niminaali .
20002021	Epe aanuri go su-ama oro yalo epe pora ratua pa piralimi .
20002022	Go yapare Gote-me waea pi aanu nimu ratu talia . Gore onaame nimuna maapu-para etaa wae mea rasu rubeme-rupa nimu mea rasu rubalia .
20003001	Go naaki neme ne agaa mana lagialo-ga waru pagape . Kone narugulape pare oro yalo neme go agaa waru pagoa ratape .
20003002	Neme go agaa mana pagoa ratali raburi ne go suamaa oro yalo eperupa pirali . Goa pua ne redepone porana aawali .
20003003	Neme aa meda raapu adapua aawape page aa meda lorobaa kalape kone page waru sua aape . Go agaa luabu nena kone-para mea sua nena maa-para epe kulubu oyae ma-imi-rupa madaa masaape .
20003004	Neme goa pali-daare onaa luabumi ne raana omoa nena palide kogono epeta teme . Goa palimi rabu Gote-me page ne raaname omalia .
20003005	Neme Aapa Gote madaa kone ora waru rulaawa eperupa piraina . Neme nina bipa makuae yae madaa epe-rupa aalua kone nasape .
20003006	Neme oyae luabu pulalo paliri Adaa Aa madaa kone aba rulaawa pape . Go rabu nipumi ne epe redepone pora mea watea .
20003007	Neme nina makuae yaere ora warua-da pe kone nasape . Neme Adaa Aa madaa kone rulaawa nipuna rolo-para pirua waea napape .
20003008	Neme goa pali-daare ora epealia . Neme yaina omoa marasini nemede rabu to yogaene raba mealade-rupa mada go epe pora ratali rabu ne epe-rupa mada aali .
20003009	Nena maapu-para eta meda napeyoa poralia raburi mua Adaa Aa nipu re-para orapi-lo kalape . Goa pali-daare go madaa Adaa Aa nipu adaa bi mada mealia .
20003010	Orapi-loa pa kate rabu Adaa Aa-me nena maapu-para eta nape yae ora waru ma-opaalia . Goa pua nena ada-para eta oyae luabu rulatabalia . Goa pua nena waini-pe page rubia koya-pape palia .
20003011	Go naaki , Adaa Aa-me ne raba mulalo oyae meda palia-dare , neme ratu nayawe nena lo-robaa maepeape .
20003012	Gore akoloya ? Adaa Aa nipumi raaname omea onaa-re maredepo yaaya . Niaana aapanumi nimuna nogo naakinu kone rulaawa suruboa maredepo yaeme-rupa mada pea .
20003013	Aa medame go epe kone-para makuae yae lapo mealia-daare nipu pedo pinawa .
20003014	Gore akolo ya ? Ora epede silva gol page epe kone-me rabuaniaaya .
20003015	Mone yoto adaa pea aana gol page , pa oyae medaloma neme ora epeta kone sua raaname ome yaenu page rabuniaaya .
20003016	Epe kone agu suali-dare ne epe kone oro yalo sua oyae page adaapu sua go su-amaa adaalu-pu mada piruaawa onaanumi nena bi minasaalimi .
20003017	Epe koneme nena pu robaa-para raana waru gua go su-amaa adaalu-pu pirape yae page ora ma-epeaalia .
20003018	Epe koneme-re onaa epe-rupa piraama pope kone mea gialia . Gore oro-yalo kagaa piraama laama popena paa kato nona piane repena-rupa aalimi .
20003019	Adaa Aa nipuna epe kone sua go su-yaa laapo ripima warisa . Nipumi su-para ipa raku-inaloa moae kobere yaa madaa masaawa yai malopaaya .
20003020	
20003021	Naa si neme gimali-ga waru adoa epe kone-para makua yae lapo waru irulu saabape .
20003022	Goa pea epe kone-para epe makuae yae laapomere ne oro yalo piraama laama pope kone gua epe pepena-rupa pua aawali .
20003023	Goa pua ne epe pora pamuali rabu oyae medame nena Ã Ã  mada na-aawalia .
20003024	Ne u-patulalo pali rabu ne oyae meda pala na-omali .
20003025	Gore neme Adaa Aa madaa kone waru puri paboa rulali-dare iaa-numi ne tulalo yada salimi page nimuna agona-para ne mada na-odobali . Wae yapi-di meda waea palimide aanu madaa opopalia rabu ne napogola sali . Go piaene yapi-di nimu madaa yai-poripu laapo epea-rupa mada epea .
20003026	
20003027	Aa meda oyae rudu yaliada agaa mealiare oyae adaapu saina kalape . Dia yaliare nakalape .
20003028	Nena adami aame oyae agaa mealia rabu katalo paliri , pa ogesi-da puaa adoaa nalape . Ekera wala epali rabu gialua-ga lo gorupa nalape .
20003029	Nena adami aanu ne raapu re-para pimiri , ne nimuna adami aa kone imi-ga nimuna kone nama-oyaape .
20003030	Aa medame ne-para waea napalia-dare go aa nipu raapu yada-yada napipape .
20003031	Nena kone mo yada pi aanuna pea-rupa maeyaawa nimumi go peme-a luabu naratape . Goa pua nimumi pamualimi pora rayo gimape .
20003032	Adaa Aa-me wae kone imi aanuri gimea-daa lalo . Goa pea pare Adaa Aa nipumi epe pora ratua epe kone imi aanu page nipuna epe pu-robaa kata . Goa pua nimu waru surubea .
20003033	Adaa Aa-me gupa ta : waea peme aanu luabu nimuri , nimuna ona nogo naaki luabu raapu alupalimi ta . Go yapare Adaa Aa-me epe redepone onaare nipuna ona nogo naaki oyae luabu epe-rupa suruboa raba mealia rabu epe-rupa piralimi ta .
20003034	Aa medame aa yagonu-para ero agaa teme-daare , Gote-me go aa nipu page ero agaa tea . Pare aanu medaloma epe kone-sua ae aanuri Gote-me nipuna epe kone luabu abutea .
20003035	Epe kone imi aanu-ri onaa luabumi epe bi kateme . Go yapare kone wae-imi aanuri nimuna bipa nimuna bi ma-oyatalo peme .
20004001	Go nogo naaki nimimi nina agaa waru pagalepa . Ni nimina aapa-ga , nimimi ni madaa epe kone mealepape .
20004002	Agaa neme go lagialo-re epeta-ga , nimimi narubalepape . Pa yae kone sua rubalimi raburi nimi omalimi .
20004003	Nina amame naaki meda abi namadini ni komea madu isa-pulu , nipumi ni madaa raana omea .
20004004	Gore ni oge naaki pirano aapa nipumi ni agaa mana gupa lagisa . Nina agaa nena kone-para waru mea sua go agaa ratape sa . Goa pali rabu ne ora epe-rupa piru diayali sa .
20004005	Neme epe kone mua kone-para mea rubina lape . Neme naa agaa mea rubebe pua kone narugulape .
20004006	Dia neme epe kone nagimape . Go agaame ne epe-rupa surubalia rabu ne ora epe aa pirali .
20004007	Gore neme aba ripia mealiare epe kone ora riri-nane meape . Neme oyae medaloma meaayo kone saliri epe yaere epe kone yade .
20004008	Neme epe kone raaname omoa irulu sabaali raburi , go epe kone-me ne adaa bi gialia . Go rabu ne ora epe aa pirali .
20004009	Goa pua nena aalu mada king aa mudu medana raguna nona piene adipua aali .
20004010	Go naaki neme nina agaa pagoa ratali rabu ne go su-amaa oro yalo adaalu-pu piruali .
20004011	Neme ne epe pora mea waloa epe pora-nini painalo maredepo yaayo .
20004012	Gore ne go pora ratua paali rabu oyae medame mada nama-oyaalia .
20004013	Ne oroyalo pirama lama pope agaa-re , nina agaa ya-pulu ratali rabu go-para ia agaame ne waru surubalia .
20004014	Neme wae aanuna agaa gimoa nimuna pulalo palimide-anu page gimape .
20004015	Neme go pora gimoa pogola pua su-adaalu meda-nane pope .
20004016	Gore mo waea puaeme aanumi waea meda napalimiri , nimu u-mada napatalimi . Nimumi waea palimi-daare , nimu u mada patalimi .
20004017	Wae kone-para wae pora ratua aa yagonu ma-oyapere pupitagi ne aanu nimuna eta-ne yae-rupa noaeme .
20004018	Wae aa luabu nimuna ini-para ribaa waru ta-pulu , nimuna Ã Ã  koyatimi awolalo palia page mada na-adalimi . Go yapare epe-rupa redepoya piri aanuna porare nimu naare yapi-pu roa paa putalade nona piane-pare piralimi .
20004019	
20004020	Go naaki nina agaa nena aane-para penaloa waru pagape .
20004021	Neme go agaa puri paloa kone-para mea sua waru irulu makuabape . Go agaa kone rugulaliri ne oyali .
20004022	Neme naa agaa pagoa ratali rabu go agaame ne epe-rupa pirama pope pora mea gialia . Goa pua go agaa-me ne ora epe redepoya mapiraalia .
20004023	Epe koneme ne maredepo yatalo nena kone-para epaliare , ipa naaku-para yokoa epeade-rupa epea . Oroyalo nena pora pamuape page nena kone wasupa luabu waru maredepo yaawa pamuape .
20004024	Neme yaa agaa na-lo wae yaenu page ora gimape .
20004025	Neme inimini na-pi mo ne palide pora waru adoa go pora ratape .
20004026	Nena kone ora epe-rupa redepo yaaina nena pora epe-rupa adoa ratua pamuape .
20004027	Neme mo epe pora pamuaaridere na-kone rugulape . Dia-ga ne popoke-nane puala wala koya-nane epala napape . Goa pua neme wae yae luabu gimapena pora adoa ratape .
20005001	Naa si neme ne ora epe agaa gua ne makuae yaenu page gua epe pora mea watalo pi .
20005002	Nena te agaa page epe-rupa te rabu nena te agaa luabu makuae aa-me ne nona-piane pagalimi .
20005003	Neme goa paliri akolo yapae ? Ona medame aani gimoa ne ogeyaliari epe omeme pua rede-pi agaa medaloma lagialia-re nipu yolainalo goa palia .
20005004	Go rabu neme nipuna agaa pagoa nipu yote-daare orope go yaere wae yae yaana kone sali . Goa paliri etaame onaa imu apetabalade-rupa page wae rero pi marasini mea noa pirimi adalia .
20005005	Go piaene oname ne wae onaa omeme sunane mea palia .
20005006	Go piane ona nipuri epe pirama-lama pope supara pope kone naniminaaya . Dia nipu go wae pora yade kone page na-ia . Nipu pa wae pora kuruape mada pamuaya . Goa pua nipu pa bebolaaya .
20005007	Go naaki neme go agaa nagimi waru pagoa ratape .
20005008	Go piane ona nipuna ada poragape-para page nape . Nipu pakeaawa ne yolamonea aape . Goa pua nipu ora gimape .
20005009	Neme go onana kone adoa ratali raburi nena epe bi gimali . Nipuna aanimi ne lo-robaa mada nagialia . Dia ne pena ogegeaa aina tumaomalia .
20005010	Ne epe-yae meda mealua loa kalai-pu kogono pu su piralide yae , wala aa medame nipu mealia .
20005011	Ne yaina adaa omoa uni kebo-agitua re loa ada-para suaawa omali .
20005012	Go rabu neme gupa te : ni ora maeyaarude-ga akolo pawa pae te ? Aa medalomame ni maredepo yaawa agaa wariaina lapede pawaaya te .
20005013	Neme nina mogeriae aanuna agaa rasua napagawa-rupa loali .
20005014	Abia ni onaa luabuna ini agaa madaa oyoa yala polalo te .
20005015	Nere nena ona raapu waru epe-rupa pirua pa aa medana ipa naaku-para napua nape . Goa pua nena ona raapu agu-patape . Aa meda nipuna ipa raana-para agu raapo nea-rupa nena agu raapo gupa nape .
20005016	Neme go onanu raapu nogo naakinu pa madua minarepali-dare , orope go nogo naakinumi ne mada naraba mealimi . Goa palimi-ga nena ona padaneme nena nogo naaki ora nena madu saina lape .
20005017	Neme paake naaki madu rubebe pualiri oyalia . Goa pua nena nogo naaki luabu pa onaanu raapu bebolo pitimi .
20005018	Nena ona-re nena ipa naaku rubita-rupa ya-pulu , Gote-me nena ona raaname omoa nipi raita epe agaa mana salia rabu epe-rupa pitipi .
20005019	Gore ora epe nape nanea ya-pulu oro yalo yalo ne rana gua nipuna epea luabu madaa ne ora raaname omalia . Goa pua rana waru omoa oro yalo nipuna adu mada page rana waru omape .
20005020	Go naaki neme oro yalo kone adaapu sua aa medana ona paake yolape mada kone penaloa nipuna adu oraape madaa ali-ga waru adape .
20005021	Adaa Aa-me niaame pema yae luabu page niaana ima kone luabu page aba adea-ga makuaawa aape .
20005022	Aa nipuna pea wae pupitagi luabumi nipuna maa-para ope poga sua maraaya . Nipuna go pupitagi-mi nipu mea adia konaa mada roaawa wae-rupa omolalo pea .
20005023	Go piaene aa nipuna bipa nipuna raana narabuaniaawa nipuna pea wae yaeme nipu adia maeyane aa-rupa pia . Goa puaaya-pulu nipuna bipa go pea pupitagimi nipu tumaomalia .
20006001	Go naaki aa medame pa aa medana rudu mua , nipuna bipa abula-peawi nasalia rabu neme na-abulaliri go kone epe-da dia .
20006002	Go koneme nena bipa ope poga sua nena maa-para ope aawa adibaya . Goa pea-pulu ne go rudu palia agaame ne adialia .
20006003	Go naaki ne wae yaeme adini rolo-para pirali-daare go wae yae luaburi abi gimape . Ne mogo wae aa-na pupitagi-na rolo-para napirape . Neme mogo rudu te agaa madaa yala poloa nagime . Ne pua mo palua te agaa lapaina yala napone abi pua agaa pua mupape . Goare ora aipapulu pape .
20006004	Ne u-ogeapu patu-piruae aipapu-loa abi pope .
20006005	Nena maa-para aba aaya ope poga aipapulu esepe rubape . Gore yaa-maitame nipu poga i-para pakeaawa naroalade-rupa pakeape .
20006006	Nimi ki-aa rakepea gi madini aanu nimiri neme agaa gupa lagialo . Nimi mo ini rubu-pi aame rakutanu-me pea aba adoa kone makuae aa-rupa piralepa .
20006007	Rakutanu nimuna aa mudu page nimuna surube aa page meda napimi .
20006008	Go yapare nimuna eta adaapu suaaya raburi eta diayalia rabu mea nolalo pa mea kirita suaeme .
20006009	Goa peme-ga nimi ki-aa rakepene aanu nimiri pa u-patu pirape mada raana waru pea pae ? Nimi go ki-aa rakepene aanuri aa-rabu u rekataboa aalimi yapae ?
20006010	Nimimi goa teme : niaa u ogesida pataluame pima pare wala ogesida kitu mua rekalima teme .
20006011	Nimimi goa palimi-daare nimina oyaenu aipapulu diyalia rabu aa naara piralimi . Paake ne aanumi nimina oyae paake meme rabu diatade-rupa pa alia .
20006012	Wae aanu nimimi yaa agaa ora waru temede .
20006013	Nimuna wae aa yagonumi adenalo gupa peme . Ne makirate rabu kimi page Ã Ã -me page inimi robo page sua nimuna waea pape agu mea wateme .
20006014	Oro yalo nimumi waea pape madaa kone rulaawa aanu medaloma kone wae ma-saaeme .
20006015	Goa peme raburi nimu kedaa adaa aipapulu meme rabu go kedaa wala ma-epeape-rupa kalai pua omalimi .
20006016	Adaa Aa-me pupitagi ne kone ipa kerepopu ( 7 ) peme-a luabu madaa-re nipumi raana na-omea .
20006017	Wae pupitagi ne-para aa yago meda adoa go aare pinawa kone imiapara , yaa agaa temena . Go page re-para aa yago meda re-nai madaa pama tumaomaeme . Nimumi waea pape madaa agu kone mapiraeme-para , waea pape-para pupitagi neme . Wae pupitagi pape madaa kone mapiraeme-para koso madaa yaa agaa adaapu teme . Go page nimuna amenu rapu agaa rado rado loa wae-kone masaeme .
20006018	
20006019	
20006020	Go naaki neme nena ama aapa laapo-na agaa pagoa ratape . Nipumi tepe agaa narasalepape .
20006021	Neme nipuna agaa kone-para mea sua oro yalo ratape . Go konere nena maa-para maasape kulubu-rupa masua pirali rabu ora epealia .
20006022	Ne pora pamulalo pali rabu go agaa-me epe pora mea watea . Ne u-patali rabu page go agaa-me ne surubalia . Ne u-patua rekali rabu page go agaame epe kone wasupa gua surubalia .
20006023	Nena ama aapana agaare laba paame pora mea watade-rupa mada ne pora mea watea . Nena ama aapa lapome ne go agaa lagialipi rabu go su-amaa epe-rupa aawape pora mea watepe .
20006024	Nipuna agaa-me ne rabamealipi rabu , ona wae-me ne kotulalo mada na-epalia . Aa medana oreme epe redepi agaa lagialia page napagape .
20006025	Neme go onana epenape-nane to madaa epaame naomape . Go rabu nipumi paake nalipinalo ne adoba saliaga nipu aae repara napope .
20006026	Gore aa medame paake aa rume ona raapu paake nalia-dare adaa yoto nakaloa pea . Gore pa oge etana yotosi peade-rupa mada kata . Gupa yapare aa medana ona raapu paake pupitagi no patalipi-daare adaa yoto waru rubalia . Goa pua nipuna bipa nipuna kone wasupa page tumaomalia .
20006027	Gore neme repena egaa ako-para mea pagali raburi nena ma-raalide seti mada naralia ya ?
20006028	Go page repena egaa ralaina Ã Ã -me rabua talimi raburi nimina Ã Ã  page mada naralia ya ?
20006029	Padane go-rupa aguri ne aa medana ore raapu paake pupitagi no patalipi-daare neme adaina kone ianu palimi .
20006030	Gore aa medame page nipu reaeme omoa aa medanuna maapu paake-nea raburi , go maapure onaa-me go aa nipu abi natemede .
20006031	Go yapare nimumi go paake-ne adasalimi rabu nipu koso laawa adialimi rabu oyae adaapumi abutea . Gore nipuna ada-para i oyae luabu ma-diayape-rupa madame abutea .
20006032	Go yapare aa medame mo aa medana ore raapu patua nipumi paake yotea-dare go aa nipu waea adaape pea . Aa medame pupitagi nalia-dare nipuna bipa nipu ma-oyaaya .
20006033	Gore aanumi nipu tua yala mapolaawa aape teme rabu oroyalo yala pola aalia .
20006034	Aa medame aa medana orenu raapu paake no pataliare onaa luabumi go aa ratu yawalimi . Go-rupa aguri mo aani nipumi go aa nipu radaa nena tua waea palia . Go aa nipu ogesi-da odome omape-re ora mada dia .
20006035	Goa pua rono lorenalo mone adaapu aani kate-pare mada namealia .
20007001	Go naaki neme nina agaa waru pago ratua nena kone-para mea saape .
20007002	Nina agaa pagoa ratali rabu ne oroyalo epe-rupa mada piruali . Nina agaa-re nena ini surube-rupa waru surubape .
20007003	Nina agaa nena kone-para oroyalo waru inaloa aape . Oroyalo kiaalo nena-ki madaa mapiraae-rupa mada pirinalape .
20007004	Epe kone-para epe makuae yae lapo rata nena kone-para inaloa aape . Gore nena baani-para epe aa yago raapu aatede-rupa mada aape .
20007005	Aa medana ore-me ne ogeyoa nipu raapu paake napana tea raburi epe kone ne raapu oro yalo piralia-pulu ne goa mada napali . Goa pea-pulu neme go onana agaa mada gimali .
20007006	Yapi medame nina ada-para pirua widua-para ini penaato pare no pora-nini ogegeaanu pamuaeme . Gore nimu epe kone page makuae yae page yada ora na-i madaa pama pamuaeme . Goa peme pare aa padane-ma nipu ora maeyaaya .
20007007	
20007008	Ogegeaa nipuri ona ora wae piri medana ada pera-pera pamea .
20007009	Gore naare pabola penaloa ribaa yolalo popea .
20007010	Mo ona nipuri pora pami onanumi pemede-rupa pepena pua nipumi mo ogege aame adena kone ia . Goa pua mo-aa puaa mada lamu mea .
20007011	Go onare nipu ora wae pupitagi ne ona yalo nipuna ada-para page epe-rupa napia .
20007012	Oro yalo nipu makete-nini page pora-nini pamualaina pua nipuna ada-para page epe-rupa napia . Aa agu asapala pirina pea .
20007013	Neme adesu pare go ogege aa i rulu ripinaawa nipumi nunu lalaina adesu . Goa pua mo oname nipuna ini agaa-para adabaa sua goa sa .
20007014	Abiare nina ada-para agu raapo pirua opa kalape yaere meda iya-daa sa .
20007015	Goaene nina ada gimoa ne asapula epawa . Goa pawa-pulu abia ne go epa adalo-da .
20007016	Goa pua ne patape yapara page aba rabolo saayo . Go yapara rabolo saayo pare nena adipu patape yakopi laplap page epe pepena pubae saayo . Go epe u-patape yaenuri mo Isipi supara mea-epe yaenu saayo .
20007017	Neme go nena u-patape epe bet madaare paura epe kaapi yae luabu koyoa saayo .
20007018	Goa pea-ga abiare saana bana . Goa puare raapa palaawa rabialo tu patua yapi malaapana . Goa pua raana adaape meapana .
20007019	Ninaa aaniri pala naomape . Nipu su adaalu meda-para naepope-rupa pisa .
20007020	Gore akoloya nipumi mone ora adaapupe mea pisa-pulu sarara laapo popenaloa orope epalia . Goa pua abia go akua epola pola raapu raapu-para epalia .
20007021	Go oname epe rede pi agaa luabu loa mo ogege aa nipuna lo-robaa ora waru marekaaya .
20007022	Mo aa nipumi mo omeme agaa pagoa mo onana ada-para ratamea pea . Gore mo mena gawa ti ada-para mea pemede-rupa mada mea pea . Go page maeyae aa opeada patinalo mea pemede-rupa mada mea pea .
20007023	Go aa nipuri koyati pua sua nipu aawalia kone na-i . Pa yaa-madaa biya pua mo poga madaa puaa roayade-rupa mada pea . Gore yaa nipu poga sabae-para roalua kone na-i . Pa biyaa pea-rupa mada pea .
20007024	Go naaki nina agaa madaa-re aane waru lobapa-inaloa waru pagalepape .
20007025	Nimimi go piaene ona rata mea popere nimina lo-robaa ora aipapulu narekena tapape . Goa pua nipuna kone gimape .
20007026	Gore akolo ya ? Aa adaapu go onana kone ratua luabu taala-pupa yabeme .
20007027	Go ona nipuna ada-para pope porare , aa tapa-para pemede pora-rupa ia . Go yapare nimi go pora ratalimiri nimi aipapulu aba omeme onaanuna su-para palimi .
20008001	Epe redepone konere ona meda rekaawa onaa yaata-rupa madaa .
20008002	Nipu so pore madaa pora kepaa-kepaa pea pare aawa yolaaya .
20008003	Gore nipu adaa ada kagure-na pora kerepo-nane aawa nipumi gupa yaloa lala aaya .
20008004	Neme onaa nimi luabu yalalo : Nimi kone na-i onaa luabu kone waru kegena mealimina . Nimi aanu kone waru na-imiri ipua kone waru epaa mealepa .
20008005	
20008006	Neme epe redepi agaa go lagialo madaa-re , aane waru lobapa ina pirua pagalepape .
20008007	Neme wae agaa luaburi gi waru pea-pulu neme oro yalo ora agaa riaa laguaayo .
20008008	Neme yaa-agaa natopare go to agaa luabu ora epe agaa riaa lagialo .
20008009	Epe kone sua makuae yae waru meme aanumiri neme to agaa-na re-re waru makuaeme . Goa pea-ga go agaa ora riae yade kone sua waru makuatepape .
20008010	Nina agaa-me mone mena sekere puri pane yae luabu rabuaaya-pulu neme epe kone luabu nimi mogeano waru pago piralepa .
20008011	Nina bipa niri ora epe kone epe yae luaburi ni yade . Neme gol mone oyae luabu page nimimi raana omeme yae luabu page rabuaawa ora puri na-ia tode .
20008012	Ni epe konena pora pamuape-rupa waru makuaayo . Goa pua ora epe pora pamuape page ni yade .
20008013	Aa meda nipu Adaa Aa-na agaa pagoa rataliare wae yaenu pape gime-omea . Neme gimi ome yae-re , aa medame nimuna bi minasaawa waea pea kone luabu-ri gime ome . Waeanu adaapu pua yaa agaa teme aanu page ora gipea .
20008014	Onaanu epe kone kaloa epe kogono papena kone page luabu neme mada gialua . Nina bipa niri epe kone yade . Goa pua adaa puri luabuna aaraa page ni yade .
20008015	Adaa ada kaguare luabu surubenalo aa mudu luabu page king-nu page neme mapiraayo . Goa pua lo waria go onaa luabu epe-rupa surubenalo epe kone neme kaato .
20008016	
20008017	Onaa medame ni adalua kone saliare ni mada adalia . Onaa medalomame ni raaname omalimiri neme page nimu raaname waru omalua .
20008018	Neme onaa adaa bi kaloa oyaenu page ora adaapu kaato . Mone oyae luabu waru kaloa epe kone pora luabu kurinaloa onaanu luabu waru raba mealua .
20008019	Neme kaato yaemere epe puri pane gol aana page aana silipa page ora rabuaniaaya .
20008020	Oro yalo neme epe redepone kone luabu ratu-aayo .
20008021	Ni raana omeme onaana yaere adaa stua-para kago imi-rupa kirita saayo . Goa pua mo akore kirita i ada-para rulatabena saayo .
20008022	Ora abade Adaa Aa-me oyae luabu warisa raburi ririnane ni aba mapiraasa . Goa pua wala oropere oyae luabu warisa .
20008023	Ora abade Adaa Aa-me su yaa lapo page oyae rayo abi nawarini aawa ni aba waria mapiraasa rabu ni aba pirisu .
20008024	Adaa Aa-me ipa ogenu page adaa ipa solowaranu page abi nawarini rabu ni aba pirisu .
20008025	Adaa porenu page oge porenu page abi nawarini rabu ni aba pirisu .
20008026	Go rabu ni pirano-re Adaa Aa-me su page abi nawarisa . Oyae luabu page abi na-opena e maapu nape yaenu page abi na-isa .
20008027	Yaa-me ipa solowara mea kutapu isa rabu page Ni aba pirisipa .
20008028	So yaa madaa moae yaakoya page , su-para ipa marakupitabasa rabu page , ipa pa go su madaa adaapu mapopaawa solowara mapiraasa rabu page ni aba pirisu .
20008029	Nipumi suna-re warisa rabu pirisu . Goa pua mo ipa solowara repa-repa warisa rabu page ni pirisu . Goa pua ipa solwara neme go su nakabulape loa agaa mana lakesa rabu page , ipa neme go salo robo nakabulape sa rabu page ni pirisipa .
20008030	Adaa Aa-me go yae luabu warisa rabu niri go kogono rayo surubanolo makuae aa mada mua mapirasa . Nipumi warisa oyae luabu adoa raana waru pisa-da neme nipu page raana omenalo kogono pisu . Neme go-su adoa onaa pimi su madaa page pedo waru pisu . Goa pisa-da neme Adaa Aa-na ini agaa-na oroyalo raaname omo aayo .
20008031	
20008032	Epea-para epe kone lapo-me agaa mone mone go-rupa ta . Go nogo naakinu nimimi naa agaa waru pagoa nina kone luabu waru ratalepape . Nimimi goa palimiri epe raaname rubini onaa piralimina .
20008033	Nimiri neme epe kone gianoloa waru makuae yaeme rubini onaa piralimina . Nimimi go agaa madaa masaa narilatepape .
20008034	Nina agaa pagoa ratalimi onaare nimi madaa raaname rubialia . Oroyalo nimi naa ada pora-gape para surubeme rabu neme epe kone epe pora mea waato . Nina poragape-para epeme rabu neme epe agaa lage .
20008035	Onaame ni mealimi-daare nimu kagaa pirape kone wasupa mealimi . Goa pua Adaa Aa-me nimu repara epe lo-robaa katea .
20008036	Goa peme pare aanu medalomame ni namealimiri nimuna bipa nimu bebo teme . Onaa-me ni raaname naomalimiri , nimu omape madaa kone mapiraawa peme .
20009001	Epe koneme epe pora waatalo ada pigi kerepo ( 7 ) pua ponoa awea . Gore nipumi epe kone sua go ada pigi eto napape-rupa awea . Go ada pigimi puri paloa ainalo pisa .
20009002	Yaa-yapa mena tua ipa waini rede waru-pi managola sua eta nape reke page aba managola-isa .
20009003	Nipuna kogono onanu ada kagure-nini penaloa agaa puri palo pua lalaatepa sa .
20009004	Nimumi gupa teme : Nimi mayae wae kone i aanu luabu ipulupa . Nimi epe kone mua epe redepone pora adalimina ipulupa loa mo kogono onanumi yalaala aaeme .
20009005	Eta page ipa waini epe rede-pi aba managala ia-ga ipua epa nalepa .
20009006	Nimina maeyae wae kone luabu gimoa epe kone-para epe pora ratalimina ipulupa simi .
20009007	Gore neme aa meda maredepo yaatalo pali rabu nipumi nepara aakone sua ero agaa-me abutea . Go page neme aa wae meda epe agaa loa maredepo-yaatalo pali-rabu , go aame ne tua nena yogaene ma-oyaalia .
