20026017	Gore aa laapome yada yada pua ratu yawalipi rabu aa medame nipu pua rabamealia-dare go aa nipu yana pupulaina aane pua ripinae nona pia pea .
20026018	Aa medame nipuna adami aa makiratalo puare wala orope gupa tea . Neme pa raapa agaa lawade ta . Gore maeyae aame repena agaa lusu ruboa etaane rubebe mada pea .
20026019	
20026020	Repena kaapu repena ralae-para na-iralimi raburi gore repena naralia . Go page aanumi maa agaa natemere go yaweme ratu dia yalia .
20026021	Repena kaapu waru iritimi rabu repena ora waru reade . Gorupare ada pi agaa ta aamere yada agaa ora ma-adaayaya .
20026022	Niaame aa yago medana maa agaa pame rabu go agaa pagape madaare raname waru omema . Go teme agaa-re epe ta kone sua epe eta-rupa mea neme .
20026023	Aa medame epe-rupa awape agaa puri paloa tea-daare ora yapare mo konena rere waea papena ta . Gore sumi warini sosopen-rupa yapare wala silipa golme warini nona mapaaeme .
20026024	Gore aa medame aa yaago meda raname na-omaliare pa agaame makirae kone sua nimu rana omana kone inalo pea . Nipu makinae kone sua pea .
20026025	Go piaene aanuna agaare nena aaneme pagape mada ora rede waru palia pare neme nipuna agaa madaa kone narulape . Gore akolo ya ? Nipuna kone pu robaa-para wae kone luabu pa rubitabea .
20026026	Nipuna pu lo robaa-para ia wae kone raayo pagaa salia pare onaa luabumi nipuna wae kone adoa makualimi .
20026027	Aa medame nipuna bipa nipu wae yaenu pa pu aano kone sua paliare nipuna bipa nipu otaa . Gore aa medame koyati pa onaa awena kone sua ia pare wala nipuna bipa mo koyati patemede-rupa mada pea . Gore aana agaare rudu madaa sone mea pea pare wala perene ipua nipu epa tea-rupa mada yade .
20026028	Aa medame aa yago meda yaa agaa medaloma laketea-daare nipumi yaa agaa loa onaa ma-oyape mada pea . Aa medame oro yalo omeme pi agaa teare gore aa yago ma-oyaatalo pea .
20027001	Neme aakone sua ekeraa goa palua loa agaa meda narogaa sape . Goa loa piraina abia paliare ne-daa namakuae .
20027002	Gore aa medame nena bi minasaaliare ora epeta pare nena bipa nena bi naminasape .
20027003	Maeyae aanuna kone epe-rupa naimi-pulu go imi koneme niaa kedaa adaa meda geme . Go epea kedaare ipa muna kedaa-para adaa aana lapome adea .
20027004	Aa medaloma ratu yawoa wae pemenumi onaa yago kedaa adaapu pa mea kateme . Goa pea pare oyae epame omoa kone wae imi konemere ratu yawoa aa meda-para wae kone imi kone luabu rabuaaya .
20027005	Waea pi aa meda maredepo rabu ne yago-rupa raana ome kone page kalo aaye .
20027006	Nena adami aanumi nimu raba meainalo radaa ora waru mea geme palo peme . Pare mo nena yada-lore aanumi epea pua ne makira teme .
20027007	Aa medame eta luabu noa pua nipuna robaa-para rubita raburi alubi apaa ora ota pare reame ome aame rero pi eta nea rabu ora mada nalia .
20027008	Gore aa medame nipuna su ada gimoa pa pora pamu aaliare yaame nipuna piri-para gimoa pa riyaa pamuaya-rupa mada pamea .
20027009	Waele-sada page ora epe wabala waele luabu pema raburi niaa mada ora epe ta kone sua pedo waru pema . Go page niaana adami aanumi niaa raana masaawa niaa rabameape kone imi epe agaa loa epea pemede-rupa mada yade .
20027010	Nena ona nogo naakinu-para nena adami aanu masaa narilape . Go page wae yae medame ne epaa mulalo paliare gore ne rabamina nena ame na-adola pope . Aa meda ne raapu repara pirali-daare go ame su adaalu-para aaya page rabuniaaya .
20027011	Naa naaki neme epe kone luabu mua epe pora luabu ratali-dare ne madaa epe kone salua . Goa pua aa medame nipara pa mariae agaa teadare neme nipuna agaa mada abutoa .
20027012	Epe kone i aamere gore nipumi ora go-rupa makuaaya . Kedaa nipu mada epolalo palia-daare gore nipumi aipapulu mapakeaalia . Goa pea pare epe kone na-i aare gore mo pora wae i-para pea rabu page go wae yaeme nipu ora mea rabu ora aipapulu kedaa mu aaya .
20027013	Aa medame mo aa yagona rudu neme abulalua loa wala naabutea-daare gore nipu wea aa yade . Go yapare mo nepara yaa agaa robali aame nepara rudu meda giaina tea rabu nipuna ta yaa agaa aba ade-ga neme mo rudu abuna kone sua oyae meda puri paboa meape .
20027014	Gore neme rui puri pabo loa nena adami aa-para ribaa reko te-dare nipu-para wae agaa temede-rupa mada te .
20027015	Aa medana ore agaa rado rado adaapu ne ona yaliare gore ada runane yai itipa-ta pogo pogo loatade-rupa mada pea .
20027016	Goa pea-pulu nipuna aanimi go agaa kone luabu magimaape-rupa mada dia . Goa peare aame poripu page wabala pepenini page ripinaalua kone sua pemedea-pea .
20027017	Nimumi puri pane aeyane nepo papere wala aeyane yagome nepo peme . Go peme-rupare aa yago medame mo aa yago rabamua epe kone masaaya .
20027018	Aa medame repenana ini etalia rabu go repenana ini raloa nalua kone salia-dare go repena ora waru surubalia . Aa medame nipuna surube aa ora waru surubalia-daare go surube aame mo aa nipuna bi ora waru minasaalia .
20027019	Aa medame mo ipa ini-para adainaalia raburi nipuna ini agaa nipuna bipa adea . Go-rupa aa medame nipuna pea rayo waru adoa rumaliare nipu gopiane aa yadelo makualia .
20027020	Gore aa adaapu omalimi page pinawa . Mo aa tapa luabu mada narulatabalia . Go-rupa mada nipuna kone-para ia yae luabu mada napu kiritalia .
20027021	Repena sulaame silipa golonu roa rakepeta . Go rupa mada go aa-re epe aa yade wae aa yade lo aba ademe . Epe aa yaliare nipuna bi minasaeme .
20027022	Gore neme epe kone nai aa puri palo tali-dare omolalo palia-rabu nipuna maeyae kone mada nagimalia .
20027023	Goa palia-ga nena mena sipsip-para meme mena luabu waru surubape .
20027024	Gore akolo ya ? Nena mone-re ne raapu oro yalo mada nasapiti . Mo aa mudu pia king-na ruru page oroyalo mada napitimi .
20027025	Nena maapu-para ripu adaalu opalia-dare ponoa nena menanu nena mea sape . Goa pali rabu wala ripu kagaa opalia .
20027026	Goa pua orope nena meme mena mada yoto mua su kabaina . Goa pua mo sipisipi mena iri pudi mua marape yae wariaina .
20027027	Goa puare nena mo meme mena adu ipaa muare nena nogo naaki ona raapu nape ipaa meaina . Goa puare nena kagono onanu page mada kate .
20028001	Waea pi aanuri pama paala omo nimu pagola peme . Goa peme pare epe kone i aanuri mena laiyano aaya-rupa puri aaeme .
20028002	Kantri meda-para piri onaame nimuna gavman senisi pulalo yada palimi rabu kagaa alopape aa mudu rado re-para alopatalo peme . Go yapare aa mudu epeme surubolalo paliare ada kantri epe-rupa pa aalia .
20028003	Aa medame naraame ome aanu rabuniaatalo palia-dare gore yai adaa ipua e maapu marateade-rupa mada pea .
20028004	Rekena i agaa rasitemere wae yae peme aanuna bi minasaeme . Rekena agaa ratua pimi aanumiri waea peme aanu rabuaniaaeme .
20028005	Waea peme aanumiri epe porare ake piaene yapalo nimu ora na-ademe . Goa peme pare aa medaloma Adaa Aa ratulalo peme onaare epe pora ademe .
20028006	Aa meda nipu oyae dia yaliare epe aa yaliare amo ne aame pea luabu rabuaaya .
20028007	Ogege-aame rekena i yaenu luabu ratua palia-dare epe kone ia . Pupitagi noa yada yada pi aanu raapu aalia-daare nipuna agi aaraanu yala polo pitimi .
20028008	Aa medame mone rudu minaloa onaa repara poropete adaapu waria mealia pare mada nasaalia . Dia , pare araanu rabameme aana kinane palia .
20028009	Aa medame rekena i agaa narataliadare Gote-me go aana beten napagalia . Gote-me go betene pageare pugu waru pugu pea-pulu mada napagalia .
20028010	Aa medame epe aa meda makiraatalo paliare nipuna paliade waeame nipu wala mapiraalia . Go yapare aa meda nipu wae yae napi pawa aaliade-daare Gote-me go aa nipu epe epe yaenu mada katea .
20028011	Oyae adaapu i aanu nimu ora makuae yae ima kone imi pare naraanu kone waru sua amope aanuna kone makuaaeme .
20028012	Epe redepone aanumi nimuna kantri surubolalo peme raburi onaa luabumi go aa madaa ranaame waru omeme . Wae aanumi mo kantri surubeme raburi onaame palaa omoa nipu kaledeme .
20028013	Aa medame nipuna wae yae pawa kudiripu pa ina kone sua piraliare go aame epea napea . Go yapare aa medame nipuna wae-yae luabu lapedepealia-dare Gote-me go aa nipu odome omoa raba mealia .
20028014	Gore aa medame Adaa Aa madaa kone rulaawa piraliare nipu raana waru omoa pirina . Go yapare nipumi Adaa Aa-na agaa rasua waeanu pu piraliare nipumi waea kedaa mu-aalia .
20028015	Gore kantri surube aame waea pua naaranu rabuaniatalo paliare nipu ota . Gore mo mena laion nipumi e-adaa puri palo ta-rupa para mena beame eta asapea-rupa mada ta .
20028016	Gore mo kantri-na surube aa nipu epe kone na-i yaliare onaa luabu pa rabua tua ma-oyatalia . Go yapare adare surube aame onaa luabuna oyae nayotea pare ma-oyaape madaa gime omaliare nipu adaalupu epe-rupa pa piralia .
20028017	Aa medame aa yago tumaomalia-dare go aa nipuna tapa poaawa kedaa mealia . Goa pua nipu ora epe-rupa napiri omalia .
20028018	Gore aa medame epe kone epe pora ratua aaliare nipu epe redepoya piruaalia . Pare waenupu aalia aare aipapulu oyo tua alupalia .
20028019	E-poae aa yaliare nipuna maapu-para eta ora adaapu su aalia . Kogono radore waru na-i mada pama to tu ruboa pu aaliare nipu wae-rupa naraa pirualia .
20028020	Aa medame redeponea rataliare Gote-me go aa nipu epea palia . Aa meda nipu mone adaapu aipapulu sano kone saliare Adaa Aa-me go amope nipu epena kone na-ia . Dia mo amope aa nipu kedaa waru katea .
20028021	Na-epeta koso madaa aa meda rabamua aa meda wala malopaliare gore ora na-epe ta . Goa pea pare aa medaloma waeanu pulalo managola pimi pare mo nimu omeme pua rabameape mone ogesi kateme rabu epe-rupa giala kone na-imi .
20028022	Aa meda nipuna yaenu o waru yoa aalia-daare aipapulu amope alia . Pare nipu orope aa naraa piralua kone naia .
20028023	Gore neme aa meda maredepoyali nipumi ranaame waru omalia . Go palipide-a luabumi mo omeme kone luabu rabuaniaaya .
20028024	Gore aa medame agi araana oyaenu paake noa gupa ta . Neme go oyaenu nameawa ta . Paake nameawa ta agaare gupa aa medalomame oyaenu ma-oyaame-rupa mada yade .
20028025	Aa meda nipu oyae yoloa salua kone saliare aa adapumi go madaa ratu yawalimi . Go yapare aa medame Adaa Aa madaa kone rulaliadare go aa nipumi epe-rupa pirua oyae adaapupe salia .
20028026	Aame nina makuae oyaeme nipuna bipa madaa raba mealia kone ia pare mada dia . Go yapare aa medame epe redepone kone ratu aliare go aa nipu epe-rupa piralia .
20028027	Aa medame aa naraanu oyae pa ode kateare go aa nipu oyae mada narudutea . Go yapare aa medame mo naraa onaa adoa oyaenu naruma kateare aa nipu ota teme .
20028028	Wae agaa lo wae pora rati aanumi kantri surubalimi-dare onaa nimu kalodoa piralimi . Pare go wae aa mudunu omalimi raburi epe kone su epe pora rateme onaa nimu epe-rupa pirua surubeme .
20029001	Gore aa meda maredepo yatalo palimi pare nipu wala pa pala pitia raburi gore nipu ora aipapulu raba meape pora nasalia .
20029002	Epe redepone aa mudumi kantri surubeme raburi onaa luabumi raaname omeme . Goa peme pare wae aanumi kantri surubeme raburi onaa luabuna lo robaa-para kedaa rua re teme .
20029003	Aa medame epe kone mulalo palia-daare nipuna aapa aba epe kone masaalia . Go yapare aa meda nipu ona pake nama palia raburi nipuna mone oyaenu gopara pua rubea .
20029004	King-mi mo kantri epe-rupa surubaliare go kantri epe-rupa pa alia . Aa mudu king nipumi onaa luabuna mone oyaenu luabu nipu gina kone sua surubalia-dare kantri maoyaalia .
20029005	Aa medame nipuna adami aa omeme pi agaa tea-dare nipuna bipa nipu raape kona ma-aya .
20029006	Gore aa medame ni oyae pa gina kone salia-daare nipuna bipa nipu roape kona maaya . Go yapare aa medaloma epea peme aanu nimu raana raapu aawa yasa lo aalimi .
20029007	Epe redepone aanumi mo aa naaranuna kedaa ritimi adoa go madaa kone waru sua raba mu aaeme . Epe yae wae yae lo waea peme onaame re ora waru namakuaawa pa puaeme .
20029008	Paake pupitagi ne aanumi mo taun-para piri onaa waea peme rabu lo robaa-para radaa mapaaeme . Goa peme rabu mo epe kone redepoya imi aanumi nimu epe kone kateme rabu nimu lo robaa kuma mua epe-rupa pimi .
20029009	Gore epe kone i aame aa meda kone wae i aa koso latalo palia-daare go aa nipu ora epe kone naia . Go aa nipuri pa ratu yawe kone agu sua nipumi wae agaa loa wae pora pamuape kone padane ia .
20029010	Aa yagonu tumaomaeme aanumiri epe redepoya pimi aanu adoa rana na omeme . Go yapare mo epe redepoya pimi aanumi nimuna epe-rupa redepoya pimi aanu epe-rupa pirina kone imi .
20029011	Kone redepone na-imi aanu nimuna ratu yawe kone sua agaa teme rabu pename ta . Go yapare epe kone imi aanumiri nimuna ratu yawe kone pa nimuna lo robaa-para ina nalapedepene gimeme .
20029012	Yaa agaa ne aanumi mo kantri surube aa muduna kogono paliare mo yaa agaa ne aanu kantri-na ofisa kogono go wae aa luabumi palimi .
20029013	Aa adaame onaa luabu ini maria aya nimumi oyae adenalo pea . Adaa Aa nipumi mo naraa aanu page kaloa nimu rabuniaaae aa medaloma page kata .
20029014	Gore aa mudu king piraliade aame aa naraanuna epe redepone koso pagalia-dare oro yalo go ruruna king pa piruaalia .
20029015	Neme nena nogo naaki tua epe mana te-daare nipumi epe kone mua epe makuae yae page mealia . Go yapare nogo naakimi oro yalo nipuna raana ratua aaliare nimuna agira yala polo ma-pitia .
20029016	Waea pi aanumi kantri surubalimi rabu mo palimide wae yaenu ora adaa yalia . Go palimi rabu kantri surubalimi aanu nimu adaalupu napiralimi gore redepone aanumi adalimi gore ora peboteme .
20029017	Gore neme nena naaki epe agaa lakeloa pirali rabu nipumi nena agaa pagoa epe-rupa pitia-dare epe kone sua pirali .
20029018	Adaa Aa-me onaa epe agaa nakata pisa yalore nimu kone rado rado sua pirita peme . Go yapare aame Gote-na agaa ratua piralimiri raana raapu piralia .
20029019	Go yapare nena kogono aa-para agu agaa te-dare neme nipu mada nama epeali . Pinawa neme agaa lakete pare nena agaa mada naratalia .
20029020	Aa meda nipu epe redepone kone nasaliare gore nipu epe kone minalo marede yamina palo adamina . Go yapare aa meda epe agaa naloa pa mabebola teare gore wala maredepo yalape-rupa maralia .
20029021	Nena kogono naaki ogesi rabu nipuna kone meape yae kalamama pua yali-daare oropere aa nona palia rabu nena oyae rayo mealia .
20029022	Ratu ora aipapulu yawe aamere onaa aa radonu page ratu mayawaya . Goa pua mo ratu yawe aa nipu wae yae adaapu pea .
20029023	Aa medame nipu ora aa ayo loa nipuna aako tua bi minasaliare nipuna bi mada rabuanialimi . Aa medame nipuna bi rabuniaawa aliare orope go aa nipu adaa bi mealia .
20029024	Aa medame paake ne aa rabamealiare go aa nipu page paake ne aa nona palia . Go paliade yae amaa mea salia raburi nipu koso loa mada adialimi . Go yapare nipumi paga saliare Gote-me nipu ma-oyalia .
20029025	Aa medame aa yagonu pala omaliare go pala re ena agona-para nipu pua piri nona pea . Go yapare aa medame Adaa Aa mada kone rulaliare nipu epe-rupa mada piralia .
20029026	Aa adaapumi kantri rupara aa mudu pimi aanu omeme pulalo pemere nimu raana omena lo peme . Goa peme pare Adaa Aa-me niaana kone adoa niaana pemanu ora epe-rupa rumaawa niaa rabamea .
20029027	Epe kone rulae aanumi waea peme aanuna kone adoa raana na-omeme . Go yapare mo waea peme aanumi epe pora rateme aanu adape page raana na-omeme .
20030001	Go agaare Jakina si Agu-me Itele-para Ukal page lakesimi agaa remaa yade .
20030002	Agu-me Gote ni raapu an pirua niri aa-da dia yade sa . Goa loa niri kone-daa waru na-isa . Nina konere ora wae sa .
20030003	Ni epe kone nasu ora ni oto pare Gote nipu ora epe redepone aa yade . Pare neme nipu na-ade .
20030004	So yaa-para aapi pua su-amaa wala ipisa pae ? Go page po-ripu aapina kimi ripinaa misa pae ? Go page so moae madaa aapimi ipa mapiraasa ? Goa pua laplap mada oyae sua aapimi keapunisa ? Abia go ia su luabu apimi puri mapalaawa robo ma-sasa ? Nipuna biri aapiya ? Nipuna si-ri aapi ya ? Go yaenuri nere makuae pae ?
20030005	Oyae luaburi Gote nipuna saa rabu opesa . Gote-na Agaare ora ria yade . Goa pua nipu piri peme onaare nipumi kepopu runane yawa surubea . Gore mo etane epa aalialo ralubi maditema-rupa mada nipuna agaa-me niaa rigitaniaawa .
20030006	Nena agaa meda loare gore Gote-na agaa yade pi nalape . Gote-me orope ne koso lalia rabu go aa-re waea pi aa yade teme .
20030007	Gote nere oyae laapo agaa mulalo pi-ga neme go yae lapo giaina . Oro yalo ni go su-amaa pirualua raburi yaa agaa-para makirae kone luabu gimanowa . Neme niri amope-para aa naraa page namapirainalo-pi . Dia nina nape eta robo-para giape .
20030008	
20030009	Neme oyae ora adaapu salua rabu ne masaa rilawa . Adaa Aa-nere aapi yapae toa ? Ni naraa piralua raburi neme paake pupitagi noa waenu pualua rabu nina Gote Adaa nena bi ma-oyaluada go aaene lalo .
20030010	Neme surube aa piri pua kogono naakina bi napua ma-oyaape . Nipuna kogono aana bi ma-oyaali rabu Gote lorapalia rabu nipuna Gote-me ne talialo lalo .
20030011	Onaa medalome goa teme : Gote-me nimina ama aapanu ma-bebolatina teme .
20030012	Onaa madalomame nimu waea meda napema teme pare nimu amulu papubaaya-pulu Gote-na ini agaa madaa nimuna pupitagi wae ia-daa adea . Onaa medalomame nimu ora epe ta kone sua pa onaa meda otaa kone imi .
20030013	
20030014	Onaa medalomame naraa onaanu-para waea agu pulalo peme . Gore nimuna agaa abulu-para rai napi eke aae ayaa-pulu nimumi mo naraa onaana oya mulalo peme .
20030015	Yaapi nea paakana oge nogo laapo pia . Nipuna biri gupa teme : Ni gi ni gi teme . Oyae maala-me nimuna raana mada na-pora poalia .
20030016	Pandanere aba ome aanuna tapa-para aeme . Laapore ore aani raapu patea pare naaki padaa napia . Repore sumi ipa adaapu mea pare ipa waru name . Maalare kone ia repena sulaame oyae luabu rea pare naare nona pea . Go yaere ora luabu madaa naniminaata .
20030017	Gore aa medame orena ama page aaraa lapona agaa rasini omalia rabu go lapome nipu mada narogaalipi . Go rabu yaa itaa-para yaa aroka roka ipua ini epa rasu nabalipi .
20030018	Oyae ipa maala ora rado pi aaene yae yapulu neme ora mada na-makuaato .
20030019	Pandanere yaa ita nipu so yaa madaa awaya . Laapore paakare nipu aana madaa pamea . Repore ipa sipi-ri adaa ipa solowara madaa pameade . Maalare aa-me ona raname omemede-rupa pipi .
20030020	Oname nipuna aa gimoa rado raapu patia raburi nipumi ipa mea radepe rubua goa ta . Neme yae meda napawade ta .
20030021	Go su-amaare yae maala wae kone ia-pulu go sumi go kone adoa gime waru omea pururu ora waru omea .
20030022	Go pemeare go-rupa : Kogono naaki naara yapare wala king kogono pea . Aa medame kone nasua eta ora adaapu nea .
20030023	Ona meda nipu aa nape pa piruaawa aba ripia aame gime ona yapare orope rumaeme . Ona nipuna surube onana kogono nipumi mulalo oyo moyo ari piralipi .
20030024	Go su-amaa yae maala raa-para pia pare nimuna kone ora epeta :
20030025	Raguta puri na-ia pare eta dia yalia rabu nape eta waru amupu imi .
20030026	Yapa wamea page aana-para pimi pare nimu puri na-ia . Goa peme pare nimuna adare aana rulalo peme .
20030027	Oboro nipuna aa muduri napia pare nimu uliri pua pameme .
20030028	Oge kaau niaame kimi ripinaawa mealimare ora yapare nimu aa mudu king-na adapara pimi .
20030029	Oyae malare padane-para wata tina pameme :
20030030	Kira mena me puri pabea-pulu pa kira anune yaenu medaloma rabuaaya . Nimu pora pameme raburi oyae meda madaa paala meme .
20030031	Yaa kuta kosapeame nipuna aalu musaawa pora pamea . Lione mena ora aari oyae meda madaa palame naomoa pare ora nipuna puri rado aaya . Meme mena yadaapunu page king medame nimu mada natalimi .
20030032	Gore neme maeyae kone sua waeanu pulalo paliri nena bi naminaasape pare agaa gimoa yalame omape .
20030033	Gore neme mena gawana adu mua mea pereke pereke te rabu bata mada autea . Aa medana ini kadu mataliri ratu yawalia . Gore yada rekalia .
20031001	Go agaa-re King Lemuel-na agaa . Agime agaa mana loa epe kone minalo lakesa .
20031002	Nina naaki nere nina madiawa-pulu neme ne raaname waru ome . Neme Gote agaa misu rabu ni gisa-da madisu . Neme ake lano ya ?
20031003	Neme ona meda nayoloa money page nakaloa nena puri dia yalia . Gore akoloya king-nu ma-oyaeme-daa go agaa lagialo .
20031004	Lemuel-yo king nimi ipa waini na-nape . Nimumi bia nape kone nasalepape .
20031005	Gore nimimi ipa agu nalimi raburi rekana agaa ruguloa mo aa naraanu-para epea meda mada napalimi .
20031006	Pa bia-para waene lapo-re omape onaa-para kedaa adaapu rini onaana nape eta yade .
20031007	Go piane onaare ipa nalame omalimiri pa nalimina . Yapare nimu naraa pimi onaa oyae rudu yoa kedaa riapere kone rugulaawa nalimina .
20031008	Kedaa madaa nariape kepele pi onaare rabameape agaa lape . Goa pua mo naraanumi koso teme rabu raba meape-na puri waru pabape .
20031009	Neme koso te rabu mogo onaanu epe-rupa redepoya pagape . Goa pua neme mo naaranu raba mua surubape .
20031010	Go yapare aame ona epe kone-i rumaatalo pe ? Ora yapare kalai pua asa palia . Go piaene ona-na yotore gol-na yoto pea-rupa mada yade .
20031011	Go piaene ona nipuna aanimi mo onana pea luabu epea peada aba adea . Goa pea-pulu ona-me nipu raba mealia rabu mo aa nipu oyae ora adaapu salia .
20031012	Go ona-me aani-para oro yalo epea agu pea .
20031013	Nipumi laplap wariape ope adaapu page pusua laplap adaapu wari pea .
20031014	Nimu luabumi eta ora adaapu waru imi . Gore akolo-ya ? Go oname eta ora su adaalu-para mea epea . Gore mo adaa sipi-numi eta madita pemede-rupa mada mea epea .
20031015	Epe onamere yapi abi nane aina eta nipuna onaa raapu nape aba yawea . Goa puare nipuna kogono onana pape kogono robo su kata .
20031016	Mo puri pane oname su kabolalore su ora waru adoa kabea . Goa pua orope mone muare repena waene maapu kaboa poaaya .
20031017	Nipu oro meda gime naomea oro yalo puri paloa kogono puaaya .
20031018	Nipuna labana wiki ora waele waru rubia epeta rabu laba waru roaaya . Go laba roaina ribaa ruma rumane nipuna pea bisinisi raayo pua epe ta-daa adea .
20031019	Go piaaene oname ope waria nipuna bipa laplap rabuta .
20031020	Gore nipumi mo naraa onaa adoa oyaenu rudu teme rabulu kata .
20031021	Gore yai radaki adaa lopea rabu page nipuna aani nogo naaki yada dia kone ia . Gore akolo ya ? Nipumi mo laplap ora epe pepena pi yae rabuta-pulu yada dia kone ia .
20031022	Goa pua nipuna ada-para sape balaket oyae page nipuna bipa rabuta-pulu nimuna ada-para epeta . Goa pua laplap kane-para yakopi lapo rata mua nipuna yamape oyae warita .
20031023	Gore mo adare-para piri aa mudunumi nipu adaa bi kateme . Nipuna aani page mo aa mudu meda yapulu goa peme .
20031024	Oro yalo mo oname epe mamina waria aako lete page waru warita . Goa pea-pulu mo bisinisi peme onaame epa kabeme .
20031025	Nipuna mogo pea kogono madaa mo ona ora epeta kone sua mo ona kone mapiraawa go piane ona yade teme . Go orope epaliade yaere nipu palame naomea .
20031026	Nipumi onaa kogono mogeatalo palia-dare pawasi agaa loa pea . Nipuna ta agaa luaburi epe kone-para makuae yae lapo ora waru rubita .
20031027	Nipuna ada-para oyae surubolalo palia raburi gime na-omea . Goa pua epe puri pane kogono pea .
20031028	Ora epeta ora epeta gore niaana ama teme . Mo ona nipuna nogo naakimi goa teme . Nipuna animi ona-na bi ora waru minasaawa goa ta .
20031029	Niaana taun-para page niana oge adarenu-nini page go piane ona adaapu pimi : Pare neme go ona luabu rabuaye teme .
20031030	Ona padaneme niaa epe rede pi agaa lagialia pare nipuna peare rado piane . Ona ora epe yalia page pinawa . Nipu oro yalo gorupa mada napitia . Goa pea-ga niaame Adaa Aa-na rolo-para pia onana bi minasamina .
20031031	Niame ona nipuna epe kogono adoa nipuna epe kone page rumaawa nipuna bi minasaeme .
21001001	King Devit-na si Jerusalem su aa mudu makuae aa pirua nipumi go buku madaa remaa tu isa .
21001002	Go makuae aame gupa sa : Oyae luaburi re naiapulu waru yaeda dia .
21001003	Niaame maali yalo kalaipua kogono pema yaena abulu ake mema pae ? Kogono kalaipu pema rabu go-na ini ake mema pae sa ?
21001004	Onaa omeme rabu kagaa nogo-naaki ma-aditimi mo omeme onaana pada gonumi meme sa . Go yapare go su-re pa gorupa agu pa suaya .
21001005	Naare raa ipua wala pabola popea gore wala ekeraa-nane wala epaa opeaa . Oro yalo naare epaa rala wala puala pua komome omea .
21001006	Poripu mo relapo rayo nane maowa maowa pua wala pereke tua epea-nane pea .
21001007	Ipa luaburi mo solowara madaa puaa rubita pare ipa solowara abi narubita . Gore mo ipa nipu yokoa epea-para wala pua go ipa nipu wala solowara madaa wala epea .
21001008	Niaame go su-amaa ia yaenu mada kone mapiraawa yapare gime ora wala omema . Go maditima gi-re nalapedepetema . Niaame oyae luabu ado pa agaa luabu pa pagema . Pare go pema luabumi niaa mada narabamealia .
21001009	Ora abade oyae medaloma opesa yaenuri wala orope page wala opalia . Abade aanu mi oyae medaloma pisimiri wala orope page palimi . Go su-amaa-re kagaa yae meda wala naopalia .
21001010	Aa medalomame go yaere niaa naade kagaa yaelo gupa teme . Goyapare yae ora abade isa yae pa ina na-adoa gupa teme . Go yaere niaana amame niaa abi namadini rabu go yae isa .
21001011	Aa medalomame aba niaana akuanu pirisimi rabu isa yaenu madaa kone na-niminaeme . Oyae luaburi abia niaa go piramona epea pare go kone rumaa niminape page mareme .
21001012	Niri waru makuae aa yapulu ni Israel onaana aa mudu king pirua neme nimu surube .
21001013	Gore neme go su-amaa ia yae luabu adoa waru makualua kone sua re adesatalo pua adaa radaapi kogono pe . Gopea pare Gote-me go geaa kogonore ora adaa kedapi kogono yade .
21001014	Neme go su-amaa ia yae luaburi ora aba ado kirite pare go oyae luaburi ora re naia . Aa medame poripu ratua ripinaatalo pea-rupa mada .
21001015	Oyae paaki paliare niaame wala ma-redepo yape-rupa madadia . Oyae meda nasaliare gore niaame mada nadipialima .
21001016	Ni adayoa makuae yae waru meawa-na kone sua mo Jerusalem supara pirisimi aa mudunu luabu rabuayo kone gorupa i . Ni makuae yae waru mua epe kone page waru i .
21001017	Neme ora abade epe kone-na re para maeyae kone para , eyaa kone para makuaeyae para nimuna peme kone rado rado mea makuatalo kalai pe . Pare neme poripu ratamea pe rupa mada .
21001018	Gore ora agaa riaa aa meda nipu amaa-yo makuae yae waru iare nipu madaa wae kone adaapumi ripinita . Goa puaa nipuna makuae yae ora adaa yalia raburi gore nipuna lo robaa kedaa page ora adaa yalia .
21002001	Neme epe kone sua pora pamuape madaa kalai waru pe . Nina koneme niminae yae luabu pu kiritalua kone sua pisu pare go pea re waru nai madaa pe .
21002002	Giri ne agaa-re maeyae kone meda madaa epeta kone sua pama pisuya . Goa pua epe pedo pi koneme niaa narabamea .
21002003	Epe kone-na re asapulalo neme kalai waru pe . Goa peada neme ipa waene noa epe kone mulalo kalai waru pe . Oge rudupu yapidi-na onaanu su-amaa pimi rabu epe-rupa pirina kone sua asapuayo . Nimu ora epe pora mea walawe kone sua pe .
21002004	Neme adaa ada adaapu pua kogono adaapu pisude . Waene maapu page sasude .
21002005	Neme e-maapu adaapu sawa epe redepi repena ini medaloma wai poayo .
21002006	Neme go repena wai mada koyape ipa naaku page medaloma robo i .
21002007	Neme kogono onaa adaapu kabamua , naa kogono painalo mua kogono pina-to . Go kogono pae onaana si wanenu page luabu nina kogono onaa pina-to . Jerusalem supara pateme aanumi mena gawa sipisipi go neme punitu-rupa adaapu meda napunitimi .
21002008	Neme silpa golo page nina ada kagure luabu-nini mua pa kantri luabu-para page me . Mo ada kagurena king rado rado pimi aanuna silpa golo-nu page luabu neme me . Mo onaanu page neme raana omanalo yasa lape adaapu teme . Raana omapena ona page adaapu rumaayo .
21002009	Neme go yaenu luabu mea suare ni adaa aa mudu pi . Abade mo Jerusalem supara aa mudu pirisimi aanu nimumi oyae go neme i-rupa meda na-isimi . Ni ora makuae aa go pirissu-rupa pa pi .
21002010	Nina konepara epea yaenu rayo nagimede dia . Neme oyae meda epame ome yaenuri gore ora meda . Neme aba pama pisude kogono madare raana waru omoa go ome raanare mo pe kogono-na yoto go yade .
21002011	Go yapare neme mo kalai waru pua pe kogono aba adano . Mo puayo kogono luaburi waru yaeda diayapulu re naiya . Gore aa medame poripu ratu ripinatalo pe nona pea .
21002012	Neme yae luabu pukirite-ga aa medame ni alopawa aa mudu king pitia-daare nipumi pa i kogono-re ake palia pae ? Oyae meda neme napia meda mada napalia . Goa pea-daa neme epe konena pora page wae kone-na pora page adolalo pora asapuayo .
21002013	Neme kone go luabu aba ado kiritua goa kone i . Epe kone epeta , wae kone , bebo kone paa-me riba rabuaniaya .
21002014	Makuae aanumi pora waru adoa gore epeta gore ota loa waru adoa makuaeme . Goyapare maeyae aanumi ribaane pora waru rateme . Neme oyae meda ade , gore gupa : mo makuae aa nipuna kogono pu kiritea raburi maeyae aa-na kone-para makuae aana kone lapo padane pea .
21002015	Maeyae aanu madaa popea konere ni madaa page gorupa epolalo pia kone i . Goa pea-ga nina makuae yae-me niri akea pua rabamealia pae ? Go madare kone wala gorupa niminaayo . Go i kone luabu waepara pawana kone i .
21002016	Oropere onaa luabumi niaa kone rugulaawa gimalimi . Niaa maeyae aanu page makuae aanu page kone rugulaawa gimalimi . Omalimi rabu maeyae aa para makuae aa-laapo mada omalipi yade .
21002017	Goa pea-pulu go su-amaa ia yae luabumi ni kedaa waru mea geapulu nina kone wasupa-me gi waru pea . Aame poripu ratu ripinatalo pea-rupa mada yapulu su-amaa pema yae luabu re meda naiya .
21002018	Neme go kalai pua pama epawade yae rayo gimaluame aba makuaayo . Gore ni alopaliade aame go yaenu rayo nipumi mealia . Goa peapulu go yae luabu mada ni gi ora waru pea .
21002019	Nina pada mealia aa-re makuae aame mealia pae maeyae aame mealia palo ni waru namakuaayo . Goyapare neme kalaipua radaa pina misude yaenu surbalia . Pare go kone luabuna re page ora meda naia .
21002020	Goyapare neme go kalapi kogono madaa lo robaa kedaa waru me .
21002021	Neme kogono pulalore nina epe kone para nina makuayae para kogono pape kina purimi mua salimi oyae-re , kogono napeme onaa katea . Gore remeda naiya pulu gore wae yae ria .
21002022	Oroyalo niaame kone ora adaapu ima pare gome niaa epe yae meda meagea pae ?
21002023	Niaame go su-amaa aema raburi niaa oyae madaa lo robaa kedaa adaapu mea gea . Goame ribaa niaa u patema rabu aalu kada-para kone kone adaapu mema . Go kone page ora re waru naia .
21002024	Niaame eta ipa noa niana pema kogonona rana omema . Go page neme ade rabu Goteme gea .
21002025	Gote-me niaa eta nagulapea-daare akea pula pema pae ?
21002026	Onaa medaloma Gote raaname omeme onaare nipumi epe kone kalo makuayae kalo rana kata , goyapare wae yae peme onaare Goteme oyae kiritawa inaloa Gote para epea peme onaa kanata . Gore re meda naiya poripu ripinatalo ratamea pe rupa mada .
21003001	Oyae luabu go su-amaa opeare nipuna opape yapidina opea .
21003002	Gote-me niaa onaa go su-amaa madiape di gua wala omape di page gea . Eta wai poape yapidi page gua eta naape awape yapidi page gea .
21003003	Gote-me onaa yaina maetape page aa tumaope yapidi page luabu nipumi saaya . Nipumi oyae maoyaatua wala maepeape yapidi page nipumi ama pea .
21003004	Nipumi re lape yapi di page giri lape yapidi page nipumi ama saaya . Odo omape di page yasa pawa lape di page saaya .
21003005	Nipumi onaa rapu patape yapidi page saaya rekena sua gimape yapidi page saaya . Ona ripinape page ona naorape yapidi page saaya .
21003006	Oyaenu alupae asapape yapidi page oyae alupape yapidi page saaya . Oyae waru amagepu sape di page saya oyaenu yolo rubape di page saaya .
21003007	Laplap marae riripia wala rabulape di page saaya . Agaa lorape yapidi page agaa lape di page saaya .
21003008	Di mo robaa kalape ao para di mo ratu yawape ao saaya . Yada pape page gimape yapidi page saaya .
21003009	Kalaipu kogono peme aanu nimuna meape epe yaere ake meme pae ?
21003010	Gote-me niaa repara epenata kedaare neme aba ade .
21003011	Gote-me oyae luabu ora epe rupa openata . Nipumi niana kone marekaawa oyae raayo page abia opea yae abade opesa yaenu luabu makua adamonalo kone gea . Goyapare Gote nipuna pea luaburi abade page abia page niaame na-adape-rupa pisa .
21003012	Neme go mada kone padane sua epe redepota adoa pe . Go epeta konere gupa . Niaame go su-amaa pima raburi kone padane sua pedo waru pua piramina .
21003013	Eta ipa nalima raburi raana rapu awa namina . Goa palimadare Gote nipumi pa ode gi yae meda madaa rana ora waru omoa namina .
21003014	Gote nipuna peanu senisi napea-daa neme waru makuaayo . Dia go piane aure oroyalo pa su-aalia . Gote nipumi pulalo peare aa medame makibumawa mada napalia . Gote nipuna pea rayore medame na-alopalimi . Gote-me go pisare onaa luabu nipuna rolo-para pirinalo pisa .
21003015	Abia go peayaenuri abade page opesa . Yaenu orope paliade-nu page abade pesa yaenu . Gote-me abade pisa yaenu diana kone naia . Dia go yaenu wala opena kone ia .
21003016	Neme ade rabu go su-amaa yae meda gupa iya . Onaame epe kone epe pora ratua apere gimeme . Dia nimumi wae pora ora rateme .
21003017	Goteme onaanu koso latalo palia raburi neme gupa kone saayo . Epea pi waea pi onaa raayo ado kiritua rumalia kone i yapi medame .
21003018	Gore Gote nipumi niaa ko tulalo pea kone i . Niaa aanu-ri pa yaa yapanu rupa yade .
21003019	Niaa aanuna diayape pora-re yaa yapana di iya-rupa mada yade . Yaa yapanu page omeme raburi niaa onaa-rupa mada omeme . Yaa yapanu page mena oyaenu komo meme-rupa niaa onaanu page komo mema . Go yaenu luabu mada kagaa pirape kone wasupa pia . Yaa yapa aarina kone wasupa-me onaana kone wasupa narabua niaya . Nipuna kone wasupa lapo rata pa yae meda rupa yade .
21003020	Gote-me su mua warisa-pulu nipu omalipi raburi gore nipu rata wala su autepe .
21003021	Aa medalomame gupa kone imi . Onaana wasare so yaapara pea raa yaa yapa mena aarinuna wasare no su-para pea kone gupa imi . Go yaena re luaburi aapimi makuaaya ?
21003022	Neme ade pare aame nipuna pea kogono rana omape pora padane gore waru yae . Goamere ora rabuaya . Niaa omalima rabu orope ake palia lo medame mada lagialiaya ?
21004001	Neme wala ade pare go yaana rolopara pimi onaada wae aurime surubea . Waeya pame onaa na re ipa adawa . Goa pea pare nimu rabameape aa page meda dia . Puripane gavman-me page nimu narabamea . Mo gavmanme wae aanu rabamua epe onaa gimea .
21004002	Neme onaa aba omeme-re epeta kone go-rupa i . Akoloya niaa go abi naome pa pima onaa-re keda radorado-na rolo para pa pima-daa laalo .
21004003	Onaa medaloma go su-amaa abi namaditimi nuri nimu wini pina . Nimu go su-amaa peme wae yaenu luabu abi naademe-pulu ora epeta .
21004004	Onaame kalaipu kogono pua oyae medaloma waritimi neme ade . Gona rere nimuna adami aanumi oyae adaapu imi kone sua go kone mada peme . Goa pua nimuna adami aanumi adoa padanepara eperupa piramona kone sua maeyae kone mada peme . Gore aa medame poripu ripinatalo peme-rupa mada .
21004005	Kiaarakepea pimi aanupara gupa teme . Nipu maeyae aa pirua puri diayalia rabu omalia teme .
21004006	Pina-ga oyae ogesi mada page kone perekea lo robaa padanepara sua kogono pamina . Aame poripu ratu ripinatalo pea rupa pama kogono palialo lalo .
21004007	Neme re waru nai kone meda adesude-re gore gupa .
21004008	Aa meda nipu ame-aaraa page na-piri nipu padane awaya . Nipuna si page napia pare oro yalo kogono agu pala pirina pea . Nipu oyae ora adaapu ia pare ogesi page namea . Nipumi mogo oyae mada kone sua oroyalo kogono puri paloa pea . Neme epe raana omape di page meda naia-ga akeaene kalae pe pae kone iya . Nipuna go oyaenuri apimi mealia loa pea . Go piaene aana kone oyoa nipuna pulalo pea oyae luabu ini namadini oyalia .
21004009	Aa laapo piralipiri ora yapare aa padane agurapo piraliare ota . Aa laapo-me upayoa kogono palipiri nipuna kogono ora epealia .
21004010	Aa nipuna yago meda lopaliadare mo nipuna yago medame mada rabamealia . Pare aguraapo-ae aa madaa odo ora waru palia . Nipu rabameape aa meda diayalia .
21004011	Nipu upame omalipiri , padanepara patalipi-pulu nipu kekapu palia . Go yapare aa nipu agurapo pirualia raburi nipuna topara kekapu mada paliaya ?
21004012	Aa padaneme iaa rapu yada mada pu patalia pae ? Aa laapo raapure yada mada palipi . Pare aa padane rapu mada dia . Opeamape ipa repo kopatawa yoteme raburi puri adaape salia pulu go ope mada narugutea .
21004013	Epe aa naara meda king pitiadare pare epe kone meda nami kogono palia dare wae king pia .
21004014	Naaki nipu kalabus amanane ipua king epaa pia . Nipu naara naki madini yapare nipuna epe koneme mada surubalia .
21004015	Neme adalo pare king ogaeyoa omalia rabu ogege aa medame pada mua king piralia . Go suna pimi onaa luabumi go king-na rolopara pirua nipuna agaa pagoa ratalimi .
21004016	Go su-para pimi onaa luabu nipuna rolopara pitimi . Go onaa luaburi aa medame mada nadipi kiritalimi . Nipu omalia rabu orope piralimi onaame nipumi pisade kogono naniminaalimi . Go madaa page re meda naiya . Gore aa medame poripu ratu ripinatalo pea-rupa mada .
21005001	Gote nipuna ada-para polalo pali raburi mo nena peaa luabu aba waru adoa pope . Nena kone abi waru naade pa pali rabu mo opa katalo pali yaenu puri napatea . Gore kone waru nai aanumi peme-rupa mada pali . Go piaene aanumi Gote-na ini agaa madaa gore wae yae yade kone waru naimi .
21005002	Neme kone waru aba mua orope agaa laape . Neme Gote raapu agaa talo palidaare agaa waru makuawa lape . Gore akoloya Gote so yaapara pia aa-re puri adaa iya niaare puri nai onaa pima . Goa pea-ga neme Gote raapu agaa adaapu nalape .
21005003	Neme oyae mada kone adaapu mealidare epaa page palia . Goa pua neme pama agaa te raburi maeyae aanumi teme rupa agaa natapape .
21005004	Neme Gotepara ora goa palua loa agaa meda tedaare neme mo palide aure adalupu nasurubape . Mo agaa lo rogalipide yae madaa oyae meda napalire ne maeyae aa meda . Gote-me go piaene aanu raaname naomea-ga Gote rapu palua tede agaa-na ini ora mamadiape .
21005005	Neme Gote-para goa palua loa mo tedea napalidaare go peare naepeta . Gore nena tede agaa ratua ora palua kone nasalidaare neme goa palualo abi nalape .
21005006	Neme pama goa palua loa napali rabu ne sini meali . Neme Gotena kogono aa meda-para goa palua tedaare gore mo miru irini aapara agaa aba ne kone aba waru nasua lawayade nalape . Gore Gote-me ne ratu akolo yawoa nena kalaipu-pe kogono luabu maoyatina ya ?
21005007	Ne epaa adaapu pi aa yalia page pama re nai kogono pu i aa yalia page ne agaa ora adaapu ne aa yalia page ne Gote nipuna rolopara oro yalo waru piruape .
21005008	Gavman aanumi naraa aanu kedaa mea gialia rabu ne nareko-oyape . Nimuna koso epe redepoya napagoa nimu epe rupa pirape pora namea wateme-daare go konena rere gupa : Pepa tea aana pea kogono adoa nimuna peme yae madaa rumawa kedaa kateme . Go opisa pimi aanu nimuna surube aa so madaa piame adoa padane rupa keda katea .
21005009	Onaa su yoto meme yae , mo opisa pimi aanu-mi nimu page meme . Mone oyae opisa nimu mua mea rumawa nimu paake meme . Mo king pia aame page onaana mone oyae paake mea iya .
21005010	Gore aa medame mone adaapu sawe kone saliadaare nipu oroyalo mone rudune pitia . Mone rana omalia aare mone adapu nasalia . Mone adapu sali page eperupa mada napiti . Go page renaiya .
21005011	Aa medana oyaeyae mada mealiadaare nipuna adami onaa epaa rulatabalia . Goa pea rabu mo aa nipuna adami onaana inimi nipu ama adabapitimi .
21005012	Kogono aana u-re kumapu patea , nipu kogono kalai puae sua page , eta adapu nanoa page . Goyapare Amane aare oyaeyae adapu kone salapirinia u napatamea .
21005013	Neme go su-amaa waeyae meda ia-da ade yae-re gupa . Aa medame nipuna raana rabuaawa oyae nakabea . Dia nipuna mone oyae waru surubea .
21005014	Orope nipuna oyaeyae luabu pua diayatabea . Goa pua nipuna naakina oyae page ora diata .
21005015	Niaana amanumi niaa madisimi raburi oyae page namea epe pa ipisima . Go-rupa agu niaa omalima rabu oyae meda namea pe pamaa palima .
21005016	Gore adaa odopi a pupima . Niaa go su-amaa oyae meda namea epe pa epema-pulu wala omoa pope page pa go rupa palima . Go su-amaa pirua kalaipu pima kogonore aa medame poripu ratu ripinaya-rupa mada .
21005017	Go su-amaa pimaa raburi ribana rupara piriua aipapulu yaina omo , keda mu , raturatu yawo go na rupara pima .
21005018	Neme abia makuatoyaere , onaame nimuna poaeme yaenu napena pedo palimiri epeta . Nimuna radapina peme kogono nare ado kaga pimi rabu . Goteme nipumi kane oyaenu .
21005019	Aa meda Gote-me mone oyaeyae adaapupe katea rabu nimu pedo rana omoa minalo kata . Nipuna kogono pedopu rana rapu minalo , go oyaeyae nuri Gotena manayaina sawa gea .
21005020	Gote-me go aa nipuna pirape yae madaa raana waru kata-pulu nipu ora epe-rupa pia . Goapeapare go aame nipu go suna rudupu pirape yana kone naniminaaya .
21006001	Neme ade pare go su-amaa pimi onaame wae kedaa ritimidaa ade . Go kedare adape ritimi .
21006002	Gote-me Aa mone mena e maapu oyaeyae adaapu waru kata . Gorabu nipu oyae meda naruduta . Go yapare Gote-me aa nipuna oyae madaa pedopu rana naomena teaa . Wala orope-re aa ruru rado medame nipuna go oyaenu mua pedo palia . Gore remeda naiya ora wae aa meda .
21006003	Gore aa meda nipuna naaki 100 maadu sua adalupu pirua , nipuna oyae mada pedo palia , nipu omalia rabu eperupa na-rogalimiri oyalia . Gore naaki meda agina robaa rupara omaliare gome rabuaniaaya .
21006004	Go piaene naaki nipuna bi meda naiya . Nipuna onaame page omea rabu kone rugulaeme .
21006005	Go naaki nipuri naarena paa page abi naadea . Nipu oyae page meda naade yapare nipu rogaeme rabu tapa-para kitu waru mua pia . Goa pea-pulu oge naaki agina robaa-para omea-me oyae adaapu sua omea aana bi rabuaniaaya .
21006006	Goa pea-pulu nipuna oyae madaa raaname naomea . Aa nipu maali adaapu 1000 o 2000 maali pirua omea pare mo agi-na robaapara omea naaki-me rabuaya . Niaa raayo omalima pare padane matmat-para palima .
21006007	Niaame eta napena kogono waru pema . Goa pema pare mo mema etame niana mada dia .
21006008	Mo makuae aame mo namaku-ae aare akeapua wini pea ? Gore naara aa medame onaa luabuna ini agaa epea palia raburi gome nipu akepu rabamealia pae ?
21006009	Niaame oro yalo meawe kone sua kone adaapu suaema yaenuri pinawa . Go ima kone page re meda naiya-ga gimamina . Aame po ripu ripinatalo aloma pea rupa mada . Go yapare niaame aba mema yaenu madaa raana waru omamina .
21006010	Oyae luabu pama ode-da naopea . Gote nipumi oyae luabu opena saa agaa ratua opea . Gote nipumi niaa aanuna ima kone luabu aba ado kiritea . Niaame Gote raapu udinona agaa mada natema . Gote nipuna purimi niaana puri luabu rabuaya-ga niaa pawa nipuna rolopara piramina .
21006011	Niaame agaa adalupu lo yoloalima pare goame niaa mada nawini palima . Niaame re nai agaa tema-pulu go agaa-me niaa narabamealia .
21006012	Niaa go su-amaa rudupu yapina pima . Gore naare ipua pabola popea rabu repena wasame rigitea-rupa mada pima . Goa pea-ga niaa go suna pirapere re ora waru naia . Niaame pora pamu eta no awape-rupare aapimi waru makuaya ? Niaa omalima rabu go su-amaa paliade yae rayo aapimi makuaaya ?
21007001	Aa medalomame ne ora epeta teme-daare gore ora waru epeta wele sada adaa yoto pea yae page rabuaniaaya . Niaa omema raburi amame niaa madita yapi di page rabuaniaaya .
21007002	Onaa omalimi rabu o-madaa piri-para palimi-mere gore eta adaa yawe para pema-rupa page rabuaniaaya . Akolo ya niaa luabu ora omalima . Goa pea-ga niaa go su-amaa pa pima raburi kone waru sua piramina .
21007003	Niaame oyae meda madaa lo robaa keda mealimare giri tema page rabuaniaaya . Gore niaana lo robaa kedaa mema raburi ini-agaa-para ribaa aba waru ta . Goa peamere go suamaa ima kone maredepo yapena epe pora mea wata .
21007004	Ne epe kone saliri onaa omeme rabu omadaa pirapere epe kone rapu mada pirali . Go yapare aa medaloma epe kone na-i aa omadaa gimoa , nimu ranarana ipara aanu rapu peme .
21007005	Epe kone-i aanumi ratu yawalimiri ne maredepo-yatalo peme . Gore epea meda , pedopua rana omeme onaana udinona kone page rabuaniaaya .
21007006	Epe kone na-i aame girilalia daare go teme girina re naia . Gore gupa ititu repena ralaaya pare somada yawe eta naralia .
21007007	Aa meda nipu epe kone salia pare aa medana oyaenu pamu yoloa mealia-daare nipu maeyane aa-rupa meda . Goa pua aa nipumi omeme pua mone oyae pamu mealiadare nipuna sabariade epe kone maoeya teapulu oyalia .
21007008	Aa medame kogono marekaa pulalo paliare gore epeta . Go yapare nipumi go kogono luabu pukiritaliare epeare go peadaa .
21007009	Neme aa meda-para ora aba aipapulu ratu nayawape . Mogo ratu yaweme konere kone waru nai aanuna kone .
21007010	Neme gupa nalape . Abade yapi diri ora epe yade pare abia go yapi diri otapi nalape . Neme gopiaene agaa te-daare ne epe makuaeyae naiya .
21007011	Go su-amaa piruaeme onaa luabumi epe kone salimiri epeta . Aaraanu omoa moae yae rumageme-rupa mada .
21007012	Epe kone-re mone-rupa ya-pulu niaa wae yapidi rabu page rabamea . Epe kone page makuae yaeme go mone-na puri rabuaya . Go epe kone makuae yaeme niaa ora waru raba mea .
21007013	Gote-me pisana oyae luabu madaa kone ora aba waru sape . Gote-me oyae meda paakipi-rupa warialo pisa-daare aapimi wala epe-rupa wariali pae ?
21007014	Nena epe-rupa piti-daare gore epe-rupa pedopu piruape . Go yapare wae keda yapi di medame ne epaa mealia raburi gupa kone niminape . Goteme epe yapi di page wae yapi di page gea kone sape . Goa pea-ga wala orope epaliade yaenuri niaada namakuaema .
21007015	Nina laipiri waru yae-daa dia yapare ni go su-amaa pima raburi neme oyae rado rado adaapu ade . Aa medaloma epe pora rateme pare nimu page omeme . Aa medaloma wae pupitagi noaeme pare nimu go su-amaa adalupa pa piruaeme .
21007016	Goa pea-ga niaame go su-amaa epe redepone-aure ratua epe kone agu sape mada kone adaapu nasamina . Goa agu palima raburi niaana bipa niaa maoyaalima .
21007017	Gore niaa-me wae kone , wae pora ratape madaa , puripane kone ogeapu samina . Goa palima-daare niaana omape yae page marudu yaema .
21007018	Ne go kone laapo waru ruma adoa pora pamuape . Aa medame Gote-na surube yaena rolo-para pirinatedaare ora epealia .
21007019	Ada-re meda para aa ki laapo pegepu pirua go siti surubo alimiri go siti puri paloa aalia . Goa palia pare epe konena purimiri go ada kagure surubalimina puri page rabaualia .
21007020	Go suna epe aa meda naaya . Dia aa medaloma nimumi wae sini peme .
21007021	Neme onaa luabuna agaa napagape . Neme mo onaame teme agaa luabu pagalidare kogono naakimi nepara wae agaa tea .
21007022	Gore nena aba makuae , neme mo onaa medaloma-para wae agaa aba tede .
21007023	Neme oyae raayona re adesaato pame kalai pere ni makuae aa opolalo pe . Nina kone ruduta-pulu mada diasa .
21007024	Oyae luabu opeana re adasaatalo pua kalai waru pe . Gore niaa-me oyae mo-para ina page no rolo-para ina asapimide-rupa pe . Gore apimi mada adesaliya ?
21007025	Goa pua nina uni radaa-pinaloa makuae kone rado rado adesatalo kalae waru pe . Go page neme wae pupitagi kone page maeyae kone adolalo page kogono radaa-pinaloa pe .
21007026	Asapua adawa raburi onanumi niaa kedaa waru mea geme-daa ade . Onaanumi niaa maroape kona yada waru ade . Nimuna ki-ri niaa adiape ope sene-me ade aaeme . Goa peme pare aa meda nipumi Gote madaa kone waru rulaliare go sene-me aditalo pea page yolaa-pa ina mada pogola palia . Go sene-me mo pupitagi neme aanu adialia napogola palimi .
21007027	Makuaae aa-me goa ta . Neme wae yae epe yae laapona re waru adolalo pawa kogono pe . Goa pe pare abiare re ona madaa asaa-daa waru adawa .
21007028	Neme ona epe asapawade pare meda ora naadawade . Aa ora adaapu papu papu pimi pare padane padane aanu medaloma epe pimi . Go yapare ona-re luabu ora wae pimi .
21007029	Gote-me onaa luabuna epe pora aba managolasaya-pulu nimumi kalai mada napalimi . Goa pea pare nimuna bipa peamea raayome nimu pope rupa radaa mapaeme .
21008001	Makuae aame oyae luabuna re waru makuaya . Goa peme-ga mo makuae aanu-ri aapimi mada rabualimi ? Aa medana ini ribaa yalia-daare , epe paa pi kone sali aana ini agaa-para paa palia .
21008002	Neme aa king-na agaa pagoa ratape . Neme mo Gote mada makuasua side agaa rataliri king-na agaa pagoa regenaape .
21008003	Ne king raapu pirali-daare nipu ora nagimape . Neme king raapu yada pu agaa te-daare gore neme puri waru paloa nalape . Gore king nipuna bipa rana ratua palialo lalo .
21008004	King nipumi aanu luabumi nipuna agaa pagoa ratalepa te-daare gore waru ratalepape . Neme go piare akolo pae lo mada na-agaa mealimi ?
21008005	Aa medame king-na agaa pagoa rataliare go aa nipu ora epe-rupa pitia . Aa nipu wale puti piraliare nipumi papea luabu-para nare inimi pea kogono page waru makuaaya .
21008006	Niaa aanuna keda medaloma salia page pinawa , oyae rayo papena pora para nareini page iya .
21008007	Orope paliade yae luabu makuapere marea . Go paliade oyae luabu lagiape aa meda naaya .
21008008	Niaa omolalo pema rabu niaana wasaa-me niaa gimoa polalo pea raburi medame mada napora-poaliaa . Niaana omape yapi di epalia page medame mada napora-poalimi . Yada peme raburi mo yada surube aame wala gimoa pupu-lo mada namea rapalia . Wae pupitagi nea aame nipuna waea aba pea-pulu nagimalia .
21008009	Neme go ade yae rayore go suna pemeda na koneme makuayo . Yapidi medamere , aa-yago rabuaniawa , waea-peme aanu rogaemeda ade .
21008010	Waeapi aa page rogaemeda ade . Wala ada pulawa mo siti para mo wae aa nipuna bi wala minasaere epeme . Gore remeda naiya da ade .
21008011	Waeapi aana rema amaa abi na epea raburi , mo onaame nimuna peme waea mada yala-poteme .
21008012	Waeapi onaa page sini peme onaa page abi naome adalupu pa aeme . Ni makuato Gote pala omeme onaa eperupa pitimi . Gore akoloya nimu Gote pala omeme pulu .
21008013	Gore akoloya , waea-pi aame Gote pala naomeapulu , nipu rapu mada napitimi . Gore nipu Gote-na surubena rolo-para napia-pulu nipu adalupu go su-amaa mada napiralia .
21008014	Go suna agaa medaloma teme pare re waru naiya . Oro medare mo epe redepoya piri aanumi wae yoto meme . Gore epe aanumi meape epe yoto wala wae aanumi meme-re neme lalo re meda naia peme .
21008015	Goa peme-daa neme epe kone epe ratapere epeta kone i . Niaame ratape epe pora meda naia . Goa pea-ga niaame ipa , etano pa epe raana raana pi-rupa awamina . Niaana pape kogono radaa pea pare niaa go su-amaa Gote-me mea gea yapi di raburi pawa epe-rupa pedopu piramina .
21008016	Neme aanumi ribaa page paa-para page puaemea adolalo kalaipu kogono pe .
21008017	Oyae raayo Gote-me pisaaya neme ado kirite pare niaame go su-amaa ia yae luabu-na re mada naado kiritema . Gore pinawa mo makuae aanumi go yae luabuna re ora aba ado kiritama teme page gore ora agaa-daa nateme . Nimumi go yaenuna re ora mada na-adasalimi .
21009001	Neme oyaenu madaa kone sua ade raburi gupa makuaayo . Gote-me mo epe aanu madaa pape aure page redepone aanu page pa aanu medaloma madaa papea page luabu aba adea . Nipu-mi oyae raana omape page raana naomape yapi di page Gote nipuna mada mea . Oyae medaloma orope ake paliare nia namakuaema .
21009002	Go yapare niaa raayo madaa epa-pe yae meda ora ia . Gore niaa Gotena ini agaa mada epea palima page ora epe redepone aa palima page ora suku suku puti aa yalia page niaa waea pi aanu yalia page o Gote nipu repara epekaapi miru irini aa yalia page niaa epe miru nairini aa luabu yalia page epe wae aa luabu yalia page Gote madaa ora yadamakua loa agaa tea-de aa mada page yadamakua natea aa madaa page epalia .
21009003	Niaa go su-amaa pima onaa luabu mada gopiane yae rayo niaa piripara ora epea . Onaa luabu go su-amaa pima raburi wae yae niaa repara ora epea . Gore gupa wae kone-para maeyae kone luabu nimina robaapara rulatabea . Goa pea pulu nimu omeme .
21009004	Raa mena laion-aba omea-mere papia yaname rabuniaya . Padane go-rupare mo papimi aanumi aba omeme aanu page rabuniaeme . Gore mo papimi aanumi nimu aba makuaawa niaare omalima kone imi .
21009005	Goa pea pare mo aba omeme aanu nimu oyae meda goa palia kone nasaapimi . Onaanumi nimu aba kone rugulaeme pare go onaa nimumi epe oyae meape mada pimi .
21009006	Onaa omeme raburi nimuna pupitagi epame omape kone page wae kone imi page oyae luabu omeme rabu diata . Goa pea-pulu go omeme onaa luabuna kogono go su-amaa meda naia .
21009007	Ne aipapulu ipa waine no lo robapara kuma pinaloa eta no raana aba meaina . Gote-me goa papere epeta loa aba ee lade .
21009008	Oroyalo neme pepena waru pua raana omoape .
21009009	Nena ore raapu rana omo eperupa piru pate page go suna re naiya . Ne go suna ape page re naiya . Goteme go suna apena yapidi geada pa goa pe .
21009010	Neme kogono meda pali-daare puri waru paloa go kogono ora pape . Gore akoloya ne omali raburi kogono pape page epe kone sape page ne makuaaeyae meape page ora mada nameali .
21009011	Neme go su-amaa oyae meda gupa ade . Aa meda alomaa pea pare oyae namea . Yada pi aanumi page nawinipeme . Epe kone sua makuae yae waru meme aanu page mone adapu nameme . Kogono radorado pu makuae aanu nimu adaa kogono nameme . Goa pua wae yapidi nimu madaa epea .
21009012	Adaa keda niaa madaa epolalo peare nadema . Kona maema rabu ya-yapa roalade rupa wae yapidimi niaa aipapulu ripinatalo agu rapea .
21009013	Neme yae meda peada ade . Go peare epe kone i aame pape kepele pia . Mo ade yaere go-rupa .
21009014	Oge siti meda aaya pare goparare onaa ora adaapu napimi . Gopara king meda nipu-na yada pi aanu rapu ipisimi . Gore mo yada pi aanumi mo oge siti kutapubasimi .
21009015	Goa peme pare mo oge siti-para aa naraa meda pirisa . Go aa nipu epe kone sua makuae yae page waru makuaya . Nipuna epe kone mada go oge siti paaya . Goa pisa rabu orope onaame mode aa naara-re wala kone rugulasimi .
21009016	Go konere niaa gupa go mea wata-daa . Epe konemere adaa puri page rabuaniaya . Go yapare onaa luabume gupa kone imi . Naara aa nipuna makuae-para epe kone page ora epe-daa dia teme . Goa loa mo aa naara-na agaa napageme .
21009017	Epe kone i aana agaa pagalima-daare epeta kone samina . Go piaene aana agaa-me rui loayaa aana agaa page rabuaniaya .
21009018	Epe koneme mo yada pape yaenu rabuaniaya . Go yapare aa padane-me waea meda pulalo paliadare nipumi oyae luabu maoyaatalia .
21010001	Puna mo wabola pabo i pe runane pua puaa omalia-dare wabola pugu waru palia . Goa pea rupare oge kone wae odabaawa epe kone i aana kone luabu maoyaatalia .
21010002	Epe kone i aame epea pulalo rapea . Go wae kone ia aa madaare epe kone meda napatea .
21010003	Mo aa nipu poranini pamea rabu page mo aa nipu aba ademe-pulu onaame go aa nipu waeyaede kone makualimi .
21010004	Nena surube aame ne ratu yawalia-daare nena kogono nagimape . Neme waea adaape pua page pawa odo pabena ali-daare nena aa mudumi nena waeyae mearuba-alia .
21010005	Aa medalomame waea adaapu peme-daa neme adoa gime . Go pemea wae yaenuri aa mudunumi peme .
21010006	Mo aa mudunumi kone epe-rupa nai aanu kogono pama kateme . Mone adaapu sua amo teme aanumi peme kogono ora naepeta .
21010007	Naraa piri kogono naakimi mena ose madaa pirua pupulaina ade . Pare pa kogono aanu pamuape rupare wala mo adaa aa mudu nimu pamualaina ade .
21010008	Aa meda nipumi su naaku adaape roboa saliare nipuna bipa go naaku-para pabalia . Aa medame ana kepo rugutea-daare paakame nipu nalia .
21010009	Aa medame ana polatua pereke-aliare aana-me nipu mada nalia . Aame repena kobealiare go repename nipu talia .
21010010	Aa meda nipuna raigapi nepo-napi pa saliare gore nipumi rai-eke naaya-pulu mo poalia repena waru nanalia . Go yapare epe kone-i aame kogono epe-rupa pea .
21010011	Aame paaka pawa epe-rupa mapirape kone sua aliare epeta . Go yapare paaka-me nipu wala nalia-daare go makuae-yae naepeta .
21010012	Epe kone-i aame agaa ora epe-rupa tedare ne epe bi meali . Ne onaa raapu wae ero agaa tedare nena bipa mabebolaali .
21010013	Go aa nipumi agaa ripima talo pea raburi nipuna talo pea agaa luabu ota . Nipuna agaa lo diayatalo pea raburi go agaa maeyaane aame ne nona pea .
21010014	Epe kone nai aamere agaa pa tea . Gore orope paliade yaenu naniminae pa agaa teme . Niaa omalima rabu palia page namakuaema .
21010015	Kone nai maeyae aa nipuna ada pope pora namakuawa kalai pama pea .
21010016	King meda pena naaki yalia pare nipuna rurumi ribaa rekoa eta yawalimidare ada kagure para kedaa adaa salia .
21010017	Go yapare king medana simi king piralia-daare go ada kagure-para piri aa mudumi nimu eta yawalia page kepele palia . Gore nimu maeyatalo-da napeme pare pa tona puri mulalo peme .
21010018	Aa meda nipu gi madua nipuna ada waru narigitaliare gore nipuna ada itipatame pabo talia .
21010019	Eta nape oyaenuri onaa , raana masape mada peme . Ipa waini neme rabu onaa lo robaa-para ora sae loa epeta kone inalo peme . Goa peme pare mone-re kogono raayo pape yae-para pema .
21010020	Nena pati ada robene-para pirua king-para ero agaa nalape . Neme nimu-para wae kone page nasape . Neme goa palide adoa yaanumi mo aa pua laketea .
21011001	Neme su adapu-para kogono waru pape orope ne epe yoto adaapu meaina .
21011002	Go suamaa wae yapidi medaloma epalia . Nena mone bisinisi adapu para saina 7-pela 8-pela bisinisi pape-para mea paga sape .
21011003	So yaa madaa moae popa rubita raburi go su-amaa yai lopea . Gore repena naare pabala-nane robalia page naare ipula-nane robalia page pa roba salia .
21011004	Ne e po sua , poripu yai epena kone surubali pare eta epe rupa nameali .
21011005	Gote nipumi oyae luabu warisa . Goa pea pulu agina robaa-para naaki akepu inagi tea palo niaa namakuaaema . Go-rupa agu Gote-me pea yae luaburi niaame mada naado kiritema .
21011006	Neme eta wai polalo paliri gore medaloma aebo poa medaloma yapipu poape . Go pea pare aebo poaede waru opea palo yapipu poaede waru opala palo waru naade . Gorupare yapipu poae-para aebo poae lapo rata waru opalia .
21011007	Paa ora epeta pulu niaa naarena paa adema raburi raana waru omema .
21011008	Niaame maali yalo go su-amaa piruaema madaa raana ora waru omamina . Niaa maali adaapuna go su-amaa piralima page go madaa kone ora narugulamina . Niaa aba ome onaana tapa-para ora maali adaapuna pirualima . Oyae luabu orope opaliade page waru yaeda dia .
21011009	Nimi ona inumakuaa , aa ogegeaa-nuri nimi pena ona inumakuaa aa ogegeaa aaeme rabu pedopu raana omo aatepape . Nimina rana ratua alimina yapare , Gote-me nimi-na pemea luabu madaa koso laliaga kone waru sua atepape .
21011010	Nimi ona inumakuaa aa ogegeaa pirape yapi diri adaalupu-da naiya . Goa pea-ga nimi kedaa mea gea yaere gimalepape . Nimina to yogaene madaa kedaa mea gea yaenu page gimalepape .
21012001	Gote-me niaa luabu warisa . Goa pea-ga nimi pena ona inumakua aa ogegeaa a-wa Gote nipu madaa kone rutalepape . Nimu kone rugulaawa alimi rabu kone perekeape-rupa maralimi . Goa pua nimi padane padane latapumi gupa teme . Nina kone wasupame raana napia teme .
21012002	Go yapi dinare nimina ini-para riba tea rabu gupa teme . Akua naare uba kedonu page waru narea pare yai epope moae page waru nasala teme .
21012003	Go yapinare nimina ki page omapaawa puri nasalia rabu pururu yata aalia . Nimina ke page omapa-wa puri nasalia rabu pulu-pulu tala-alia . Go rabu agaa imaa padane padane-si aalia . Goa pua nimimi eta puri paloti mada nanalimi . Nimina ini page ribaa yalia rabu oyae waru naadalimi .
21012004	Nimina ane page poalia rabu adaalu pare awa temede agaa mada napagali . Goa pua gigau loalia page mada napagalimi . Goa pea pare nimi patalimi raburi yaa-agaa tea padane mada pagali .
21012005	Go raburi nimi pora-nini pamuape page so madaa pirape page palame omalimi . Nimina iri page kama-iri opalia rabu pora pamuape-rupa maralimi . Oyaeme page nimina lo robaa mada namarekaalia . Goa pua nimi omali-mi rabu oroyalo piruape supara palimi . Go rabu nimina adare-para piri onaa-me odome omoa re yasa loalimi .
21012006	Goa palimi-ga nimi abi naome pa pirua Gote madaa kone rulatepape . Gore nimi laba paa udinitade rupa mada omalimi . Go page niaame ipa-no ritalo peme rabu sosopene-na igu apetaboa ipa pupubeade-rupa mada palia .
21012007	Nimina tore go su autea . Kone popo Gote nipuna gisa-pulu kone wasupare Gote nipu piri-para wala palia .
21012008	Makuae aame nipumi oyae luabu waru yaeda dia loare ogeda page naia ta .
21012009	Makuae aa nipu epe koneme rulatabisa-pulu onaa luabu go epe kone mogealia . Nipumi ora agaa ria-para saa-agaa page rumawa epere luabu buku-para mea tu isa .
21012010	Onaana anepara pagoa redeme omalimi loa buku-para popena sa . Goa pua ora agaa riaa uni mada polabaina loa tu isa .
21012011	Go makuae aanuna agaa-re rigi eke waru aayade-rupa mada . Gore mena pulubaene maredepo yaemade-rupa mada . Makuae aame go agaa buku-para mea kiritaawa tu saliare go agaa ora adaalupu suaalia . Gore nili tema rabu ripinaya-de rupa mada . Gote-re niaana surube aa pulu nipumi go agaa niaa luabu lagiala .
21012012	Nina naaki neme yae meda lagiano . Aanumi buku temere go kogono ora diayape kogono-da napeme . Neme go buku oroyalo ado pirali raburi nena to yogaene gi-palia . Goa palia-ga neme go gi-madini kone-re waru adape .
21012013	Agaa luabu madiaaya neme gupa talo pi . Niaa aanuna riri-nane palimare go-rupa : Niaame Gote padanemana rolo-para pirua nipuna pora ia-rupa luabu ratua pawa epe-rupa piramina .
21012014	Niaana puaema oyae luabu madaa Gote-me niaa adialia . Gore niaame kudiripi kone page wae kone page ima pupitagi oyae luabu pema yae mada niaa koso madaa Gote-me adialia .
40001001	Go remaa madaare Yesu Krais-na akuanuna bi aba gupa teme . Aba ripiare Yesuna akua Devit pirisa . Devit-na akua medare Abraham pirisa .
40001002	Abraham-re Aisak-na aaraa pirisa . Aisak-re Jekop-na aaraa pirisa . Jekop-re Juda-para nipuna amenu-para nimuna aaraa pirisa .
40001003	Juda-re Peres-para Sera lapona aaraa pirisa . Nipuna amare Tamar pirisa . Peres-re Hesron-na aaraa pirisa . Hesron-re Ram-na aaraa pirisa .
40001004	Ram-re Aminadap-na aaraa pirisa . Aminadap-re Nason-na aaraa pirisa . Nason-re Salmon-na aaraa pirisa .
40001005	Salmon-re Boas-na aaraa pirisa . ( Nipuna agiri Rehap . ) Boas nipuri Obet-na aaraa pirisa . ( Nipuna agiri Rut . ) Obet-re Jesi-na aaraa pirisa .
40001006	Jesi nipuri King Devit-na aaraa pirisa . Devit-ri Solomon-na aaraa pirisa . Nipuna agiri abade Uria ona pirisa .
40001007	Solomon-re Rehoboam-na aaraa pirisa . Rehoboam-re Abiya-na aaraa pirisa . Abiya-re Asa-na aaraa pirisa .
40001008	Asa-re Jehosafat-na aaraa pirisa . Jehosafat-re Jehoram-na aaraa pirisa . Jehoram-re Usia-na aaraa pirisa .
40001009	Usia-re Jotam-na aaraa pirisa . Jotam-re Ahas-na aaraa pirisa . Ahas-re Hesekia-na aaraa pirisa .
40001010	Hesekia-re Manase-na aaraa pirisa . Manase-re Emon-na aaraa pirisa . Emon Josaia-na aaraa pirisa .
40001011	Josaia-re Jehoiakin-para nipuna amenu medaloma nimuna aaraa pirisa . Go raburi mo Israel onaanu nimu Babilon su-para kalabus ada mapataasimi .
40001012	Nimu Babilon su-para kalabus patisimi raburi akuanuna bi gupa maasimi : Jehoiakin-re gore Sealtiel-na aaraa pirisa . Sealtiel-re Serubabel-na aaraa pirisa .
40001013	Serubabel-re Abiut-na aaraa pirisa . Abiut-ri Eliakim-na aaraa pirisa . Eliakim-ri Asor-na aaraa pirisa .
40001014	Aso-re Sadok-na aaraa pirisa . Sadok nipuri Akim-na aaraa pirisa . Akim-ri Eliut-na aaraa pirisa .
40001015	Eliut-ri Eleasar-na aaraa pirisa . Eleasar-re Matan-na aaraa pirisa . Matan-re Jekop-na aaraa pirisa .
40001016	Jekop-re Josep-na aaraa pirisa . Josep-re Maria-na aani pirisa . Maria-re Yesuna agi pirisa . Yesu nipuna biri Gote-na Mea Repae Aa ( Mesaia ) maasimi .
40001017	Gore abare Abraham-na ruru go pirisimi onaana epa-mama pua Devit madaare akuanuna ruru 14-pela pirisimi . Abade Devit pirisa rabu epa-mama puare nimu Babilon kalabus ada mapataasimi raburi akuanuna ruru 14-pela pirisimi . Gore mapataasimi onaana epa-mama puare Gote-na Mea Repae Aa madisa rabu go madaare akuana ruru 14-pela pa pirisimi .
40001018	Yesu Krais nipu madisa-na remaare go-rupa : Nipuna agi Maria-re aba Josep-na rumaainalo mada misimi . Goa pisimi pare Josep nipumi abi narumaasa rabu Maria-me nipu madaa Holi Spirit-mi naaki padaa pa maraasa .
40001019	Go ona nipuna polalo pi aare Josep yapare nipu ora epe aa ya-pulu nipumi Maria yala namapolaano kone isa . Goa pisa-pulu nipumi kudiri pi kone sua pawasi gimalua kone isa .
40001020	Josep nipumi go kone pa niminaaba pirina upaame Gote-na ensel meda adesa . Go ensel-me nipu-para lalo : Josep nere Devit-na si . Nena ona Maria meape paalame naomape . Paga , mo robaa-para pia naakiri Holi Spirit-mi mapiraariade .
40001021	Nipumi naaki madialia rabu nipuna biri Yesu lape . Gore nipumi onaa rayona wae yaenu mea raakepe ruboa nimu epe-rupa raba mua mapiraalia sa .
40001022	Gore Aa Mudu Gote-na agaa lakene aa meda agaa lakesa-pulu go oyae rayo apo-rupa ora pisa . Go agaa lakene aame abade gupa sa :
40001023	Pagelepa , ona inumakua meda aa raapu napatimi naaki padaa pirua naaki meda madialia pare go naaki nipuna biri Emanuel lamina sa . Go bina re-re gupa : Gote-re niaa raapu piruaaya .
40001024	Josep nipu u patua rekesa rabu mo Aa Mudu-na ensel-me lakesa agaa pagoa nipumi go ona nipuna ore-rupa misa .
40001025	Pare nipuna oname naaki padaa pa pirina nipu raapu u napatasipi . Go naaki madisa rabu Josep-me bi Yesu lo lakesa .
40002001	Maria-me Yesu Betlehem adaare-para madisa . Go suri Judia su ru-nane aasa . Go naaki nipu madisa raburi Herot nipu aa mudu pirisa . Gore aba madinaloa uba kedo madaa kone makuaae aanu medaloma mo naare opa ipula-nane pirua Jerusalem su-para ipisimi .
40002002	Epa opopaawa agaa gupa misimi : Go kagaa naaki nipu Juda onaanuna aa mudu pirape aare aa-para madia ya ? Niaana su-para pirua nipu madini su waala uba kedo adoa epa amaa . Nipuna bi minasaatalo .
40002003	Gore aa mudu Herot-me go remaa pagoa pogolasaasa . Goa pua Jerusalem su-para piri onaa rayo kone adaapu isimi .
40002004	Goa pua Herot-me Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para rekena agaa maalape aanu-para makiritaasa . Nimu kiritasimi rabu Herot-me agaa gupa misa : Gote-na Mea Repae Aare aapina su-para madia ya ?
40002005	Gore nipu gupa lakesimi : Judia su ru-nane Betlehem adaare-para madiaaya simi . Gote-na agaa lakene aame pepa madaa gupa tu isa-ga pagape simi :
40002006	Nimi Betlehem adaare-para piri onaanuri Juda su robo ru-nane pimi . Gore Juda suna aa mudununa kone madaa ora epe-rupa pimi . Goa pea-ga nimina su-parare aa mudu meda piralia . Go aamere nimi-para Israel su-para piri onaanu-para surubalia .
40002007	Go tu isa agaa pagoare Herot nipumi pawasi kaledoa mo naare ipula-nane piri makuaae aanu ipulupa lo lakesa . Goa pua go uba kedo opapariaade diri aa-rabu yaalo agaa misa .
40002008	Go agaa mua sana nipumi go makuaae aanu Betlehem adaare-para wala rapaawa agaa gupa lakesa : Nimi puare puri paloa go naaki waru asapula pulupa . Nimimi aba adasaalimiri ni piri wala epa lagialepape . Goa palimiri neme page nipuna bi minasaata palua sa .
40002009	Mo aa muduna agaa aba pagoare nimu pisimi . Go adoa ipisimi uba kedo wala epa opoa puaa-mama puare mo naaki madu saapiri ada masaa madaa pua aasa .
40002010	Mo uba kedo wala adoare nimuna pu robaa-para raaname ora waru omesimi .
40002011	Nimu ru-nane pua odobaawa simina mo naaki Maria agiaaya pua adesimi . Go rabu nimumi su adoa rumu koba pua mo naakina bi minasaasimi . Nimuna paus loboa epe kaa pi oyae medaloma pa epa kasimi . Nimumi abu pi gol aana-me warini epe yae-para paura epe kaa pi yaenu-para epe kaa pi wabola nona piane yae medaloma page epa kasimi .
40002012	Gore upaame Gote-me nimu gupa lakesa-pulu nimu Herot piri wala napisimina nimuna pora rado meda mada pua nimuna ada wala pisimi .
40002013	Nimu aba penaaloa Gote-na ensel-me ipua upaame Josep gupa epa lakesa : Nena naaki agiaaya mea pu no Isip su-para pogola pulupa . Ne go su-para piraina wala orope go su gimape yapi di epa lagialua . Abiare Herot-me go naaki asapua tulalo pia .
40002014	Gore Josep go agaa pagoa sana nipu ruma rumane rekoa nipuna naaki agiaaya mo Isip su-para mea pisa .
40002015	Josep nipu mo Isip su-para pirina Herot omesa . Josep nipu go su-para pisare Gote-na agaa lakene aanu lakesa-pulu pa pisa . Buk madaa Gote-na agaa lakene aa nipumi gupa tisaa-ya : Nina naaki Isip su-para pirisa pare neme yaasude tu isaya .
40002016	Gore abade mo naare ipula-nane piri aanumi Yesu madini su Herot nalakeloa pogola pisimi-pulu Herot-me nimu ratu yawesa . Herot nipumi mo kimisu aanu-para agaa misa rabu go aanumi mo uba kedo opasade di lakesimi-pulu Herot-me mo naaki madini di niminaawa tu maomaatalo pisa . Go raburi nipumi Betlehem su-para pirua maali laapo abi napati naaki rayo tu maomaaina sa .
40002017	Go kone madaare abade Gote-na agaa lakene aa meda Jeremaia-me abade saa agaame gupa lakesa :
40002018	Rama su adaare-parare agaa meda pagoaeme . Go agaare nimumiri re lo pirua odome omoaeme . Go rabu ona Resel-me nipuna nogo naakinu madaa re loaaya . Go rabu onaanumi go onaana pu robaa namakuma paeme . Dia-ga nipuna nogo naaki omesimi-pulu nipu re lo piruaaya .
40002019	Orope Herot aba omenaloa Aa Mudu-na ensel medame Isip su-para ipua Josep nipu upaame gupa epa lakesa :
40002020	Ne rekoa nena naaki agiaaya mea pu nimina su Israel su-para wala pulupa . Mo naaki tulalo paade aare aba omaade .
40002021	Gore Josep nipu rekoa nipuna naaki agiya mea pua Israel su-para wala pisimi .
40002022	Gore Arkelaus-me nipuna aaraa Herot alopaawa nipu Judia suna aa mudu pirisa . Gore Josep-me go remaa aba pagesa-pulu nipu go su-para pope paalame omesa . Pare Gote-me Josep upaame agaa gupa epa lakesa . Go nimu Galili su ru-nane wala pisimi .
40002023	Nipu pua Nasaret adaare-para pua pirisimi . Gore abade Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi ora agaa gupa lo mapataasimi : Nipuri Nasaret su-para piri aa simi .
40003001	Jon Batais ipua sana Judia su onaa napiri rina su-nane epa aawa Gote-na agaa lakelo aasa .
40003002	Gore nipumi lalo : Gote-na Surube Suri aba re-para go epea-ga nimina pupitagi nape kone gimalepa sa .
40003003	Abade Gote-na agaa lakene aa Aisaia-me Jon madaa agaa gupa sa : Aa medame onaa napiri su-para aawa agaa gupa yaatea : Aa Mudu nipuna poranu waru wari salepape . Nipuna pamuape pora maredepo yatepape sa .
40003004	Jon nipumi abade kamel menana iri maraawa mena yoganeme warini aako let-me rabuniaawa yamesa . Goa puare nipumi mata-para alubi aapa-para asapu no pirisa .
40003005	Go rabu mo Jerusalem su-para Judia su rayo-para piri onaanumi ipa Jordan repaa-para piri onaanu page Jon nipu piri-para ipisimi .
40003006	Ipuare nimuna waeanu lapedepe ne agaa lakesimi rabu Jon-me ipa Jordan-para baptais kasa .
40003007	Yapare Jon nipumi Farisi aanu-para Sadyusi aanu-para nimu baptais minalo adesa . Goa pua nipumi nimu gupa lakesa : Nimiri wae paakame madini aanu pimi . Aapimi nimi gupa lagia ya ? Gote-na orope ratu yawape konere nimimi adobaawa piralimi . Go ratu yawe konere nimimi madaa pogola palimi ya ?
40003008	Nimimi epe kogono pipape . Nimimi goa pua kone rulalimi-daare ora kone rulae onaanu pitapape .
40003009	Nimina robaa-parare Abraham-re niaana Aapa kone nasalepape . Neme nimi lagialo : Go ia aana-re Gote-me Abraham-na sinu mada ma-aulaalia .
40003010	Rai gaapiri repena re-para aba apo ia-daa ini waru namadialiade repenare pitaa poa repena sulaa-para mea iralia .
40003011	Nemere nimi kone perekealiminalo pa amaa baptais gialo . Pare orope epaliade aa medamere Holi Spirit-na purimi repena sulaa nona piane yae raapu baptais gialia . Niri raba mi aa ya-pulu neme go aa-na aariti esepea kege radepetalo palua pare mada dia .
40003012	Nipuna lama saapia nipuna kimi ripinua aaya . Goa pua mo wit-na ini raapu ripu raloa go epe ininu agu mua nipuna kiritape ada-para sulalo palia . Gore wae ripuri aipapulu nauduni repena sulaa-para mea iralia rabu pa roalia sa .
40003013	Go raburi Yesu nipumi su Galili gimoa ipa Jordan-nane ipisa . Nipu Jon piri pua Jon-me baptais kanalo pisa .
40003014	Goa pisa pare Jon-me Yesu gupa lakesa : Neme ni baptais gialiri epe ta-ga akeane neme baptais gialua pae ?
40003015	Gore Yesumi nipu agaa gupa abusa : Palaina abiare neme toade-a pape . Niaame goa palimi-daare Gote-me pamina ta rayo palima . Goa sa-pulu Jon-me nipuna agaa ratisa .
40003016	Yesu nipu baptais aba mua aipapulu nipumi ipa Jordan gimoa so repaa-nane ipisa . Goa pua Yesumi gupa adesa : Yaa-para pora gaape lobesa rabu Gote-na Holi Spirit yaa puluma nona piane biyaa ipua nipu madaa epaa pirisa .
40003017	Go rabu agaa meda yaa-para gupa laniaasa : Gore nina si-ga neme nipu madaa ora pedo waru pisa .
40004001	Go raburi Holi Spirit-mi Yesu nipu onaa napiri su-para mea pisa . Go rabu Satan-me nipu kone adolalo ko tisa .
40004002	Yesu nipu raa-para yapi 40-pela pirua eta nanisa-pulu reame omesa .
40004003	Go rabu Satan-me ipua sana Yesu-para goa sa : Nere ora Gote-na Si yaliare neme te rabu go aana-me bret aunialoa mea na sa .
40004004	Go raburi Yesu nipumi agaa gupa lakesa : Gote-na buk madaa agaa gupa ia : Onaanumi bret agu noa epe-rupa napirualimi pare Gote-na lagi agaa rayo waru pagoare oro yaalo epe-rupa pitimi sa .
40004005	Go raburi Satan-me Yesu nipu wala so epe Jerusalem siti-para lamua pisa . Gore nipu ora so lotu adaa masaa madaa lamu pua goa lakesa :
40004006	Nere ora Gote-na Si yalia-daare gore ne go lotu ada masaana aawa su amaa epa pogolape . Gore Gote-na buk madaa agaa gupa ia : Gote-me ne madaa nipuna ensel-nu lakeloa ripinaatepa tea rabu ne waru suruboa kimi ripinaabalimi . Goa pea-ga pogolali-daare aana-me page nena aa mada natalia sa .
40004007	Gore Yesumi nipu goa lakesa : Gote-na agaa i buk madaare agaa meda gupa ia : Neme nena Mudu Gote-re kone adolalo nakotape ta .
40004008	Satan-me Yesu wala mea puare ora so pore medana eke madaa pua aaware su rayona i yaenu Yesu walabesa .
40004009	Gore nipumi Yesu gupa lakesa : Neme ni madaa rumu koba pua nina bi minasaali-daare go su amaa ia yae rayo ne gialua sa .
40004010	Go rabu Yesumi nipu goa lakesa : Satan nere pane pu . Gote-na buk-mi agaa gupa ta : Nena Mudu Gote padane pia-ga nipu padanena bi minasaawa nipu padanena kogono pape .
40004011	Go raburi Satan-me Yesu nipu gimenaloa Gote-na ensel-numi nipu raba mula ipisimi .
40004012	Yesumi Jon kalabus ada mapataarimi remaa pagesa-pulu nipu Galili su-para pisa .
40004013	Gore nipu Nasaret su-para napirisa pare Kaperneam su-para pua pirisa . Kaperneam suri ipa Galili ini repaa-para aasa . Go Kaperneam adaare-re Sebulun-para Naptali su lapona robo rikiraana aasa .
40004014	Gore aba Gote-na agaa lakene aa meda Aisaia-me laama ipisa agaa ratua pa amaa ipisa .
40004015	Sebulun su-para Naptali su lapo-para piri onaanuri nimina su lapona porare mo ipa repaa-nane pua ipa Jordan-na mone pane aina . Go su laapo-parare ora Galili su robo ru-nane aasa pare ruru rado onaa adaapu pirisimi .
40004016	Go su ribaane-para pirisimi onaanu nimumi epe adaa paa adalimi . Onaa rayore omape su ribaane-para piri onaanu nimi pimi-para paa ora epalia .
40004017	Go raburi Yesumi nipuna epe agaa ripima lakesa : Gote-na Surube Su ora re-para go ipula-ga nimimi wae kone gimoa lo robaa perekealepape sa .
40004018	Yesu nipu ipa Galili ini repaa-nane pamuala aasa rabu nipumi ameaya lapo adesa . Go ameaya lapore Saimon Pita-para ame Andru lapome ena meape kogono pua agona pa amaa pisipi .
40004019	Gore Yesu nipumi lalo : Nipiri ni raapu baina . Go ena meapena-rupa nipimi onaa mealipinalo mogealua-ga ipulupa sa .
40004020	Gore nipu lapome aipapulu mo ena agona gimoa nipu raapu pisipi .
40004021	Nipumi wala ogesi-daa pua ameaya lapo meda adesa . Nipu lapore Sebedi-na si Jems-para Jon ameaya pirisipi . Nipuna aaraa Sebedi raapu ipunu madaa pirua nimuna ena agona rabu lala pirisipi . Yesumi nipu lapo ipulupa sa .
40004022	Gore nipuna Aapa page mo ipunu page gimoa Yesu rata mea pisipi .
40004023	Nipu Galili su rayona pora pamula pisa . Goa puare nipumi Juda aanuna lotu adanu-para onaanu Gote-na surube suna agaa pamu mogeasa . Gore nipumi Gote-na Surube Su madaa epe agaa pamu lakeloa sana mo onaanu nimuna yaina rado rado maperekeaawa nimuna yogane maepeaasa .
40004024	Goa pisa-pulu nipuna bi so Siria su robo rayona piri onaanumi pago kiritisimi . Go onaanumi pago kiritaawa nimuna yaina rado rado-para radaame ome onaa page mea ria ipisimi . Nimuna yainare wae remo nimu madaa pirua maeya ne onaanu page pirua uni rayo oma pae page nimu mea ipisimi . Yesu nipumi nimu rayo maperekeaa kiritisa .
40004025	Go rabu ora onaa adaapumi Yesu rata mea pisimi . Nimuna suri Galili-para adaare Dikapolis-para Jerusalem su-para Judia su robo ru-nanepara ipa Jordan-na mone pane piri onaanu-para ora rayore agaa pagoa rata mea pisimi .
40005001	Yesu nipumi mogo onaa adaapu adoa nipu so rudu madaa opasaawa pua pirisa . Go rabu nipuna disaipel onaanu padane-para epa pirisimi .
40005002	Go rabu Yesumi nimu agaa gupa lakesa :
40005003	Nimi rayona robaa-para epe kone mulalo pirua niminaalimi-daare raana omo piralimina . Gote-na Surube Su nimimi ora mealimina .
40005004	Nimi rayome re lo pi-daare pedo pu piramina . Gore Gote-me nimina robaa-para kuma mapainaalo goa palimina .
40005005	Nimi rayome nimina bi rabuaniaalimiri gore pedo pu piramina . Gore nimiri Gote-me su rayo gialia .
40005006	Nimi rayome Gote-na epe kone padane mulalo palimi-daare nimiri Gote-me eta rulatabenalo gialia . Goa pea-ga nimi pedo pu piralimina .
40005007	Nimi rayome onaanu odome omalimiri pedo pu piralimina . Gore nimi madaare Gote-me page odome omalia .
40005008	Nimi rayona robaa-para epeaaliare pedo pu piralepape . Nimimi Gote mada adalimi .
40005009	Nimi rayome yada mapataalo palimi-daare Gote-me nimi ora naa onaanu tea .
40005010	Nimi rayome Gote-na pora kurua kedaa rialimi-daare pedo pu piralimina . Nimiri Gote-na Surube Su adalimi .
40005011	Gore nimimi naa ruru piritalo rata mea epalimide rabu nimumi adoa nimi-para ero agaa lo wae kedaa pi kone sua yaa agaa medaloma teme-daare nimimi pa raaname omalepape .
40005012	Nimina kone-para page raana waru omoa pedo waru palimina . Goa pea-ga nimi so yaa-para i yoto epe adaapu gialia . Go wae konere nimumi aba Gote-na agaa lakene aanu riri-nane aba mea kasimi .
40005013	Nimi kone rulae onaanuri go su amaa piri onaanuna rikiraane aipa-rupa pimi . Goa pea pare mogo aipa-na rede aba dia yaliare gore niaame ake palima rabu aipa wala ma-rede palima ya ? Go piane aipare nipuna rede napea-pulu onaanumi mea ruboa nipuna aame rabuaatalimi .
40005014	Nimiri go su amaa piri onaanuna paa-rupa pimi . Goa pua adaare so rudu madaa waritimi rabu onaa rayome go adaarena paa waru ademe .
40005015	Go page onaanumiri lam meda ewoa baket rolo-para nasalimi . Dia , pare ora ada-para mudialimi gomere ada ru-nane piri onaa rayo paa epe-rupa mealimi .
40005016	Goa pea-ga nimina epe paame pa onaanuna ini agaa madaa roalia-daare nimumi nimina epe palimide kogono adoa nimina Aapana bi minasaalimi .
40005017	Nimimiri neme Gote-na agaa lakene aanuna agaa-para rekena agaa-para gimaliminalo ipisude kone nasalepape . Dia , neme go yaenu mea rubolalo naipisu pare apo rekena agaana re waatalo ipisu .
40005018	Neme ora nimi lagialo : Go su yaa lapo ora dia yaliade rabu page Gote-na rekena agaana oge tu saabae pepasinu page alupalia . Go rekena agaare ora pa saabaina Gote-me oyae rayo kiritalia .
40005019	Goa pea-ga onaa medalomame go rekena agaare oge agaa meda kone sua onaanumi gimalimi-daare mogo rekena agaa ogeme-ga Gote-na Surube Su-para nimu page oge onaanu mapiraalia . Pare onaa rayome mo rekena agaa waru pagoa onaa medaloma pagenalo mogealimi-daare gore so Gote-na Surube Su-para page bi adaape salia .
40005020	Neme nimi lagialo : Gore nimimi Gote-na agaa pagoa nimina epe koneme kogono palimiri mo rekena agaa tisaanu-para mo Farisi aanu-para nimuna kogono maoge yalimi . Goa napalimiri nimimi Gote-na Surube Su madaa na-adalimi .
40005021	Niaana akuanumi abade pagesimi yaade agaare gupa pagesimi : Aa meda natu maomape tade . Pare aa meda tu maomaliri koso pagape aa piri-para mea palimi .
40005022	Pare neme abia nimi lagialo : Aa medame nipuna ame-para ratu yawaliare nipu koso pagape aa piri-para mea palimi . Go page aa medame nipuna ame-para agaa wae tea-daare kaunsil piri-para koso talo lamua palimi . Gore aa medame ame-para ne ora maeya ne aa yana tea-daare nipu mo wae repena sulaa-para mea lo palia .
40005023	Goa puare neme Gote-para ora pi lape eta mea yawo sua aana reke alta madaa mea epali rabu neme nena ameme ne madaa wae kone inare go kone aba maepeaape :
40005024	Gore nena mo rialide ofa mo aana alta madaa pa yawo sape . Goa pua nena ame piri wala pua mode agaa wae wala pua maredepo yatepape . Go agaa aba wari kirituare orope Gote mo eta mea pua ora pi ta paina .
40005025	Gore aa medame ne raapu koso loa agaa unini salia-daare pena pora-nia palipi rabu epe kone sua agaa maredepo yaawa pulupape .
