40018025	Pare mo aame mogo mone yago mada na-abutea-pulu nipuna aa adaame gupa lakesa : Go aa nere ora kogonome adini aa-rupa piraina . Go rabu nipuna ona-para nipuna nogo naaki-para oyae rayo-para kabalimina . Goa pua go mone-re mo yago medaloma abutea .
40018026	Goa sa rabu mo kogono naaki nipu mo aa adaana kibu-para rumu koba pua adaniaa pirua lalo : Neme ni odome omape . Go yago rayore neme mada abutua .
40018027	Go kogono naakina aa adaame nipu madaa odome omoa nipu pirina gimisa . Goa pua nipuna yago mone page gimisa .
40018028	Go rabu go kogono naaki nipu amaa puare nipuna padane kogono pi naaki yago pua adesa . Go aare nipuna yago mone ogesi 40 kina go aa madaa isa . Go aa adesa-pulu nipumi mo aa-na maa regepeminua lalo : Neme nina yago rayo abulape .
40018029	Goa pisa-pulu nipuna kogono padane pi aa nipu rumu koba pua agaame gupa ogesa : Neme ni odome omoa ni ado pirape . Neme yago mada abutua .
40018030	Pare nipumi gimi omoa kalabus ada mapataasa . Goa pua nipuna yago abunalo mada esepeaalia .
40018031	Gore mo kogono padane pisimi aanumi go kone adoa nipuna robaa-para o sa . Goa pua rayo nimuna aa adaa piri pua puaa lakesimi .
40018032	Go raburi aa adaame mo kogono naaki ipu loa gupa lakesa : Nere kogonome adini naaki wae yana . Abade neme ni piri ipua re epa lae-daa nina yano rayo gimawade .
40018033	Neme abade ne padane odome omesude-ga akeane nena kogono padane pi naaki odome naomae ya ?
40018034	Gore nipuna aa adaame nipu-para ratu yawoa nipu kalabus ada-para mea rapaasa . Goa pua nipu radaa manaawa nipuna yago rayo abunaloa mada esepealimi .
40018035	Go rabu Yesumi lalo : Nimi rayona koneme nimina amena wae yae namea rakepealimiri nina so yaa-para pia Aapame page nimi-para goa palia .
40019001	Yesumi go agaa aba lo kiritua Galili su gimoa mo ipa Jordan-na mone pane pua Judia su ru-nane pisa .
40019002	Go raburi onaa adaapumi nipu rata mea ipisimi rabu nipumi yaina ome onaa go su-para maepeaasa .
40019003	Gore mo Farisi aanumi Yesu ko tulalo ipua lalo : Gore niaana rekena agaa madaare aa medame nipuna ore pa amaa mada gimalia ya ?
40019004	Yesumi lalo : Gore nimi abade go agaa buk-para gupa nadipisimi ya ? Aba ripiare Gote-me oyae rayo waria sana ona aa lapo aba warisa .
40019005	Goa pisa-ga aa medame nipuna Aapa ama gimoa nipuna ona raapu padane-para piralipi . Go rabu nipu lapore ora padane piralipi .
40019006	Goa pisa-pulu nipu lapo padane-rupa piralipi . Gore Gote-me aba nipu lapo makibuma lapaasa-pulu wala repaaya mada narugulalipi sa .
40019007	Gore mo Farisi aanumi nipu gupa lakesimi : Goa lae pare Moses-na rekena agaamere aa medame nipuna ona rasini pepa tua kaloa nipu penaalape taasa . Akeane gupa sa ya ?
40019008	Gore Yesumi nimu lakesa : Nimimi agaa napagoa wae kone imi-daa Moses-me nimina ona rasini pora mea waasa . Pare ora abade Gote-me oyae warisa rabu go pora naisa .
40019009	Neme nimi gupa lagialo : Gore aa rayona orenumi aa paake nanalia pare aanimi pa mea ratua ona rado meda mealimi-daare go aanu nimumi ona paake yone aa-rupa piralimi .
40019010	Gore Yesuna disaipel aanumi nipu lakesimi : Gore aa nipu mo ona raapu agu aawalipiri ora epe ta simi .
40019011	Gore nipumi nimu gupa lakesa : Onaa rayome go agaa mada napago kiritalimi . Gote-me abade nimu puri pane agaa lagisade .
40019012	Paga , aa medalomame kone rado rado salimiri nimumi ona mada nayoteme . Medaloma nimuna amanumi madisimi rabu abe aa aeme . Aa medalomamere abade nimuna ru mu pasimi-pulu nimumi ona mada narumaasimi . Aa medalomamere Gote-na Surube Su madaa kone sua ona narumaasimi . Aa meda go agaa pago kiritaliare nipumi mada palia .
40019013	Go raburi Yesu piri-para oge nogo naaki medaloma lamua ipisimi . Gore nipumi nimuna aalu madaa ki sua beten lainalo mea ipisimi . Goa pisimi pare nipuna aanumi mo onaanu-para ratu yawesimi .
40019014	Go rabu Yesu nipumi lalo : Goa natapape . Go nogo naakinuri ni piri-para epenaatapape . Gote-na Surube Suri go nogo naaki go piane-me mada mealimi .
40019015	Goa loa sana nipuna kimi aalu madaa su kiritua nipu go su-para gimoa pisa .
40019016	Aa meda Yesu piri ipua goa epa sa : Tisaa , neme akea pua ni epe-rupa oro yaalo piralua ya ?
40019017	Gore Yesumi nipu agaa misa : Akeane neme ni-para epe yae madaa agaa epa meae ? Aa padane-ma epe ta . Gore ne ora epe-rupa piralua kone saliri neme Gote-na rekena agaa rayo waru ratape .
40019018	Gore mo aame nipu gupa agaa misa : Go rekena agaare ake ya ? Gore Yesumi lalo : Neme aa meda natu maomape . Neme ona paake nayolape . Neme paake nanape . Onaa meda-para yaa agaa nalape .
40019019	Nena ama aapanu raapu pawa pirua nimuna bi minasaape agaa pagape . Nena ada lapa piri onaanu raana ome-rupa nena yago meda raana omape .
40019020	Go rabu mo aame Yesu gupa lakesa : Mo rekena agaa rayore aba pago kirite . Goa pawa-ga meda abiare ake palua ya ?
40019021	Gore Yesumi nipu lakesa : Neme ora epe-rupa pitua kone saliri nena oyae rayo madaa mone mua onaa naraanu kalape . Goa paliri nena epe yoto so yaa-para salia . Goa pua ni rata mea epape .
40019022	Go raburi mo ogege aame go agaa rayo pagoa kedaame omo pirisa . Gore nipumi oyae adaapu isa-pulu go yae rumape kedaame omesa .
40019023	Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para lalo : Amo ne oyae adaapu i onaanuri Gote-na Surube Su-para popere kalai peme sa .
40019024	Agaa meda lagialo : Kamel mename noae kego-para pola pea pare ora kalai pula pea . Goa pea pare amope aare so Gote-na Surube Su-para polalore apo mename noae kego-para kalai mada pua palia .
40019025	Gore nipuna aanumi go agaa pagoa nimu waru pogolasaawa nimumi lalo : Goa pea-ga oro yaalo kagaa pirape konere aapimi mealia ya ?
40019026	Gore Yesumi nimu waru adaaba sua lalo : Onaanumiri oyae mada napalimi pare Gote-me oyaeyae rayo mada palia .
40019027	Nipumi goa sa raburi Pita-me nipu-para gupa sa : Pagape , niaame niaana oyae rayo gimoa ne rata mea epa amaade . Goa pa amaade-ga niaamere ake mealima ya ?
40019028	Gore Yesumi nimi ora lagialo loa gupa lakesa : Orope kagaa yapi di opaliade raburi Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri epe king siaa madaa piralua . Go raburi nimi ni rata mea ipua nimi page epe king siaa 12-pela madaa pirua Israel onaana ruru 12-pela madaa koso lape agaa pagalimina sa .
40019029	Go rabu onaa rayome abade ni madaa kone rulaawa nimumi nimuna ama aapa nogo naaki ame baaninu page maapu oyae rayo gimisimi-pulu nimumi apo oyaeyae nona piane yoto ora waru mealimi . Goa pua nimu oro yaalo epe-rupa kagaa piralimi .
40019030	Abia onaa adaapu riri-nane pimi pare wala orope masaa-nane pimi onaa aba ripia epalimi . Goa pua nimu riri-nane epalimi .
40020001	Gore Gote-na Surube Su-na agaa gupa ia sa : Aa medame nipuna wain maapu surubisa . Goa pua nipu ora abasade yapipu wain maapu kogono pinalo onaanu mula pisa .
40020002	Gore nipumi mo kogono naakinu raapu kone padane suare go yapi padanemere ten kina meama palimi sa . Goa loare nimu mo wain maapu-para kogono pula penalo mea rapaasa .
40020003	Goa puare naare rapataina nipu kiritae su-para pua sana aa medaloma pa aina adesa .
40020004	Gore nipumi go aanu gupa lakesa : Nimi page neme epe mone mada gialua-ga wain maapu kogono pula pulupa sa .
40020005	Goa loa nimu pisimi . Gore naare pabola pulaina page aa medaloma wala agu mea rapaasa .
40020006	Gore ora aebo ribaa talo palaina maket-para pua aa medaloma pa aina adesa . Go rabu nipumi lalo : Nimi go naare raama puaina ake ado piaeme ya ?
40020007	Gore nimumi lalo : Niaa kogono giape aa meda dia yaade simi . Gore nimi page mo wain maapu-para kogono pua pipa .
40020008	Ora ribaa sa raburi mo wain maapuna aaraame surube aa gupa lakesa : Neme kogono naakinu yaaloa nimuna mone kalape . Orope epamede kogono naakinu kalaama kalaama pua aba ripia epamede kalo kiritape .
40020009	Gore aebo 5 klok raburi kogono epa pisimide aanumiri ten kina agu kasa .
40020010	Gupa misimi pare ora abade epa pisimide aanumiri nimu mone ora adaapupe mealima kone isimi . Pare dia nimu page 10 kina agu meama pisimi .
40020011	Nimumi muare mo maapuna aaraa ratu yawesimi .
40020012	Gore nimumi gupa simi : Go aanuri pena go epaade pare nimu kogono ogepusi pamede pare nimu mone niaa giaede-rupa agu mealeme . Niaamere naare paalu kogono radaa pi pa amaa sima .
40020013	Nimumi goa simi raburi mo maapuna aaraame nimuna aa padane-mare gupa lakesa : Adami aa , neme ni namakiraate . Gore abade saa agaa lapade rabu neme ten kina gialua laede .
40020014	Gore nena mone mua pu . Abade neme ne gisude-rupa orope meawade aanu page gode-rupa katoa .
40020015	Gore nina go mone-me page nina yada pulalo paluare gore mada dia ? Neme epe kone sawade pare nena pu-para udipa kone sae ya ?
40020016	Go rabu Yesumi lalo : Goa pea pare orope epeme onaanuri nimu aba riri-nane popalimi . Yapare aba ripia epeme onaanuri wala orope epamede .
40020017	Yesu nipu Jerusalem su-para polalore nipuna disaipel aa 12-pela mea pisa . Nimu pora-nia pulaawa disaipel aanu agu raapo-para gupa lakesa :
40020018	Pagalepa . Abia niaa Jerusalem su-para baina . Go-parare Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri miru irae aa mudunu-para rekena agaa tisaanu mea kateme . Go rabu nimumi koso lape agaa loa tu maomalimi sa .
40020019	Gore nimumi muare onaa ruru radonu mea kanaloare nimumi wae ero agaa loa repena unimi tuare repena polopea-para tu maomalimi . Goa pua rogaalimi pare yapi repome matmat gimoa wala rekalua sa .
40020020	Go raburi Sebedi-na oremere nipuna naaki lapo Yesu piri-para lamua ipisa . Gore go ona nipumi rumu koba pua su adaniaawa oyae meda madaa Yesu-para ogesa .
40020021	Gore Yesumi nipu agaa misa : Nere ake raana pea ? Go oname lalo : Ne aa mudu pirali rabu naa naaki laapore meda nena popo ki-nane pirina meda koya ki-nane pirina sa .
40020022	Gore Yesumi nipu lakesa : Mo reke mulalo paape yaere nipumi waru na-adepe . Gore nipimiri go neme ipa naluade kap madaare radaa pi ipa mada nalipi ya ? Gore nipumi lalo : Saa mada nalipa sipi .
40020023	Gore Yesumi nipu lakesa : Nina kap mada nalipiri gore epe ta pare nina popo ki-nanepara koya ki-nane lapore aapi piralia palo go agaare neme-daa namakuaayo sa . Apo pirape siaanuri Aapa nipuna managola saaya .
40020024	Mo 10-pela disaipel nimumi go remaa pagoa mo ameaya ratu yawesimi .
40020025	Goa pisimi pare Yesu nipumi nimu ipulupa loa sana nimu-para lalo : Nimimiri ademe . Ruru radona aa mudunumi onaa rayo rabuniaawa nimi puri waru paboa nimuna agaa ora pagalepape teme sa .
40020026	Aa mudu medaloma goa peme pare go konere nimi rikiraana nasaapiralepape . Dia , pare aa meda nimina rikiraana aa mudu piritalo paliare gore nimi raba meape kogono aa aba piralia .
40020027	Aa medame ni mudu piralua kone salia-daare gore nimi raba mi aa-rupa aba pirina sa .
40020028	Onaa Raapu Pirape Aare nipu raba mua nipuna kogono paminalo-daa naipisa . Dia , pare onaa adaapu raba mua nimu madaa epa omalalo ipisade . Goa pua nipuna kone wasupa nimu raba meapena katalo ipisa .
40020029	Gore nimu Jeriko su gimoa pisimi raburi onaa adaapumi Yesu nipu rata mea pisimi .
40020030	Gore mo ini rubu pi aa lapo mo pora aane-nane pirisipi . Nipumi Yesu epea remaa aba pagoa nipumi puri paloa nipumi gupa yaasipi : Nere Devit-na si neme saa laapo madaa odome omape .
40020031	Goa sipi rabu onaa rayome nipina agaa loraatepa loa nipu-para ape simi . Yapare nipumi go agaa rasua wala ora puri palo yaasipi : Aa Adaa , nere Devit-na si-ga neme saa madaa odome omape sipi .
40020032	Gore Yesu nipu pua rekaawa nipu yaaloa lalo : Neme nipiri ake pano ya ?
40020033	Gore nipumi gupa sipi : Aa Adaa , neme saana ini maepeaaina kone salepa .
40020034	Gore Yesumi odome omoa nipuna ini maepeaasa . Ora go raburi nipuna inimi oyae waru adoa simina nipu page Yesu rata mea pisipi .
40021001	Nimu Jerusalem su-para re-para pua opapasimi rabu Rudu Oliv re-para epa pirisimi . Go-parare Betfage su adaare meda aasa . Go rabu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa lapo mea rapaasa .
40021002	Nipumi go aa lapo gupa lakesa : Mogo adaare-para pulupa . Puare donki mena si agiaaya lapo apo opeme adiba aaya-ga pua adalepape . Nipimi pua koloa mea ipulupape .
40021003	Gore aa medame nipi-para agaa meda epa teare nipimi nipu gupa laketapape : Aa Adaa nipu kogono go donki mena madaa ia-pulu nipu saa mea palipa . Goa tepe rabu aa medame donki mena mea rapalia .
40021004	Go pisipina kogonore abade Gote-na agaa lakene aame gupa sa :
40021005	Abia Saion su-para piri onaanu gupa laketapape : Aa mudu abia nimi piri apo ipula-daa . Nipu kone pawa sua donki mena masaana pirua no epea-daa . Nipumi mo oge donki mena si onaa meda abi napiri madaa pia sa .
40021006	Gore mo disaipel aa lapomere mo Yesumi lakesa-rupa goa pua pisipi .
40021007	Nipumi mo donki mena adibae yare pua mua nipuna adaa mamina-nu donki mena masaa mada sua ipisipi . Goa puare Yesu nipu so donki mena masaana pirisa .
40021008	Nipu pirua ipisa rabu onaa adaapupeme so pora repaa repaa rekasimi . Go rabu medalomame nimuna mamina-nu pora-nia mea saapisimi . Medalomamere repena alanu yado saapisimi . Gore Yesumi rabuama epenalo pisimi .
40021009	Go rabu onaa adaapu medaloma aba riri-nane pisimi medaloma pa aapu-nane ipua gupa yaasimi : King Devit-na siri ipula-daa . Nipuna bi minasaamina . Aa Mudu-na bi mea ipula-daa nipuna bi minasaamina yaasimi . Gote ora sone pia adaa aa-na bi kalamina yalaama pua mea ipisimi .
40021010	Yesu nipu Jerusalem su-para pisa raburi mogo adaare-para piri onaa rayo pogolasaawa simina go aare aapi ya simi .
40021011	Gore mo nipu raapu pisimi onaame lalo : Gote-na agaa lakene aa Yesu simi . Nipu Galili su robo-para adaare Nasaret-para piri aa yaade simi .
40021012	Yesu nipu mo lotu ada ru-nane pua odobaawa nipumi lotu ada-para pisa rabu mone oyae ropo pi aanu amaa-nane ratu tisa . Nipumi pua mone ini ropo pi aanuna reke lakepe rubebe pua yaanu kabe aanuna rekenu lakepe tisa .
40021013	Goa puare nipumi agaa gupa lakesa : Gote-na agaa i buk madaare nipumi gupa ta : Nina adaare beten lape ada lo bi ma-alimi pare nimi paake ne aanuna kaledape ada-rupa perekea ma-arimina sa .
40021014	Yesu nipu lotu ada-para pirina ini wae onaanu-para aa wae onaa medaloma nipu piri-para ipisimi . Goa pisimi rabu nipumi nimu maepeaasa .
40021015	Goa pisa pare Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para mo rekena agaa tisaa aanu-para nimumi mo Yesumi napiaa kogono pina adesimi . Gore mo nogo naakinumi lotu ada-para pirua gupa simi : King Devit-na sina bi minasaamina . Goa simi rabu nimumi ronome omesimi .
40021016	Goa pua nimumi Yesu-para lalo : Neme mogo lamede agaare pagae ? Gore nipumi lalo : E , go agaare pagalo pare abade nimimi agaa gupa nadipisimi kone salo : nimimi abade nogo naakinu-para madu saapiri rupame agaa mana waru pagesimi-pulu nimumi bi minasaatalo pimi . Go agaa napageme ya ?
40021017	Gore nimu pirina Yesu adaare Betani su-para ribaa pua puaa patisa .
40021018	Gore ekeraa-nane yapi lapaasa rabu Yesu nipu so adaare-para pisa rabu reame pua omesa .
40021019	Gore nipumi repena fik ini pora-nia adoa go-para pisa . Pua adesa pare ini padane-daa page naetasa pa amaa yope agu aasaaya . Gore Yesumi mo repena fik lakesa : Nere ini wala meda ora namadiape . Goa sa rabu ora aipapulu mogo repena fik kaapu sa .
40021020	Gore disaipel aanumi goa adoa paalame omesimi . Go repena fik akea pua aipapulu kaapu yala kone isimi .
40021021	Yesumi lalo : Pagalepa . Nimimi kone waru rulaawa kone lapo nasalimiri go repena fik madaa pawade-rupa nimi page goa agu mada palua . Go-rupa madare nimimi mogo aaya rudu ne lusu rua no ipa solwara-para pua pogola teme raburi mada pagalia .
40021022	Gore nimimi ora kone rulaawa beten teme-daare gore oyaeyae rayo beten loa mada mealimi .
40021023	Gore Yesu nipu lotu ada ru-nane pirua onaa rayo epe agaa moge riaasa . Go rabu Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudunu-para Israel aa mudunu-para ipua Yesu-para epa lalo : Nere go kogonore aapina puri mua pi simi . Nere abade go kogonore aapimi pape laa-daa pi simi . Nere go kogono painalo puriri aapimi gia simi .
40021024	Gore Yesumi nimu gupa lakesa : Neme page agaa padane gupa nimi agaa mealuame pi . Gore nimimi nina agaa-daa yago talimiri neme page nimi nina kogono go aame gisalo nimi lagialua .
40021025	Jon-me abade onaana baptais mea saayaade kogonore Gote-me kasa pae pa onaanumi kasimi ya ? Go agaa pagoa nimuna agaa lalaawa gupa simi : Gore niaa Gote-me kasa tema-daare gore nipumi niaa gupa lagialia : Akeane nimimi Jon madaa kone narulasimi palo lagialia .
40021026	Gore niaame pa onaanumi kasimi tema-daare niaana onaanu madaa paalame omalima . Gore onaa rayome Jon-re Gote-na agaa lakene aa kone imi temare niaa talimi .
40021027	Go rabu Yesuna agaa gupa abuloa lakesimi : Niaare na-adema simi rabu Yesumi lalo : Goa teme-daare aapimi ni puri gua kogono gea aare nimi page mada nalagialua sa .
40021028	Yesumi adaa aa mudunu-para gupa lakesa : Aa padaneme naaki lapo madu isa . Go remaare pagalepape . Gore aaraame mupaa naaki lakeloa nere wain maapu kogono pula pu sa .
40021029	Gore go naakimi gipia loa-ga wala orope kone perekea wala kogono pula pea .
40021030	Gore aaraame wala mo naaki meda piri pua padane goa pua sa . Gore go naakimi lalo : Aapa , ni palua loaaya pare napisa .
40021031	Go rabu Yesumi lalo : Gore go naaki laapo madaare aapimi aaraana kone misipi ? Gore nimumi lalo : Mupaa naakimi simi . Gore Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Abade Jon nimi piri-para ipua nipumi epe pora madaa epe agaa mogeasa pare nimimi kone narulasimi . Dia , pare mo takis mi aanu-para aa paake rume onanuri orope nimumi Jon-na agaa madaa kone rulasimi . Goa pea-ga takis mi aanu-para aa paake rume onanu-para nimuri Gote-na surube su-para aba riri-ne adalimi . Goa pisimi pare nipu aba adoa simina kone naperekene nipu madaa kone narulasimi .
40021032	
40021033	Nimi saa agaa meda pagalepa . Aa medame nipuna su adaape saawa wain maapu adaape poasa . Nipumi kepo pu mawaawa go-para ini igipini yae warisa . Goa puare nipumi maapu surubape ada adaalupe maasa . Goa puare nipumi mone yoto meape aanumi surubainaloa nipu kimisu pisa .
40021034	Nipu pua aawa orope mo wain maapu ini kereape di rudu sa rabu maapu surube aanu piri-para kogono aa medaloma penasa . Gore nipumi mo surube aanu mo wain pore nape medaloma gina kone sua pisa .
40021035	Go kone isa pare mo maapu surubae aanumi nipuna kogono naaki meda aana-me tuare tu rubebe pisimi .
40021036	Gore mo wain maapuna aaraame wala kogono naaki medaloma mea rapaasa . Pare aba mo maapu surubae aanumi pisimi-rupa tisimi .
40021037	Wala oropere nipuna si mea rapaasa . Aaraame nina naakina agaa pagalimi kone sua mea rapaasa .
40021038	Pare mo maapu surubae aanu nimumi naaki adoa nimumi goa simi : Go ipula aamere aaraana moae yae rayo mealia-ga niaame nipu aipapulu tu maomaawa go maapuri niaa ora meamina simi .
40021039	Goa loa nipu to maomaawa mua so kepo rarane mea rubisimi .
40021040	Yesumi agaa gupa sa : Orope mo wain maapuna aaraa ipuare mo wain maapu surubae aanu-parare ake palia kone imi ?
40021041	Nimumi lalo : Go aa wae rayore waru talia . Goa pua mo wain maapu wala aa ruru rado mea katea . Go aanumi surubenaloa ini etaliade rabure raloa nipu epe kateme .
40021042	Gore Yesumi lalo : Nimimi Gote-na agaa i buk madaa iade agaare pagamina : Abade kamda kogono pi aanumi mea rubesimi yaade aana-re abiare ora epe-daa ada palimi . Aa Mudumi abade goa pisa ya-pulu niaame go aana-mere epe rado piane ada maopaalia sa .
40021043	Goa pea-ga neme nimi ora lagialo : Gote-na Surube Su-na eta maopaeme onaa mea katea-daa adalimi sa .
40021044	Onaa rayome go aana madaa magatabalimiri nimu asa tabebe palia . Go aana-me onaa meda taliare gore go onaa aasatua rugulala palia .
40021045	Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para Farisi aanumi Yesuna saa agaa pagesimi rabu niaa-para ta kone sua niminaasimi .
40021046	Goa sa raburi nipu ripinaatalo pisimi pare onaa paalame omesimi . Onaame Yesu Gote-na agaa lakene aa kone isimi-pulu go aanumi paalame omesimi .
40022001	Gore Yesumi nimu-para saa agaa meda wala gupa lakesa :
40022002	Gote-na Surube Suri gupiane : Aa mudu medame nipuna naakina ona rumaasa rabure ogere adaape meda yawesa .
40022003	Goa puare nipumi ona rumaatalo yawe ogere nola ipulupape loa nipuna kogono naakinu agaa mea penaasa . Laketa pisimi pare onaanumi mo ogere gimoa naipisimi .
40022004	Gore naipisimi rabu aa mudumi wala kogono aa medaloma mea rapaawa gupa lakesa : Nimi puare epape onaanu-para gupa pua laketapape sa : Pagalepa , nina ogere aba lusua gawa mena yadapunu-para sinu page aba tu yawo ima tapape sa . Eta rayo aba managola sama-ga nimi ona rumaape eta nola ipulupape lo tapape .
40022005	Mo kogono naakinumi go agaa pua lakesimi pare eta nape onaanumi go agaa gimoa nimuna kogono pisimi . Medare nipuna maapu e pola pisa . Medare nipuna bisnis kogono pula pisa .
40022006	Goa pisimi pare aa medalomamere aa muduna kogono naakinu ripinaawa tu maomasimi .
40022007	Gore aa mudu ratu yawoa nipuna soldia aanu mea rapaasa . Nimumi mo kogono naaki aanu tu maomaawa nimuna ada rayo irabasimi .
40022008	Goa puare aa mudumi nipuna kogono naakinu gupa lakesa : Ona rumaatalo yawe etare aba managola sawade pare mo neme yalawade onaana konere o ta sa .
40022009	Goa pea-ga nimi mo pora-nia pua go adalimide onaa rayore eta yawe nola epena laketapape sa .
40022010	Nipumi goa sa raburi pora kepaa-nini puare epe onaa-para wae onaa rayo makirita-mama pua adesa . Nimu rayo ipua mo onaa rumaae aana ada epa marulatabasimi .
40022011	Mo onaa epa kirita pirisimi raburi aa mudu nipu mo kiritae onaanu adolalo epa odobaawa adesa . Pare aa padane-mame ona rumaae rabu kalae mamina namaraasa .
40022012	Gore aa mudumi mo aa-para lalo : Adami aa , nere epe mamina na-ayamaina-ga akolo yapae sa pare agaa na-abusa .
40022013	Go raburi aa mudumi kogono aanu gupa lakesa : Nimimi nipuna ki aa rogaawa so amaa mea lopalimi rabu nipu su ribaane-para pirina sa . Go ribaane-para piruare nipu re lo nipuna kidipaa rugulalo piralia sa .
40022014	Yesumi agaa gupa lo kiritisa : Gore Gote-me onaa adaapu yaata pare nipumi adoa aa padane padane laatapu mua ru-nane mea pea sa .
40022015	Gore Farisi aanumi Yesuna kone adolalo ko tisimi .
40022016	Nimuna disaipel aanu-para Herot-na aanu-para meda rabu Yesu piri mea rapasimi . Nimumi gupa pua simi : Tisaa , niaame nere ora agaa lape aa-rupa adema . Ora agaamere onaanu madaa rumaalia . Goa pe pare onaanu rayo kone padane-rupa ade . Dia , neme onaa rayo agaa rado piane lakete .
40022017	Goa pede-ga neme abia yada kone saliri niaa lagi simi : Gore niaame Rom aa mudu Sisar-para takis mone kalamano yapae dia yapae agaa misimi . Niaana rekena agaame ake ta pae simi .
40022018	Gore Yesu nipumi nimuna wae kone aba adoa nimu-para lalo : Nimiri yaa agaa ne aanu . Akeane nimimi ni-para yaa agaa loa ni ko taleme ?
40022019	Nimimi mo takis kalape mone meda mea waatapa sa . Goa sa rabu nimumi mone meda mea ipua waasimi .
40022020	Go rabu Yesumi nimu agaa misa : Go mone-na bi-para piksa-parare aapina ya ? Gore nimumi Sisar-na simi .
40022021	Goa simi rabu Yesumi nimu gupa lakesa : Gore Sisar-na yaere wala nipu pua katapape pare Gote-na oyaere Gote nipuna katapape sa .
40022022	Nimumi go agaa pagoa pogolasaawa Yesu gimoa pisisi .
40022023	Go raburi Sadyusi aanu nimu Yesu piri-para ipisimi . Go aanu nimumiri ome onaanu wala narekalimi teme-daa goane Yesu epa agaa misimi .
40022024	Nimu ipua lalo : Tisaa , Moses-me agaa gupa mogeasa : Aa meda nogo naaki napirina omaliare nipuna ona wasaa ameme nogo naaki madinalo mada rumaalia sa .
40022025	Gore abade nimu amealu 7-pela pirisimi . Pare aa mupaare ona rumaawa omesa pare nipuna nogo naaki napirisa . Goa pisa-pulu nipuna masaa-nane ameme go ona wasaa nipu rumaasa .
40022026	Wala ame laapo pa repo pa page nogo naaki napirina omaamapa amaa pisimi . Goa pu kiritua 7-pela amealu rayo pa omesimi .
40022027	Mo amealu rayo omabasimi raburi orope mo ona page omesa .
40022028	Gore neme mo ome onaa wala rekalimi rabu mo ona wasaare mogo aa 7-pela wala rekalimi-daa aapina ore ora piralia ya ? Neme makuaaye nimu rayome mogo onana aaniri aapi ora piralia ya ?
40022029	Gore Yesumi nimu gupa lakesa : Nimiri Gote-na agaa napago nipuna puri page na-ademe-pulu nimimi agaa pa-rupa teme sa .
40022030	Gore ome onaa wala rekalimide raburi mo ona wala narumaalimi . Dia , so yaa-parare ensel-rupa piralimi .
40022031	Pare go ome onaa wala rekape agaare neme nimi agaa mealo : Gore abade Gote-me gupa sa :
40022032	Niri Abraham-para Aisak-para Jekop-para nimuna Gote pi sa . Goa pea-daa Gote-re aba ome onaanuna Gote-daa dia , pare nipu kagaa piraama laama pope onaanuna Gote yaade .
40022033	Onaa rayome Yesuna agaa pagoa akepu tapae kone isimi .
40022034	Gore Yesumi Farisi Sadyusi aanuna agaa pora poasa rabu Farisi aanumi go agaa pagoa nipu adola ipisimi .
40022035	Nimu go epa kirita pirisimi raburi nimuna rekena agaana tisaa padane pirabasa-pulu nipumi Yesu ko tulalo goa sa :
40022036	Tisaa , mo rekena agaa rayo ora epe ta-ga ora aba mudu rekena agaare aaya pae simi .
40022037	Gore Yesu nipumi gupa lakesa : Nena Mudu Gote-re pu robaame page kone wasupame page puri-para rayome raana-me omoa pedo pu piralepape sa .
40022038	Go rekena agaare ora aba mudu agaa lagialo sa .
40022039	Gore rekena agaana lapo pa padane go-rupa lagialo : Nimina yogane madaa raana omo pedo pi kone imi-rupare pa onaa meda page padane-rupa raana omape sa .
40022040	Go rekena agaa lapomere Moses-na rekena agaa rayo-para Gote-na agaa lakene aanu agaa rayo go agaa rolo-para epea .
40022041	Farisi aanu nimu pa kiritaba pirina Yesumi nimu agaa gupa misa :
40022042	Nimimiri Krais madaare ake kone imi ? Nipuri aapina si ya ? Gore nimumi Devit-na si simi .
40022043	Goa simi rabu nipumi nimu gupa lakesa : Holi Spirit-mi akeane Devit-na kone marekaasa-daa nipu akeane nina aa mudu sana ya ? Gore Devit-mi lalo :
40022044	Gote-me nina Aa Mudu gupa lakesa : Nere nina popo ki-nane aa mudu piraina . Oropere nena iaanuri nina aa rolo-para mapiraalua sa .
40022045	Gore Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri nipu Devit-na si yaade-ga akeane Devit-mi bi nina Aa Mudu lakesa ya ?
40022046	Gore aa medame mo Yesu nipuna agaa meda na-abusimi . Gore nipu paalame omesimi-pulu wala go rabu page orope page nipu-para agaa meda nasimi .
40023001	Orope Yesu nipumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para onaa rayo-para agaa gupa lakesa :
40023002	Mo rekena agaa tisaanu-para Farisi aanu-para nimu Moses-na agaa moge riaata pirisimi .
40023003	Goa pea-ga agaa rayo nimi lagialimiri nimimi pagoa waru mogealepape . Goa palimi pare kone meda nimumi nimi mogealimiri napagalepape . Goa pea pare go agaa napagoa rateme .
40023004	Gore nimumi oyae adaapu rogaawa aanuna pasaa madaa mariaaeme . Goa peme pare nimuna kimi mo onaa naraba meape naniminaeme .
40023005	Kogono rayo nimumi pemere pa onaanumi nimu adena kone sua peme . Adalepa . Nimuna beten ta polalo peme raburi rogope madu imi . Go nu amaare madua ropaa-para enon yapa aapu-rupa ritimi . Go page nimuna mamina aanenu madaa oyaeyae pepena yaenu awo kilipiala peme .
40023006	Eta yawo saeme raburi nimumi mo riri-nane pirape siaa go agu raaname omeme . Goa puare no lotu ada-para pimide-rupa riri-nane i reke madaa raaname omeme .
40023007	Go page nimu mo maket-para peme rabu nimimi abi piralepape loa niaana tisaa teme rabu nimumi pedo peme .
40023008	Pare onaanumi nimi-para tisaa pi-daa wala nateme . Dia , nimu rayo amealu piralimi rabu tisaa padane piralia .
40023009	Go page su amaa onaa medare niaana Aapa go pi-daa natapape . Nimina Aapa padane-mare so yaa-para pia .
40023010	Goa pea-ga nimi-para nimumi Aa Adaa go pi-daa natapape . Dia , nimina aa muduri padane-ma pirua nipu Krais pia .
40023011	Goa puare nimi aa mudu piritalo palimiri nimi onaa rayome raba meape aa-rupa aba pirina .
40023012	Aa medame nipuna bipa aa mudu piritalo nipu bi minasaaliare nipuna bi rolo-para palia . Pare aa medame nipuna bi rabuaniaaliare gore nipu aa mudu mapiraalia .
40023013	Nimi rekena agaana tisaanu-para Farisi aanu nimiri waru adalepape . Nimiri maeyae aanu pimi . Nimimi onaanuna ini agaa madaa Gote-na Surube Su-na pora gaape poaemede . Goa peme pare nimina bipare naodobaeme . Go page onaa medaloma ru-nane pua odobatalo peme pare nimimi rutu teme .
40023014	Nimi rekena agaa tisaanu-para Farisi aanu nimiri waru adalepape . Nimiri maeyae aanu adaapu pimi . Nimimi ona wasaanuna ada-para oyae rayo paake nolalo peme . Goa pua nimimi go pupitagi nape kone rabuainaloa beten adaalu pa teme . Goa peme-pulu nimiri ora wae yoto mealimi .
40023015	Rekena agaana tisaanu-para Farisi aanu nimi waru adalepape . Nimi ipunu madaa pirua ipa solwara rayona pamua su rayona onaa rayo nimina disaipel aa-rupa pirinalo pamuaeme . Nimina disaipel aanu mapiraaeme rabu nimu wala wae naaku-para go-rupa mapiraaeme . Gore nimi wae naaku-para ora palimi pare nipu nimimi naaku-para penaateme .
40023016	Nimi ini rabuni onaame onaa pora mea waatalo peme . Gore nimi aba waru adalepape . Nimimi gupa temede : Aa medana lotu adana bi madaa yaa madaa makuaa tea-daare go agaare waru yae-daa dia . Pare so yaa-para aaya lotu adana gol aana-me warini oyae-daa temere gore epe ta teme .
40023017	Nimiri ini rubu pi aanu maeyae-rupa pimi . Ake madaa kone sua teme ? Gore aana-me warini mone mudu yapae mo aana-me warini mone i epe lotu ada mudu yapae ?
40023018	Gore nimimi gupa teme : Aa meda aana reke madaa yaa madaa makuaa tea-daare go agaa mada gimalia teme . Goa pea pare nipumi miru irua mo aana reke madaa sua yaa madaa makuaa tea-daare go agaa mada nagimalia teme .
40023019	Nimi ora ini rubu pi onaa pimi . Gote-re ake kate ya ? Gote-na miru irae epea palo Gote-na aana reke madaa miru irini ora epea ya ?
40023020	Gore aa medame aana rekena bi madaa yada makuaa tea-daare nipuna agaare so reke madaa i yae raapu tea .
40023021	Gore aa medame lotu adana bi madaa yaa madaa makuaa tea-daare Gote go ada-para pia-ga Gote-na bi madaa page nipu agaa tea .
40023022	Gore aa medame so yaa madaa makuaa loa tea-daare gore Gote so-para pirua nipu pia reke-para tepe .
40023023	Nimi rekena agaana tisaanu-para Farisi aanu nimiri waru adalepape . Nimiri ora maeyae aanu pimi . Nimiri pa yabia meda-para rakia-para padi raani medaloma-para ogegepu pamu rugulu imi openalo goa pua Gote medaloma pa kateme . Goa peme pare nimimi adaa rekena agaa rayore aba gimeme . Go agaare epe kone i onaa rayo mea rumaawa odo omape kona mea sua kone waru rulaatepa . Rekena agaa saapirua Gote adalima konere nasalepape .
40023024	Nimimi onaa medaloma pora waatalo peme pare nimi aba ini rubu pi aa pimi . Nimimi oge puna meda ipa-para adobaawa pia rabu mena kamel ipa-para peme laapo rata mea noa yolaniaaya .
40023025	Rekena agaana tisaanu nimi-para Farisi aanu nimiri maeyae aanu-ga nimimi waru adalepape . Nimimiri pa kap-para plet lapona amaa-nane yogane radepeteme pare ru-nane pea amulu pa puaaya .
40023026	Nimi Farisi aanuri ini rubu pi aanu pimi . Aba ripiare mo kap-na ru-nane radepealimiri yogane page epeaalia .
40023027	Nimi rekena agaa tisaanu-para Farisi aanu nimiri waru adalepape . Nimiri maeyae aa-rupa pimi . Nimiri matmat-na pepena amaa-nane yaako pi pepeminua pimi . Nimimi amaa-nane pepenare epe-rupa peme pare no ru-nanere aa uni-para wae pugu pi oyaeyae adaapu ia-rupa pimi .
40023028	Nimiri apo matmat nona piane pirua amaa-nane nimi epe-rupa pimi . Pa onaanumi nimina yogane ademe raburi nimiri epe aa kone imi pare nimina robaa-para ora agaa rasape kone page rulatabea .
40023029	Nimi rekena agaana tisaanu-para Farisi aanu nimiri waru adalepape . Nimiri agaa laapo ne aa-rupa pimi . Nimimi mo Gote-na agaa lakene aanuna matmat apedaa epe-rupa wariaawa amaa-nane pepena waru paeme .
40023030	Goa pua nimimi gupa teme : Abade niaana akuanu raapu pirisima-rupa yaalo niaame mo Gote-na agaa lakene aanu natu maomaawa nimu naraba misima teme .
40023031	Go agaa teme rabu nimi Gote-na agaa lakene aanu tu maomape aanuna ruru pimi-daa teme .
40023032	Gore nimimi nimina akuanuna kone mua aba pisimi-a wala peme .
40023033	Nimiri wae paakame madini sinu pimi . Gote-me koso agaa tea raburi nimimi akea pua mada gimoa wae naaku-para mada napiralimi ya ? Dia , wae yoto mu piralimi .
40023034	Goa pea-ga nimimi pagalepape . Neme Gote-na agaa lakene aanu-para kone makuaae aanu-para Gote-na agaa lakene tisaanu-para rayo nimi piri-para mea rapalua . Goa palua pare medalomare nimimi tu maomalimi . Medalomare repena polopea mada nil-mi talimi . Medaloma mo nimina lotu ada-para repena unimi talimi . Medalomare nimimi adaare meda-para rata moneaawa adaare rado-para rata mea palimi .
40023035	Goa palimi-pulu epe-rupa pirape onaanuri nimumi tu maomasimide-ga to madaare wae yoto rayo mealimina . E , gore epe aa Abel pirisa rabu tu maomaniaama ipuare Berekia-na si Sekaraia-me epe tu maoma kiritisimide madaare wae yoto mealimina . Go aa-na siri aba lotu ada-para pirua aana reke madaa re-para pirua nimina piaanu epa rumaalia .
40023036	Gore neme nimi ora lagialo : Apo tu maomaasimide onaanu page abia go rabu pimi onaa nimuna wae kedaa rialimi sa .
40023037	Jerusalem onaanu-ya . Nimimi Gote-na agaa lakene aanu tu maomaeme Gote-na Mea Rapae Aanu page aana-me teme . Ora rana adaapu neme nena sinu mea kirita sua upitalo pe . Gupa yaa kutame nipuna sinu nipuna popa-para mea kirita mapiraatade-rupa pe . Goa pe pare nimimi ni gimamede .
40023038	Nimimi pagalepa . Abiare nimina adaare pa ainalo gimalua .
40023039	E , gore neme nimi gupa lagialo : Gore nimimi ni wala na-adalimi pare nimimi orope gupa teme : Gote-na Aa Mudu-na bi meape aare nipu ora epe ta teme sa .
40024001	Yesu nipu lotu ada-para pirua amaa-nane pisa raburi nipuna disaipel aanu nipu mo lotu robene-rupa mea waatalo pisimi .
40024002	Go rabu nipumi nimu agaa gupa lakesa : Nimimi go epe lotu ada waru adalimina . Neme nimi ora lagialo : Aana gome pubaa yaadare ora padane napubaalia pare rayo kilipi rubalimi sa .
40024003	Yesu nipu so Rudu Oliv madaa pirina disaipel aanu nimu padane pawa ipua gupa epa simi : Go kedaare aa-rabu epalia yapae lo agaa misimi . Ora aba ripiare ake aba epalia-daa niaame adalima pae ? Go adalima raburi nena epape di-para su yaa lapo mea perekealia rabu niminaalima simi .
40024004	Gore Yesu nipumi nimu gupa lakesa : Pa aa medame nimi makiraalia nimimi nipu aba waru adalepape .
40024005	Aa adaapupe ipua nina bi madaa nimumi gupa teme : Niri Gote-na Mea Rapae Aa i-pulu loa onaa adaapu ora makiralimi .
40024006	Go raburi nimimi eaea marekaape agaa-para yada ora pape remaa pagalimi pare wala makirape agaa adaapu natapape . Go yaenu rayore aba epalia pare su yaa perekeape yapi diri go rabu abi naepalia .
40024007	Goa puare ruru medamere ruru rado radonu raapu yada palimi . Go page gavman-na adaa su rado radonu raapu yada palimi . Go rabu su rayo-parare reae adaa paboa su eto palia .
40024008	Go oyae rayo aba ripia epalia pare oname naaki maditalo masaa nalade-rupa palia .
40024009	Go raburi nimumi nimi aditalo mua kedaa gua radaa manaawa nimi tu maomalimi . Go raburi nina agaa waru page onaa rayo nimiri kone wae salimi .
40024010	Go raburi onaa adaapumi nimuna epe kone rulae yae gimoa wala nimuna amenu ratu yawoa iaanu ta pea aa wala piralimi .
40024011	Go rabu makirae Gote-na agaa lakene aa adaapu iti ralapae aa-rupa ipua onaa adaapu makiralimi .
40024012	Go raburi wae yaenu adaapu su rayo-para opaama epalia-pulu onaa adaapu nimuna epe raana omape kone mada gimalimi .
40024013	Goa paliade raburi aa medame puri paboa kone rulaawa waru piraliare gore su yaa lapo dia yalia rabu epe-rupa kagaa piraama laama palimi .
40024014	Goa pea pare Gote-na Epe Agaare su rayo-para lakelo kiritalimi . Mo onaa rayome pago kiritinaloa go rabu su yaa lapo dia yalia .
40024015	Gore orope wae pugu pi yaeme epe lotu ada-para rekaina adalimi . Abade Gote-na agaa lakene aa Daniel-me saa-rupare epa rekalia . Aa medame go agaana re pagali-daare waru pagape .
40024016	Go raburi Judia su-para piri onaa rayore so rudu aana apedaa-paranu pogola pulupape .
40024017	Gore onaanu nimuna ada gaa-nani piralimi pare nimuna ada ru-nane i yaere namula pulupape .
40024018	Go page onaanuri maapu-para pitimiri nimina mamina wala namula pulupape .
40024019	Go raburi ona nogo naaki adu nala pirinu-para naaki padaa piri onanu-para gore nimu madaa ora odo waru palia .
40024020	Yapare Kitu Pirape Yapi diri wae kogore yai rabu nimi mada naepalia-ga nimimi Gote yaaloa beten waru tapape .
40024021	Go raburi kedaa ora adaape opalia . Gore su kagaa warisa rabu epa-mama pua abia page kedaa gupiane meda naepea .
40024022	Goa pea pare Gote-me abade go di rudupu namea sula pisa yaalore onaa rayo ora omola pisimi . Pare Gote-me nipuna kone mapiraae onaa nimu wae kone mealimi-pulu go yapi di marudu yaalia .
40024023	Go raburi aa medame nimi go agaa lagialiare adalepa : Gote-na Mea Rapae Aa go pia tea page mogo-nane epa pia tea page nimimi nipuna agaa madaa kone narulaatepape
40024024	Go rabu yaa agaa lape aa Gote-me mea rapaaria loa adaapu opapalimi . Go rabu nimumi page napiaa-nu kogono pua oyae epape-rupa rado rado adaapu palimi . Goanu nimumi mada palimi pare Gote-me nipuna mapiraae onaa makiralimi . Goa yapare mada dia .
40024025	Gore neme nimi aba lagede-ga waru pagalepa .
40024026	Goa pea-pulu pa onaanumi nimi gupa lagialimi : Mo onaa napiri su-para aaya-ga teme-daare go su-para napulupape . Goa page nimumi mogo kaleda yaa teme-daare nimuna agaa napagalepape .
40024027	Di , Gote-me Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si epenatea rabu ari-yapa naare ipula-nane pabola-nane popea-rupa aipapulu epalia .
40024028	Gore aba ome onaana yogane i-parare yaa itaayamanu epa kiritalimi .
40024029	Go rabu adaa kedaa aba pupu kiritinaloa aipapulu naare udunua ribaa yabalia . Goa pua akua mada naraalia . Goa pua ubanu page yaa-para gimoa lopalia . Goa puare yaa-para ae puri pane oyaenu page mada eto eto palia .
40024030	Go raburi Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si epape diri so yaa madaa oyae adenalo palia . Goa pua makuaamonalo . Go raburi go su amaa onaa ruru rayome re waru teme pare Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri so yaa moae yaako yaa madaa awoa ipua nipu adaa puri paa raapu epalia .
40024031	Goa pua biugel berona agaa pagenaloa nipuna ensel-nu mea rapalia . Goa palia raburi nipuna mada mi onaanu mea kiritalimi sa . Kiritalimi rabu su yaa lapo yarua aawaaya-nane pamua nipuna ruru onaanu epa mea kiritalimi .
40024032	Nimimi repena fik ini madaa kone mealepape . Nipuna palaa-para ipaa rubia yo kagaa pulu rubea raburi gore abia pani palia kone imide .
40024033	Go raburi oropere apo oyae rayo adalimi rabu epaliade yapi di ora re-para managolaawa aaya sa .
40024034	Gore nimi waru pagalepa . Go pima onaare abi naomalimi pare go oyae rayo openaloa nimimi adalimi .
40024035	Go su yaa lapore mada dia yalia pare nina agaare oro yaalo kagaa pa salia sa .
40024036	Aa medame page go Kitu Pirape Yapi di page namakuaaeme . Yaa-para pimi ensel-numi page ni page go yapi di na-adema . Dia , niaana Aapa padane nipumi agu raapo go di saapia .
40024037	Abade Noa nipu raapu pisimi onaanumi risimi kedaare nona piane wala Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si su amaa epaluade rabu go-rupa opalia .
40024038	Abade go aa Noa pirisa rabu ipa abi narubisa rabu nimumi ogere waima yawo ipa no ona rumaa goa paa-mama pisimi . Go page Noa nipu ipa ipunu ru-nane odobaawa pirina goa pa pala pirisimi .
40024039	Goa puare nimu naniminae pirina ipa roa onaa rayo tabesa . Go-rupa Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si epaluade rabu page goa palia .
40024040	Epalua raburi aa lapo maapu-para kogono pala pirina pare Gote-me meda mua medare gimalia .
40024041	Ona lapome page bret wariala piralipi Gote-me meda gimoa meda mealia .
40024042	Goa pea-ga nimimi kone waru su piralepape . Nimimi nimina Aa Mudu-na epaliade yapi di naniminaaeme-ga waru suruba piralepape .
40024043	Nimimiri go agaa madaa kone mealepape . Gore nimimi paake ne aa epape yapi di niminaawa suruba pimi gore nimimi u napati rabu page mada suruba piralimi ? Goa puare mo paake ne aame go aana ada ru-nane mada naodabalia .
40024044	Goa pea-ga nimimi page Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri aa-rabu epalia palo maarea-ga nimimi page waru surubalepape . Gore nimimi namakuaae rabu epalua .
40024045	Gore epe kogono pi aamere epe kogono agu pea ? Go piane aare nipuna adaa aame nipuri nipuna kogono naakinu rado surubenaloa nipu surube aa mapiraaya . Goa puare nipumi nimuna eta nape yapi di rabu eta rumaainalo mapiraasa .
40024046	Orope mo aa wala epalia rabu mo nipuna kogono naakimi mo kasade kogono agaa-para aalia rabu raaname waru omalia sa .
40024047	Gore neme ora nimi lagialo : Mo aa adaame go kogono naaki oyae rayo surubenalo aa mudu mapiraalia
40024048	Pare mo kogono naakimi wae kogono pu piralia rabu aa adaare abi aipapulu naepalia kone ia .
40024049	Go kone sua nipumi nipuna kogono naaki yagonu pamu tua nipumi puri pane ipa pamu noa aanu raapu aasa .
40024050	Goa puare kogono naakimi nipu naniminae pa aaina epa opopalia . Goa palaina nipuna aa adaa ora meda aipapulu epalia .
40024051	Epalia rabu aa adaame go kogono naaki raimi tua teana mo makirae aanu raapu mapiraalia Go-nane piruare nimuna kidipaa regepe no re lo wae-rupa piralimi .
40025001	Orope Gote-na Surubae Suri gupiane epalia : Ona inumakua 10-pela pirisimi raburi aa meda ona pena rumaatalo epalia remaa pagesimi . Gore pagesimi-pulu mo onaanumi 10-pela lam-nu mua nipu rumaape eta yawe-para epolalo pora-nia madaari pisimi .
40025002	Goa pisimi pare mo ona supuri nimu maeyae pirisimi pare ona supuri epe kone isimi .
40025003	Gore mo maeyae onanumi lam-re mea ipisimi yapare alopape wel namea ipisimiya .
40025004	Pare mo nimu kone waru saapirisimi onanuri nimuna lam-para alopape wel raapu managolaawa mea ipisimi .
40025005	Mo ona rumaape aa abi aipapulu naipisa-daa ado pirua nimuna ini-para u ipisa-daa umi kole male lapirae sua u patisimi .
40025006	Go rabu ribaare ruma rumane pirisimi raburi mo 10-pela oname gupa pagesimi : Mo ona rumaape aa go epea-ga mo pora repaa-nini madaama pulupa simi .
40025007	Gore mo ona inumakua rayo rekoa nimuna lam managola sua pirisimi .
40025008	Goa pua mo kone waru na i onanumi mo kone waru i onanu-para lalo : Niaana lam udinitalo pia-ga nimina wel meda gialepa simi .
40025009	Gore mo kone pa sae onanumi nimu agaa gupa lakesimi : Dia , go wel-re nimi page niaa page mada dia simi . Goa pea-ga nimina stua-para pua puaa kabalepa simi .
40025010	Gore mo onanu nimu mo stua-para wabola kabola isimi raburi mo ona rumaape aa ipisa . Gore mo ona medaloma managola pirisimi rayore mo aa raapu ona rumaatalo yawe ogere nola pua pora gaape garulabaawa pirisimi .
40025011	Orope mo ona inumakua medaloma wala pora gaape epa tua lalo : Aa adaa , niaa epomona pora loba simi .
40025012	Gore nipumi nimu gupa lakesa : Nimiri aa-para pirua epame ? Neme nimi ora na-ade maarea sa .
40025013	Go remaa lakeloa Yesumi onaanu-para lalo : Goa pea-ga nimimi waru surubalepape sa . Nina aba epape diri ribaa epalia paalo aebo epalua paalo ni na-ade sa .
40025014	Gore Gote-na Surube Suri gupiane yaade lo remaa lagialo : Aa meda su rado-para pora pamula polalo palia pare nipuna kogono naakinu-para ipulupa loa sana oyae rayore nimimi surubalepape lo laketea .
40025015	Gore nipumi mo naakinuna puri ado kone ado pua nipumi nimu oyae rumaa katea . Gore aa medare mone 20,000 kina rumaa kasa . Goa pua aa meda 8,000 kina kasa . Wala aa medare mone 4,000 kina rumaawa kasa . Nipumi nimu mone go-rupa kaloa nipu pisa .
40025016	Gore mo mone 20,000 kina misade aame kogono aipapulu pa amaa puare wala nipumi ode mone 20,000 kina meda sania saaba pirisa .
40025017	Mo aa meda 8,000 kina misade aame kogono pa amaa pua ode mone 8,000 kina meda misa .
40025018	Pare mo aa meda nipumi mone 4,000 kina misade aa adaa mone mua su naaku roboa pua paga isa .
40025019	Gore mo adaa aa nipu adaalu pirua sana nipuna kogono naakinu mone adaapu kasa-pulu nipu raapu agaa maredepoya laa-mama pulalo kone sua ipisa .
40025020	Gore abade mone 20,000 kina misade aa ipuare nipumi ode mone 2,000 kina mua nipumi epa lalo : Aa adaa , abade neme ni mone 20,000 kina giside pare neme mone yoto kogono pua wala go mone-na yago ode meda 20,000 kina apo meawa sa .
40025021	Gore nipuna aa adaame nipu gupa lakesa : Epe ta-ga nere ora nina epe kogono naaki-ga neme epe kogono paena sa . Neme abade oge oyaesinu page waru surubaena-daa neme nere oyae adaapu surubainalo pi sa . Ne ipu saa ni raapu pedo pu pirapana .
40025022	Gore mone 8,000 kina kasade aa page ipua goa epa sa : Aa adaa , neme page bisnis kogono pa amaa pua ode mone 8,000 kina profet meawa sa .
40025023	Gore nipuna aa adaa me nipu gupa lakesa : Epe ta-ga nere ora epe kogono naaki yana sa . Neme abade epea pua kogono waru surubisina . Neme abade oge oyaeyaesi waru surubaena-daa abia neme oyaeyae adaapu surubaina kone salo . Goa pea-ga ipu saa lapo pedo pu pirapana .
40025024	Gore mo mone 4,000 kina misade aa page ipua gupa sa : Aa adaa , neme nere aba makuaayo . Nere puri pane aa yaade . Aa meda nipuna sae maapu-para neme eta wai aawa nisi . Go page su rugi meda-nane aa medana poae etare neme madua nisi .
40025025	Goa pea-daa neme paala omoa nena mone su naaku roboa paga isu . Abiare nena mone go ada sa .
40025026	Gore nipuna aa adaame nipu-para lalo : Nere kogono naaki wae yaana . Nere ki aa raakepene aa yaana . Gore ora abade neme aa medame poae e maapu-para eta awesude lae ya ? Go page aa medame nape eta neme madia yarina sa .
40025027	Gore nena mone-re mo benk ada-para akeane namea epae ya ? Goa pula pisi yaalore ni wala ne piri ipua mone ode medaloma raapu mone wala gula pae .
40025028	Gore nimimi mone adaapu gisude aanu wala mua mo mone 40,000 kina mi aa pua kala sa .
40025029	Gore onaa medalomame oyae saapitimi-daare gore neme wala medaloma sania katoa sa . Go page onaa medalomame oyae ogepusi saapiralimiri nina wala rayo epa mealua sa .
40025030	Go kogono naaki waere ora su ribaane-para pena ratasaatepa sa . Gore nipuna kidipaa regepe no re lo piralia sa .
40025031	Oropere Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Simi ensel-nu raapu epalia raburi epe paa mea ipua king siaa madaa pirua epalia .
40025032	Go raburi su amaa piri onaa rayo epe makiritaawa robo lapo rumaalua . Go rumaaliade konere sipsip meme menanu mo surube aanumi robo lapo rumaawa meda-nane meda-nane palia .
40025033	Goa puare nipumi sipsip menanuri nipuna ora ki-nane mea mapiraaware mo meme menanuri koya ki-nane mea ma-aalia .
40025034	Goa palia-pulu mo aa mudu nipuna popo ki-nane pitimide onaanu-parare gupa tea : Nimiri nina Aapana epe raba meape kone aba meamena-ga ipulupa tea . Abade su yaa lapo pena warisa rabu Aapame nimina Surube Su mea sasa-ga nimimi epa mealepa tea .
40025035	Gore abade ni ipa eta nalame omesu rabu eta ipa gisimide toa . Niri kimisu pisude rabu nimina ada-para lamua pisimide toa .
40025036	Ni mamina dia sade raburi nimimi mamina gisimide toa . Ni yaina omisude raburi nimimi ni raba misimide toa . Ni kalabus ada patisu rabu ni adola ipisimide toa . Nimimi goa pisimi-pulu nina Surube Su mealimina toa .
40025037	Go raburi mo epe kone i onaanumi gupa teme : Aa Mudu , aa-rabu ne reame omesi rabu niaame ne eta gisima ya ? Ne aa-rabu ipa nalame omesi-daa niaame ipa no gimisima ya teme ?
40025038	Gore aa-rabu ne pora kimisu-para pamiside rabu ne niaana ada-para lamua napamisima ya ? Go page ne aa-rabu mamina dia yaade rabu niaame mamina gisima ya ?
40025039	Ne yaina omesi rabu page ne kalabus ada patisi rabu page niaame aa-rabu adola ipisima ya ?
40025040	Go rabu aa mudu king-mi agaa gupa abutea : Neme nimi ora ria lagialo . Gore nimimi nina Aapa amenu-para pisimide aanuri gore nina ame ogenu-para pisimide .
40025041	Goa lo kirituare neme mo koya ki-nane piralimidenu gupa laketoa : Nimiri alupape onaanu nimi neme na-ade-ga pane pulupa toa sa . Goa pua repena naudini-para palimana . Go repena sulaare Gote-me Satan-para nipuna enselnu-parana managola saaya .
40025042	Gore abade nimimi ni reame oma pirano eta ipa oyaeyae nagisimide toa .
40025043	Ni pora kimisu piri aa ipisude rabu nimimi ni nimina ada-para nalamua pisimide toa . Ni mamina dia sa raburi ni naraba misimide toa . Ni yaina omesu rabu page kalabus ada patisu rabu ni nasurubesimide toa .
40025044	Go raburi nimumi page nipu-para gupa laketeme : Aa Mudu , aa-rabu ne reame oma piraina adesima pae teme . Ne eta ipa nalame omesi page mamina dia sa page yaina omesi rabu page kalabus ada patisi page niaame aa-rabu naraba misima ya ?
40025045	Go raburi Aa Mudumi agaa gupa abutua : Gore neme ora nimi lagialo toa . Nimimi abade rolo rolo piramede ame baaninu naraba misimide-ga go raburi nimimi abade ni page naraba misimide toa .
40025046	Goa pe-pulu go onaa rayore repena sulaa-para pua pirua oro yaalo radaa no piralimina . Pare mo epe ona rayore oro yaalo epe-rupa piralimi toa sa .
40026001	Go raburi Yesu nipumi go agaa rayo lo kiritua sana nipumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para gupa lakesa :
40026002	Gore nimimi niminaaeme . Go Pasova yawe nape diri wala yapi laapo dia yalia rabu salia sa . Go rabu Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri repena polopea madaa talimi rabu omalia pare wala rekalia sa .
40026003	Go raburi Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para mo Juda aanuna aa mudu-para nimu Gote-na miru irae aa Kaiafas-na ada-para pua kiritasimi .
40026004	Goa puare nimumi kudiri pu Yesu nipu ripinaawa tu maomaatalo yada robesimi .
40026005	Pare wala nimumi lalo : Gore Pasova yawe yapi di rabu niaa go napamina-ga mo onaanumi niaa raapu yada marekalimi simi .
40026006	Yesu nipu Betani su-para pua yakimi ti yaina maperekeae aa Saimon-na ada-para pua pirisa .
40026007	Go raburi Yesu eta nala pirisa pare ona meda nipu piri-para ipisa . Go onamere aana-me warini botol-para kaapu ti wabola pira palae meda mea ipisa . Go wabolana yotore ora oyae adaapupeme kabeme . Yesu nipu reke madaa eta no pirisa raburi go oname Yesuna aaluna madaa koyasa .
40026008	Go raburi disaipel aanumi ratu waru yawoa nimumi lalo : Go wabolare akeane pa koyaate pae ? Mo nipuna yotore ora adaape yaade-ga ake pea-daa mone rubeta ?
40026009	Pare niaame go wabola yoto mealima raburi ora oyae adaapupe mua medaloma onaa riabo naraanu rumaa katema simi .
40026010	Yesumi nimu adoa nimu gupa lakesa : Gore akeane go ona ratu yawaleme ? Nipumi abade ni madaa ora epe kogono pisade .
40026011	Oro yaalo onaa naraanu raapu padane-para pitimi pare niri nimi raapu-daa oro yaalo napitima .
40026012	Go oname ni mada wabola koyaariaadere gore nipumi nina ro matmat-para rogaalimi managolaasade sa .
40026013	Waru pagalepa . Ora su rayo-para epe agaa laketa palimi raburi go oname ni madaa pia page teme-ga nipu madaa kone meamina .
40026014	Go rabu disaipel aa 12-pela aa-na meda nipuna biri Judas Iskariot nipu Gote-na miru irae aanu piri-para pisa .
40026015	Goa pua nipumi nimu-para pua lalo : Neme Yesu nimi mea gialua-ga nimimiri ni ake gialimi pae sa . Go agaa lakesa rabu nimumi mone silva ini 30 kasimi .
40026016	Goa puare Judas nipumi Yesu adi katalo pua nipumi inimini pisa .
40026017	Gore Bret Kaapuni Nape yapi di raburi disaipel aanumi Yesu nipu piri-para ipu lalo : Niaame Pasova nape etare aa-para mea managola salima ya ?
40026018	Go rabu nipumi lalo : Nimi mo ada re-para pua aa meda piraliade-para gupa laketapape : Tisaa-me lalo : Nina eta nape diri aba rudu yaana . Goa pea-ga nena ada-para eta Pasova nola epalualo pua lakelatepape .
40026019	Gore disaipel aanumi Yesuna agaa pagoa Pasova nape eta mo ada-para aba managola sasimi .
40026020	Gore ora aebore mo disaipel aa 12-pela Yesu raapu reke madaa eta nolalo pirisimi .
40026021	Nimu eta nalalo pirina Yesumi lalo : Neme nimi ora ria lagialo : Nimina rikiraana pia aa medame ni mua iaanuna kina mea katea sa .
40026022	Goa sa rabu disaipel aanuna kone-para kedaa waru pisa-pulu nimu padane padaneme goa simi : Aa Mudu , ora ne madaa agaa lae palo loa nipu agaa gupa misimi .
40026023	Pare nipumi go-rupa lakesa : Aa meda ni raapu plet madaa-para ki salipa . Go aamere ni madaa kawae madua ni tape aa piralia sa .
40026024	Gore Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri Gote-na agaa i buk-mi ta-rupa ratua yawalimi sa . Goa palimi pare Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa tinalo kawae madini aa padanere ora odo waru pea sa . Go aare nipuna agimi aba namadita pisa yaalore ora epe ta pisa sa .
40026025	Gore kawae madini aa Judas nipumi gupa lakesa Tisaa-ya , Ni-para lae ? Yesumi lalo : Nena lae sa .
40026026	Nimu eta nala pirina Yesu nipumi bret mua piribia Gote-para ora pi loa sana nipuna disaipel aanu kasa : Goa pua nipumi lalo : Gore nina to-ga mea nalepa .
40026027	Nimumi nala pirina ipa wain kap-para pira palae mua sana Gote-para ora pi loa sana nimu kaloa lalo : Nimi rayome mea nalepa .
40026028	Gore nina yaapimi Gote raapu meda-para pogatu pirapena wae yaenu mea rubenalo koyaato .
40026029	Abia neme nimi lagialo : Wain ipare abia wala nanalima pare nina Aapana surube su-para nimi raapu kagaa wain namina .
40026030	Goa loare nimumi yaasa meda aba loa simina amaa pua su Rudu Oliv-nane pisimi .
40026031	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Abia go ribaa nimi rayome ni gimoa pogola palimi sa . Go kone madaare Gote-na agaa i buk-mi gupa tu ia : Gote-na sipsip menasi surube aa tu maomalia rabu sipsip rayo pu pa yabalimi sa .
40026032	Pare Gote-me ni matmat-para wala marekaalia rabu Galili su-para ni aba riri-nane popalua sa .
40026033	Gore Pita-me Yesu agaa gupa lakesa : Go aa rayome ne mada palia adoa gimalimi pare ni padaneme nena gimalua sa .
40026034	Gore Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Neme abia go ribaa yaa kuta agaa abi narekaina neme ni na-ade rana repo te .
40026035	Gore Pita nipu-para lalo : Niri ne raapu padane-para omalipa pare neme ne nagimalua . Goa sa raburi disaipel aa rayo ni goa agu simi .
40026036	Yesu nipuna disaipel aanu raapu nipu Getsemani maapu-para pisimi . Goa pua nipuna disaipel aanu-para pawa piralepape sa . Ni mogo-para pua beten ta pulu sa .
40026037	Gore nipu raapuri Pita-para Sebedi-na si lapo-para nimu pisimi . Go raburi nipuna robaa-para kedaa pua nipu ora waru odome omesa .
40026038	Gore Yesumi nimu lakesa : Nina kone-parare ora kedaa waru pua ni ora omape yaata-ga nimi go-pare pirua ni adaba pitapape .
40026039	Gore nipu ogesi-daa pua nimuna ini agaa madaa pua lopoa beten gupa sa : O , nina Aapa , neme ni mada raba mealia-daare neme go kedaa pi kap meape . Pare nena kone ratua pape . Nena koneme pea pape .
40026040	Gore nipu wala mo disaipel aa 12-pela piri puare nimu aba patisimi ya . Go rabu Pita goa lakesa : Nimimi niri naare ini ogesi-daa mada na-ado pitimi ya ?
40026041	Gore ni wae yaeme ko tinalo epalia-ga beten loa nimi waru adoba piralepape . Nimina konemere raaname omeme pare yoganemere gimi omea .
40026042	Nipu wala rana laapo pua beten gupa pua sa : Nina Aapa , go kedaa meape kap mea pu kone salo pare neme nape tedere nena raaname palia agu paina .
40026043	Nipu wala ipuna disaipel aanu epa adesa pare nimuna robaa-para kedaa pisa-daa wala pa pata isimi .
40026044	Nimu pa u patae ina pua beten rana repo wala pua sa
40026045	Goa pua nipuna disaipel aanu piri-para wala ipua lalo : Nimiri abade ora pa pirua kitu meme ? Adalepa . Abiare Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si nimumi wae aanuna ki-nane mea kateme .
40026046	Baina nimi rekalepa . Yada lore aanu ni re-para mea katalo go epea-daa .
40026047	Yesu nipu agaa pa lala pirina disaipel aanu 12-pela nimuna aa padane Judas nipu ipisa . Go ipisa rabu onaa adaapu nipu raapu ipua simina nimumi rai kutu-para repena uninu-para rulubaawa ipisimi . Gore nipuri Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para Juda aanuna aa mudunu-para page nimumi mea penaasimi .
40026048	Go kawae madini aa nipumi mo iaanu-para gupa palua-ga adalepape lo kudiri pi kone gupa lakesa : Neme aa meda-para nunu toare gore Yesu nipu-ga ripinaatepape sa .
40026049	Goa loare nipu aipapulu aloma pua sana : Tisaa , epe-rupa piraina epa loare nipuna ini agaa-para pua nunu sa .
40026050	Gore Yesumi nipu gupa lakesa : Adami aa , mo nena pulalo epae kogonore abi aipapulu pape . Go raburi nimu ipuare Yesu nipu epa ripinaasimi .
40026051	Aa meda Yesu nipu raapu pirisipi aamere nipuna kimi rai kutu yolo risa . Goa pua nipumi mo Gote-na miru irae aa-na kogono naakina aane pona tisa .
40026052	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi nipu goa lakesa : Neme go naaki nena rai kutu wala abi nipuna ada-para madia sa . Aa rayome rai kutu raapu yada palimiri gore rai kutumi aa rayo nabalia sa .
40026053	Gore nimi naniminaaeme . Neme nina Aapa yaatoade rabu nipumi yada pape ensel-nu gupa 12-pela ruru rabuniaae epenala toare mada pagola pea .
40026054	Pare neme goa paluade raburi Gote-na buk madaa ti agaana re mada naepalia .
40026055	Go rabu Yesumi onaa adaapu gupa lakesa : Nimi ni mula ipuare nimina rai kutu-para repena uni ripinuare nimimi paake ne aa meda mula epame ? Oro yaalo ni lotu ada-para pirua neme onaanu agaa mogeaarude pare go rabu nimimi ni naepa misimide .
40026056	Goa pea pare mo Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi buk madaa aba tisimi-rupa ora epenalo mada palimi . Go rabu disaipel aa rayome Yesu gimoa nimu pogola pisimi .
40026057	Yesu nipu epa ripinaawa mea ipisimi aanumiri Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudunumi Kaiafas-na ada-para mea pisimi . Go ada-parare rekena agaana tisaanu-para kone makuaa aa medaloma-para nimu padane kiritaba pirisimi .
40026058	Pita nipu Yesu rata mea pisa pare ogesi-daa mo-pare puare Gote-na miru irini aa-na epe pokaalo ada ru-nane pua pirisa . Nipu pua odobaawa mo surube plisman-nu raapu pua pirua mo nimuna pimi-a adolalo pirisa .
40026059	Go rabu Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudunu-para kaunsil rayo-para nimumi Yesu madaa pa amaa makirae agaa mulalo Yesu nipu orope tu maomaatalo pisimi .
40026060	Goa pisimi rabu aa adaapu epa kiritaawa makirae agaa epa simi . Goa pisimi pare nipu tu maomape agaa meda nasimi . Goa pisa pare orope aa lapo ipisipi .
40026061	Gore nipumi epa lalo : Go aamere Gote-na epe lotu ada lakepe ruboa wala yapi repome wala palua laasimi .
40026062	Gore Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudu nipu reka awoa Yesu nipu agaa misa : Ne madaare agaa adaapu lo aaeme-ga nemere agaa meda mada nate ya ?
40026063	Goa sa pare Yesu nipumi agaa meda nasa-pulu Gote-na miru irini aame gupa lakesa : Neme oro yaalo pirape Gote-na bimi yaa madaa makuaa agaa mealo-ga neme agaa meda niaa lagi . Nere Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si ya ? Nere Gote-na Si ora ria ya ?
40026064	Gore Yesumi lalo : Neme aba apo laede pare neme wala lagiano : Abia page orope page Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si oro yaalo Gote-na popo ki-nane pirano adalimi . Gore so yaa madaa moae raapu pirua epalua rabu adalimi .
40026065	Yesumi goa sa rabu Gote-na miru irini aame nipuna mamina riripia lalo : Gore nipumi Gote madaa ero agaa ta-ga nipuna adasae aa medana agaa napagamina simi . Dia , go aare Gote madaa ero agaa ta-ga napagalepape simi .
40026066	Gore nimimiri ake kone saleme ? Go raburi nimumi gupa simi : Gore nipu ora wae aa ya-pulu nipu ora tu maomamina simi .
40026067	Goa loare Yesu nipuna ini agaa-para sope rapiaawa tisimi . Nimumi nipu ki paarame tua nere Gote-na agaa lakene aa ya-pulu lagi . Nere aapimi tala pae simi ?
40026068	
40026069	Go rabu Pita nipu ada peraana kepo ru-para pirisa pare Gote-na miru irape aa muduna kogono ona medame Pita aa piri-para ipua lalo : Ne page abade Yesu raapu so Galili su-para piraede sa .
40026070	Goa sa pare Pita nipumi onaa rayona ini agaa madaa ni-daa dia yaade loa goa sa : Neme go lae agaare ni maarea .
40026071	Goa loa sana nipu pua so kepona pora gaape-nane pua pirisa . Go rabu kogono ona medame nipu adoa go padane pirisimi aanu gupa lakesa : Go aare abade Yesu raapu no Nasaret su-para pirisipi .
40026072	Gore Pita-me makirae agaa wala gupa sa : Ora yada makuaa neme go aa na-ade sa .
40026073	Orope ogesi-daa pirua go re-para aasimi aa medalomame Pita-para gupa lakesimi : Gore nere Yesu nipuna ruru pirua nipuna adaa agaa-rupa te simi .
40026074	Go rabu Pita-me yada madua agaa puri palo lalo : Ni ora agaa nalagialore Gote-me ni talia lalo . Go aare ni na-ade . Nipumi go agaa lo kiritinaloa yaa gulame gagara agaa sa .
40026075	Go rabu Pita-me abade Yesumi lakesade agaa wala niminaasa : Yaa kuta agaa abi narekaina neme rana repome ni gimali lo lakelaa . Go rabu Pita nipu so amaa-nane pua re waru lo pirisa .
40027001	Yapi lapaasa raburi Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para kone makuaae Juda aa mudunu-para nimumi mo Yesu tu maomaatalo yada robesimi .
40027002	Nipu puri pane opeme adia so namba wan gavman Pailat piri-para lamua pisimi .
40027003	Gore mo kawae madini aa Judas nipumi Yesu tinalo koso loa nipu ora tu maomatainaloa adesa . Gupa adesa-pulu nipumi wala kone pereke sua mo mone silva ini 30-pela wala mo Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para kone waru i Juda aa mudunu piri wala mea pisa .
40027004	Goa pua nipumi lalo : Neme aba waea pua ora epe aa tabena kabereke aba meawade pare nipu waea meda napia . Gore nimumi nipu-para lalo : Gore niaana yada dia yapare nena kogono aba paede simi .
40027005	Goa simi rabu Judas nipumi mo mone silva ini 30-pela no epe lotu ada ru-nane ruboa sana nipu pua ope pua nisa .
40027006	Gore mo Gote-na miru irae aa mudunumi go mone muare gupa simi : Gore aa tu maomaatalo yoto kane mone simi . Gore rekena ia-ga lotu ada-para i mone raapuri go mone nasamina simi .
40027007	Go mone madaa agaa meda gupa robo suare go mone-mere sospen warini aanuna su kabamina simi . Go su-parare pora kimisu onaana matmat wariamina simi .
40027008	Goa pisimi-pulu go suna bi aa yaapi koyae bi maasimi . Go suri abia page pa ia .
40027009	Go-rupa abade agaa meda Gote-na agaa lakene aa Jeremaia-me sade agaana re-re ora go ipisa . Gore nipumi lalo : Nimumi go mone silva ini 30-pela misimi . Go mone-re mo Israel su-para piri onaanumi aa tapena kabereke mi mone sa .
40027010	Go mone mua simina Aa Mudumi lakesa-rupa nimumi sospen warini aanuna su kabasimi . Go agaare Gote-na agaa lakene aa Jeremaia-me tu isa .
40027011	Go rabu Yesu ora aa mudu gavman-na ini agaana rekainaloa mo gavman-na aa mudumi agaa gupa misa : Nere Juda aanuna aa mudu ya ? Yesu nipumi lalo : Nena go laede sa .
40027012	Goa sa pare Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudunu-para kone makuaae Juda aa mudunumi pa amaa mariaawa koso lape agaa simi . Goa pisimi pare Yesu nipumi agaa meda na-abusa .
40027013	Goa pisa-pulu aa mudu gavman Pailat-me lalo : Aa Adaa , mogo ne-para koso lape agaa go temere pagae ya ?
40027014	Goa sa pare Yesu nipumi agaa meda na-abusa rabu gavman-na aa mudu Pailat nipumi kone adaapu isa .
40027015	Gore oro maali yaalore Pasova Ne yapi di rabu mo gavman Pailat-me kalabus ada-para pati aanu padane pane penaalala pisa . Mo amaa-nane piri onaanumi niaana go aa penaalape simi rabu go raana ratua penaalala pisimi .
40027016	Go rabu ora aa wae meda Jisas Barabas mo kalabus ada-para pirisa .
40027017	Onaa rayo kiritaawa pirisimi raburi gavman-na aa mudu Pailat-me lalo : Nimimi neme aapi penaalano kone saleme pa sa . Gore Jisas Barabas giano yapae Yesu nipuna bi meda Krais giano ya sa .
40027018	Goa sa pare nipumi nimuna kone makuaa misa . Nimumi Yesu madaa udipa kone sua nipu mea kasimi .
40027019	Pailat nipu koso pagape siaa madaa pirina nipuna oreme wai agaa gupa lo o ta sa : Apo epe aa madaare neme yada nalape . Neme abia ribaa upaa pua kedaa mea-daa adawa sa .
40027020	Go rabu Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudunu-para kone makuaae Juda aanuna aa mudunu mi onaa rayona kone makiraawa goa simi : Barabas esepea Yesu ora tu maomamina tapape lakesimi .
40027021	Pare mo namba wan gavman aa Pailat-me nimu-para lalo : Go aa lapore nimina konemere aapi penaalano ya sa ? Gore nimumi lalo : Jisas Barabas simi .
40027022	Gore gavman aa Pailat nipumi lalo : Yesu nipuna bi meda Krais-re ake pano ya ? Goa sa pare nimumi puri paloa lalo : Nipu ora repena polopea mada omena tamina simi .
40027023	Pare gavman-na aa Pailat-me lalo : Akeane ya ? Nipumi wae yae meda napana sa . Goa sa pare nimumi puri paloa lalo : Nipu ora repena polopea mada tamina simi .
40027024	Gore mo Pailat nipumi mo onaanumi nipuna agaa mada napagalimi kone adesa . Nipuna konere nimumi yada marekaalimi kone isa . Goa pea-daa nipuna ki ipa-para pataawa mo onaanumi adenalo kunisa . Goa pua nipumi mo onaanu-para lalo : Go aa tu maomapere ni-daa dia sa yapare ora nimina kogono .
40027025	Goa sa rabu onaa rayome agaa gupa simi : Go tu maomape aare niaa-para niaana nogo naakinu madaa kedaa epenawa simi .
40027026	Gore go rabu gavman-me Jisas Barabas wala nimuna ada penaalo esepesa . Goa pua nipumi Yesu repena unimi tua repena polopeane nil-mi tinalo kasa .
40027027	Go rabu mo gavman-na soldia aanumi Yesu nipu mua mo gavman-na surube ada-para mea pisimi . Goa puare soldia aa rayo nipu epa kutapu ma-aawasimi .
40027028	Goa pua nipuna mamina mea kolo ruboa kane mamina mea maara laasimi .
40027029	Goa pua ititumi raguna nipuna aalu madaa maadipaasimi . Goa pua nipuna popo ki-nane rama meda mea maripinaasimi . Goa pua nipu re-para epa pirua rumu koba pua ero agaa gupa simi : Nere Juda aanuna aa mudu yaade-ga oro yaalo epe-rupa pirape simi .
40027030	Goa pua nimumi sope roa nipuna rimaapu mua nipuna aalu tisimi .
40027031	Nipu-para ero agaa aba loare mode kane mamina wala kolo ruboa nipuna abana mamina-nu wala mea maraasimi . Goa puare nipu repena polopeane nil-mi tula pisimi .
40027032	Nimumi Yesu lamua pisimi rabu Sairini su-para piri aa meda Saimon pora-nia madaasimi . Goa pua nimumi go aa-para Yesuna repena polopea mea raba mu riaainalo mariaasimi .
40027033	Gore nimu puare su meda-para opapasimi . Go suri Golgo ta simi . Go bina re-re gupa : Aana aalu uni rogaae su maasimi .
40027034	Nimumi Yesu ipa wain wae rero pi marasin raapu kasimi pare nipumi mea nadoa-ga gimisa .
40027035	Gore nimumi nipu repena polopea madaa tuare nipuna mamina oyaeyae rumaatalo satu-rupa pu tisimi .
40027036	Goa puare nimumi pirua Yesu adaba pirisimi .
40027037	So repena polopeana rugi-nanere nipuna aalu sone abade nipu-para koso lape agaa simide-rupa pepa madaa gupa tisimi : Go aare Juda aanuna aa mudu yaade tu tisimi .
40027038	Go raburi paake ne aa laapo Yesu nipu raapu nil-mi tisimi . Goa pua paake ne aa padane popo ki-nane tua meda koya-nane tu mudiaasimi .
40027039	Gore onaa rayo one lobasa apone lobasa pimisimi onaanumiri aalu wage wage pua ero agaa lama lobasa pala pisimi .
40027040	Goa pua nimumi lalo : Nere lotu ada kilipia wala yapi repome ma-alua side . Nere Gote-na Si yaliare nena go-rupa raba meape . Nere ora Gote-na Si yaliare apo repena polopea mada kilipia su amaa ipu isimi .
40027041	Goa simi rabu Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para rekena agaa tisaanu kone makuaae Juda aa mudunu-parame ero agaa gupa simi :
40027042	Gore nipumi aba onaa medaloma raba mua oro yaalo epe-rupa mapiraasa-pulu nipumi nipuna bipa raba mua oro yaalo piralia . Gore nipuri Israel onaanuna mudu ya ? Gore nipumi repena polopea gimoa su amaa kilipialia-daare niaame nipu madaa kone rulamina simi .
40027043	Gore nipumi Gote madaa kone rulaawa niri Gote-na Si tea-daare Gote-me nipu abia raba meala pame adamina simi .
40027044	Goa puare mo Yesu raapu nil-mi tisimide aa wae lapome page ero agaa simi-rupa sipi .
40027045	Gore naare rikiraana aasa rabu ribaame rigitaama pua orope naare nogo-nane pabola pupulaina yapi wala lapaasa .
40027046	Naare mogo-nane popa aaina aebo 3 klok rabu Yesu nipumi puri paloa gupa sa : Eli , eli , lama sabaktani sa . Go agaana re-re gupa : O , naa Aapa Gote , neme ni akolo gimae ya sa .
40027047	Gore mo re-para rekasimi onaanumi go agaa pagoa nimumi lalo : Go aamere Elaija yaata simi .
40027048	Go raburi aa padaneme aba aloma pua lubi nona piane yae misa . Goa puare rero pi wain ipa paba palae repena uni rugi-nane rogaa palaawa Yesu nipu nenalo kasa .
40027049	Goa pisa pare onaa medalomame lalo : Aba adamina go ipa abi nakatapape simi . Elaija-me nipu raba mula ipula pame adamina simi .
40027050	Go rabu Yesu nipumi wala puri paloa yaaloa nipuna pu imu udunasa .
40027051	Go rabu mo lotu ada-para mudiabasimi mamina so rugi-nane riripi taboa none rigi-nane pua riripi kiritisa . Goa puare su eto pua aana adaapu lusatabebe pisa .
40027052	Go rabu page matmat loba tabama pua Gote-na ruru onaare aba omesimi pare wala go rabu marekaasa .
40027053	Gore nimumi matmat ora gimoa rekesimi . Wala orope Yesu rekesa rabu nimu epe adaare Jerusalem su-para pisimi . Go raburi aa adaapumi nimu adesimi .
40027054	Soldia aa mudu-para nipuna soldia medanu-para su eto-para oyae rayo mo pisa-daa adesimi-pulu nimumi paala waru omesimi . Go rabu nimumi gupa simi : Go aare ora Gote-na Si yaana simi .
40027055	Go rabu Galili su gimoa Yesu nipu rata mea ipua nipu raba mulalo ipisimide ona medaloma pirisimi . Nimu ogesi-daa mo-pare aawa nipu adesimi .
40027056	Gore nimuna rikiraanare go onanu pirisimi : Makdala su-para piri ona Maria-para ame Jems-para Josep lapona agi Maria-para Sebedi-na si lapona agi-para nimu pirisimi .
40027057	Gore ribaa yabaasa raburi amope aa meda Josep nipu Arimatea su-para pirua ipisa . Go aa nipuri abade Yesuna disaipel aa pirisa .
40027058	Nipu mo gavman-na opis-para ipua Yesu nipuna ro ria ponoloa epa agaa misa . Go rabu gavman-me nipu lakeloa go aa Josep mea katapa sa .
40027059	Goa puare mo aa Josep-me Yesu nipuna ro mea rua epe kagaa mamina yaako pimi rogaawa ria pisa .
40027060	Goa puare nipumi mo Yesu nipuna ro ria puare nipuna abade warini aana apedaa matmat-para pua rogaasa . Goa puare nipumi aana apedaa pora gaape-para aana adaape medame garulaniaawa pisa .
40027061	Maria Makdala-para Maria rado-para nipu lapo pirisipi . Nipu mo aana apedaa re-para pirua nipumi adapaba pirisipi .
40027062	Gore ekeraa-nanere Kitu Pirape Yapi di aba ipisa . Goa pisa-pulu Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudu-para Farisi aanu-para mo Pailat raapu epa kiritasimi .
40027063	Goa pua nimumi lalo : Adaa aa-ya , gode yaa agaa ne aamere nipu kagaa pirua goa sade : Gore yapi repo pa no matmat-para pirua wala rekalua sa .
40027064	Goa sa-ga yapi repo nimumi go matmat surubalepa lo agaa lakela . Gore nipuna disaipel aanumi nipuna ro paake epa mua onaanu-para nipu aba rekaaya loa niaa makiralimi-ga soldia aanumi surubalimina sa . Orope temede yaa agaare aba simide niaa makiralimi simi .
40027065	Gore Pailat-me lalo : Nimimi surubape aa medaloma lamua pua mo matmat ora puri pane aanumi pua surubatepa sa .
40027066	Goa sa-pulu nimumi mo matmat rigitulalo aana-me garulasimi . Goa pua nimumi mo aana rekena mea sua nimumi soldia aa medaloma surubaina simi .
40028001	Gore Kitu Pirape Yapi di aba dia naloare adaa oro rabu naare rapasa . Go rabu Makdala su-para piri ona Maria-para Maria meda nipu lapome matmat-para adola ipisipi .
40028002	Pulaina aipapulu su eto pisa rabu yaa-para piri ensel meda ipisa . Gore nipumi aana apedaana pora gaape mea pereke tua isa-daa nipu go madaa pirina adesipi .
40028003	Nipuna ini agaare so yaa madaa piri paa nona pisa . Nipuna mamina-ri ora moae yaa yaako nona pisa .
40028004	Go ensel ipisa-pulu mo soldia aanu nimumi goa adoa paalame ora waru omesimi . Goa pua nimu pururu pisa-daa aba ome onaa nona piane pirisimi .
40028005	Pare mo ensel-me mo ona laapo gupa lakesa : Gore nipimi paala naomalepape sa . Nimimi repena polopea-para tu maomaarimide Yesu asapula epamena-daa niminaato sa .
40028006	Nipu go-para napia . Nipu abade sade-rupa wala rekaa pua . Nipiri nipu rogaarimide-para epa adalepa .
40028007	Gore nipi aipapulu wala pua nipuna disaipel aanu pua laketapape : Nipu aana apedaa matmat-para wala aba rekaade tapape sa . Nipu Galili su-para aba riri-nane nimumi go-para adalimi lo laketapape . Abiare neme lagiawade agaare koneme niminaatepape sa .
40028008	Go agaa pagesipi rabu mo ona lapo nipu paalame omoa raaname waru omesipi . Goa pisipi-pulu nipu lapome aipapulu mo aana apedaa matmat gimoa disaipel aanu laketalo aloma pisipi .
40028009	Pare ora go rabu Yesu nipumi aipapulu nipu laapo mo pora madaawa lalo : Epe-rupa piralepa sa . Go raburi nipumi nipuna kibu re-para pua ripinaa palae sua nipuna bi minasaasipi .
40028010	Gore Yesumi nipu gupa lakesa : Nipimi paala naomalepape . Nipimi nina amenu mo Galili su-para popena pua laketapape sa . Go Galili su-parare ni mada adalimi .
40028011	Mo ona lapo pena pora-nia pulaina mo matmat surube soldia aa medaloma mo adaare-para aipapulu pisimi . Goa puare Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para mo adesimi yaena remaa pua lakesimi .
40028012	Agaa pagesimi-pulu Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu nimu rayo-para kone waru i Juda aa mudunu-para nimu kirita pirua nimu agaa robesimi . Goa pua soldia aanu mone adaapu kasimi .
40028013	Gore nimimi agaa gupa tapape simi : Ribaa niaa patala puaama rabu nipuna disaipel aanumi mea pua meaaya tapape simi . Goa pua nipuna ro paake mea puamede tapape lo robesimi .
40028014	Gore mo namba wan gavman-me go remaa pagalia-daare niaame agaa medaloma wala lakelamina . Niaa goa palima rabu wae yae nasalia simi .
40028015	Go raburi soldia aanumi mone muare mo aanumi simi-rupa pua pisimi . Go agaa rayore Judia su-para lama lama puare abia page pa lala pimi .
40028016	Disaipel aa 12-pela so Galili su rudu madaa pisimi . Gore abade Yesumi pulupape sa-rupa pisimi .
40028017	Nimumi Yesu nipu adoa bi minasaasimi pare aa medalomame kone lapo isimi ,
40028018	Goa pua Yesu nipu ora re-para ipua gupa epa lakesa : Gote-me su yaa lapona puri rayo ni gia .
40028019	Goa pea-ga nimimi su rayo-para pua nina disaipel onaanu-rupa mapiraatepape . Goa pua nimimi nimu Gote-na bi-para Sina bi-para Holi Spirit-na bimi baptais katapape .
40028020	Goa pua neme abade agaa mana nimi mogesude-rupa onaa rayo pua laketapape . Pagalepa . Niri nimi raapu piraama puare go su yaa lapo dia yalia rabu page nimi raapu piralua sa .
41001001	Gote-na si Yesu Krais pirisa . Go buk madaare nipuna Epe Agaa ia .
41001002	Ripiare Aisaia-me buk madaa agaa gupa tisa : Gote-me lalo : Pagalepape . Neme nina agaa lakelape aa aba epenatoa . Nimina pu robaa-para pora-rupa maredepo yatepape .
41001003	Mo aare nipu onaa napiri su-para aawa gupa yaasa : Aa Mudu epalia-ga nipuna poranu epe-rupa managola su piralepape lo lakesa .
41001004	Aisaia-me gupa tisa-pulu Jon Baptais onaa napiri su-para aba ipua gupa lakesa : Onaanuna wae kone perekealimi-daare baptais mealimina . Gote-me nimina pupitagi mea raakepe rubalia sa .
41001005	Gore Judia su robo ru-nane piri onaanu-para Jerusalem su-para piri onaanu page nimumi Jon-na agaa pagola pisimi . Nimu rayona waea lapedepe agaa lakeloa ipa Jordan-para baptais misimi .
41001006	Jon-me kamel menana yogane maraawa sana mena yogane aako yamesa . Go aare onaa napiri su-para pirisa-pulu nipumi mata-para alubi Aapa asapu no pirisa .
41001007	Jon-me kiritaawa pirisimi onaanu-para gupa sa : Naa masaa-nane aa meda epalia . Niri wae aa ya-pulu nipuna aariti esepea kege-daa mada naradepealua sa .
41001008	Neme nimi pa ipame baptais meaato pare Yesumiri ora Holi Spirit-na puri madaa baptais mealia sa .
41001009	Gore orope Yesu nipu Galili su robo ru-nane go adaare Nasaret su gimoa Jon piri-para pisa .
41001010	Yesu nipu ipa repaa-nane aainaloa yaa pora gaape lobesa-daa adesimi . Lobesa rabu Holi Spirit yaa nona piane biyaa ipua sana Yesuna masaana epa pirisa .
41001011	Biyaalaina yaa-para i agaa meda gupa sa : Nere ora nina si naaki-ga neme ne madaa pedo pi sa .
41001012	Go rabu Gote-na Siri Holi Spirit-mi onaa napiri su-para mea penaasa .
41001013	Go-para nipu yapi 40-pela pua pirina Satan-me Yesu pupitagi manataalo ko tisa . Go-para pirisa rabu kira menanu yaa yapanu Yesu raapu pirisimi pare ensel-numi nipu suruba pirisimi .
41001014	Gore Jon kalabus ada-para mapataasimi raburi Yesumi Galili su-para ipua sana Gote-na kagaa agaa pamu lakesa .
41001015	Lakesa raburi gupa sa : Gote-na Surube Su rudupu epalia-ga wae kone perekea kagaa agaa madaa kone rulaatepape sa .
41001016	Yesu ipa Galili ini repaa-nane pamisa rabu nipumi aa laapo adesa . Nipumi Saimon Andru ameaya lapo ipa ini-para ena agona sala pirina adesa . Go aa lapona kogonore ena meape aa laapo pirisipi .
41001017	Yesumi nipu lapo-para lalo : Ni rata mea ipua nina kone ratalipina . Goa pua ena mepede-rupa onaanu page go-rupa mada mealepape .
41001018	Goa sa rabu go aa lapome ena agona aipapulu gimoa Yesu raapu pisimi .
41001019	Yesu ipa mone pane ogesi-daa pua Sebedi-na si laapo adesa . Go aa laapona biri Jems-para Jon lapo . Go ameaya ipunu madaa pirua ena agona rabulala pirisipi .
41001020	Yesumi go aa lapo adoa ipulupa sa . Goa sa rabu go aa laapome nipuna aaraa-para kogono aanu-para gimoa Yesu raapu padane-para pisimi .
41001021	Goa pua nimu Kaperneam su-para pisimi . Go Kitu Pirape Yapi rabu Yesumi Juda aanuna lotu ada-para agaa mogeasa .
41001022	Mogeasa rabu onaanumi ki wage pua raaname omenaloa rekena agaana tisaanu-rupa namogeaasa . Dia , pare nipuna purimi rado-rupa agaa lakesa .
41001023	Go agaa mogeasa rabu wae remome maeyae aa ipua sana agaa puri palo rui gupa sa :
41001024	Go Nasaret su-para piri aa Yesu ya . Neme niaa madaa ake pulalo epae ya ? Nemere ne ade-ga niaa tulalo epaena ?
41001025	Goa sa rabu Yesumi remo-para agaa mana lalo : Agaa loraawa go aa gimape .
41001026	Yesumi goa sa raburi wae remome maeyae aa pururu mapaawa agaa puri pane loare gimoa pane popesa .
41001027	Gore rakepea pisa raburi onaa rayome kidipaa ragi tua meda lakelala pu pirisimi : Go aare ake piane aa ya ? Mogo aa-na agaare ora rado meda yaade . Nipuna purimi wae remo agaa mana ta-daa nimumi pageme simi .
41001028	Goa pisa-pulu Yesuna bi Galili su-para mone mone laama pisimi .
41001029	Goa pisa raburi Yesu Juda aanuna lotu ada gimoa Saimon-para ame Andru lapona ada-para pisa . Jems page Jon page medaa rabu pisimi .
41001030	Gore Saimon-na aaya kekapu pi yaina omesa-daa nimumi Yesu epa lakesimi .
41001031	Lakesimi raburi Yesu ipua sana go onana ki ripinaawa marekaawa kekapu pi yaina maepeaasa . Nipuna yaina dia sa rabu nipumi nimu eta kasa .
41001032	Naare pabola pisa raburi onaanu yaina omesimi page masaa-nane remo piri onaanu page Yesu piri-para mea ipisimi .
41001033	Mea ipisimi raburi su rayo-para piri onaanu page Yesu adolalo ipua pora gaape-para kirita pirisimi .
41001034	Pirisimi rabu Yesumi onaa adaapuna yaina maepeaawa sana wae remonu page marakepeaasa . Wae remonumi Yesu aba adesimi-pulu Yesumi onaanu-para go agaa natapape sa .
41001035	Gore wala yapi pena lapatalo palaina Yesu rekoa sana onaa napiri su amaa-nane pua Gote-para beten ta pisa .
41001036	Go raburi Saimon-para go adami aa medaloma page Yesu rata mea pisimi .
41001037	Yesu adesimi rabu gupa simi : Onaa rayome ne asapu pimi .
41001038	Yesumi lalo : Wala pa su meda-nane laketa baina loa neme nimu epe agaa mogeaalua .
41001039	Goa puare nipu Galili su robo ru-nane su rado rado pamua Juda aanuna lotu ada-para page lakeloa wae remonu page raakepe rubisa .
41001040	Goa pisa raburi yakimi ti aa medame ipua rumu koba pua pirua Yesu gupa ogesa : Neme ni kone sali-daare naa rere makaapu yape sa
41001041	Gupa ogesa raburi Yesu nipumi odome omoa nipuna ki ridulaawa go aana yogane oraawa lalo : Goa pea-ga abia kaapu yape sa .
41001042	Goa pisa raburi mogo yakimi ti aa-na yoganena rere kaapu yoa wala epe-rupa pirisa .
41001043	Yesumi mo aa aipapulu repaawa puri paloa gupa sa :
41001044	Waru pagape . Onaa rayo nalakelape pare Gote-na Miru Irae Aa piri-para nena yogane mea waalape . Moses-me Gote-para miru irua kalape aba sa-pulu gupa paina . Go pali raburi onaanumi nena rere kaapu ta-daa mada adalimi sa .
41001045	Yesumi goa sa pare rere kaapu ne aamere agaa adaapu one mone pamu lakesa . Goa pisa rabu Yesu adaare meda-para kaledoa pisa . Nipu onaa napiri pa su meda-para pirina onaanumi nipu piri-para agaa pagolalo kiritata ipisimi .
41002001	Gore orope yapi medame Yesu nipu mo Kaperneam su-para epa pia remaa pagesimi .
41002002	Pagesimi-pulu onaa adaapu kiritaawa ru-nane pora gaape-para page rulatabesa . Goa pu pirisimi raburi Yesumi Epe Agaa mogeasa .
41002003	Mogeasa rabu yaina omo pora napami aare aa maalame ria ipisimi .
41002004	Gore onaa adaapumi mo pora gaape-para rulatabesimi-pulu Yesu piri-para mada naria ipisimi . Goa pisa rabu mo yaina ome aa ada masaana ria pisimi . Goa pua ada pira kegepe minala paawa reke opeme rogaabaawa apalae ru-nane pawa lopaniaasimi .
41002005	Goa puare Yesumi nimuna kone mua pora napami aa-para lalo : Ne naa naaki-ga nena pupitagi ne kone mea rubaato .
41002006	Goa sa raburi rekena agaa tisaanu pirua nimuna robaa-para kone gupa isimi :
41002007	Mo aamere akeane ta pae simi . Nipumi Gote madaa ero agaa ta paaya . Nipumi pupitagi ne kone mada mea rubalia ya ? Gote nipu padaneme mada mea rubalia kone isimi .
41002008	Go kone isimi raburi Yesumi nimuna robaa-para kone mua lalo : Nimimi go piane konere akeane imi pae ?
41002009	Ake kogono puri mapalaatalo palua ya ? Ni pora napami aa-na pupitagi ne kone mea rubaluare go kogono puri patea ya ? Nipu pora mapamuaaware go kogono ora puri patea ya ?
