41002010	Ni Gote-na Si padanemere su amaa piri onaanuna pupitagi mada mea rubalua-ga adalepa . Go rabu yaina ome aa-para lalo :
41002011	Yapara page u pati yae mea ripinua rekoa adaa pu .
41002012	Goa sa raburi yaina ome aa aipapulu rekoa yapara mea ripinua pora pamisa . Pamisa raburi onaanumi paalame omoa Gote-na bi minasaawa gupa simi : Niaame oyae go piane na-adema simi .
41002013	Yesu ipa ini pagi-nane wala pisa rabu onaa rayo Yesu piri-para epenaloa Yesumi agaa moge riaasa .
41002014	Yesu pora pamisa rabu Alfius-na si Livai-ri takis mi ada-para pirisa . Yesumi go aa adoa lalo : Ni rata mea ipu . Goa sa raburi Livai nipu rekoa Yesu rata mea pisa .
41002015	Goa pisa rabu orope Yesu Livai-na ada-para eta nolalo pisa . Takis mi aanu-para pa riabo aanu-para Yesuna disaipel aanu-para nimu rayo ada ru-nane padane-para epa kiritaawa pirisimi . Gore onaanumi Yesu rata mea ipisimi-pulu ora adaapu pirisimi .
41002016	Go raapu pirisimi pare Yesu nipu pupitagi ne aanu-para takis mi aanu-para pirina Farisi aanuna pepa tape aanumi nimu adesimi . Adesimi rabu nimumi disaipel aanu agaa gupa misimi : Akeane Yesu takis mi aanu-para pupitagi ne aanu raapu pirua eta nala pae simi .
41002017	Pepa tape aanumi goa simi rabu Yesumi nimuna agaa pagoa lalo : Yaina naome onaanuri dokta-na ada napeme pare yaina ome onaanu pemede . Go-rupa neme page epe kone i aa agu raba mula-daa naipisu pare onaa naraanu raba mulalo ipisu sa .
41002018	Rana medare Jon-na disaipel aanu page Farisi aanu page Juda aanuna agaa mogeaawa eta madaa niti pua pa pirisimi . Go rabu onaa medalomame Yesu piri-para agaa mula ipisimi : Gore akeane Jon-na disaipel aanu page Farisi aanu page eta nano pimi pare nena disaipel aanu eta pa neme simi .
41002019	Goa simi rabu Yesumi saa agaa gupa sa : Aa medame ona rumaatalo pia rabu nipuna adami aanumi eta kateme ya ? E , kateme . Gore ona rumaape aa pia-pulu eta mada kateme .
41002020	Oropere ona rumaape aa lamua palia rabu adami aanumi eta nape yae madaa niti pua piralimi .
41002021	Yesumi kagaa oyaeyae lapo madaa saa agaa gupa lakesa : Aa medame mamina rugini kagaa mua abana mamina madaa rabulalia ya ? Dia , gupa rabulaalia rabu kagaa rabuni mamina-mere abana mamina mariripiaawa rugula tabalia .
41002022	Go page aa medame kagaa ipa wain-mi abana yapa yogane pe-para yupialia ya ? Dia , goa palia-daa yogane podepe taboa kagaa ipa wain popalia . Gore kagaa wain-ri kagaa yapa yogane pe-para yupiape . Goa pea-ga abana kone-para kagaa kone lapo padane-para nasalepape sa .
41002023	Wala Kitu Pirape Yapi rabu Yesu-para nipuna disaipel aanu-para wit maapu-para pamisimi . Gupa pamualaawa disaipel aanumi wit-na ini keresimi .
41002024	Gore keresimi rabu Farisi aanumi Yesu-para agaa gupa lakesimi : Ada . Akeane Kitu Pirape Yapi rabu nena disaipel aanumi rekena agaa rasua kogono peme ?
41002025	Yesumi lalo : Devit-mi tisade remaare nadipisimi ? Devit aa medaloma raapu eta dia yoa reame omesimi .
41002026	Reame omesimi raburi aa meda Abaiata-re nipu Gote-na Miru Irae Aa pirisa . Go aa mudu pirisa rabu Devit-miri lotu ada-para bret pua mua noa aa medaloma page kasa . Go bret-re Gote-na kalape bret ya-pulu Gote-na miru irini aanumi agu nisimi . Nimimi go agaana re niminaaeme ya ?
41002027	Yesumi lalo : Gote-me Kitu Pirape Yapi robo isare onaa raba minalo pisa . Gote-na Kitu Pirape Yapi madaa onaa nawarisa .
41002028	Ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa ya-pulu niri Kitu Pirape yapina Aa Mudu pi sa .
41003001	Wala orope Yesu Juda aanuna lotu ada-para pisa rabu ki rudu-ae aa meda pirisa .
41003002	Goa pisare Kitu Pirape Yapi ya-pulu Farisi aanumi Yesu koso lape agaa ta polalo pirisimi . Gore Yesumi ki rudu-ae aa wala maepeaaliare koso laalima kone sua pirisimi .
41003003	Goa pisa rabu Yesumi ki rudu-ae aa-para lalo : Rekoa ipu .
41003004	Goa sa raburi nipumi Farisi aa-repaa agaa misa : Kogonore ake epe ta ? Gore neme onaa raba mua epe-rupa mapiraano epe ta pae onaa tu maomalimi epe ta pae ? Kitu Pirape Yapi diri ake kogono mada pamina ? Go agaa misa pare Farisi aanumi agaa na-abusimi .
41003005	Nimumi agaa pa yola mua pu-para rero pia pisimi-daa Yesumi ratu yawesa pare-ga wala odome omesa . Odo omesa rabu ki rudu-ae aa-para lalo : Ki ridula . Mo aame nipuna ki ridulasa rabu Yesumi ki maepeaasa .
41003006	Goa pisa raburi Farisi aanumi aa mudu Herot-na adami aanu piri-para pua Yesu tu maomaatalo yada robo pirisimi .
41003007	Goa pisa rabu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu gimoa wala ipa repaa-nane pisimi . Goa pisimi raburi su Galili-nane piri onaame orope rata mea ipisimi .
41003008	Go page su Jerusalem su-para onaanu page su Idumea onaanu page ipa Jordan-na mo-nanena onaanu page Tair Saidon su lapona piri onaanu page go su rayona piri onaanumi Yesuna epe remaa pagolalo nipu piri-para kiritaawa ipisimi .
41003009	Kiritasimi rabu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para lalo : Onaanumi niaa epa minabalimi-ga ipunu managola salepape sa .
41003010	Yesumi onaa adaapuna yaina aba maepeaasa-pulu onaa medalomame Yesuna to yogane oraatalo kiritasimi .
41003011	Goa pisa rabu wae remo pabo piri aanumi Yesu adoare yala poloa pogola pisimi . Aiya , ne ora Gote-na Si simi .
41003012	Goa simi raburi Yesumi lalo : Naa bi natapape sa .
41003013	Goa pua wala go rabu Yesumi su rudune pua nipuna kone sua aa medaloma-para ipulupa sa .
41003014	Goa pua Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa 12-pela mada mua lalo : Ni raapu kogono pu epe kagaa agaa laketemena repaalua .
41003015	Nimimi goa palimi rabu nina purimi wae remo pabo piri aanu marakepealimi .
41003016	Nipuna aposel 12-pela nimuna bi gupa maasa : Saimon yapare Yesumi Pita loa bi maasa .
41003017	Medalomare Sebedi-na si Jems-para Jon lapo misa . Yesumi go ameala Boanerges lo bi maasa . Go bi adaa agaa madaare yai ari tala naaki lapo teme sa .
41003018	Yesumi aa medaloma gupa mada misa : Andru-para Filip-para Batolomyu-para Matyu-para Tomas-para Alfius-na si Jems-para Tadius-para Saimon nipu Selot ruru pirisa .
41003019	Gore namba 12 aare Judas nipu Iskariot su-para pirisa pare go aamere orope Yesu tulalo kawe madini aa pirisa . Go aa rayo Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu mapiraawa ada pisa .
41003020	Goa pisa rabu onaa ora adaapu wala kiritasimi-pulu Yesu nipuna disaipel aanu page eta nanisimi .
41003021	Eta nanisa remaa pagesimi rabu Yesuna adami aanumi nipu mula ipisimi . Gore Yesu kone maeyaawa eta nano piruaaya kone sua nipu mula ipisimi .
41003022	Goa pisa rabu rekena agaa tisaanumi nimuna Jerusalem su-para gimoa epa lalo : Yesuna masaana Belsebul pia-pulu go remonuna purimi remo medaloma mada magimaalia simi .
41003023	Goa simi rabu Yesumi nimu yaaloa saa agaa lakesa : Satan-me nipu pua gimape re mada tea ya ? Dia , onaana robaa-para piralia-pulu mada natea .
41003024	Gore pa su meda-parare ruru padane pirua rugulala paliare go suna puri ora mada dia yoa o yalia .
41003025	Go page ada meda aaraalu rugulala paawa yada palimiri go aaraaluna puri ora dia yalia .
41003026	Go page Satan-me nipuna surube onaanu rugulala palia yaalore epe-rupa mada napiralimi pare puri ora dia yalia .
41003027	Yesumi Satan madaa saa agaa meda gupa lakesa : Neme puri pane aa opeme aba rogaaliri nipuna ada-para oyaeyae mada paake noa maoyaali .
41003028	Go agaa pagalepape . Gote-me onaana pupitagi mada mea rubalia . Go page onaanumi ero agaa rana adaapu temere nipumi mada rabuaniaalia .
41003029	Goa pea pare onaanumi Holi Spirit madaa ero teme-daare Gote-me go wae konere namea rubalia . Go wae konere ora adaape ya-pulu mo aa-na go wae kone oro yaalo pa saapiralia .
41003030	Onaa medalomame Yesuna masaame remo pia aba simi-pulu Yesumi apo agaa lakesa .
41003031	Goa pisa raburi Yesuna agi amenu ipua ada gaa-nane pirua Yesu adola ipisimi-daa agaa lo moneasimi .
41003032	Agaa o taasimi rabu onaanumi Yesu piri-para kiritaawa simi : Nena agi amenu ada gaa-nane pimi simi . Ne lamua polalo epa yalame simi .
41003033	Goa simi rabu Yesumi lalo : Nina ama ame baaninuri aapi ya ?
41003034	Go rabu nipu pereke tua onaanu adoa agaa gupa lakesa : Go onaanuri naa ama naa ame baaninu pimi sa .
41003035	Onaa rayome Gote-na kone ratalimi-daare go onaanu naa ame baani ama aapa pimi sa .
41004001	Wala oro meda Yesumi ipa ini repaa-nane pua agaa pamu moge riasa . Mogeasa rabu onaa adaapu kiritisimi-pulu nipumi ipunu madaa pirua ipa repaa-nane pua agaa lakesa .
41004002	Onaa kiritasimi rabu Yesumi saa agaame gupa lakesa :
41004003	Gore wit-na ini poae aame ini pola pisa .
41004004	Pua poasa rabu wit-na ini medaloma pora-nia madaa lopesa . Go rabu yaanumi epa mea nisimi .
41004005	Ini medalomare no aana rote madaa lopesa . Goa pisa rabu rote madaa-nane oge su kobere isa-pulu inimi aipapulu opesa .
41004006	Aipapulu opesa pare naareme adesa rabu pita napua kaapu sa .
41004007	Ini medalomare repena eto ae-para lopesa pare adaa sa raburi etoto putimi maregepeaawa wit-na ini naetisa .
41004008	Ini medalomare epe su kobere madaa lopesa-pulu opoa sana ini epe-rupa etisa . Wit-na ini etisa rabu medalomare 30-pela etisa . Ini medalomare rikiraana sone pua ini 60-pela etisa . Medalomare ini rubi kiritua ora 100-pela etisa .
41004009	Goa pua Yesumi lalo : Onaa rayome go agaana re niminaalimiri waru pagalepape sa .
41004010	Goa pua agu raapo pirisa rabu nipuna disaipel aanu raapu onaa medaloma ipua saa agaana re epa agaa misimi .
41004011	Gupa agaa misimi rabu Yesumi lalo : Nimimiri Gote-na Surube Su madaa kudiri agaa pageme . Goa pea pare kepo rarane piri onaanu saa agaa laketalo pi .
41004012	Go agaana re adalimi pare nimumi yada namakualimi : Onaanumi ado pimi pare naniminaalimi . Pagalimi pare namakuaalimi . Gore niminaawa pupitagi ne kone gimalimiri Gote-me waea yae mea rubalia .
41004013	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Go saa agaana re mada namakuaa pimi ? Napagalimiri saana agaare akolo makuaalimi ya ?
41004014	Saa agaana re gupa sa : Wit-na ini pua poae aamere nipu Gote-na kagaa agaa poaaya .
41004015	Gore pora uni madaa lope wit-ri onaanumi kagaa agaa pagaminalo Satan-me aipapulu epa mabebolaalia .
41004016	Go aana rote madaa lope wit-ri onaanumi kagaa agaa pagoa raana omo pimi .
41004017	Raana omeme pare nimuna robaa-para pita napua pa ogesi pea . Oge yapi di pirua kagaa agaa pageme pare wae yaeme nimu talia rabu Gote gimoa aipapulu lopeme .
41004018	Repena eto-para lopea wit-ri go onaanumi kagaa agaa pagoa pare nimuna koneme abia ake palua pae kone imi .
41004019	Goa pua nimu sekere menanu raana omoa oyaeyae mulalo peme . Goa pea-pulu nimumi Gote-na kagaa agaa robaa-para ia pare go koneme maregepaawa maoyaalia .
41004020	Epe su kobere-para lopesa wit-ri onaanumi kagaa agaa pagoa ini epe-rupa maditimi . Go raburi medalomana iniri 30-pela etea . Medalomanare ini 60-pela etea pare medalomana ini rubi kiritina gupa 100-pela etea sa .
41004021	Yesumi nimu agaa gupa misa : Onaanumiri lam ewoa reke rolo-para imi ya ? Reke rolo-para suare so madaa namudialimi ya ? Dia , ora mudiaemede .
41004022	Gore oyaeyae pagaa suare orope mea wanalo peme . Oyaeyae kudiri pu salimiri orope Gote-na paame ada salia .
41004023	Nimimi go agaana re niminaaba piralimiri waru pagalepape .
41004024	Yesumi nimu-para wala lalo : Pageme agaare waru surubape . Nimimi agaa mogeteme-daare Gote-me mogo kogonona yago wala abutea . Goa pua medaloma page gialia .
41004025	Onaa medalomame oyae adaapu su pitimi-daare Gote-me medaloma page mea gialia . Pare onaa rayome ogepu oyae su pitimiri oge abuna ora mu pa aalia .
41004026	Goa pisa rabu Yesumi wala lalo : Gote-na Surube Suri go piane lo lagialo : Pa aa medame ini su madaa radasa .
41004027	Nipu u patua rekoa kogono pula pea rabu mo kibita ini opoa adaa yalia . Goa pea pare go aame go ini opea-rupa naniminaaya .
41004028	Sumi nipuna ini madita . Goa pua aba ripiare yosi opoa walare uni aawa walare nape yae etalia .
41004029	Goa pua go ini etea rabu mo aame rai kutu mua aipapulu warita palia . Gote-na Surube Su onaanuri apo maapu madaa oyae opea-rupa adaapu piralimi .
41004030	Goa pisa raburi nipumi wala lalo : Gote-na Surube Suri ake nona piane ya ? Gote-na Surube Suri ake madaa lano ya ?
41004031	Gote-na Surube Su gupa ia : Repena yamo mastet-me ini su amaa radata rabu nipuna ini ora ogege yaesi .
41004032	Ogege yaesi yapare opoare repena rayo minabaaya . Go repena palaa adaa yalia-pulu yaanumi ipua palaana ru-para ada peme . Gote-na Surube Su madaa piri onaanuri aba ogepu pirua orope adaapu piralimi .
41004033	Yesumi saa agaa go-rupa lakesa . Nimumi agaana re niminaainalo mogeaata pisa .
41004034	Pare Yesumi nimu-para oro yaalo saa agaame agu mogeasa . Goa pisa pare nipumi disaipel aanu-para saa agaana re lakesa .
41004035	Go yapi padanena aebo raburi Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Abiare ipa ini mone pane bai .
41004036	Goa sa raburi Yesu ipunu ru-nane aba pirina disaipel aanu page epa pirisimi . Nimu pirisimi rabu ipunu medaloma page go-para isimi .
41004037	Goa pua ipa ini madaa aba penaaloare po ripu ipua ipa kai tisa rabu ipunu-para ipa epa pabolalo pisa .
41004038	Go rabu Yesumi ipunu masaa-nane pirua kada sua u patisa . U patisa raburi nimumi nipu marekaawa simina : Aya Tisaa , niaa omalima-ga kone nasae ya ?
41004039	Goa simi rabu Yesumi rekoa po ripu-para ipa lapo agaa gupa lakesa : Mada-ga gima . Goa sa rabu po ripu loraawa ipa eto napi pa pirisa .
41004040	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Akeane paala omeme ? Abia page epe agaare nimina robaa-para waru nasame ya ?
41004041	Goa sa raburi nimu paala omoa simina agaa lo pirisimi : Go aare aapi yapae lo pirisimi . Go aa-na agaare po ripu-para ipa ini laapome pagea simi .
41005001	Goa pisa raburi nimu ipa ini Gerasa-repaa mone pane pisimi .
41005002	Mone pane opapasimi raburi Yesu ipunu gimoa popesa . Go rabu wae remo pabo piri aa meda matmat apedaa gimoa Yesu aipapulu madaama ipisa .
41005003	Go remo pabo piri aa nipu matmat-na u patisa rabu onaanumi nipu puri pane opeme page mada na-adisimi .
41005004	Go aa nipu oro yaalo hankap ope laapo rugulu rubebe pala pisa-pulu mada na-adisimi . Goa pisa-pulu nimumi nipu mada kuma namapaeme .
41005005	Oro yaalo mo aa matmat amaa-para pore laapona pamisa . Pamisa raburi nipu rui loa aana-me nipuna to mea tala pisa .
41005006	Nipumi Yesu adesa rabu Yesu piri-para aipapulu ipisa . Go rabu mo aame Yesu madaa paala omoa rumu koba pua epa pirisa .
41005007	Rumu koba pisa rabu puri paloa gupa yaasa : Ne ora Mudu Gote-na Si Yesu yaade . Neme ni-para ake pali ya ? Gote-na bi madaa lalo-pulu neme ni gimoa pu .
41005008	Gore Yesu aba nipu wae remonu nipu gimoa pope lo lakesa-pulu apo agaa sa .
41005009	Goa sa raburi Yesumi nipu-para wala lalo : Nena biri aapi ya loa agaa misa . Wae remo aaya aame lakesa : Remo adaapu ni-para odobaeme-pulu nina biri riri yaade .
41005010	Go rabu mo aame Yesu-para puri paloa ogesa : Niaa rayo pora kimisu-para na-ratu ta sa .
41005011	Goa pisa raburi menanumi rudu-nini e poalaasimi .
41005012	Wae remonumi Yesu-para lalo : Niaa mogo menanu-para mea repaa . Goa pua nimuna robaa-para pomona gupa ogesimi .
41005013	Gupa ogesimi raburi Yesumi nimu mea rapaasa . Mea rapaasa rabu wae remonu mo aa gimoa menana robaa-para pua odobasimi . Go rabu mena-repaame rata-para kilipia ipa-para pua omesimi . Menanuri ora 2000-rupa omesimi .
41005014	Gore mena puni aanumi go yae adoa adaare-para pa su meda-nane pogola pua puaa lakesimi . Lakesimi raburi onaa rayo ipua epa adesimi .
41005015	Nimu Yesu piri-para ipua aba wae remo piri aa epa adesimi . Remo pirisade aare nipu pirua mamina yamoa epe kone isa . Mo aa adesimi rabu paala omesimi .
41005016	Goa pua onaanumi wae remo mena madaa pua odobataina adesimi-pulu remaa pamu simi .
41005017	Goa pisa rabu nimumi Yesu-para lalo : Niaana su gimoa su meda-para pope simi .
41005018	Yesu ipunu madaa piritalo pisa rabu mo remo piri aame ni page pirapana sa .
41005019	Goa sa pare Yesumi dia loa nena ruru piri-para pua ni madaa Aa Mudumi epe kogono paa lo pua lakelape sa . Gote-me ni odome omalo pua lakelape sa .
41005020	Goa pisa raburi aba remo piri aame Dekapolis su-para pua Yesuna kogono painalo lakesa . Onaa rayome pagoa ora pogolasaasimi .
41005021	Yesumi ipunu madaa pirua ipa mone pane wala kenaasa rabu onaa kiritasimi . Kiritasimi rabu Yesu ipa ini repaa-nane pirisa .
41005022	Goa pisa rabu aa meda nipuna bi Jairasi go aame Yesu piri-para ipisa . Nipu mo Juda aanuna lotu adana aa mudu pirisa . Nipu Yesu adesa raburi Yesuna kibu re-para ipua rumu koba pua agaa mulalo pisa .
41005023	Rumu koba pua nipumi lalo : Naa oge nogo ora ini adupialia . Gore ne epape . Nipuna to madaa kimi oraali rabu nipuna yaina perekealia .
41005024	Goa sa raburi Yesu nipu raapu pisipi . Onaa adaapumi nipu rata mea pisimi rabu Yesu pope pora rulatabesa .
41005025	Pora pisimi raburi ona meda nipuna yaapi pupulae yaina maali ru repo patisa .
41005026	Mo oname dokta-nuna ada pua nipuna to mada radaa pina pisa pare namaperekeaasimi . Dia , pare go onana yaina adaa ya-mama pisa .
41005027	Go ona Yesuna bi pagesa-pulu onaa pabo kiritasimi-para ipua Yesuna masaa-nane mamina oraata ipisa .
41005028	Oname mamina oraawa kone gupa misa : Go aa-na mamina oraalua rabu ni mada maperekealia kone isa .
41005029	Goa pua oraasa raburi nipuna yaapi kaapu sa rabu nipuna robaa-para epea pi kone isa .
41005030	Mo oname oraasa raburi Yesuna puri medaloma ma-puaasa-daa koneme adesa . Nipu pereke tua onaanu agaa gupa misa : Nina mamina aapimi oraaria ya ?
41005031	Go agaa mulalo pisa raburi Yesuna disaipel aanumi gupa simi : Gore onaa adaapu reko piramede-ga naa mamina aapimi oraaria pae piri ake pea-daa le ?
41005032	Pare Yesumi pereke tua adobasa .
41005033	Goa pisa rabu onana kone-para paalame omesa . Paala omoa pururu pua Yesuna kibu-para epa adaniaa pirisa . Go oname yala omoa neme pawade-ga neme ni maepeaainalo pawa sa .
41005034	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi mo ona gupa lakesa : Aina , neme Gote madaa kone rulaari-pulu ne epea pi-ga abia pawa pope . Nena yaina puade sa .
41005035	Yesumi goa lalaina Jairas-na mea repaae aa medaloma go Juda aa muduna ada gimoa ipua lalo : Nena wane ini adupiaade . Nere akeane tisaa mea epali ya ?
41005036	Goa simi pare Yesumi apo agaa gimoa Juda aanuna aa mudu-para gupa sa : Paala naomape . Dia , kone rulape .
41005037	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi Pita-para Jems-para nipuna ame Jon-para medaa-para baina sa . Pisimi raburi Yesumi lalo : Onaa medaloma ada-para naipulupape lo lakesa .
41005038	Nimu apo Aa Mudu-na ada re-para ipisimi rabu Yesumi onaa rayo puri paloa re lala pirina adesa .
41005039	Yesu ada-para pisa raburi onaa lakeloa lalo : Akeane re lo pimi ? Go nogo na-ini adupita pare pa u patana sa .
41005040	Goa sa raburi nimumi nogo ini adupisa-daa niminaasimi-pulu giri laasimi . Giri laasimi raburi onaanu amaa ratu tisa . Yesu-para mo nogona agi aaraa lapo-para disaipel aanu-para nimu rayo nogona ro isa ru-nane pisimi .
41005041	Yesumi oge nogona ki mua Talita Kumi sa . Go agaare gupa sa : Oge nogo abi reka sa .
41005042	Goa sa raburi go nogo aipapulu rekoa pamisa . Go nogona maali 12-pela pirisa . Mo nogo pamisa raburi onaanumi paala omoa kidipaa ragi tu pirisimi .
41005043	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Onaa medaloma napua laketapa . Go nogo eta katapape sa .
41006001	Yesu go su gimoa nipuna adaare-para pisa . Pisa rabu nipuna disaipel aanumi nipu rata mea pisimi .
41006002	Goa pisa raburi Yesu Kitu Pirape Yapi di rabu nipumi Juda aanuna lotu ada-para agaa mogeaata pisa . Mogeasa rabu onaame pagoa pogolasaawa gupa simi : Go aa-na kone aa-para misa ? Akea pua go adaa puri misa ? Puri pane kogono medaloma nipuna purimi wariala .
41006003	Go aare kamda kogono pi aa pirua nipuri Maria-na si yaade . Go page Jems-para Josep-para Juda-para Saimon-para go aanu nipuna amenu yaade . Nipuna baaninu niaa padane-para pima simi . Goa loa nimimi Yesu madaa robaa-para wae kone isimi . Goa pua nimumi Yesu gimisimi .
41006004	Goa pisimi rabu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Gote-na agaa lakene aare su rayo-para onaame nipuna bi minasaaeme pare nipuna adaare-para nipuna ruru-para nipuna aaraalu-para nimumi nipuna bi naminasaaeme .
41006005	Goa pisimi rabu Yesumi puri pane kogono go-para mada nawarisa pare nipumi onaana yaina padane padane laatapu maperekeaasa .
41006006	Yesu onaanuna pu robaa-para kone waru narulasimi-pulu Yesu ora paalame omesa . Goa pua Yesu adaare rayo-para epe agaa mogeatalo pamisa .
41006007	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi aposel kogono aa 12-pela rapaasa .
41006008	Goa pisa rabu laapo laapo laatapu mua mea rapaasa . Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu puri kaloa wae remo mea rubaainalo pisa . Yesumi agaa gupa lakesa : Pora kimisu-para palimi rabu oyae namealepape pare rimaapu ripinua pora pamula pulupape . Sapi-para nu-para mone pabe paus-para rayo namea pulupape lo lakesa .
41006009	Nimimi aariti sua palimi pare mamina padane yamalepape .
41006010	Yesumi page nimu-para gupa lakesa : Adaa adaare-para pua kogono palimi raburi ada padane-para pirua eta nalepape . Adaare rado-para palimi rabu go ada nagimalepape .
41006011	Adaa adaare-para palimi rabu go onaanumi nimi gimoa epe agaa napagalimi-daare nimuna wae yae niminaaina nimina aa madaa ae kege nimuna ada-para kunu satepape .
41006012	Goa sa raburi disaipel aanumi pua onaanu lakeloa lalo : Wae kone rabuaatepape simi .
41006013	Disaipel aanumi wae remo pabo piri aa maepeaawa yaina ome onaana aalu madaa wabola sua maperekeaasimi .
41006014	Goa pisimi rabu gavman-na aa mudu Herot-me disaipel aanuna kogono madaa remaa pagesa . Yesuna bi sogo-nane puala nogo-nane puala pisa-pulu pagesa . Goa pisa raburi onaa medalomame lalo : Jon Baptais-ri matmat gimoa wala rekesa-pulu go puri mua apo kogono pamu puaaya simi .
41006015	Goa simi pare onaa medalomame lalo : Go aare nipuna bi Elaija simi . Medalomame page lalo : Nipuri Gote-na agaa lakene aa abade pirisa yaade simi .
41006016	Goa simi pare Herot-me pagoa gupa sa : Neme Jon-na aalu kepesu pare wala rekaade kone salo sa .
41006017	Abadere Herot-me nipuna ore Herodias-na agaa pagoa Jon opeme adia kalabus ada mapatasa . Go aa mudumiri nipuna ame Filip-na ore Herodias paake yolo pirisa .
41006018	Go kone isa-pulu Jon-me oro yaalo Herot gupa lakesa : Rekena ia-ga nena amena ore nayola pe sa .
41006019	Goa sa raburi Herot-na oreme Jon-para wae kone sua tulalo pisa pare mada dia .
41006020	Goa pisa pare Jon epe kone su redepo ne aa pirisa-pulu Herot-me nipu madaa paala omoa kalabus ada epe-rupa surubisa . Herot-me Jon-na agaa pagesa rabu nipu kone laapo isa .
41006021	Goa pisa pare ore Herodias-me kone meda isa . Nipuna aani Herot-na agimi nipu madini di ipisa rabu eta yawo kiritasimi . Ora nipuna gavman aanu-para soldia aanu-para Galili suna aa mudunu rayo epa kiritasimi .
41006022	Goa pisa raburi Herodias-na wane ipua Herot-na yaane aanu-para epa pirina yaasa pabesa rabu raana omesimi . Goa pisa rabu Herot aa mudu ya-pulu nogo-para lalo : Nena kone ake ya ? Agaa meali yae madaa gialua .
41006023	Goa pisa rabu Herot-me nogo-para makuaa loa gupa lakesa : Neme agaa meali rabu ake yae gialua . Nina adaa su rikiraana rumaawa oyaeyae adaapu gialua sa .
41006024	Goa sa raburi nogome agi piri pua lalo : Ake lano ya ? Agimi nogo lakeloa lalo : Jon-re baptais mi aa yaade nipuna aalu kepea meaina .
41006025	Goa pisa rabu nogome aa mudu piri-para aipapulu pua agaa mulalo gupa sa : Neme Jon-na aalu plet madaa sua giaina .
41006026	Goa sa raburi aa mudumi Jon odome omesa . Yapare ada makuaa agaa lo lakesa-pulu nipuna wamo pi aanu pirua adesimi-pulu neme nagimalua kone isa .
41006027	Goa pisa raburi aa mudumi soldia-para lalo : Jon-na aalu pua kepea sa . Gore mo polis nipu kalabus ada-para pua Jon-na aalu kepisa .
41006028	Kepisa rabu plet madaa sua wane kasa rabu wanemere nipuna agi kasa .
41006029	Goa pisa raburi disaipel aanumi pagoa ipua Jon-na ro ria pua rogaasimi .
41006030	Goa puare disaipel aanumi Yesu piri-para wala ipua Herot-na kogono pisa-rupa agaa epa lakesimi .
41006031	Go rabu onaa adaapu epala puala pisimi-pulu Yesu-para disaipel aanu page eta nanisimi . Goa pea-ga Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa-para lalo : Go su gimoa onaa napiri su-para pua kitu mada piramina sa .
41006032	Goa pisa rabu nimu ipunu madaa pirua onaa napiri su-para pisimi .
41006033	Yapare pisimi raburi onaa adaapumi nimu waru adesimi . Goa pua onaanumi adaarenu gimoa pora-nia pisimi . Goa pua go onaanumi Yesu ipunu madaa abi napenaloa nimuna piri-para aba epa kiritasimi .
41006034	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi ipunu gimoa onaa adaapu adesa rabu nipuna pu robaa-para odome omesa . Go onaanu ora sipsip mena-rupa pa pirina yapare nimuna puni aanu napimi-daa odome omesa . Goa pua go rabu nipumi agaa adaapu mogeasa .
41006035	Gore ora aebo rabu Yesuna disaipel aanumi ipua nipu-para lalo : Go su-para onaa ora dia ta .
41006036	Abia ribaa tea-ga onaanu ada o taape . Goa pua nimuna eta kabola penaalo o taape .
41006037	Goa simi pare Yesumi lalo : Nimina nimu eta katapape . Goa sa pare nimumi Yesu-para lalo : Niaame bret kabolalo palimare mone minare maali padane kogono pua mada kaboa mea katema ya ?
41006038	Goa simi rabu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimina bret akepu raapo ya ? Pua adalepa . Nimumi adoa gupa simi : Bret ipa supu-para ena ipa laapo ia simi .
41006039	Goa pisimi rabu Yesumi lalo : Nimu go-pare ripu yamala madaa mapiraatepape .
41006040	Yesumi gupa sa raburi go-para ona 100-pela kiritaawa pirala meda-para onaa gupa 50-pela kiritaawa piraa-mama pu pirisimi . Gore rado rado rayo gupa pirisimi .
41006041	Goa pisa rabu Yesumi bret supu-para ena laapo mua yaa-para adasaawa Gote-para ora pi sa . Goa loa bret piribia disaipel aanumi onaanu rumaainalo kasa . Go ena laapo page Yesumi onaa rumaainalo kasa .
41006042	Goa pisa rabu nimumi ora eta mada no pirisimi .
41006043	No kiritinaloa disaipel aanumi eta ebo yarepea basket 12-pela madu isimi .
41006044	Goa pisa rabu aa adaapu gupa 5,000-pela eta nisimi .
41006045	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa-para lalo : Ipunu madaa piralepape . Nimi ipa mone pane Betsaida su aba pulupape . Gore disaipel aanu nimu penaaloa Yesumi onaa rayo mea repaatalo pisa .
41006046	Yesumi onaa pawa pulupape lo lakeloa so rudu madaa beten ta pisa .
41006047	Goa pua ora ribaa yabaasa raburi ipunu ipa ini madaa saabaina Yesu agu raapo so rudune pirisa .
41006048	Go raburi disaipel aanumi ipunu yola mua ipa apea kitu pirisimi rabu Yesumi nimu adesa . Po ripu nimu polalo pisimi-nane ipisa-pulu kitu pirisimi . Gore yapi pode talo pisa raburi Yesu nimu piri-para ipa masaana ipisa . Yesuna konere nimuna ipunu gimoa mogo-nane pa pisa .
41006049	Goa pisa pare ipa masaa-nane pamualaina nimumi Yesu ora pa remo meda kone sua pogolasaawa yaasimi .
41006050	Yaasimi rabu nimumi adoa paala omesimi . Paala omesimi-pulu nipumi nimu-para lalo : Paala naomalepape . Ni Yesu yaade sa .
41006051	Goa pisa raburi Yesu nimuna ipunu ru-nane pirina po ripu loraasa . Goa pisa raburi nimu pogolasaawa paalame omesimi .
41006052	Gore disaipel aanumi bret-na kogonona re naniminaasimi . Dia , nimuna robaa-para go konena re ora namakuaasimi .
41006053	Goa pisa raburi nimu ipa mone pane pua Genesaret su opapaawa ipunu adibasimi .
41006054	Nimumi ipunu gimisimi rabu onaanumi Yesuna ini agaa waru adesimi .
41006055	Go rabu nimu su rayona aipapulu pisimi . Wala ipisimi raburi Yesu piri-para yaina ome onaanu reke madaa ria ipisimi .
41006056	Goa pua orope Yesu ora oge su-paranu adaare-paranu emaapu-paranu go su rayo-para pamisa rabu onaanumi yaina ome onaa kiritae maket amaa ria ipisimi . Goa pua nimumi Yesuna mamina aane madaa oraamonalo ogesimi . Gupa oraainaloa nimuna yaina rayo maepeaasa .
41007001	Goa pisa raburi Farisi aanu rekena agaa tisaanu page Jerusalem su-para gimoa Yesu piri kiritasimi .
41007002	Kiritasimi raburi disaipel aa medaloma eta nolalo pirua nimuna ki amulu pimi nisimi-daa kiritae aanumi ado pirisimi .
41007003	Gore Farisi aanu page Juda aanu page eta nolalore ki aba radepisimi . Nimuna akuana kone mogeaatalo ki radepeteme .
41007004	Go page go Farisi aanumi maket-para kabeme eta aba radepeteme . Goa pua nimuna pora meda rado rado page ratisimi . Kone medare nimumi kopo-nupara plet-nupara kap-nupara rayo radepeteme .
41007005	Goa pea-ga Farisi aa page rekena agaa tisaanu page Yesu agaa mulalo pisimi : Akeane nena disaipel aanumi nimumi akuana kone namogeteme pae ? Nimuna kina oto pi yae naradepeaawa amulu pimi eta neme simi .
41007006	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimi ora makirae aanu pimi . Go madaare Gote-na agaa lakene aa Aisaia-me pepa madaa gupa tisa : Go onaanuna agaamere nina bi minasaaeme pare nimuna robaa-para ni madaa kone naimi .
41007007	Go onaanumi pa aanuna kone mogeteme pare ora Gote-na rekena agaa page pa teme . Goa teme-pulu nimumi naa bi mada naminasaaeme . Yesumi Aisaia-na agaa gupa lakesa .
41007008	Goa pua Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimi Gote-na rekena agaa gimoa yapare akuana kone mogeteme .
41007009	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimina kone ratulalo peme rabu kudiri kone sua Gote-na rekena agaa gimeme .
41007010	Moses-me aba gupa sa : Nimina agi aaraa lapona agaa pagoa bi minasaatepape sa . Onaa rayome agi aaraa-para wae agaa teme-daare nimu ora tu maomalimi sa .
41007011	Moses-me gupa sa pare nimimi gupa simi : Onaa rayome agi aaraanu-para lalo : mone neme saayore Gote madaa imaa niti pua saato . Goa pea-ga ama aapa naraba mealua teme .
41007012	
41007013	Goa peme-ga nimimi nimina akuanuna agaa pagoa rateme raburi Gote-na agaa rasitimi . Goa puare nimimi kogono go-rupa adaapu pa peme sa .
41007014	Goa pisa rabu Yesumi onaa adaapu wala yaaloa saa agaame lalo : Nimi rayo pagalepape .
41007015	Nimimi epe eta nalimi rabu go etame nimi-daa mada nabebolalia . Dia , pare nimina robaa-para i koneme nimi maoyaalia .
41007016	Onaa rayome go agaana re niminaaba piralimiri waru pagalepape .
41007017	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi onaa gimoa ada-para epenaloa disaipel aanumi saa agaana re madaa agaa mulalo pisimi .
41007018	Goa pua Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimimi nimu-rupa pirua kone naimi . Nimi ora pagalepape . Onaanumi eta nalimi-daare go nape yaeme nimu mada namaoyaalia .
41007019	Dia-ga go etare onaana kone-para nasalia pare robaa-para pua i tapa-para pea sa . Yesumi goa sare nape eta rayore ora epe ta loa sa .
41007020	Yesumi wala lalo : Onaanuna robaa-para i koneme pupitagi manaalia .
41007021	Gore onaanuna robaa-para i kone sua gupa peme : ona paake yolape-para paake nape kone-para aa tu maomape kone sua peme .
41007022	Go page aanumi ona rasini meape kone-para oyae madaa epame omape kone-para waea pape kone rayo peme . Go page makirae kone-para wae yalame omape kone-para wae udipa kone-para onaanuna bi rabuaniaape kone-para aa tape kone-para pa maeyae kone page ora go rayo robaa-para kone imi .
41007023	Go wae kone rayore kone-para sua onaa maoyaaya . Yapare eta nape yaeme gupa-daa napea sa .
41007024	Goa pua Yesu go su gimoa kimisu Tair adaare-para pisa . Goa pisa raburi nipu ada meda-para odobaawa yapare onaanu nalakesa . Nalakesa pare nimuna pa makuaasimi .
41007025	Gore wae remo piri nogo medana agimi Yesu pia remaa pagesa . Goa pua nipu Yesuna kibu re-para ipua rumu koba pua pirisa .
41007026	Mogo nogona agiri Siria adaare Fonisia oname madisa . Gore nipu Yesumi mo nogo-para pia remo rakepeainalo ogesa .
41007027	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi Juda aanuna pora madaa kone sua saa agaame gupa sa : Gore aba niaame nogo naaki eta kalamina . Nogo naakina eta mua yana katemare epe kone-daa dia sa .
41007028	Yapare mo oname Yesu gupa lakesa : Aa Mudu , ora lae pare reke rolo-para piri yananumi nogo naakina eta ebo neme .
41007029	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Gupa lae-ga nena ada-para wala pu . Wae remore nena nogo gimoa puade sa .
41007030	Goa pua no agimi ada pua ru-nane odobaawa nipuna nogo reke madaa epe-rupa pirina adesa . Go nogo piri wae remo rakepea pane pisa .
41007031	Goa pisa raburi Yesu Tair su-nane gimoa ipa Galili su-para wala pisa . Pamisa rabu nipu adaa su robo Saidon ru-nane pamua adaare Dekapolis-para page pisa .
41007032	Goa pisa raburi onaa medalomame aane poa agaa maare aa Yesu piri-para mea ipisimi . Mea ipua Yesumi go yaina ae aa-na to madaa oraainalo ogesimi .
41007033	Yesumi mo aa mua onaa napiri su-para mea pua kimi aane-para sua sope roa mo aa-na eke oraasa .
41007034	Oraasa rabu Yesu yaa-para adasaawa sana odome omoa komo misa . Go rabu mo aa-para lalo : Lobape sa . Yapare Yesuna adaa agaame : Efata sa .
41007035	Goa sa raburi mo aa-na aane malobaawa eke maepeaawa agaa epe-rupa malaasa .
41007036	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi onaanu-para agaa natapape sa . Yapare natapape lo lakesa raburi nimumi puri paboa lakesimi .
41007037	Apo remaa pagesimi onaanumi Yesumi goa pisa-daa ora paalame omoa kidipaa ragi tua lalo : Mogo aame oyae rayo epe-rupa pea . Aane poae aa page agaa maare aa page nipumi epe-rupa maperekeaaya simi .
41008001	Gore orope onaa adaapu epa kiritasimi . Orope nimuna eta dia sa rabu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para yaaloa lalo :
41008002	Go onaanu yapi repome ni raapu piraama pare eta naname-pulu ni odome omalo .
41008003	Neme nimuna adaa penaatoare reae pua pora-nia lopalimi . Onaa medalomare pora adaalu-para epame .
41008004	Nipuna disaipel aanumi nipu-para lalo : Gore go suri onaa napimi-ga niaa aa-para pua bret kaboa nimu rumaalima ya ?
41008005	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimina bret akepu raapo ia ? Nimumi lalo : 7-pela ia simi .
41008006	Go rabu Yesumi onaa rayo su madaa mapiraasa . Goa pua Yesumi bret 7-pela mua Gote-para ora pi loa sana piribia nipuna disaipel aanu kasa . Yesumi kanaloa nimumi muare onaa rumaawa kata pisimi . Goa pua disaipel aanumi rumaasimi .
41008007	Goa pisimi raburi disaipel aanuna ena ogepusi page madu isimi . Go page Yesumi mua sana ora pi loa onaa-para rumaatepape .
41008008	Goa pisa raburi nimu eta ora waru no pirisimi . Eta nabenaloa ebore basket 7-pela yarepea madu isimi .
41008009	Go raburi onaanuri 4,000 pirisimi .
41008010	Goa pua orope Yesumi nimu rapaasa . Pisimi raburi Yesu page nipuna disaipel aanu page ipunu madaa pirua Dalmanuta su robo ru-nane pisimi .
41008011	Go-para pirina Farisi aanu medalomame Yesu piri-para ipua arere pisimi . Nimumi Yesu ko tulalo ipua napiaa kogono mada pali yapalo lakesimi . Go adalimare Gote-me puri ne guaaya-daa niminaalima simi .
41008012	Goa simi pare Yesumi nipuna pu robaame komo mu rubua gupa sa : Akeane go padane rabu onaanumi napiaa kogono asapeme pae ? Ni ora lalo : Nimimi ora mada na-adalimina sa .
41008013	Goa pua nipumi go onaanu gimoa ipunu madaa pirua disaipel aanu raapu ipa mone pane kenaasimi .
41008014	Gore ipa mone pane pisimi pare disaipel aanumi kone rugulaawa bret namea isimi . Go kone rugulaawa nimumi bret ipa padane agu ipunu-para mea isimi .
41008015	Go rabu Yesumi saa agaame nimu-para lalo : Pagalepape . Farisi aanu-para Herot-para nimuna bret ma-adaa yaape yis waru adalepape .
41008016	Yesumi goa sa raburi nimumi gupa lala pirisimi : Niaa bret naima simi .
41008017	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi nimu adoa mua nimu-para lalo : Niaa bret naima teme-ga akolo teme pae ? Nimi abi naniminaaeme ? Nimi kone naimi ?
41008018	Nimina inimiri na-ademe ? Nimina aaneme agaa napageme ? Gore nimimi kone rugulaeme pae ?
41008019	Neme bret supu piribia onaa adaapu gupa 5,000-pela giawade raburi nu eta ebonu akepu raapo yarepea madu isimi ya ? Nimumi 12-pela simi .
41008020	Goa simi rabu Yesumi wala lalo : Go page onaa adaapu gupa 4,000-pela bret 7-pela giawade raburi nu akepu raapo yare pea madu isimi ya ? Go rabu nimumi 7-pela madu isima simi .
41008021	Goa simi raburi Yesumi nimu lakesa : Goa pawade pare abiare naniminaaeme ?
41008022	Goa pua nimu Betsaida su-para pisimi . Go rabu onaa medalomame ini rubu pi aa Yesu piri-para mea ipua lalo : Go aa oraape lo ogesimi .
41008023	Goa pua Yesumi ini rubu pi aa-na ki mua ada gaa-nane lamua pisa . Goa pisa raburi Yesumi mo aa-na ini-para sope rapiaawa ki tone oraawa agaa misa : Ne oyae ade pae ?
41008024	Goa sa raburi mo aame adoa lalo : Neme aa adalo pare nimu pamualeme raburi repena nona pea .
41008025	Goa sa rabu Yesumi nipuna ini wala oraainaloa waru perekea adesa . Adesa raburi mo aame oyae rayo pa epe-rupa adesa .
41008026	Goa pua Yesumi mo aa penalo repaawa lalo : Nena ada puare adaare-para wala napope sa .
41008027	Goa pua Yesu nipuna disaipel aanu raapu Sisaria Filipai su lapo-nane pamisimi . Pamisimi raburi Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para agaa gupa misa : Onaanumi ni aapi teme ?
41008028	Nimumi nipu-para lalo : Gore onaa medalomame nere Jon Baptais teme . Medalomame nere Gote-na agaa lakene aa Elaija teme . Medalomame nere Gote-na agaa lakene aa meda teme .
41008029	Goa pua Yesumi nimu-para wala lalo : Ora lae pare nimimi ni aapi kone imi ? Pita-me nipu-para lalo : Ne ora Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si Krais yaade sa .
41008030	Goa sa raburi Yesumi nimu-para onaa rayo nalaketapape sa .
41008031	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi nimu gupa mogeasa : Ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si radaa waru no piralua . Gore kone makuaae aanumi page Gote-na miru irape aa mudunu page rekena agaa tisaanu page nimu rayome ni gimalimi . Nimumi ni Yesu tu maomalimi pare yapi repo dia naloa wala rekalua . Yesumi agaa gupa mogeasa .
41008032	Yesumi nimu-para apo agaana re waru lakesa . Goa sa rabu Pita-me Yesu-para lalo : Ne talimi agaa gupa nalape sa .
41008033	Goa sa pare Yesumi pereke tua nipuna disaipel aanu adesa rabu Pita-para ratu yawoa lalo : Ne Satan-na kone ia-ga nemere ni gimape . Ne Gote-na kone nai pare ne su amaanuna kone i sa .
41008034	Goa puare Yesumi onaanu page disaipel aanu page yaaloa lakesa : Oropere onaa rayome ni rata mea epalimi-daare repena polopeana kedaa rua nimuna kone gimoa ni rata mea ipulupape sa .
41008035	Onaa rayome nimuna yogane surubalimi-daare oro yaalo alupalimi . Pare onaa rayome ni madaa page epe agaa madaa nimuna kone gimalimi-daare oro yaalo piralimi .
41008036	Pa aa medame su rayona mone yoto mealia pare nipuna kone wasupa gimaliare go kone epe ta ? Dia sa .
41008037	Goa pua go aame kone wasupa ora wala mada mealia ya ? Mada dia sa .
41008038	Goa pea-ga abia go pupitagi no Gote gimape di rabu onaa rayome ni-para epe agaa lapo masaa rilalimi-daare neme nimu page gimalua . Oropere ni onaa Raapu Pirape Aare epe ensel-nupara Aapana epe puri raapu epalua-ga go rabu gimalua sa .
41009001	Goa pua Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para onaanu medaloma-para page lalo : Neme nimi-para ora lalo : Go-para pimi onaa medaloma naomalimi pare nimumi aba Gote-na Surube Su-na puri mea epaliade adalimi sa .
41009002	Wala yapi oraapu dia naloa Yesu-para Pita-para Jems-para Jon-para nimu padane-para so rudu madaa pisimi . Gore Yesumi to rado aawa pisa-daa adesimi .
41009003	Goa pisimi raburi nipuna mamina-nu yaako pua lepo lepo atasa . Go yaako pu tisa rabu mamina rayo yaako pisa-rupare aa meda mada napia-rupa pisa .
41009004	Goa pisa rabu Elaija page Moses page ipua sipina Yesu raapu agaa epa sipi .
41009005	Goa pua Pita-me Yesu-para lalo : Tisaa , niaa go-para pimare epe ta . Pokaalo ada repo pamina . Medare nena medare Moses-na medare Elija-na wariamina .
41009006	Gore Pita nimu page paala omoa ake teme pae kone isimi-pulu apo agaa sa .
41009007	Go rabu moae medame naare maudinae ru-para pirisimi . Go yaa-para moae raapu agaa gupa pagesimi : Gore ora nina epe Si . Neme nipu madaa pedo pi . Nipuna agaa pagalepape sa .
41009008	Goa sa raburi disaipel aanumi aipapulu pereke tua adesimi pare Yesu padane adesimi .
41009009	Nimu pore kilipisimi raburi Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Onaa meda-para nimimi abia adamede yaere remaa natapape . Ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aana Siri aba matmat-para madaa rekalua .
41009010	Nimumi nipuna agaa pagesimi pare nimuna agaa gupa lo pirisimi : Go agaa ni matmat-para rekalua agaare ake agaa ya ?
41009011	Goa pua nimumi Yesu-para lalo : Rekena agaa tisaanumi gupa teme : Elija-me oyae managola sua aba epena teme . Go agaana re ake ya ?
41009012	Goa simi raburi Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Elija-re oyae rayo amege pulalo aba epalia . Goa pea pare Gote-na buk madaare Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si niri radaa aba waru no piralua . Goa pua onaanumi ni gimalimi . Go agaana re niminaaeme ?
41009013	Yapare neme nimi lagialo : Elaija aba ipisa pare go rabu onaanumi nimuna wae kone sua pirisimide sa . Gote-na buk madaare Elaija tulalo peme lagisa .
41009014	Gore Yesu-para disaipel aanu ipa repo wala disaipel aa medaloma raapu kiritaawa onaa adaapu adesimi . Go rabu disaipel aa medalomame rekena agaa tisaanu-para agaa lape arere pisimi .
41009015	Go pirisimi onaanumi Yesu adoa paala omoare aipapulu ipua ki kasimi .
41009016	Kasimi raburi Yesumi nimu-para agaa gupa misa : Ake madaa arere pu pimi ?
41009017	Go agaa misa rabu go onaa adaapuna rikiraana pirisa aame lalo : Tisaa , nina naaki ne piri-para mea epawa . Go naaki madaa remo pia-pulu agaa maarea .
41009018	Remome naaki yolo ria pea rabu malopaawa agaa yarua rako sope madu to puri pata sa . Neme disaipel aa-para maepeaape lawade pare nimu mada dia lamede .
41009019	Goa sa raburi Yesumi onaanu-para lalo : Nimiri epe agaa rasini onaa pimi . Ni nimi-para oro di akepu raapo pa piralua ya ? Neme nimi-para rana akepu raapo kogono waatoa ya ? Go naaki mea ipu .
41009020	Go lakenaloa naaki Yesu piri mea ipisimi . Remome Yesu adesa raburi naaki mapururu mapaawa naaki su amaa malopaasa . Goa pua pereke pereke lalaawa rako sope madisa .
41009021	Go pisa raburi Yesumi go naakina aaraa-para lalo : Go yaina maali akepu raapo ia ? Aaraame lalo : Oge naaki pirisa rabu pisa .
41009022	Remome go naaki tulalore repena sulaa-para page ipa-para page mea malopaawa yogane maoyaatalo pea . Goa pea pare neme niaa madaa odome omoa raba meali palo maarea .
41009023	Goa sa rabu Yesumi lalo : Neme mada palua palo maarea lae ya ? Aa medame naa agaa robaa-para madiaalimiri oyae rayo ora mada palua .
41009024	Goa sa raburi aaraame aipapulu yaaloa robaa-para agaa namaditu-ga ni raba meape sa .
41009025	Gore Yesu onaa rayome nipu epa kiritaawa kuta pubasimi adesa-pulu wae remo-para puri pane agaa gupa sa : Ne aane poae agaa maare ne wae remore neme puri pane agaa lagialo : Mo aa nipu rakepea nipu-para wala naepa pirape sa .
41009026	Goa sa raburi mo remome e loa naaki mapururu pawa pisa . Goa pisa raburi mo naakina to kogore sa-daa onaa medalomame lalo : Nipu ini adupiaade simi .
41009027	Yapare Yesumi nipuna ki mua marekaasa . Goa pisa raburi rekatabisa .
41009028	Yesu ada-para wala pisa raburi disaipel aanumi onaa napimi rabu agaa mulalo pisimi : Akeane niaana aba mada nama-rakepeaarima pae simi .
41009029	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Remo gupianere beten-me agu mada marakepaalia . Kone oyae medalomame mada dia sa .
41009030	Nimumi go su gimoa Galili su robo ru-nane pamisimi . Pamisimi pare onaanumi nipu wala mada na-adalimilo Yesumi nimu nalakesa .
41009031	Nipumi disaipel aanu agaa rado mogeasa-pulu kaleda pirisimi . Nipumi gupa mogeasa : Ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri orope iaanumi tinalo mea kateme sa . Tinaloa wala yapi repo dia naloa rekalua sa .
41009032	Goa sa pare disaipel aanumi nipuna agaana re naniminaasimi . Goa pisimi pare paala omesimi-pulu agaa meda namisimi .
41009033	Go rabu nimu su Kapaneam-para pisimi . Go rabu Yesumi ada pua pirua nimu-para agaa gupa misa : Niaa pora puamade raburi ake madaa arere pame ya ?
41009034	Goa sa pare nimumi agaa meda nasimi-para pora-nia pulaawa aapi ora aa mudu pirua yapae arere pisimi .
41009035	Go rabu Yesu nipu pirua disaipel aa 12-pela ipulupa sa . Nipumi nimu-para lalo : Aa medame ni riri-nane aba piralua kone saliare gore nena kone gimoa onaa rayo raba meape aa aba pirape .
41009036	Go sa raburi Yesumi naaki meda ipu loare nimu piri rikiraana mea mapiraasa . Go rabu nipumi go naaki upia sana nimu-para lalo :
41009037	Onaa rayome go nogo naakinu padane epe-rupa mua raba mealimi-daare ni page go kone salimi . Onaa rayome ni epe-rupa mua mealimi-daare nimumi ni mea o taae Aapa page mealimi sa .
41009038	Jon-me Yesu-para lalo : Tisaa , aa medame nena bimi aa medana wae remo pane mea rakepeaaria . Goa paa pare niaa raapu napima-ga niaame goa napape lama .
41009039	Goa sa pare Yesumi lalo : Nipu namagimaape . Aa medame naa bi-para napiaa palia-daare orope nipumi ni madaa wae agaa mada natea .
41009040	Gore onaa rayome niaa madaa iaa na-aulaliare gore niaana adami aa pitimi .
41009041	Pagalepa . Onaa rayome nimi ni Krais-na nogo naakinu adoa epe nape ipa gialimi-daare nimuna epe yoto waru mealimi sa .
41009042	Go oge nogo naaki meda ni madaa kone rulalimi-daare onaa medame nimuna kone rulae bebolaliare ora o ta . Bebolalia-daare go onaana maa-para adaa aana madu mudiaawa ipa-para lopaliare ora epe ta .
41009043	Yesumi saa agaa gupa sa : Gore nena kimi ne pupitagi manaaliare mea kepe poape . Ki kepene aa-rupa pirali-daare epe ta pare epe ki lapo paina wae repena sulaa-para piraliri ora o ta sa .
41009044	Go adaa repena sulaa-parare onaana eteto piri yaenu naomea mo repena sulaa pa ralaina .
41009045	Nena aame ne pupitagi manaaliare go page nena aa kepe poape . Go sune aa ruguloa piraliri gore epe ta . Goa pea-ga epe aa lapo rata paina pirua wala repena sulaa-para piraliri ora o ta .
41009046	Go adaa repena sulaa-para onaana eteto piri yaenu repena sulaa-para ralalia .
41009047	Go page nena inimi ne pupitagi manaaliare rasu rubape . Gore ini kalae rubu pi aa-rupa pirua Gote-na Surube Su pua adali-daare epe ta . Goa pea pare epe ini laapo pa apalae pirina repena sulaa-para mea rubalimiri ora o yalia .
41009048	Go adaa repena sulaa-parare onaana eteto piri yaenu naomalia pare repena sulaa pa roalia .
41009049	Gore onaanumi pagalepa : Repena sulaare ora puri ia-rupa page aipa puri ia-rupa page nimimi Gote-na puri pane agaa pagoa waea pape kone rabuaniaatepape .
41009050	Sol-re ora epe ta pare nipuna rede dia yalia rabu wala ake palima ya ? Nimina aipa-rupa rede masaawa robaa-para kuma mapaawa onaa raapu epe-rupa piralepape sa .
41010001	Yesu go su gimoa Judia su robo ru-nane pua ipa Jordan mone pane kenaawa pisa . Go rabu onaa adaapumi nipu piri-para wala epa kiritasimi . Goa pisimi raburi nipuna pisa-rupa onaanu wala lakesa .
41010002	Goa pisa raburi Farisi aanumi Yesu ko tulalo ipua makirae agaa gupa lakesimi : Gore niaana rekena agaa madaare aa medame ore gimalia-daare go kone epe ta simi .
41010003	Goa simi raburi Yesumi nimu agaa gupa misa : Moses-me nimi-para ake lagisa ya ?
41010004	Yesumi goa sa rabu nimumi lalo : Aa medame ona gimalia-daare Moses-me go aame pepa mada rugutepe lakesa .
41010005	Goa simi pare Yesumi agaa gupa misa : Nimimi agaa waru napageme-ga Moses-me pepa madaa agaa mana go-rupa gisa .
41010006	Pare aba su yaa laapo warisa raburi Gote-me ona aa laapo warisa .
41010007	Goa pisa-pulu aa medame nipuna aaraa agi gimoa nipuna ore raapu ora padane-rupa piralepape .
41010008	Goa pua nipu laapo dia yapare ora padane piralipina .
41010009	Goa pua Gote-me repaaya padane mapiraasa-pulu aa medame mada narugulatepape sa .
41010010	Gore nimu ada-para wala pua disaipel aanumi Yesu mo ona rasini madaa wala agaa misimi .
41010011	Goa pua Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Aa medame nipuna ore gimoa ona rado meda rumaalia-daare go aame ona paake lami ona mapiraalia .
41010012	Go page oname aani gimoa aa meda palia-daare go oname page nipuna aa paake rume kone sua palia sa .
41010013	Onaa medaloma Yesumi nogo naaki kimi oraainalo nipu piri-para mea ipisimi . Yapare nipuna disaipel aanumi mo onaanu-para ape simi .
41010014	Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanuna kone adoa nipumi ratu yawoa nimu-para lalo : Nogo naaki ni piri-para mea epenawa . Gote-na Surube Su-parare nogo naaki-rupa piralimi-daa mealimina .
41010015	Pagalepa . Onaa rayome Gote-na Surube Su adolalo pimiri nimu aba nogo naakina kone mada mua adalimi sa .
41010016	Goa sa raburi Yesumi no go naaki upiaawa kimi oraawa epe raba mi agaa lakesa .
41010017	Yesu pora wala polalo pisa rabu aa meda aipapulu ipua Yesu madaa rumu koba pua agaa mulalo : Epe Tisaa , ni oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama pope kone mulalore ake palua pae ?
41010018	Goa sa raburi Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Gote nipu padane ora epe ta-ga akeane ni epe aa lae ya ?
41010019	Ne Gote-na rekena i agaa napage ? Go-rupa ia : Neme onaa meda natu maomape . Ona meda paake nayolape . Neme paake nanape . Onaa-para yaa agaa nalape . Onaa medana oyae mulalo makirae agaa nalape . Nena ama aapa laapona bi minasaawa agaa waru pagalepape .
41010020	Go raburi nipumi Yesu-para lalo : Tisaa , go rekena agaa rayore ni oge naaki rabu page abia page pago mogeto sa .
41010021	Go rabu Yesumi nipu-para raana omoa adoba sua gupa sa : Ne kone padane nai . Nena oyaenu pua mua mone yoto mua onaa naraanu kala . Go rabu so yaa-para epe yae meaina-ga ni rata mea epape .
41010022	Yesumi goa sa raburi go aa-na oyaeyae adaapu isa-pulu nipuna ini agaa adaniaawa kedaame omoa pisa .
41010023	Goa pisa raburi Yesu pereke tua nipuna disaipel aanu adoa nimu-para lalo : Aa amopere Gote-na Surube Su polalore ora kalai peme .
41010024	Goa sa-pulu disaipel aanumi paalame omesimi . Yapare Yesumi nimu-para saa agaame wala lalo : Naa naakinu-ga waru pagalepape . Onaa rayome Gote-na Surube Su adolalo peme pare kedaa waru pea sa .
41010025	Gore kamel menare noi kego-para palia yaalore kalai napea . Yapare aa amope Gote-na Surube Su-para polalore kamel menana kalai maoge yaalia .
41010026	Goa sa raburi disaipel aanumi pogolasaawa gupa lala pirisimi : Gore aapimi mada oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palia ya ?
41010027	Yesumi nimu waru adabaawa lalo : Onaanumiri yae medaloma mada napalimi . Yapare Gote-mere onaa raba meape kogono rayo mada pea .
41010028	Go rabu Pita-me Yesu-para lalo : Ada , niaame oyae rayo gimoa ne rata mea epame .
41010029	Yesumi nimu lakesa : Ni ora lae-daa pagalo . Onaa rayomere nimuna ada page ame page baani page ama aapa page nogo naaki page su page ni-para epe agaa-para ratulalo gimalia-daare nipu yago tu yoto waru mealimi . Goa pua abiare nimumi ora adanu page amenu page baaninu page amanu page nogo naakinu page yoto rado rulatabena mealimi . Goa pea pare kedaa raapu mealimi sa . Goa pua orope kagaa su-para oro yaalo piralimi sa .
41010030	
41010031	Onaa adaapu abia riri-nane pimi pare go onaanuri orope masaa-nane piralimi . Goa pua abia orope piri onaanuri aba riri-nane piralimi .
41010032	Nimu so Jerusalem su-para pora pamisimi . Goa pua Yesu aba pisa rabu disaipel aanumi paala omesimi . Go onaa medaloma nimu raapu pamisimi rabu nimu page paala omesimi . Go rabu nipumi disaipel aa 12-pela mo-nane ogesi pua nimu-para orope epaliade yae madaa agaa lakesa .
41010033	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Gore niaa so Jerusalem su-para baina . Go-parare pa onaanumi Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudunu page Gote-na agaa ne tisaanu page nimumi ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri lamu mealimi . Go rabu go aanumi tu maomape koso agaa laketeme rabu ruru radome lamu mealimi .
41010034	Go raburi nimumi ni-para ero loa sope rapiaawa repena unimi tu maomalimi sa . Go palimi pare yapi repo dia naloa wala rekalua sa .
41010035	Go rabu Sebedi-na si Jems Jon lapo Yesu piri-para ipua lalo . Tisaa , saame ne agaa mulalo pipa yaere neme ora painalo sipi .
41010036	Goa sipi raburi Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Gore nipina kone-para neme ake palua ya ?
41010037	Nipumi Yesu-para lalo : Goa pape . Nere nena epe pirape siaa king madaa pirua surube aa pirali rabu saa page pirapana . Meda nena popo ki-nane pirina meda nena koya ki-nane pirina sipi .
41010038	Yapare Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Nipi go siaa mulalo pape yaere nipi namakuaaepe . Naa ipa naluade pe ipa-rupa radaa raapu mada nalipi ya ? Niri baptais mealua-rupa nipiri go-rupa baptais mada mealipi ya ?
41010039	Nipu laapome nipu-para lalo : Saa mada sipi . Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Neme nalua ipa pere go-rupa mada nalipi . Go page nina mealua baptais go-rupa mada mealipi .
41010040	Go mada palipi pare nina popo ki-nane page koya ki-nane mapiraape konere neme agaa mada nalagialua . Go-para pirapere Aapa padaneme nipuna tea sa .
41010041	Gore disaipel aa medalomame go agaa pagoare mo ameaya Jems Jon laapo-para ratu yawesimi .
41010042	Goa pisimi-pulu Yesumi nimu rayo yaaloa lalo : Ruru radona aa mudunumi nimuna onaanu madaa puri paloa nimuna koneme peme . Nimumi go onaanu waru surubaeme .
41010043	Goa peme pare nimuna kone agaa namogealepape . Nimina padaneme aa mudu pirano kone salia-daare go aare nipu nimi aba raba mealia .
41010044	Go page nimina padane aba riri-nane polalore nipu aba kogono aa-rupa piralia .
41010045	Ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri onaanumi nina kogono paminalo naipisu pare onaa raba mulalo ipisude . Nina kone wasupame onaanuna wae kone mea rubatalo ipisude .
41010046	Nimu Jeriko su-para ipisimi . Gore Yesu page nipuna disaipel aanu page onaanu page Jeriko su gimisimi raburi aa meda Bartimeus-miri pora aane-nane pirisa . Go aare ini rubu pi aa pirua mone ogetalo pirisa . Nipuna aaraare Timias yaade .
41010047	Gore mo aare nipu Nasaret su-para piri aa Yesu epaa remaa pagesa-pulu nipumi gupa yaasa : Yesu-ya , Devit-na si-ya . Ni odome omape .
41010048	Goa sa raburi onaa medalomame nipu ratu yawoa agaa nalape simi . Goa simi pare nipu ora puri paloa wala yaasa : Devit-na si ni odome omape .
41010049	Go rabu Yesumi pa aawa onaanu-para lalo : Go aa mea ipu lo lakesa . Nimimi ini rubu pi aa-para yaaloa lalo : Paala naomape . Ne yaata-ga reka pu simi .
41010050	Goa simi raburi mo aa mamina kolo rubua aipapulu rekoa Yesu piri pisa .
41010051	Goa pua Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Nena konere neme ne-para ake palua ya ? Ini rubu pi aame nipu-para lalo : Epe Tisaa , nina ini maepeaaina oyae adaluame pi .
41010052	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Abi pu . Nina agaa robaa-para maodaawa kone rulaari-pulu nena inimi oyae mada adali . Ora goa sa raburi mo aa-na ini epe sa rabu nipu Yesu rata mea pisa .
41011001	Goa pua nimu Rudu Oliv-na pora-nia ipua su Jerusalem su-na oge adaare su Betfasi-para su Betani laapo re-para ipisimi . Ipisimi rabu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa laapo mea rapaasa .
41011002	Go rabu nipumi nipu-para lalo : Mogo-nane su adaare-para pulupa . Go-parare donki mena meda adibaliare koloa mea ipulupape . Go donki menare nipuna masaana onaanu abi napiri .
41011003	Onaa medalomame ne-para go donki mena akeane mea pali pa temere goa tapape : Adaa Aame go menana kogono saliare wala gialia la tapape sa .
41011004	Goa sa raburi nimu pora pua donki mena meda adesimi . Go donki mena aba medana pora gaape uni-para aina repaasimi .
41011005	Go rabu go-para reko aasimi onaanumi nimu-para lalo : Akeane go mena iti kote ya ?
41011006	Goa simi raburi Yesuna sade agaa lakesimi . Goa pua nimumi pina mea pulupape simi .
41011007	Goa pua nimumi donki mena Yesu piri mea ipua nimuna mamina-nu mena masaana inaloa Yesu pirisa .
41011008	Goa pisa raburi onaame mamina-nu pora-nia rabolasimi . Medalomame maapu-nini repena palaa yo laapo poa pora-nia rabolabaama ipisimi .
41011009	Goa pua riri-nane onaanu-para aapu-nane ipisimide onaanumi page gupa yaasimi : Gote-na bi minasaamina . Go aare Gote-na bi madaa ipula-ga Gote-na adaa bi kalamina loa yaasimi :
41011010	Niaana akua Devit-na Surube Su epalia Gote-me puri kalaina . Gote-na bi minasaamina simi .
41011011	Goa pua Yesu Jerusalem su-para pua Juda aanuna epe lotu ada-para oyae adola pisa . Nipumi oyae adabaawa ribaa sa rabu nipu aa 12-pela raapu Betani su-para pisimi .
41011012	Goa pua wala ekeraa-nane Betani su-para aawa ipisimi raburi Yesu reame omesa .
41011013	Reame omesa raburi nipumi mo-para aaya repena fik-na yo adoare ini etea palo adola pisa . Go ini ratalo pisa raburi nipumi ini naetisa yo agu aasa adesa .
41011014	Goa adesa-pulu Yesumi repena-para agaa gupa lakesa : Nena ini meda ora mada namadiali . Goa sa raburi disaipel aanumi go agaa pagesimi .
41011015	Nimu Jerusalem su-para opapasimi rabu Yesu epe lotu ada ru-nane odobasa . Goa pua nipumi lotu ada-para bisnis rome pi aanu mea ratisa . Go rabu nipumi mone ropo pi aanuna reke lakepe rubebe pua oyae rome pi aanuna reke page pua lakepe rubebe pisa .
41011016	Goa puare onaanumi lotu ada ru-para oyae ritalo ipisimi rabu Yesumi rekena isa .
41011017	Goa pisa raburi nipumi nimu-para agaa moge riaawa lalo : Gote-na pepa madaa gupa tu isa : Su rayona piri onaanumi naa ada ora Gote-para beten lape ada tu isa . Yapare nimimi paake ne aanuna kaledape ada-rupa perekea ma-arimina sa .
41011018	Goa sa raburi Gote-na miru irae aa mudunumi page rekena tisaanumi page pagoa nimumi Yesu tu maomalima kone isimi . Goa pisimi pare onaa rayome Yesuna epe agaa madaa raana omoa pogolasaasimi-pulu go aanumi Yesu mada natisimi .
41011019	Ribaa Yesuna disaipel aanu raapu go adaare gimisimi .
41011020	Goa pua wala ekeraa-nane yapipu nimu pora-nia pisimi rabu nimumi mode repena fik aasa adesimi . Go adesimi raburi repena page no repena pitaa page aba kaapu saaya .
41011021	Goa pisa raburi Pita-me abade sade kone saapirua Yesu-para lalo : Tisaa ada , go yaina ape laede go repena fik ora kaapu ta .
41011022	Yesumi nimu-para agaa lakesa : Pagalepape . Gote-na agaa robaa-para kone rulaatepape . Nimimi mogo pore-para ne rekaawa ipa-para pua pogola teme-daare goa mada palia . Yapare agaa gupa teme rabu robaa-para kone laapo sua kone waru narulalimi-daare goa mada napalia .
41011023	
41011024	Goa pea-ga neme nimi-para lalo : Nimimi oyae mulalo beten teme rabu ora mealima kone rulalimi-daare oyae ora mada mealimi .
41011025	Go page nimi beten talore nimimi onaa meda madaa wae kone imiri mea rubatepape . Goa pua nimina so yaa-para pia Aapa nipumi page nimina pupitagi mea rubalia .
41011026	Yapare onaa medalomana pupitagi namea rubalimiri yaa-para pia Aapame abuna nimina pupitagi namea rubalia sa .
41011027	Goa pisa raburi nimu Jerusalem su-para wala pisimi . Yesu lotu ada-para pamualaina Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu page Gote-na agaa lae tisaanu page makuaae aanu page Yesu piri-para ipua lalo :
41011028	Gore aapina puri mua neme kogono pe simi . Go kogono pe-ga aapimi puri guaaya ?
41011029	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Neme page nimi-para agaa padane agaa mealuame pi . Agaa yago talimi rabu neme kogono pape puri aapimi gisare nimi madaa lagialua .
41011030	Agaa abutapa . Jon-re baptais meape lo puriri Gote-me kasa pae onaanumi kasimi pae ? Go agaa abutapa .
41011031	Goa sa raburi nimuna arere pisimi . Gore niaame Gote tema-daare nipumi akeane Jon-na agaa madaa kone narulaeme pae tea .
41011032	Yapare niaa aanumi puri kasa tema page mada dia . Goa simiri nimumi onaanu madaa paalame omoa simi . Gore onaa rayome Jon ora Gote-na agaa lakene aa pirisa-daa kone rulaeme-pulu mo aanu paalame omesimi .
41011033	Goa pua nimumi Yesu-para agaa gupa lakesimi : Niaa maarea simi . Goa simi-pulu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Gupa teme-ga aapina puri mua kogono pere nimi page nalagialua sa .
41012001	Go raburi Yesumi nimu-para saa agaa meda gupa sa : Aa medame nipuna wain ini maapu poasa . Go rabu nipumi kepo waru pua naaku pu sua ini igipi sape warisa . Goa puare nipumi surubape ada meda warisa . Goa pua nipumi mone yoto meape aanumi surubenalo pora kimisu pisa .
41012002	Gore wala ini etesa raburi go maapuna aaraame kogono aa meda mo maapu surubape aanu piri-para mea rapaasa . Maapuna aaraana mone yoto meainalo kogono aa mea rapaasa .
41012003	Goa pisa pare maapu surubape aanumi kogono aa ripinaawa tua repaasimi . Repaasimi pare mone yoto nakasimi .
41012004	Goa pisa raburi kogono aa rado meda mea rapaasa . Nipumi mone yoto mula pisa rabu nimumi go aa-na aalu tua wae yae pisimi .
41012005	Goa pua maapuna aaraame kogono aa meda mea rapaasa rabu tu maomasimi . Goa pua nimumi aa medaloma page tua aa medaloma page ora tu maomasimi .
41012006	Goa pua maapuna aaraare nipuna si padane pirisa yapare ora nipuna epe naaki pirisa . Goa pua kogono aa medaloma dia sa-daa nipuna si page wala repaawa kone gupa isa : Nina si ya-pulu nipu madaa epe kone sua agaa pagena kone isa .
41012007	Goa pisa-para maapu surubape aanumi yada roboa gupa simi : Go naakimi maapu nipu oro mealia-ga tamina simi . Go maapu niaa mada mealima simi goa palimare .
41012008	Goa loa go naaki ripinaawa tu maomaawa maapu kepo rarane tu rubisimi .
41012009	Yesumi go remaa madaa lalo : Gore go ini maapuna aaraamere ake palia ya ? Gore nipu pua maapu surubape aanu tu maomaawa aa medaloma maapu surubenalo katea .
41012010	Gore nimimi Gote-na buk madaa gupa dipitimi : Aana medare kamda kogono aanumi gimoa yapare abia ora mupaa aana aaya sa .
41012011	Go kogonore Gote-me piae-ga niaame ora epe rado yae adema sa .
41012012	Yesumi go saa agaa sa rabu Juda aa mudunumi nipu aditalo pisimi . Yesuna saa agaare niaa madaa ta kone isimi . Yapare nimumi onaa adaapu madaa paalame omesimi-pulu Yesu gimoa pisimi .
41012013	Go raburi nimumi Farisi aanu page Herot-na adaami aanu page Yesu piri-para repaasimi . Nimumi Yesu agaa mua ko tisimi .
41012014	Goa pua mo aanumi lalo : Tisaa , niaame ne adema-ga ne onaa madaa paala naome pare Gote-na kone madaa ora agaa mogeaate . Gore nena konemere aa mudu aa riabo lapo madaa kone padane su pirua Gote-na redepo ne pora waru mogete . Goa pea-ga neme niaa lagiape : Rom gavman aa mudu Sisar-na opis-para takis mone lopaemare go epe ta pae o ta ?
41012015	Go takis mone-re lopamina yapae dia yapae simi . Goa simi rabu Yesumi nimuna kone adoa mua makirae agaa madaa kone isa-pulu nimu-para lalo : Akeane nimimi ni go agaame ko tulalo pimi pae ? Gore mone ini padane adano mea ipulupa .
41012016	Goa sa raburi ini padane mea kasimi . Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Go mone madaare aapina bi-para piksa-para ia pae ? Nimumi nipu-para lalo : Sisar-na piksa nona piane simi .
41012017	Goa simi raburi Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Gore Sisar-na oyae Sisar pa katapape pare Gote-na oyaenu Gote-para pa katapape . Go sa raburi nimu pogolasaawa paalame omesimi .
41012018	Goa pisa raburi Sadyusi aa medaloma Yesu piri-para ipisimi . Nimuna konere ome onaanu matmat-para wala narekalimi kone isimi . Nimumi agaa gupa mulalo pisimi :
41012019	Tisaa , Moses-me niaa-para pepa gupa tisa simi : Aa medana ame omenaloa ore pia pare nogo naaki napiraliare go ona nipuna amena ore rumaawa nogo naaki madiaalia .
41012020	Sadyusi aanumi wala simi : Gore amealu 7-pela pirisimi . Mupaare ona rumaawa omesa raburi nogo naaki namadisa .
41012021	Gore ame laapome go aa-na ona wasaa rumaawa omesa pare nogo naaki dia sa . Ame repome page goa pisa .
41012022	Goa puaa-mama puare ame naba seven nipumi mo ona rumaawa omesa pare go oname nogo naaki namadesa . Oropere go aa-na ona wasaa page omesa .
41012023	Gore wala Gote-me onaa marekaama paliare go onare aapina ona piralia ya ? Go ame 7-pela nimumi ona misimi-ga simi .
41012024	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Gore nimimi Gote-na puri-para nipuna buk madaa i agaa-para ora na-ademe-pulu apo agaa waea teme .
41012025	Orope matmat-para onaa rekalimi rabu yaa-para piri ensel-nurupa piralimi . Goa pea-ga onaare go rabu abi narumaalimi .
41012026	Go page ome aanu rekalimi rabu go madaa Moses-na buk madaa i agaa gupa nadipisimi ya ? Go buk-ri repena raane remaa agaare Gote-me Moses-para agaa gupa lakesa : Ni Abraham-para Aisak-para Jekop-para nimu rayona Gote pi sa .
41012027	Go agaana re-re Gote-me ora kone wasupa suaeme onaanuna mudu pia . Nipu pa ome onaanuna Gote-daa dia . Nimina agaare lo maoyaateme sa .
41012028	Go agaa lakesa raburi rekena agaana tisaa meda pirua onaanuna agaa pagesa . Go aame Yesu nimu-para agaa epe-rupa abusa-pulu nipumi Yesu-para agaa gupa mulalo pisa : Rekena agaa meda ora mudu ya-pulu medaloma minaabata ya ?
41012029	Yesumi lalo : Mupaa rekena agaa gupa sa : Israel onaa pagalepape . Niaana Mudu Gote-re niaana ora mudu padane pia .
41012030	Nimimi Mudu Gote madaa pedo pu raaname omalimiri nimuna pu robaa rayo-para kone wasupa rayo-para go rayore Gote madaa raaname omoa pedo pu piralepape .
41012031	Rekena agaa laapona mudu agaa gupa sa : Nimina yogane surubeme-rupare nimimi pa onaanu madaa raaname omoa pedo pu piralepape . Go rekena agaa laapore pa medame narabuaniaaya .
41012032	Goa lanoloa mo rekena agaa tisaa-me Yesu-para Ialo : Tisaa loa neme ora waru lae . Gote nipu ora Aa Mudu padane pia lae . Go page Gote pia-rupare pa gotenu medaloma napimi .
41012033	Goa pea-ga onaanumi Gote madaa raana omoa pedo pu piralimi-daare nimina pu robaa rayo-para kone wasupa rayo-para puri rayo-parame pamina . Go page nimina yogane surubeme-rupa nimina ame madaa raaname omoa pedo pu piralimina . Go konere ora epe ta-ga go konemere miru irae page oyae tu yawape kone page maoge yaaya .
41012034	Yesumi go aa-na epe makuaae kone adoa lalo : Ne Gote-na Surube Su i-para polalo pi . Goa sa raburi onaanumi nipu agaa namisimi pare paala omoa pirisimi .
41012035	Gore orope Yesumi Juda aanuna epe lotu ada ru-para aawa agaa mogeawa lalo : Ake pua rekena agaa madaa tisaanumi gupa teme : Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri nipu Devit-na si piralia teme .
41012036	Holi Spirit-mi Devit kone kasa-pulu Devit-mi gupa sa : Gote-me nina Aa Mudu-para gupa lakesa : Nina popo ki-nane aa mudu piraina-ga iaanu nena aa rolo-para marabuaniaalua sa .
41012037	Gore Devit-mi nipuna Aa Mudu sa-ga akea pua Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si wala Devit-na si mada piralia ya ? Onaa adaapu pirua Yesuna agaa pagape raaname waru omesimi .
41012038	Yesuna disaipel aa-para agaa gupa lakesa : Rekena agaa tisaanuna kone waru adalepape . Nimumi mamina pepena pi adaalu yamoa su amaa pua onaanumi abi piralepape teme rabu raana omeme .
41012039	Go aanuna konere Juda aanuna lotu ada-para odobaawa riri-nane reke madaa piritalo pedo peme . Go page eta adaa yaweme raburi rikiraa madaa piritalo pedo peme sa .
41012040	Go piane aanumi kone medare nimu ona wasaana oyae paake neme . Goa pua beten adaalu yoteme rabu onaanu makiraalimi . Goa peme-pulu orope di salia raburi nimuna wae yoto ora adaape mealimi sa .
41012041	Yesumi lotu mone kiritasimi re-para pirua onaa adaapumi mone lopasimi-daa adesa . Goa pua amope aanumi mone adaapu lopasimi .
41012042	Goa pua ona wasaa meda ipua mone oge kane laapo epa lopasa . Go mone-re ora ogesi lopasa .
41012043	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu meda-para maepaawa agaa lalo : Nimi-para neme ora lalo . Go ona wasaana mone-re ora aa medaloma nimuna kateme maoge yaaya sa .
41012044	Nimumi kateme rabu mone adaapu imi pare go ona nipuna kata rabu eta kabape mone rayo kasa . Nipuna mone rayo dia yaade sa .
41013001	Goa pua Yesu Juda aanuna lotu ada gimoa pisa . Go raburi disaipel aa padaneme nipu-para lalo : Tisaa , go adanu-para aana-nu page ora epe ta-ga ada sa .
41013002	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Go adaa adanu waru adae ? Gore go kiritasimi aana-nu ora padane-daa na-aritalia pare rayo lakepea rubebe palimi .
41013003	Gore oro meda Yesu Rudu Oliv-ne pirua mo Juda aanuna epe lotu ada mone adesa . Pirisa raburi Jems-para Jon-para Edaru-para nimumi Yesu piri-para ipua padane-para pirisimi rabu agaa gupa misimi :
41013004	Nena laede-rupa aa-rabu palia ? Abia lagiape . Niaame ake adalimare gore go yae epalia lo mada niminaalima pae ?
41013005	Yesumi nimu-para agaa abuloa lakesa : Aa medalomame ne makirae agaa mea lagialimiri waru adalepape .
41013006	Orope aa medaloma ipua nina bi Yesu teme-ga onaa adaapu epe pora makiralimi .
41013007	Go page nimimi yada marekaape agaa-para ora yada pape remaa-para pagalimi rabu paala naomalepape . Goanu aba palia pare su yaa perekeape diri go rabu-daa dia .
41013008	Goa puare ruru medalomame ruru rado-para yada palimi . Go page gavman adaa su medalomame gavman su rado radonu raapu ada palimi . Go page su rado rado-para suminini palia . Go page su rado rado-para reae adaa pabalia . Goa palia pare go yaenuri naaki masaa nala-rupa mada epalia . Oyae medaloma page orope epalia .
41013009	Yapare nimi wae onaanu raapu piralimi rabu nimimi nina pora mea waateme . Nimumi nimi aditalo kaunsil-na ada-para mea pua koso teme . Go page nimumi nimi Juda aanuna lotu ada-para tua nimi kadipinu piri-para maawa aa mudunu piri page maawalimi .
41013010	Goa palia pare epe agaare onaa piri su rayona aba lakelo kiritalimi . Goa pua oropere go yapi di dia yalia .
41013011	Nimumi nimi mapataawa koso-para mea palimi raburi ni ake lano yapae kone robaa-para namapiratepape . Go raburi Holi Spirit-mi agaa lagialia-pulu nimimi agaa mada laketeme .
41013012	Go raburi ame baaninumi nimuna ame baani medaloma onaanu-para taminalo mea kateme . Aaraanumi nogo naaki onaanu-para mea tainalo kateme . Nogo naakinumi agi aaraa-para ratu yawoa taliminalo mea kateme .
41013013	Nimiri nina si ya-pulu onaa rayome nimi ratu yawoa gimalimi . Goa palimi pare onaa rayome ni nagi-mama palimiri orope go su yaa dia yalia rabu page oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi .
41013014	Gore nimimi mabebolaawa pugu pi oyae adalimi rabu go oyae epe ada-para rekalia-pulu go rabu su yaa lapo dia yalia . Go rabu su Judia piri onaame rudu apedaa-para pogola pulupape . Gore buk Daniel-me tisa-daa onaanumi go agaana re aba ademe-pulu mada niminaalimi .
41013015	Go rabu onaanuri ada gaa-nane piralimiri ru-nane i oyaenu namula pulupape .
41013016	Go rabu page onaa medaloma maapu-para piralimiri nimuna mamina ura laapo namea yamola pulupape .
41013017	Go page ona medame nipuna nogo naaki padaa pia page adu nalae onaanu page pawa pogola palimi rabu ni odo palia .
41013018	Yapare go piane wae kogono epea rabu naepenalo beten tapape .
41013019	Go rabu epaliade yaere onaanumi kedaa gupa ora meda na-ademe . Gote-me su yaa laapo wariaa-mama ipua abia page radaa adaape go-rupa naepea .
41013020	Gote-me go wae yae epaliade yapi di namarudu yaliare onaa rayo ora omalimi . Yapare Gote-me nipuna mapiraae onaa madaa kone salia-daa nipumi go di marudu yaalia .
41013021	Go raburi onaa medalomame goa teme : Mea Repae Aare go-para pia mogo-para pia teme-daare go agaa napagalepape .
41013022	Gore makirae Krais-nu page makirae agaa lakene aanu page opapalimi . Go rabu nimumi napiaa kogono pua oyae epape di radonu pinaloa adalimi . Goa pua nimumi nimi Gote-na mapiraae onaanu makiratalo epalimi .
41013023	Goa palimi pare waru adalepape . Go epaliade yae rayo madaa agaa aba laguaayo .
41013024	Goa pua onaa madaa apo radaa aba nenaloare naare udunoa akua naraalia .
41013025	Uba kedome yaa gimoa lopalia rabu yaa-para piri oyaenuna puri page maeto eto palia .
41013026	Goa palia raburi Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si adalimi . Nipumi yaa-para ipua nipuna puri ora mea epalia .
41013027	Go raburi nipumi ensel-nu repaawa su rayona abade mapiraae onaare makiritaalia . Kiritalia rabu su yaa ruma aaya-nane pua re lapu lapu yarara yarara pu mea kiritalimi sa .
41013028	Kama fik repenana kone waru mealepape . Nipuna palaa-para ipa rubia yo kagaa opea raburi go yae adoa pani palia kone su niminaamina .
41013029	Go page apo wae yae epalia raburi kedaa meape di ora re-para epalia-ga niminaamina .
41013030	Go agaa pagalepa . Go pimi onaa abi naomalimi pare go yaenu aba epenalo adalimi .
41013031	Su yaa laapo aba dia yalia pare nina agaa oro yaalo pa saabalia .
41013032	Yapare go epaliade diri onaa medame page naniminaaeme . Yaa-para piri ensel page Gote-na Simi page namakuaaeme pare Aapa Gote-me agu raapo go di adoa niminaaya .
41013033	Go epaliade yapi di rabu naniminaaeme-ga waru ado piralepape .
41013034	Go yapi Di-na remaare gupa lagialo : Pa aa meda pora kimisu polalo pisa . Go rabu nipuna ada gimoa nipuna kogono aanu aba kogono rumaawa pisa . Go rabu pora gaape surubape aa-para waru adoaape loa pisa .
41013035	Gore adoaatepape sa . Adana aaraare aa-rabu epalia palo naniminaaeme . Ribaa epalia yapae ruma rumane epalia yapae yaa kuta agaa piade rabu yapae yapipu epalia yapae maarea . Goa pea-ga ora waru adoaatepape .
41013036	Mogo adana aaraa epalia rabu nimi patalimiri ora o yalia .
41013037	Gore neme nimi-para lagialo-rupare onaa rayo-para ora ado piralepape lano sa .
41014001	Goa pua orope wala yapi laapome Pasova yawe Di epalia . Go rabu page Bret Nama-Adaa Yaape yapi di ya-pulu onaanu epa kiritasimi . Go raburi Gote-na Miru Irae Aa mudunumi page rekena agaana tisaanumi page Yesu tu maomaatalo pisimi-pulu nipu aditalo pisimi .
41014002	Goa pisimi rabu nimumi lalo : Onaanumi wae-rupa pogolasaalimi-pulu go Pasova Yawena yapi di rabu mada na-adiatamina simi .
41014003	Gore Yesu Betani su-para ipua yakimi tisa pare maepeaae aa Saimon-na ada-para pirisa . Pirisa raburi ona medame aana pe mua epe kaa pu ti wabola pirapalae mea ipisa . Go ipare yoto ora adaape inalo oname go pe loboa Yesuna aalu madaa koyasa .
41014004	Koyasa rabu go piri onaa medalomame ratu yawoa gupa lo pirisimi : Akeane go epe ipa pa rubala ?
41014005	Go ipa kabola peme raburi mone yo adaapu gupa 1200 kina mada mua riabo naraanu pa kata pema . Goa loa nimu mo ona-para ape simi .
41014006	Goa pisa raburi Yesumi lalo : Go agaa gimalepa . Akeane nipu madaa wae kone imi pae ? Nipumi ora epe kone sua pia .
41014007	Riabo naraanuri oro yaalo nimi raapu piralimi-pulu nimu madaa raba meape kone salimi-daare go rabu pipape . Yapare neme nimi raapu oro yaalo napiralua .
41014008	Go onana kone epe ta-ga palainawa . Naa ro rogaaliminalo naa tone go epe ipame aba koyaata .
41014009	Pagalepa . Gore epe agaa su rayona laketeme rabu onaanumi go onana bi pagenalo nipumi ni madaa ipa koyasa kone salimina .
41014010	Go rabu disaipel 12-pela aa-na bi medare Judas Iskariot pirisa . Go aare Gote-na miru irape aa mudunu piri-para pua Yesu tulalo yada robesa .
41014011	Go aa mudunumi Judas-na agaa pagoa raaname omoa mone gialima simi . Goa simi-pulu Judas-me Yesu ora tinalo mea katoa kone isa .
41014012	Go Bret Yis Nasape yapi di raburi disaipel aanumi Yesu-para agaa gupa misimi : Niaa aa-rabu pua nena Pasova eta managola salima ya ? Go rabu Pasova-na sipsip tisimi-pulu goa simi .
41014013	Go raburi Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa laapo mea repaawa lalo : Su yada-para palipi raburi ipa noria ipulae aa meda madaalipi . Nipu rata mea pulupape .
41014014	Nipu ada-para odobalia rabu go adana aaraa-para gupa laketapape . Tisaa-me lalo : Ni-para nina disaipel aanu-para niaa Pasova eta nalima-pulu go ada rum meda ia palo laketapape sa .
41014015	Go tepe raburi mo aame nipi so-nane mea pua epe pepena pi ada rum mea waatea . Go rabu nipumi niaana eta nape yaenu mea managola salepape .
41014016	Goa sa-pulu disaipel aanumi adaare-para pua Yesumi lakesade-rupa adesimi . Goa pua nimumi Pasova eta managola saasimi .
41014017	Wala aebo raburi Yesu-para disaipel aa 12-pela padane-para pirisimi .
41014018	Goa puare nimu reke madaa eta no pirisimi rabu Yesumi lalo : Pagalepa . Nimina aa padanere ora kawae madini aa pia pare abia nipumi ni raapu eta pa no pia .
41014019	Goa sa raburi nimu odome omoa disaipel aa 12-pela aame padane padane nipu-para pua agaa gupa misimi : Gore ni ora yapae lo gupa simi .
41014020	Yesumi nimu-para lalo Aposel aa 12-pelana padane abia saa laapo plet-para bret madaa ki sapalae no pipa .
41014021	Gote-na buk madaa ta-rupa Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si omalua sa . Goa pea pare go raburi nipuna kawae madini aare wae yae epaliana odome omalo . Go aare nipuna agimi aba namadita pisa yaalore ora epe ta sa .
41014022	Eta nisimi raburi Yesu nipu bret mua Gote-para ora pi loa ruki ruki pua nipuna disaipel aanu kasa . Kalalaawa gupa sa : Mealepa . Go bret-re nina yogane gialo-ga mua nalepa .
41014023	Goa pua Yesumi kap mua Gote-para ora pi loare kasa . Kasa rabu nimumi rayo nisimi .
41014024	Go rabu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Go ipa wain-ri nina yaapi-ga onaanu madaa koyaato . Nina yaapi-miri Gote-na onaa ora agaame mapogasaalia .
41014025	Nimi-para ora lalo : Neme go ipa wain wala mada nanalua pare aba Gote-na surube su-para pirua nalua sa .
41014026	Goa pisa raburi nimumi ora pi yaasa loare su Rudu Oliv-nane pisimi .
41014027	Pamisimi raburi Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimi rayome ni gimalimi . Gote-na buk madaa gupa tu suaaya sa : Gote-me sipsip punini aa talia rabu sipsip yola minabalia sa .
41014028	Yapare ni wala rekoa nimi Galili su-para palimi rabu ni aba riri-nane palua sa .
41014029	Goa sa raburi Pita-me nipu-para lalo : Nimu rayome ne gimalimi pare neme mada nagimalua sa .
41014030	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Waru pagalepa . Go ribaare yaa kutame e rana laapo talo palia pare aba rana repo neme ni Yesu na-ade te .
41014031	Goa sa raburi Pita-me puri palo yaaloa gupa sa : Saa rana padane omalipa pare neme ne nagimalua sa . Go disaipel aa rayome agaa padane gupa simi .
41014032	Gore nimu su medana bi Getsemani-para pisimi . Go-para Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para lalo : Go-para nimi piralimina neme beten ta pulu sa .
41014033	Goa pua Yesumi Pita-para Jems-para Jon-para lamua pisa . Go rabu Yesuna pu imu-para ora radaa pua kedaame omesa .
41014034	Nipumi nimu-para lalo : Nina robaa-para kedaa pua ni omalua sa . Go-nane adaba pitapape .
41014035	Goa loa Yesu pora-nia wala ogesi pua suna lopesa . Lopoa Gote-para beten gupa sa : Aapa , ni madaa ora kone saliri go radaa ni mada naepena magimaape .
41014036	Goa loa wala lalo : Aapa , ne oyae rayo mada pali-ga ni radaa nape gimano kap pane meape . Yapare neme kone salo-rupa napape . Dia , nena koneme niminaawa pape .
41014037	Goa loa wala ipisa pare nipuna disaipel aa repo u pa patisimi . Go rabu Yesumi adoa Pita-para lalo : Saimon-ya , ne u patae ya ? Ne go oge yapi rabu mada na-adobali ?
41014038	Gore wae yae-para lopalimi-ga beten loa adaaba piralepape . Nimina konere puri pata pare nimina yogane oma paaya .
41014039	Goa loa nipu wala pua beten agaa aba sa-rupa wala sa .
41014040	Nipu disaipel aanu piri-para wala ipisa rabu nimu pa u patisimi . Nimuna ini-para u wala ipisa-daa u patisimi . Nimumi rekoa nipu-para agaa wala meda na-abusimi .
41014041	Goa pua wala rana repo Yesu ipua nimu-para lalo : Nimi penaa u patua piralimi ya ? Gore mada . Abiare nimumi Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si pupitagi ne onaanu lamu kateme .
41014042	Rekoa baina . Ada , ni tapena kabereke meade aare aba go epea-daa sa .
41014043	Yesumi agaa lalaina go aposel-na rikiraanare aa Judas page onaa adaapu page medaloma ipisimi . Nimumi nimuna repena uninu nimuna rai kutunu mea ipisimi . Gote-na miru irae aa mudunumi page rekena agaa tisaanu page aa mudunumi repaasimi-pulu ipisimi .
41014044	Gupa ipisimi rabu kawae madini aa Judas-mere nimu-para kudiri pi kone kaloa lalo : Neme go aa pua nunu toa rabu go aa mealepape . Nipu adia waru suruboa mea pulupape sa .
41014045	Gore Judas ipisa raburi nipumi Yesu piri aipapulu pua puaa lalo : Aa Mudu sa . Goa loa nipumi Yesu nunu sa .
41014046	Go rabu nimumi Yesu aditalo waru ripinaawa misimi .
41014047	Yapare aa meda re-para piri aame rai kutu mua Gote-na aa mudu nipuna raba mi aa tulalo pisa pare aane pona tisa .
41014048	Goa pua Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Akeane nimimi rai kutu-para repena uni-para mua ni talimi ya ? Ni paake ne aa ya ?
41014049	Ni oro yaalo nimi raapu lotu ada-para pirua agaa mogeaaru pare go rabu ni aditalo naipisimide . Yapare Gote-na buk madaa ia-pulu mada palimi .
41014050	Go sa raburi disaipel aanumi nipu gimoa pogola pisimi .
41014051	Go rabu ogege aa medame Yesu rata mea pisa . Go naakina to madaare mamina yaako pi agu yamesa . Go rabu aa medalomame nipu epa ripinaabasimi .
41014052	Yapare nipu mamina malopaawa pogola pisa .
41014053	Go raburi nimumi Yesu Gote-na aa mudunu piri-para mea pisimi . Go raburi Gote-na miru irae aa mudunumiri kone makuaae aanu-para rekena agaana tisaanu-para nimu padane-para kiritasimi .
41014054	Go raburi Pita-me Yesu rata mea ipisa pare re-para naipisa . Nipu Gote-na miru irae aa mudununa epe pokaalo ada ru-nane pua pirisa . Nipu plisman-nu raapu padane-para piru repena adala pirisa .
41014055	Go raburi Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu page kaunsil aanumi page nimu rayome Yesu tu maomaatalo pisimi-pulu pa amaa makirae agaa mulalo pisimi . Goa pisimi pare nimumi wae yae ora padane-daa na-adesimi .
41014056	Onaa adaapumi Yesu madaa makirae agaa lo pirisimi pare agaa rado rado simi .
41014057	Goa pisa-pulu aa medaloma rekoa Yesu madaa makiraawa lalo :
41014058	Nipumi go epe lotu ada kimi wariniri kilipialua sa raburi niaame pagesima simi . Wala yapi repome lotu ada rado wariabalua sa pare kimi namaalua sa . Go sa raburi niaame pagesima simi .
41014059	Nimumi remaa lakesimi pare agaa rado rado lakesimi .
41014060	Go rabu Gote-na miru irae aa mudumi nimu piri-para rekoa Yesu agaa gupa misa : Nimumi ne madaa go agaa tame-ga agaa mada na-abulali ya ?
41014061	Goa sa raburi Yesu pa pirua agaa nasa . Gote-na miru irae aa mudumi agaa wala gupa misa : Nere Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si ya ? Nere epe puri i Gote-na Si ya ?
41014062	Yesumi lalo : E , ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si ya-pulu Gote-na ora ki-nane piralua nipuna puri mada adalimi . Ni yaa moae raapu madaa pirua epalua-daa adalimina .
41014063	Goa sa raburi Gote-na miru irae aa mudumi Yesu ero agaa ta kone sua nipuna mamina mea riripia lalo : Akeane adasae aa medana agaa pagamona ya ?
