42020014	Goa pisa pare mo maapu surubape aanumi mo nipuna naaki ipisa adesimi rabu nimumi gupa simi : Go naakimiri orope aaraana moae oyaenu mealia-ga niaame tu maomaamina simi . Goa puare go maapu niaana mada surubamina simi .
42020015	Gore mo naaki kepo ru-nane epenaloa nimumi tu maomaawa amaa-nane pua rubisimi . Goa pua go maapuna aaraa nipumi ake palia pae ?
42020016	Nipumi gupa palia lo lagialo : Nipumi ipua mo maapu surubape aanu epa tu maomaawa go wain maapuri pa aanu medalomame surubenalo mea katea sa . Gore go onaanumi go Yesuna agaa pagoa nimumi lalo : Dia , nipumi goa napalia simi .
42020017	Goa simi rabu Yesumi nimu adaba sua lalo : Dia tame pare Gote-na buk-mi iade agaana re madaa ake teme ya ? Pagalepa sa : Kamda kogono pi aanumi aana meda mea rubisimide . Pare go aana-re ora epe Aa Mudu-na aaya sa .
42020018	Onaa rayome go aana madaa magatabalimiri nimu ogegepu rugula tabebe palia . Go aana-me onaa meda magataboa lopaliare go aare aasatua rugula palia sa .
42020019	Yesumi go saa agaa lakesa rabu rekena agaana tisaanu-para Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para nimumi niaa madaa agaa ta kone isimi . Ora go raburi nimumi nipu ripinaatalo pisimi . Goa pisimi pare onaanu madaa paala omoa gimisimi .
42020020	Goa puare nimumi nipu ripinaatalo waru adapaba aasimi . Goa pua go aanumi pa aa medalomana mone kanaloa makirae kone sua Yesu piri penaasimi . Nimumi Yesu agaa mulalo pisimi . Goa pua nipu ko tisimi . Goa puare mo namba wan gavman-na purimi koso pagenalo pisimi .
42020021	Go makirae aanumi Yesu agaa gupa lakesimi : Tisaa , nena agaare ora epe ta . Neme onaa rayo epe agaa mogeaate . Neme Gote-na pora madaa ora agaa agu mogeaaye rabu aa mudununa biri paalame naome .
42020022	Goa pe-ga nemere ake kone sae pae ? Niaana rekena agaa madaare niaame Rom suna aa mudu Sisar-para takis kalamina yapae dia yapae simi .
42020023	Pare Yesumi nimuna makirae agaa madaare adokaru misa-pulu nipumi nimu lakesa :
42020024	mone meda ni mea waatapa . Go mone madaa pia piksa-para bi lapore aapina yapae ?
42020025	Gore nimumi lalo : Sisar-na simi . Goa simi-pulu Yesumi nimu-para gupa lakesa : Sisar-na yaere nipuna katapape pare Gote-na yaere Gote nipuna katapape sa .
42020026	Gore makirae aanumi onaanuna ini agaa madaa Yesu namakiraeme-pulu nimu agaa loraawa pa pirisimi . Go page nipuna agaa madaa kone adaapu isimi-pulu agaa nalo pa aasimi .
42020027	Sadyusi aanu medaloma Yesu nipu piri ipisimi . Mo Sadyusi aanu nimuna konere ome onaanuri wala mada narekalimi kone isimi .
42020028	Gore nipu agaa misimi : Tisaa-ya , Moses-me agaa meda niaa-para gupa tisana : Aa meda ona rumaawa omalia pare nogo naaki meda namadu salia . Goa puare go ona wasaame ome aa-na nogo naaki namadialia-daare go ome aa-na ameme go ona mada rumaalia ya ? Moses-me gupa tisana simi .
42020029	Gore amealu 7-pela pirisimi . Aba mupaamere ona rumaasa pare nipuna nogo naaki namadiaawa nipu omesa .
42020030	Gore laapopa aame mo ona wasaa nipu misa .
42020031	Wala go aana masaa-nane aame repome page goa pisa . Goa paa-mama puare mo amealu 7-pela nimumi mo ona padane misimi pare nimu nogo naaki namadiaawa pa omesimi .
42020032	Oropere go ona page omesa .
42020033	Gore aba ome onaa wala rekalimide raburi go ona padanere aapina ore ora pitia ya ? Mo aa 7-pelame go ona aba padane rumaasimide simi .
42020034	Gore Yesumi nimu goa lakesa : Abia go rabu su amaa pimi onaamere repaya pitimi .
42020035	Pare orope ome onaa wala rekoa piralimide onaanumiri nimu repaaya aulape kone nasalia .
42020036	Nimu Gote-na akero-rupa piralimi-pulu nimu wala mada naomalimi . Gote-me nimu matmat-para marekaalia-pulu nimu Gote-na si wane-rupa oro yaalo piralimi .
42020037	Ome onaa matmat-para wala rekapere Moses-me page aba tisaaya . Go buk-ri repena rabe remaa lakesa rabu nipu Aa Mudu Abraham-para Jekop-para Aisak go repona Gote pa pia-daa tisa .
42020038	Go agaana re gupa sa : Gote-re ome onaanuna Gote-daa Dia , pare nipu kagaa piraama laama pope onaanuna Gote yaade . Onaa rayo wala rekalimilo go agaa lakesa .
42020039	Nipumi goa sa raburi rekena agaa tisaanumi gupa simi : Tisaa , neme ora waru lae simi .
42020040	Goa simi pare nipu wala agaa meape paalame omesimi-pulu pa ora lae simi .
42020041	Yesumi nimu goa lakesa : Gore nimumi Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri nipu Devit-na si piralia teme . Go agaana re ake ya ?
42020042	Buk Sam madaare Devit nipuna agaa gupa sa : Gote-me nina Aa Mudu-para gupa lakesa : Nina popeke ki-nane aa mudu mapiraalia sa .
42020043	Oropere neme iaanu nena aa rolo-para marabuaniaalua sa .
42020044	Gore Devit-mi Aa Mudu nipu lakesa . Goa lakesa-pulu Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri Devit-na si-daa napiralia sa .
42020045	Go onaa rayome pa pirua Yesuna agaa pago pirisimi rabu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu gupa lakesa :
42020046	Rekena agaa tisaanuna kone waru adalepape . Nimumi mamina epe yamoa maket-na pua onaanumi abi piralepape teme rabu raaname omeme . Go aanumiri Juda aanuna lotu ada-para page eta yawaeme-para page reke riri-nane aba pua pimi .
42020047	Go aanumiri ona wasaana oyae paake no peme . Goa pua nimumi beten adaalupu yoloa teme rabu onaanu makiraeme . Goa peme-pulu orope Gote-me koso salia rabu nimuna wae yoto ora adaape mealimi sa .
42021001	Yesumi adesa rabu amo ne aanumi lotu ada-para mone i pe-para mone epa lopasimi .
42021002	Go rabu naraa piri ona wasaa meda nipuna oge mone ipa laapo epa lopasa . Go mone-re ora ogesi gupa 2 toea yaade .
42021003	Goa pisa pare Yesumi lalo : Neme nimi lagialo . Go naraa piri ona wasaame mone lopata rabu nipumi onaa medalomana mone maoge yaawa rabuniaaya .
42021004	Medalomamere mone adaapu imi-pulu pa ode meda mua go mone epa lopasimi pare mo ona naraamere nipuna eta kabape mone rayo epa lopasa .
42021005	Onaa medalomame lotu ada madaa agaa lala pirisimi . Nimumi go lotu adana aana pepena-para page Gote-me oyae pa katade-para ora epe ta simi . Go rabu Yesumi lalo :
42021006	Abia nimimi go adaleme yaenuri orope yapi di epaliade rabu go adaa lakepe rubalimi-pulu aana padanede page na-aritalia sa .
42021007	Gore nimumi Yesu nipu agaa gupa misimi : Tisaa , nena laede yaenuri aa-rabu epalia ya ? Niaame ake adalima rabu go yaena yapi di epalia mada niminaawa makuaalimaa ya simi .
42021008	Yesumi lalo : Nimimi waru adalepape . Makirae aa adaapu ipua nina bina gupa lagialimi : Niri Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si yaade teme . Medalomamere go epaliade yapi di abia go epaana-daa teme . Pare nimu narata mea pulupape .
42021009	Oropere nimimi yada pape remaa-para wae-rupa pogolasaape remaa pagalimiri paalame naoma piralepape . Go yaenu aba palia pare su yaa perekene diri go-daa dia .
42021010	Yesumi agaa meda wala gupa sa : Go raburi ruru rado radonu yada palimi . Go-rupa gavman adaa su robo rado radonu page yada palimi .
42021011	Go raburi su rado rado-para suminini eto eto adaa paa-mama pua reae adaa paboa wae yainanu page epalia . Go raburi so yaa-parare paala piae adaapu pua wae oyae epape di page epalia .
42021012	Pare go oyae rayo abi naepalia . Dia aba nimumi nimi ripinaaba pirua wae kedaanu gialimi . Nimi mo lotu adanu ru-nane mea pua koso loa kalabus ada mapatalimi . Goa puare nimumi nina kogono onaa rabuaniaatalo palimi rabu nimiri kadipinu-para adaa aa mudunu nimuna ini agaa madaa mea palimi .
42021013	Go rabu nimimi nina Epe Agaa laketeme-daa goa palimi .
42021014	Nimumi nimi kosona mea palimi raburi ni ake lano yapae kone aba namasatepape .
42021015	Dia-ga neme agaa-para epe kone-para lagialua rabu nimina iaa rayome nimina agaa mada rasalimi .
42021016	Go rabu nimina ama aapanu-para ame baaninu-para nena ruru-para adami aanu-para nimumi iaanu mea kateme . Goa pua nimumi nimi medaloma tu maomalimi .
42021017	Nimi nina agaa rateme-pulu onaa rayome nimi-para ora ratu yawo gimalimi .
42021018	Goa palimi pare nimina aalu-para ae iri meda mada ora napudia lopalia .
42021019	Nimimi puri paloa ado piralimiri oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi sa .
42021020	Gore nimimi soldia aanu so Jerusalem su epa kuta pina adalimiri go su go adaare pabo tape yapi di go opapa yada .
42021021	Go rabu Judia piri onaanu nimiri ora rudu-nini aana apedaa-para pogola pulupape . Onaa medaloma ada-para piralimiri pogola pulupape . Go page pa su rarane ae onaanu wala adaare-para naepa odobatepape .
42021022	Gore Gote-na buk madaa i agaa rayore ora yalia go raburi Gote-na raturi go onaanu madaa koyaalia rabu wae yoto yapi di mea salia .
42021023	Go raburi nogo naaki padaa piri onanu-para adu nalae-para aipapulu napalimi-ga ora odo pea . Go su madaare ora adaa kedaape meda epalia-ga Gote-me go su amaa piri onaanu madaa ora ratu waru yawalia .
42021024	Go rabu nimumi onaa medalomanu rai kutumi tua medaloma iaanumi adi rulubaawa ruru radona rikiraana pua mapiraalimi . Go rabu page pa onaa ruru rado medame Jerusalem mabebola-mama puare orope go wae di dia yalia .
42021025	Go raburi naare akua ubanuri rado rado aalimi . Go su amaa onaanu rayona robaa-parare adaa kedaa mu piralimi . Go ipa solwarame agaa loa ralia-daa paalame waru omalimi .
42021026	Onaa adaapumi go su-para oyae meda ipula kone sua pu robaa-para paala waru omalimi pare ini-para page emelalu mapalia . Gore so yaa-para uba kedo oyae eto eto palia-daa paalame waru omalimi .
42021027	Goa pinaloa Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri yaa moae raapu ipulaina puri adaape adalimi .
42021028	Gore orope gode yaenu ripima epalia rabu aipapulu rekoa nimina aalumi waru adalepape . Go raburi Gote-me nimina oro yaalo kagaa Pirape Yapi diri go mea epea-daa sa .
42021029	Go rabu Yesumi nimu saa agaa meda gupa lakesa : Nimimi repena fik page pa repena medanu page adalepape .
42021030	Kagaa ma-apulu saawa yo aalia-daare gore pani pua naare ralia kone salemede .
42021031	Gupiane yaenu adalimi-daare gore Gote-na Surube Su-na di aba re-para go epaana-daa kone salepape .
42021032	Go agaa pagalepa : Abia go pimi onaa naomalimi pare go yaenu aba epenalo adalimi .
42021033	Su yaa rayona yaere aba dia yalia pare nina agaa oro yaalo pa salia sa .
42021034	Gore nimimi waru adalepape . Nimimi oro yaalo eta adaapu nayawo ipa bia noa maeyae ne aa-rupa napiralepape . Go page go su amaa yoganena yaenu madaa kone adaapu nasalepape .
42021035	Go yapi diri nimi piri ora aipapulu epalia-ga gupa napiralepape . Go yapi di epalia rabu kona-rupa onaanu madaa perekea taboa ripinalia .
42021036	Goa palia-pulu nimi oro yaalo ado piralepape . Goa pua Gote-me nimi puri gina ora yaalo beten tapape . Goa palimiri wae yaenumi nimi piri epalia pare nimimi puri mua Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si raapu epe-rupa mada piralimi sa .
42021037	Oro yaalo Yesumi onaa lotu ada-para pua mogeasa . Goa pua ribaane-para nipu mo Oliv Rudu madaa patulalo puare lotu ada-para wala yapipu epala pisa .
42021038	Goa pisa rabu onaame Yesuna agaa pagolalo ipisimi .
42022001	Bret-para yis nasua yawo ne Pasova yapi Diri aba rudu sa .
42022002	Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para rekena agaana tisaanu-para nimumi Yesu tulalo pisimi . Goa pisimi pare onaanu madaa paalame omoa kudiri pi kone su pirisimi .
42022003	Go raburi Satan-me Judas aanuna robaa-para pua odobasa . Mo Judas aanuna bi medare Iskariot teme . Go aa nipu mo 12-pela disaipel aa ru-nane pirisa .
42022004	Satan nipuna robaa-para odobasa-pulu Judas nipu pua Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para mo lotu ada surube aanu-para agaa nimu raapu pua lo pirisimi . Nipumi Yesu nimumi tinalo yada robesa .
42022005	Go raburi nimu pedo pedo waru puare nipu kalape mone medaloma kirita su pirisimi .
42022006	Gore Judas aanumi nimuna agaa pagoa epe ta simi . Goa puare nipuri akea pua mada mea waatoa pae kone sua kone kone adaapu mu pirisa . Nipumi rana meda onaa adaapu raapu napitimide rabu nimu waatoa kone isa .
42022007	Olode rabu bret-para yis nasape di rudu sa raburi Pasova eta irape sipsip mena si meda tulalo pisimi .
42022008	Go rabu Pita-para Jon lapo Yesu nipumi repaawa agaa gupa lakesa : Nipimi niaana Pasova eta namina oyae pua managola salepape sa .
42022009	Gore nipumi agaa gupa misipi : Niaame aa-para pua managola sua namina yapae sipi .
42022010	Gore Yesumi nipu gupa lakesa : Pagalepa . Nipimi adaare-para palipi rabu ipa norini aa meda madaalipi . Go aa nipu rata mea pulupape . Goa pua odobaliade ada-para pulupape .
42022011	Goa puare nipimi go adana aaraa gupa laketapepe sa : Tisaa-me ne agaa meape laa : Nipuna disaipel aanu raapu Pasova eta nalima-pulu neme go eta managolape ada rum meda waalape lo pua agaa meape sa .
42022012	Goa tepe raburi mo aame nipi adaa so madaa-nane mea pua epe pepena pi ada rum ae-para mea waatea . Go-parare reke madaa oyae managola salepape sa .
42022013	Go agaa lakenaloa mo aa lapo pua nipumi lakesade-rupa adesipi . Go rabu nipu lapome Pasova eta managola sasipi .
42022014	Eta nape di raburi Yesu nipuna disaipel aanu raapu reke madaa pirisa .
42022015	Gore nipumi nimu gupa lakesa : Neme go etare nimi raapu nolalo ora raaname waru omalo . Gupa noa oropere neme kedaa pi yaenu rialua sa .
42022016	Neme nimi lagialo : Neme eta wala meda nimi raapu nanalua pare Gote-na Surube Su rabu etana re adalimina sa .
42022017	Go rabu nipumi kap madaa pirapalae wain mua Gote-para ora pi loa nimu-para kalalaawa lalo : Nimimi go kap-para mua rumaawa nalepa .
42022018	Neme nimi lagialo : Abia neme nimi raapu wain ipare wala nanalua . Dia , pare Gote-na Surube Su madaa go yaena re adoa nalua sa .
42022019	Goa puare nipumi bret mua Gote-para ora pi loa piribisa . Goa pua nimu kalalaawa lalo : Go bret-re nina yogane-ga nimi raba minalo gialo . Nimimi ni madaa kone sua nalepape sa .
42022020	Goa puare orope aba no kiritinaloa ipa wain pirapalae mua kalalaawa lalo : Go kap-para piri wain-ri nina yaapi kupame nimi raba minalo koyaato . Gore Gote raapu pogatu pirapena nimi madaa omalua sa .
42022021	Yapare adalepa . Ni yada lore aanu mea kalape aare abia ni raapu go reke madaa padane-para eta go no piralepa-daa sa .
42022022	Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri Gote-na agaa ratua omalua sa . Goa pea pare mo ni iaanuna ki-nane mea kateade aare ora kedaa waru mealia-daa odome omalo sa .
42022023	Nipumi goa sa raburi nimumi aapimi palia yapae lala pisimi .
42022024	Disaipel aanumi arere pua nimuna rikiraanare aa muduri aapi ora yapae simi .
42022025	Gore Yesumi nimu gupa lakesa : Ruru radona aa mudunu nimumi puri paloa nimuna ruru onaanu surubeme . Goa puare mo surube onaanumi bi onaanuna raba mi aanu lo bi ma-aeme .
42022026	Pare nimi gupa napiralepape . Dia-ga aa meda nimina rikiraana aa mudu aba piralia-daare gore nipu pora poa madini aa-rupa aba piralia . Nimina mudu pirape aare aba kogono pua nimina raba mi aa-rupa piralia .
42022027	Gore aa medame eta pa nolalo piruaaya pare aa medame kogono pua eta rumaaya . Gore mo eta aba nolalo pia aare nipu aa mudu yana . Pare ni nimina rikiraana piruaayo rabu nimi raba muaayo .
42022028	Neme kedaa ruaayo rabu nimi ni raapu pirua nagimisimide .
42022029	Gore neme su rayo surubanolo Aapame nipuna puri gisa . Goa pea-ga neme page nimi surube kogono gialua .
42022030	Gore nina Surube Su-para pirua nimi naa reke madaa pirua eta namina . Goa pua nimi epe reke madaa pirua Israel su-para piri ruru 12-pela onaana koso agaa pagolalo piralimi .
42022031	Ora Saimon , neme pagape . Gore wit poape aamere nipuna etare epe ta palo o ta palo eta waru adalia . Go-rupare neme puri kasu-pulu Satan-me nimi ko tulalo epalia .
42022032	Yapare Saimon neme kone rulae yae nagimainalo neme ne raba mulalo beten to . Orope neme ni madaa kone wala pereke sua nena amenu puri kalape sa .
42022033	Gore Pita-me goa sa : Aa Mudu , niri ne raapu abia banalo kalabus ada-para page ni ne raapu mada omalua kone salo sa .
42022034	Gore Yesumi lalo : Pita ne lagialo . Abia go ribaare yaa kutame e talo palia rabu neme Yesu ni na-ade rana repo te sa .
42022035	Go rabu Yesumi nimu gupa lakesa : Nimiri abade mea rapasude raburi nimina mone paus-para rokanu-para aariti go yaenu namea pisimide . Goa pisimide-ga nimi oyae meda rudu sa pae ? Gore nimumi lalo : Niaa muaema simi .
42022036	Gore nimu gupa lakesa : Abiare onaa rayome mone paus-para rokanu-para saapitimiri mea pulupape . Onaa rayome nipu adaalu rai kutu nasalimiri nimina mamina madaa mone mua rai kutu kabalepape .
42022037	Gore nimi lagialo : Gote-na buk madaa ni-para gupa sa : Nipu onaa waenu raapu page mapiraaeme lo tisana . Go agaana re-re orope ni madaa epalia-ga adalimina sa .
42022038	Go rabu disaipel aanumi lalo : Aa Mudu , neme ade . Niaame adaalu rai kutu laapo go saapima simi . Gore nipumi lalo : Apo saapimi mada sa .
42022039	Nipu amaa pua sana nipuna oro yaalo puala pia-rupa Oliv Rudu madaa pua pisa . Go rabu nipuna disaipel aanumiri nipu raapu pisimi .
42022040	Mo Oliv Ruduna puare nipuna disaipel aanu gupa lakesa : Wae yaeme nimi nako tina beten tapape sa .
42022041	Goa loare nimu gimoa ogesi-daa puare rumu koba pua beten sa . Nipu pisade-rupare aana mea lopatema-rupa mada pisa .
42022042	Go rabu nipumi lalo : Aapa , neme kone saliri ni radaa nape pe kap mea pu . Yapare nina kone gimoa nena raana ratano lape .
42022043	Go rabu yaa-para piri ensel meda nipu piri-para ipua nipu epa puri mapalaasa .
42022044	Yesu nipu madaa kedaa adaape rinalo pisa-pulu nipumi beten puri paboa wala sa . Goa puare nipuna pudu ekatare yaapi kupa nona piane kilipia su amaa popesa .
42022045	Nipumi beten aba loa sana rekaawa nipuna disaipel aanu piri-para pisa . Nipumi pua adesa pare nimuna robaa-para kedaa waru pisa-daa u patisimi .
42022046	Gore nimu gupa pua lakesa : Nimiri akeane u patu pimi ? Nimi madaa wae yaeme nako tinalo beten lo piralepape sa .
42022047	Yesu nipumi agaa pa lakelalaina onaanu adaapupe meda ipisimi . Gore Judas riri-nane epena onaanu nipu rata mea ipisimi . Go aare disaipel aanuna ru-para pirisa . Nipu re-para ipua Yesu-para nunu talo ipisa .
42022048	Goa pisa pare Yesumi Judas gupa lakesa : Neme Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si nunu loa mea waaloa yada lore aanu katalo pae ?
42022049	Gore disaipel aanu nipu raapu pirisimi aanu mo ipisimide adoa nimumi lalo : Aa Mudu , niaame nimuri go adaalu rai kutumi tamona ya ?
42022050	Go rabu disaipel aa medame kogonome adini naaki meda rai kutumi tisa . Go naakiri Gote-na miru irae aa-na kogono pisa . Tisa rabu mo popo ki-nane aane pona taboa lopesa .
42022051	Goa pisa pare Yesu nipumi goa adoa lalo : Go yada gimalepa . Nipuna kimi mua mo aane wala mea maasa .
42022052	Goa puare mo aanumi Yesu ripinaatalo ipisimi . Gore Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para lotu ada surube surube aanu-para aa mudu medalomanu-para ipisimi . Ipisimi rabu nipumi lalo : Nimina rai kutunu-para repena uninu mea epamena-ga gore nimimi ni paake ne aa kone sua tulalo epame pae ?
42022053	Oro yaalo niri nimi raapu lotu ada-para pimade pare nimimi ni talima kone naimide . Goa pemede pare abia go yapi di raburi ora nimina puri-para ribaana purimi rabuaata sa .
42022054	Goa puare nimumi Yesu epa adia Gote-na miru irae aa muduna ada-para mea pisimi . Goa pisimi raburi Pita nipumi nimu rata mea pisa pare nipu ogesi-daa mo-pare pua pirisa .
42022055	Go rabu aa medalomame epe pokaalo ada ru-nane repena adala pirisimi-pulu Pita nipu page nimu raapu pua pirisa .
42022056	Gore kogono ona medame Pita repena re-para pirina adesa rabu go oname Pita nipu-para goa sa : Go aa page abade Yesu raapu pirisa sa .
42022057	Pare Pita-me lalo : Go ona ni-daa dia-ga go aa-daa ni na-ade sa .
42022058	Pare wala ogesi-daa pirua aa medame wala nipu adoa lalo : Ne page Yesu raapu piriside sa . Gore Pita nipumi lalo : Go aa ni-daa ora dia sa .
42022059	Orope ogesi-daa adaalupu pirua aa medame agaa ora puri paloa gupa sa : Go aa nipuna adaare Galili ya-pulu nipu abade Yesu raapu pirisa .
42022060	Goa sa pare Pita-me lalo : Nemere go lae aa ora ni na-ade sa . Nipumi goa pa lalaina yaa kutame aba aipapulu rekoa agaa sa .
42022061	Go rabu Aa Mudumi pereke tua Pita ada moneasa . Goa pisa rabu Pita-me Aa Mudumi abade nipu-para lakalaade agaa wala niminaasa . Aba Yesumi gupa lakesade : Go rabu yaa kuta abia rekoa agaa tea pare neme ni rana repo gimali lakesade .
42022062	Go raburi Pita nipu so amaa-nane pua re puri palo lala pirisa .
42022063	Go rabu Yesu surube aanu nimumi nipu epa ripinaabawa ero agaa loa nipu tisimi .
42022064	Nipuna ini mamina-me rigitua nipu agaa gupa misimi : Nere aapimi tala paa simi . Nere Gote-na agaa lakene aa-ga agaa la simi .
42022065	Goa puare nimumi ero agaa rado rado lakesimi .
42022066	Orope yapi lapaasa raburi Israel onaana aa mudunu-para Gote-na miru irae aanu-para mo rekena agaa tisaanu page epa kiritasimi . Goa puare Yesu nipu kaunsil piri mea pua agaa gupa misimi :
42022067	Nere Onaa Wala Meape Aa-na Si yapae dia pae simi . Gore nipumi nimu lakesa : Gore mada lagialua pare nimimi ni kone narulalimi .
42022068	Go page neme nimi agaa medaloma mealuare nimimi agaa mada na-abuteme .
42022069	Abia page orope page ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Siri so yaa-para puri pane Gote-na popoke ki madaa oro yaalo pitua sa .
42022070	Go raburi nimu rayome lalo : Gore nere ora Gote-na Si yapae simi . Nipumi nimu goa lakesa : Nimina bipa go tame yaade sa .
42022071	Gore nimumi lalo : Niaame ake wala tema ya ? Niaame nipuna agaa go pagalema-pulu pa adasae aanuna agaa medaloma gimalima simi .
42023001	Go rabu kaunsil rayo aipapulu rekoa Yesu aa mudu Pailat piri mea pisimi .
42023002	Goa puare nimumi koso gupa laa simi : Go aamere niaana kone rado mogea Sisar-para mone takis nakatapape laa simi . Go page niri ora aa mudu Krais ta simi .
42023003	Go rabu Pailat-me nipu agaa misa : Nere Juda onaanuna Aa Mudu yapae sa . Yesumi lalo : Nena go lae-daa sa .
42023004	Go rabu Pailat-me Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para onaa rayo-para gupa lakesa : Neme apo aa-na wae kone meda penaame na-adalo-ga akolo wae yoto katoa pae sa .
42023005	Goa sa pare nimumi agaa puri paloa gupa simi : Nipumi onaanu-para agaa mogeaaya rabu nimu wae-rupa pogolasaasimi . Go kogonore pa amaa pua Galili su-para pua Judia su-para pua abia go su-para page epa pia simi .
42023006	Pailat-me go agaa pagoa nipumi agaa gupa sa : Go aa nipuna suri Galili ya ?
42023007	Gore nimumi e simi-pulu Pailat-me Yesu Herot piri-para mea penaasa . Gore Herot-mere Yesu madini su surubesa-pulu goa pisa . Go rabu Herot nipu page Jerusalem-para pirisa .
42023008	Herot-me Yesu adoa raaname waru omesa . Yesu madaa remaa abade pagesa-pulu nipumi Yesu adolalo pisa . Herot nipuna konere Yesumi napiaa kogono palia rabu adalua kone isa .
42023009	Go rabu Herot nipumi Yesu nipu agaa rado rado misa pare Yesu nipumi agaa meda na-abusa .
42023010	Go rabu Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para rekena agaana tisaanu-para nimumi rekaawa Yesu madaa puri pane koso agaa lo pisimi .
42023011	Go rabu Herot-para nipuna soldia aanumi Yesu-para makiraawa ero agaa waru simi . Nimumi ora pepena epe-rupa pi adaalu mamina meda mua Yesu madaa yamasimi . Goa pua Pailat piri lamua pisimi .
42023012	Abadere Herot nipumi Pailat raapu iaa-rupa pirisa pare wala go rabu kone padane sua adami aa-rupa wala pirisipi .
42023013	Go rabu Pailat-me Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para Juda aanuna aa mudu medalomanu-para onaa rayo page yaaloa makiritasa .
42023014	Go rabu nimu gupa lakesa : Nimimi abade go aa ni piri lamua epame yaade . Nipumi wae pora rado onaanu mea waata lamede . Go agaa madaare nimina ini agaa madaa nipu apo agaa meawade pare nimimi mo nipu koso laatalo pimi pare go aa nipumiri go waea meda napana kone salo sa .
42023015	Herot-me page go aa-na waea meda na-adesa . Pare na-adea-ga wala niaa piri-para go epenalana . Pagalepa . Go aamere abade nipumi waea meda napana-daa niaame nipu madaa natu maomalimina .
42023016	Goa pea-ga neme repena unimi nipu mea kudu tuare nipu mea repaano sa .
42023017	Gore oro yaalo eta yawe nape Pasova yapi di rabu Pailat-me kalabus ada piri aa padane maesepeaata pisa .
42023018	Go rabu mo piri onaa rayome puri paloa gupa yaasimi : Apo aare tu maomamina . Go aa Jisas Barabas-re niaana wala esepea epenala simi .
42023019	Jisas Barabas-me abade go adaare-para yada meda marekaawa aa meda tu maomaa nipu kalabus ada-para mapataasimi aa-para simi .
42023020	Gore Pailat-me Yesu wala maesepeaatalo kone sua onaanu-para agaa wala yaasa .
42023021	Goa pisa pare nimumi ora puri paloa gupa simi : Repena polopea madaa mea taminapa . Repena polopea madaa tamin aapa simi .
42023022	Goa simi pare Pailat-me wala rana repo gupa lakesa : Go aamere nipuna wae yae meda ake pana ? Neme wae yae meda ora na-adawade . Goa pea-pulu neme repena unimi mea tua esepealua sa .
42023023	Goa sa pare nimumi ora puri paloa Yesu repena polopea madaa tu maomamina simi . Goa pua nimumi Pailat-na agaa rabuaniaasimi .
42023024	Goa pua Pailat-me Yesu talepa loa nimuna agaa ratisa .
42023025	Nimuna wae aa Barabas mea esepeasa . Go aamere aba onaa wae-rupa mapogolasaawa aa meda tu maomasa rabu nipu kalabus ada-para mapataasimi . Goa pisa pare mo onaanumi go aa wala esepea lo simi rabu nimuna agaa pagoa Pailat-me Yesu nimuna pinalo mea kasa .
42023026	Nimumi Yesu nipu mea pisimi rabu pa aa meda madaasimi . Go aa-na biri Saimon nipuna su Sairini gimoa ipua no adaare-para polalo pisa . Go rabu nimumi repena polopea nipuna pasaane mariaasimi . Nipumi mea ruare Yesuna masaa-nane rata mea pisa .
42023027	Goa puare ora onaa adaapumi Yesu rata mea pisimi . Nimuna rikiraanare ona medalomame re loa yaasa odo pi laa-mama pisimi .
42023028	Pare Yesu nipumi wala pereke tua nimu gupa lakesa : Nimiri Jerusalem onanu-ya . Ni madaa re natapape pare nimi madaa page nimina nogo naaki madaa re lo piralapape sa .
42023029	Pagalepa . Orope kedaa meape di epalia rabu nogo naaki namadua adu nakane onanuri aipapulu mada pogola palimiri ora epe ta teme sa .
42023030	Go di raburi onaanumi mo rudunu-para gupa laketeme : Niaana masaa-nane lopoa niaa tu maomape teme . Gore wala oge rudunu-para gupa laketeme : Niaa makaledaape teme .
42023031	Abiare ora pani pia-daa go kedaa pia peme-ga orope wae yai epalia rabu ake kedaa ora omalimi ya ?
42023032	Go rabu nimumi pupitagi ne aa lapo page lamua pua Yesu raapu nil tulalo pisimi .
42023033	Nimu pua su meda Aalu Rogaae su temede go-para pua aasimi . Go-para Yesu repena polopea madaa nil tisimi . Mo wae aa laapo page nil-mi tua medare Yesuna popo ki-nane tua medare koya-nane tisimi .
42023034	Gore Yesumi lalo : Aapa , nimumi kone nasua pimi-ga nimuna wae yae mea rakepeape sa . Go pimi aare nimumi go yaena re na-adoa pimi sa . Go rabu go aanu nimumi Yesu nipuna mamina koyo mua satu tu pirisimi .
42023035	Go rabu pa onaanumi pa rekaawa adapaba pirisimi . Goa pisimi pare mo Juda aa mudunumi Yesu-para ero gupa simi : Nipumi abade onaa medaloma raba meaaria-ga nipuna bipa nipu raba mea simi . Gore Gote-me nipu Mea Rapae Aa ya-pulu mada palia simi .
42023036	Soldia aanumi page nipu-para ero agaa simi . Nimumi Yesu re-para ipua rero pi ipa wain epa katalo pisimi .
42023037	Gore nimumi gupa simi : Nere ora Juda aanuna aa mudu yalia-daare gore nena bipa raba mua no suna ipu simi .
42023038	Pepa meda so repena polopea rugi madaa tu saabaasimi : Go aare Juda aanuna Aa Mudu yaade lo simi .
42023039	Mo aa wae lapo abade tu mudiasimide medame Yesu-para ero agaa gupa sa : Ni Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si laede-ga neme saa page raba mea sa .
42023040	Go rabu mode mudiasimide aa medame aa-para gupa ape sa : Niaame kedaa padane-rupa meamade-ga nere Gote paala napea pae sa .
42023041	Saana kedaare saana papade aena ora mada gialeme . Pare abia go aare nipumi abade waea meda napisa sa .
42023042	Goa pua nipumi Yesu-para lalo : Yesu nere aa mudu pirali raburi ni madaa kone saina sa .
42023043	Gore Yesu nipumi nipu gupa lakesa : Neme ora ne lagialo . Abiare nere ni raapu so Gote-na epe maapu-para pirapana sa .
42023044	Go naare paalu rabu naare udunua ribaa yoa su rayo rigitaama pua naare nogo-nane pabola popesa .
42023045	Goa pisa raburi mo lotu ada ru-nane mudiabae adaa mamina so rugi-nane riripitaboa none rugi-nane pua riripi kiritisa .
42023046	Yesu nipumi puri paloa gupa sa : Aapa , nina wasupare nena ki-nane apo salo-daa sa . Nipumi goa sa rabu pu imu udunasa .
42023047	Mo soldia aanuna aa mudumi go adesa-pulu nipumi Gote-na bi minasaawa lalo : ora yaana go aare ora epe aa yana sa .
42023048	Onaa adaapumi nipu pia adolalo epa ado pirisimi pare nimuna aako rupitua ada wala pisimi .
42023049	Yesuna adami aanu rayo-para onanu medaloma aba so Galili su-para pirua Yesu nipu rata mea ipisimi . Nimu ogesi-daa mo-para rekaawa mo oyae rayo ado kiritisimi .
42023050	Aa meda nipuna biri Josep pirisa . Nipuri Juda aanuna adaare meda biri Arimatea su-para pirua nipu ora epe aa pirua Gote-na Surube Su epenalo adolalo pirisa . Gore nipumi kaunsil raapu pirisa pare Yesu tu maomamina simi rabu nipumi dia sa .
42023051	
42023052	Go aa nipu Pailat piri pua Yesuna rore nina mea ria pono sa .
42023053	Goa pua nipuna ro mea ruare mamina yaako pimi rogaa palae mea pisa . Goa pua nipu aana apedaa meda-para pua rogaasa . Go-parare abade aa meda abi narogaasimi .
42023054	Go yapi diri Kitu Pirape Yapi rudu sa-pulu go adaa oro rabu nape etanu maredepo yaasimi .
42023055	Onaanu abade Yesu nipu Galili su gimisa rabu nimumi nipu rata mea ipisimi . Nimumi Josep raapu pua mo aana apedaa matmat-para Josep-me rogaasa-rupa adesimi .
42023056	Goa pua nimumi adoa nimuna ada wala pua epe kaa pi yaenu Yesuna ro madaa sainalo managolata pisimi .
42024001	Gore adaa oro rabu kogono mupaa yapi di rabu mo onaanu matmat-para pisimi . Nimumi mode kaa pide yaenu-para aba managola sua mea madisimi .
42024002	Matmat-para ipisimi rabu mode pora gaape aana aba mea lusu rubenaloa adesimi .
42024003	Goa pua nimumi no matmat apedaa-para pua adesimi pare Aa Mudu Yesu nipuna rode nasabasaaya .
42024004	Goa pua nimu pa rekaawa kone adaapu su pirisimi rabu aa lapo nimu re-para aipapulu opapasipi . Go aa lapore nipuna mamina-nu ora yaako pu ti maraasipi .
42024005	Onanu nimuri paalame omoa su adaniaawa pirina aa lapome nimu gupa lakesipi : Nimimiri akeane matmat-para go aa asapeme pae ? Go aa ora pa pia-pulu go-para mada na-adalimi sipi .
42024006	Nipuri go-paradaa napia nipu aba rekaade . Abade nipu so Galili su-para pa pirua nimi lagisade agaa wala niminaatepa . Aba gupa lagisa :
42024007	Onaana Si Mea Rapae Aare wae onaanuna ki madaa mea kateme rabu nipu repena polopea madaa tu maomalimi . Goa pea pare wala yapi repo dia naloa wala rekalua lo lagisade sipi .
42024008	Go rabu onanumi Yesu nipuna abade lakesade agaa niminaasimi .
42024009	Go rabu nimumi mo matmat apedaa gimoa wala pisimi . Go rabu nimumi pa onaa medaloma-para disaipel aa 11-pela rayo piri-para pua mo nimumi adesimi yaenu rayo pua lakesimi .
42024010	Matmat-para pua adesimide onanuna biri gupa : Maria nipuna su Magadala-para Jon-para Jems-na agi Maria-para go onanu nimumi go yae adesimi . Go onanu-para pa ona medaloma-para mo agaare moge riaae aanu lakesimi .
42024011	Lakesimi pare aposel kogono aanumi mo onanu pa amaa po ripu agaa pa tame kone isimi-pulu nimuna agaa madaa kone narulasimi .
42024012	Pare Pita nipu rekoa matmat-para wala aloma adola pisa . Nipumi no aana apedaa matmat-para pua adaniaawa mamina padane adesa . Nipu wala ada pua kone adaapu sua gore ake pana pae kone isa .
42024013	Go raburi mo disaipel aanu ipa laapo Emeus su-para polalo pisipi . Nipu Jerusalem su gimoa Emeasa pora-nia ogesi-daa adaalu pu pisipi .
42024014	Nipu go pora-nia pulaaware mo abade adesipide remaa la-mama pisipi .
42024015	Nipu laapome agaa la-mama pula pirina Yesu nipu ipua nipu raapu pisimi .
42024016	Go nipu laapome nipu adesipi pare ora Yesu-rupa naniminaasipi .
42024017	Go rabu Yesumi nipu lapo lakesa : Nipimiri ake laa-mama pula pipi ? Nipumi goa sa rabu nipu laapo pa rekabaawa nipuna kone pu robaa-para kedaa pua ini agaa-para odo pina aasipi .
42024018	Go aa meda nipuna biri Kliopas go aame agaa gupa misa : Jerusalem su-para pamede aanu-para lapade pare onaanu-para kimisu onaanu-para nimumi ademe-ga ne padane-mare abade gona remaa napage aa-para pirua lae pae ?
42024019	Yesu nipumi nipu agaa gupa misa : Ake-para tape pae ? Nipumi nipu gupa lakesipi : Nasaret Yesuna remaa-para lapade . Go aare ora Gote-na agaa lakene aa pirua Gote-na ini agaa-para ona rayona ini agaa-para ora puri pane agaa madaa kogono laapo pea .
42024020	Pare niaana miru irae aa mudunu-para niaana aa mudu medalomanu-parame kaunsil mea kalamede sipi . Gore nimumi nipu tu maomatepape lakenaloa nipu repena polopea madaa tamede sipi .
42024021	Gore abade niaame go aamere Israel onaanu niaa wala minalo mea rapae aa kone sama . Gonu rayo pame raburi abiare yapi repo aba go popaade .
42024022	Abiare niaana ruru ona medalomame niaa mapogolasaarimi . Ora abade yapipu nimu matmat aana apedaa-para adola puame ya .
42024023	Pare Yesu nipuna ro na-adame ya . Goa pua nimu wala ipua niaame ensel medaloma adama lo lagiame . Gore ensel-numi Yesuri aba rekoa epe-rupa pia lo lagiame lame .
42024024	Niaana ruru aa medalomame matmat-para pua mo onanumi epa lagiamede-rupa pua adame pare nipu na-adameya sipi .
42024025	Go rabu Yesumi nipu gupa lakesa : Gore nipiri kone nasua tepe . Nipina robaa-parare mo Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi lagisimide remaa madaa kone ora ogepusi rulaaripina .
42024026	Nipi naniminaaepe ? Gote-na onaanu wala minalo Mea Repae Aame aba ripia radaa noa epe paana puri mealialo napagapena ?
42024027	Gore Yesumi Moses-na agaa madaa mea ripimaawa Gote-na agaa lakene aanuna remaa rayo lakeloa Gote-na buk madaa i agaame nipu madaa ta-rupa go rayo lakesa .
42024028	Nimu agaa laa-mama pua mo aa lapo nipuna polalo pisipi adaare re-para opapasimi . Go rabu Yesu nipuna raaname ogesi-daa adaalu pu pisa .
42024029	Goa pua mo aa lapome nipu-para lalo : Adoaa . Ogesi-daa pa piramina . Naare pabola pea-ga nere saa raapu piramina sipi . Go rabu nipu ada ru-nane pua nipu raapu padane-para pirisimi .
42024030	Gore eta nolalore Yesu nipu raapu reke madaa pirisipi . Go rabu nipumi bret mua Gote-para ora pi loa piribia mo aa laapo kasa .
42024031	Nipumi goa pisa rabu nipu lapome ini rupaawa robaa-para paa ipisa rabu waru adesipi . Goa pisipi pare go rabu Yesu pa aipapulu pisa-pulu wala na-adesipi .
42024032	Gore go aa lapome lalo : Saa aba pora-nia epapade rabu nipumi saa Gote-na agaa mogeaaria-daa saana pu robaa-para rekatabea sipi .
42024033	Nipu lapome goa loare aipapulu rekoa wala Jerusalem su-para pisipi . Nipumi mo aposel kogono aa 11-pela page pa adami aa medaloma page nimu kiritaba pirina adesipi .
42024034	Gore mo aanumi nipu gupa lakesimi : Aa Mudu ora rekaa yaade simi . Saimon-me nipu ora adaa yaade sipi .
42024035	Go raburi go aa lapome mo onaanu-para mo pora-nia pisade remaa lakesipi . Goa pua Aa Mudu nipumi bret mea piribiaawa niaa gia rabu saame waru ada pa sipi .
42024036	Nimumi go agaa lala pirina Yesu aipapulu nimuna rikiraana epa rekasa . Go rabu nipumi nimu-para lalo : Nimina robaa-para epe kuma pi kone su piralepa sa .
42024037	Pare nimumi remo meda kone isimi-pulu nimumi paalame omesimi .
42024038	Gore nipumi nimu gupa lakesa : Nimiri akeane pogolasaarimi ya ? Nimina robaa-para kone adaapuri akeane saleme pae ?
42024039	Gore ora ni yaade-ga nina ki aanu adalepa . Nimina kimi naa yogane uni lapo-para oraatepa . Remore gupa-daa dia yaade sa .
42024040	Nipumi goa loare nipuna ki aa lapo nimumi adenalo mea waasa .
42024041	Nimumi pedo ora waru pua kone adaapu isimi-pulu nimumi kone narulasimi . Go raburi nipumi nimu agaa misa : Nimiri eta medaloma saapimi pae sa .
42024042	Nimumi aba irabae ena piribini mea kasimi .
42024043	Gore nimumi adabaina nipumi mua nisa .
42024044	Nipumi nimu goa lakesa : Abade ni nimi raapu pa pirisude rabu nimi go yae madaa aba lagisude . Gore mo Moses-na rekena agaame page Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi page buk Sam-para page ni madaa loa tisimi yaade . Go remaana re ora adalimina lagiawade sa .
42024045	Go rabu nipumi nimuna robaa-para paa maepasa-pulu nimumi mo Gote-na agaa waru adesimi .
42024046	Go rabu nipumi Gote-me onaanu wala minalo Mea Repae aamere kedaa adaa meda rua matmat-para pirua yapi repo dia naloa ome su gimoa rekalialo i yaade sa .
42024047	Nipuna bina purimi su rayona piri onaanumi kone perekeaminalo agaa lakelatepape sa . Goa puare Gote-me onaanuna wae yae mea rubalia-ga agaa laketepape sa . Go kogonore so Jerusalem-para ripima pua su rayona pinalo lakelatepa .
42024048	Yesumi apo agaa lo kiritua nimu-para wala lalo : Nimimi go adalemade yaenu madaa remaa laketapape .
42024049	Abade Gote-me puri gialua lo lagisa-pulu neme ora mea repaalua . Pare nimimi so yaa-para i puri nimi madaa epenalo Jerusalem siti-para adoaatepape sa .
42024050	Go rabu nimu go adaare gimoa Betani su-para lamua pisa . Go-parare nipuna ki minasaawa nimu-para epe puri minalo agaa lakesa .
42024051	Nimu-para lakelaama pua nimu piri-para gimisa . Goa pua Gote-me nipu yaa-para mea pisa .
42024052	Gore nimumi nipuna bi minasaawa Jerusalem su-para wala pisimi . Pisimi rabu pedo waru pua raaname omoa pisimi .
42024053	Goa puare oro yaalo nimu lotu ada-para pirua Gote-para ora pi lo pirisimi .
43001001	Abade su yaa lapo nawarini rabu Gote-na Agaa aba pirisa . Go Agaare nipuna bipa nipu Gote-rupa pirisa .
43001002	Aba ripiare go Agaa nipu Gote raapu pirisipi .
43001003	Gote-me oyaeyae rayo go Agaame warisa-pulu wariape yae meda pa-rupa naopapasa .
43001004	Go pirisa Agaare nipuna kagaa piraama laama pope kone isa-pulu nipumi go kone su amaa mea ipua onaanuna robaa-para paa mea kasa .
43001005	Go paare ora ribaane-para roasa-pulu ribaana wae yaenumi go paa namaudunaaya .
43001006	Gote-me aa medana bi Jon temenalo mea rapaasa .
43001007	Go aamere go epe paa madaa agaa laketalo ipisa . Laketalo ipisa pare onaanumi go agaa pagoa Yesu madaa kone rulaminalo ipisa .
43001008	Go aare nipu go paa meape aa-daa dia yapare nipumi mo paa madaa agaa laketalo ipisa .
43001009	Ora go epe paare su amaa madisa rabu onaa rayona robaa-para makuaa adenalo paa katalo ipisa .
43001010	Go Agaare su amaa ipisa . Gote-me warisa yaere go Agaame warisa . Nipu epa Agaa pirisa pare onaanumi go Agaa waru na-adesimi .
43001011	Go Agaare nipuna adaare-para epa pirisa pare nipuna onaanumi nipuna agaa gimoa napagesimi .
43001012	Go rabu onaa medalomame nipuna pora kurua nipu madaa kone rulaeme . Goa peme-pulu Gote-me nimu ora nipuna nogo naaki-rupa mapiraaya .
43001013	Nimu Gote-na nogo naaki-rupa piruaeme agi aaraa lapome madini nogo naaki napiruaeme . Dia , nimuna aaraare Gote padaneme madisa-pulu rado-rupa piruaeme .
43001014	Go Agaare nipu yogane maawa sana aa-rupa piruare niaana rikiraana epa pirisa . Nipuri nipuna Aapana Si padane ya-pulu Aaraana puri paa mu pirina adema . Niaana rikiraana pirisa rabu ora agaa-para raba meape kone page nipuna robaa-para rulatabesa .
43001015	Jon-me nipu madaa gupa lakesa : Go aa madaare neme abade agaa gupa sude : Nipuri nina masaa-nane epalia pare nipuna purimi ni maoge yaalia . Nipu aa mudu piralia pare ni abi namadini raburi nipu aba pa pirisa lagesude .
43001016	Nipuna epe raba meape kone-para titame omea-para rulatabena nipumi niaa padane padane laatapu epe raba meapa kone page titame omea page gisa .
43001017	Gore Gote-me rekena agaa kasa rabu Moses-me mea ipisa . Goa pisa pare epe kone-para ora agaa-parare Yesu Krais-me mea ipisa .
43001018	Aa medame Gote ora na-ademe . Ora dia . Mo nipuna naaki nipu padane Gote raapu medaa-rupa pipi . Go naakimi nipuna Aapana agaa niaa piri-para mea ipua waata .
43001019	Jerusalem su-para piri Juda aanumi Gote-na miru irae aanu-para Livai aa-para nimu rayo Jon piri-para mea repaasimi . Goa pua nimumi Jon agaa gupa misimi : Nere aapi ya ?
43001020	Go rabu Jon-me agaana kudiri pi redepo ne agaa gupa lakesa : Niri Krais-daa dia sa .
43001021	Go rabu nimumi lalo : Gore nere Krais-daa dia yaana-ga nere Elaija yapae simi . Dia sa . Gore ne Gote-na agaa lakene aa ya ? Dia sa .
43001022	Go rabu nimumi wala lapopa Jon-para lalo : Gore nere aapi yapae simi . Niaame mo niaa mea repaarimi aanu-para agaa waru ipua laketema-pulu ne-parare niaame ake teme ya ?
43001023	Go rabu Jon-me Aisaia-na agaa mogeawa lakesa : Niri gupa pulalo pi : Neme onaa napiri su-para agaame yalano : Aa Mudu-na pamuape pora maredepo yaatapape to sa .
43001024	Go agaa mulalo pisimi aanuri Farisi aanuna rurumi o taasimi .
43001025	Nimumi Jon agaa meda wala agaa gupa misimi . Gore nere Krais-daa dia laede . Go page nere Gote-na agaa lakene aa-daa dia laede . Go page ni Elaija dia laede . Goa pea-ga neme onaana baptais-ri akolo kate pae simi .
43001026	Goa simi rabu Jon-me gupa sa : Neme pa ipame baptais meaayo pare nimina rikiraana aa meda rekaaya pare naniminaaeme .
43001027	Go aare nina masaa-nane epalia pare nipu ora epe aa ya-pulu nipuna aariti esepea kege radepeta palua sa .
43001028	Apo agaare Betani su-para pisa . Go suri ipa Jordan-na mone pane go su-para Jon-me baptais kalaama pirua sa .
43001029	Ekeraa-nanere Jon-me Yesu ipisa rabu adoa lalo : Adalepa . Gote-na sipsip si-rupa ya-pulu nipumi su amaa piri onaa rayona pupitagi ne kone wae rayo mea rubaalia .
43001030	Go aa madaare abade neme gupa sude : Nina masaa-nane aa meda epalia pare nipu ni namadini rabu nipu aba pirisa-pulu nipu adaape pia .
43001031	Neme abade nipu na-adesu pare Juda onaanumi nipu adenalo baptais meaata ipisude sa .
43001032	Jon agaa gupa lakesa : Neme aba Holi Spirit yaa nona piane biyaa ipua Yesuna aaluna epa pirisa rabu adesu .
43001033	Go raburi niri Yesu yapae lo waru naniminaasu pare Gote-me ni gupa lagisa : Holi Spirit yaa nona piane biyaa ipua aa meda madaa epa piraliade aamere Holi Spirit-na baptais meala epalia sa .
43001034	Jon-me wala lalo : neme ora adawa pare nipu Gote-na Si ria yaade sa .
43001035	Ekeraa-nane Jon nipuna disaipel aa laapo raapu pirisimi .
43001036	Go rabu Yesu pamualaina adoa nipumi lalo : Nipu adalepa . Go aare Gote-na sipsip mena si yaade sa .
43001037	Mo disaipel aa laapome go agaa pagoa Yesu rata mea pisipi .
43001038	Rata mea pisipi rabu Yesumi pereke tua nipu adesa-pulu agaa gupa misa : Gore nipiri ake asapipi ? Nipu lapome lalo : Rabai , nere aapina ada-para pi ? Go bi Rapaina re-re tisaa teme .
43001039	Go rabu nipumi lalo : Epa adalepa . Goa sa-pulu nipu raapu pua nipu piri ada-para pua pirisimi . Go yapi rayo nipu raapu pirisimi . Ada-para pirina naare nogo-nane pabola popesa .
43001040	Gore aa laapome Yesuna agaa pagesipi go aa medare Yesu raapu pisipi . Go aa-na biri Andru nipu Saimon Pita-na ame pirisa .
43001041	Go rabu Andru-mi ame Saimon adasaawa agaa gupa lakesa : Niaame Mea Repae Aa aba adama sa . Mea Repae bina re gupa Mesaia Krais teme .
43001042	Go rabu Andru-mi ame Yesu piri-para mea ipisa . Yesumi go ame adoa lalo : Nere Jon-na si Saimon yapare oropere nena bi Sifas teme sa . Go bi perekeaere Pita temena pare go bina re-re aana yaade .
43001043	Ekeraa-nane Yesu nipu Galili su-para polalo pisa-pulu nipumi Filip adasaawa lalo : Saa bana sa .
43001044	Filip-ri nipu madini suri Betsaida . Go adaare-re Andru Pita lapona adaare-para pirisipi .
43001045	Gore Filip-mi Nataniel asapuare gupa lakesa : Moses-me abade rekena agaa madaa remaa tisade aare niaame aba adasaarima . Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi page go aa epalialo pepa madaa tu isimide . Goa aare Nasaret su-para piri Josep-na si yaade sa .
43001046	Goa sa-pulu Nataniel-me agaa gupa misa : Gore epe yaenuri Nasaret su-para mada epena ya ? Filip-mi agaa go-rupa sa : Adola bana sa .
43001047	Gore Yesumi Nataniel nipu piri ipisa rabu nipu agaa gupa lakesa : Go aare nipu ora Israel aa meda yaade . Nipumi yaa agaa nane aa yaade sa .
43001048	Go rabu Nataniel-me nipu-para agaa gupa misa : Niri aa-rabu makuaari ya ? Gore Yesumi lalo : Abade Filip nipi repena fik re-para piralaina adawade .
43001049	Goa sa rabu Nataniel-me lalo : Tisaa , ne ora Gote-na Si yaade . Ne ora Israel onaana aa mudu pi sa .
43001050	Goa sa rabu Yesumi lalo : Neme nere mo repena fik re-para pirae lawade-ga go madaa kone rulaari ya ? Orope adali yaena purimi go abia adae yaenu maoge yaalia sa . Orope yae medalomame nina puri waru mea waatea .
43001051	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Neme ora ria lagialo . Oropere yaa-para pora lobenaloa Gote-na ensel-nu ni nipuna Onaanu Raapu Pirape Aa madaa epala puala palia-daa adalimina sa .
43002001	Wala yapi laapo dia naloa aa medame Galili su ru-nane pirua Kana adaare-para ona rumaasa . Nipumi ona rumaasa-pulu Yesuna agi-para nipuna disaipel aanu-para yaasimi rabu adola ipisimi .
43002002	
43002003	Nimumi yawe eta aba noa oropere wain ipa dia sa rabu Yesuna agimi nipu-para lalo : Nimuna ipa wain dia yaade sa .
43002004	Gore Yesumi lalo : Go ona , nina kogono aa neme agaa meda abi nakelape . Nina kogono pape yapi diri abi naepea .
43002005	Goa pisa rabu Yesuna agimi disaipel aanu gupa lakesa : Nipumi gupa pipape teare nimimi goa ora pipape sa .
43002006	Go ada aana-me warini ipa pe oraapu isa . Go aana pe padanere wabola piralade pe dila nona piane isa . Juda aanu nimuna rekena kone isimi-pulu oro yaalo nimuna waswas tape ipa pe mea isimi .
43002007	Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para lalo : Mogo aana pe madaa ipa nalepa sa . Goa sa-pulu nimumi no rubia palala pua isimi .
43002008	Go rabu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Abia go ipa meda noria pua mo eta surube aa pua katapa . Nimu mo ipa mea pua kasimi rabu mo aame mo ipa rede pea pame mea nadesa . Go yaere abade pa ipa pirisa pare abia ipa wain-ga go eta surube aame ipa aa-para mea pae loa namakuaasa . Yapare ipa no pabe kogono aanu nimumi adesimi . Goa pea-pulu mo eta surube aame mo ona rumaatalo pi aa-para lakeloa ipu sa .
43002009	
43002010	Go rabu nipumi lalo : Aa medalomame epe ipa wain aba rumaainaloa onaanumi adaapu nenaloare wala orope wae wain rumaasimi . Goa peme pare neme epe wain orope mea rumaariaa sa .
43002011	Go puri pane kogonore Yesumi Galili su robo ru-nane aaya Kana adaare-para aba ripima pisa . Go adaare-parare Yesumi nipuna epe paana puri wanaloa nipuna disaipel aanumi nipu madaa kone rulasimi .
43002012	Goa puare Yesu-para nipuna agi-para amenu-para disaipel aanu-para mo Kaperneam adaare-para pua pirisimi .
43002013	Gore Juda aanuna Pasova yawe ne adaa yapi di rudu sa-pulu Yesu Jerusalem su-para pisa .
43002014	Lotu ada ru-nanere aanumi maket pua gawa sipsip yaa madaa yoto mealaina Yesumi adesa . Goa pua mone sens pape aanu reke madaa pirina adesa .
43002015	Yesumi ope mua ote meda waria apo mena-para mena puni aanu-para lotu ada amaa-nane ratu tisa . Go page mo mone misimi aanuna reke musaawa mone lakepe rubebe pisa .
43002016	Go rabu mo yaa madaa yoto mealae aanu-para Yesumi lalo : Go yaanu amaa mea pulupa . Nina Aapana lotu ada namabebolatepa . Dia nimina stua ada-rupa namula tapape sa .
43002017	Goa sa rabu nipuna disaipel aanumi Gote-na agaa i buk madaa kone wala rulasimi . Mo buk madaa agaa gupa isa : Gote , nena lotu ada madaare neme kone mapiraae-pulu nina pu robaa ora rekoaaya .
43002018	Go rabu Juda aanu Yesu agaa gupa misimi : Niaame nena puri waru adamona-ga ake piane napiaa kogono pali-daa adalima pae simi .
43002019	Yesumi nimu agaa gupa lakesa : Nimi go Gote-na ada kilipialimi rabu neme yapi repona ru-para wala wariabalua .
43002020	Goa sa rabu nimumi pogolasaawa Yesu-para agaa wala gupa lakesimi . Neme go ada yapi repona ru-para mada wariali ya ? Go lotu ada warisima diri maali 46-pela ru-para wariasima simi .
43002021	Yapare Yesumi lotu ada warialua agaa lakesa rabu nipuna to yogane goa palia lo lakesa .
43002022	Gore orope Gote-me Yesu matmat madaa marekainaloa nipuna disaipel aanumi mo sade agaa wala niminaasimi . Go rabu nimumi Yesuna agaa-para Gote-na buk madaa i agaa-para kone rulasimi .
43002023	So Jerusalem su-para Pasova yawe ne adaa yapi di isimi rabu Yesu page pisa . Go rabu Yesumi napiaa kogono pisa-pulu onaa adaapumi nipu madaa kone rulasimi .
43002024	Pare Yesumi onaa rayona kone adesa-pulu pa onaanu raapu piruapena kone narulasa .
43002025	Nipumi onaa rayona robaa-para adokaru misa-pulu pa onaa medame nipu kone makuaae meda nalakesimi .
43003001	Farisi ruruna aa medana biri Nikodemus nipu Juda aanuna aa mudu pirisa .
43003002	Go aame yapi meda ribaa Yesu piri-para ipua gupa sa : Tisaa , nere Gote-na agaa mogeainalo mea rapaasa . Go konere niaame makuaaema pare Gote ne raapu pia-pulu neme napiaa kogono epe-rupa pe sa .
43003003	Yesumi saa pi agaa gupa sa : Neme ne ora lagialo . Aa medame agina robaa-para wala napiralia-daare Gote-na Surube Su mada na-adalia sa .
43003004	Go rabu Nikodemus-mi lalo : Akea pua aa meda robaa-para wala mea madialia ya ? Aa meda agina robaa-para wala piralia rabu rana laapo mada namadialia .
43003005	Goa sa rabu Yesumi lalo : Neme ora lagialo . Aa medamere nipu ipa-para Holi Spirit-para namua piraliare Gote-na Surube Su mada na-adalia .
43003006	Onaana yoganeme madini onaare yogane pa ia . Go page Holi Spirit-mi madini onaare Holi Spirit raapu pia .
43003007	Goa pea pare ne kagaa opainalo remaa lagiawade-ga kone adaapu nasape .
43003008	Po ripu nipuri aa-para popea palo mada na-ade . Niaame nipuna kete-daa pagema raburi aa-para epea pae aa-para pea palo niaame na-adema . Holi Spirit-mi madini onaamere po ripu-rupa go yaena re mada ademe .
43003009	Goa sa rabu Nikodemus-mi lalo : Go lae agaa madaare akea pua kagaa palua ya ?
43003010	Yesumi lalo : Nere ora Israel onaanuna profet ya-pulu neme go agaa naniminaate ?
43003011	Neme ne lagialo . Niaame agaa tema rabu niaana ade yae-para page agaa tema pare nimi rayome go agaa gimaleme .
43003012	Neme go su amaa yaenuna re lagialo rabu kone narulaeme . Goa pea-pulu orope yaa madaa yaenuna re lagialua rabu page kone ora narulalimi .
43003013	Gore pa onaa meda yaa-para abi napeme . Onaanu Raapu Pirape Aana Siri ni padane yaa-para pirua su amaa ipisude sa .
43003014	Abadere Moses-me onaa napiri su-para pua repena rugi madaa paka rogaawa minasaasa . Go-rupare orope nimumi Onaanu Raapu Pirape Aana Si mea tua pitalimi .
43003015	Goa pea-pulu onaa rayome ni madaa kone rulalimiri go onaa rayo oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi .
43003016	Gore Gote-me su amaa piri onaa rayo madaa pedo pu raaname omesa-pulu ora nipuna Si padane mea repasa . Goa pea-ga onaa rayome ni madaa kone mapiraalimiri nimu ora naomalimi pare oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi .
43003017	Goa pea-pulu Gote-me ni nipuna Si su amaa koso agaa pagenalo namea rapaasa . Dia , pare onaa epe pora mea wanalo mea rapaasa .
43003018	Onaa rayome ni madaa kone rulalimiri nipu koso agaa natea . Yapare onaa medalomame ni madaa kone narulalimiri nimu koso madaa aba popalimi . Go onaanuri ni Gote-na Si padane madaa kone narulaeme-pulu koso madaa wae yoto mulalo pimi .
43003019	Go koso lapena re-re gupa : Epe paa go su amaa aba ipisa pare onaanumi waeanu pu pimi . Nimumi go epe paa gimoa ribaa madaa raana omoa pimi .
43003020	Go waea peme onaanuri epe paame nimuna wae yaenu penaame waatea lo go paa masaa-nane mea roto tu ruboa pimi . Goa pua nimu epe paa roaaya-para naepeme .
43003021	Goa pea pare epea peme onaanuri Gote-na agaa pago pimi-pulu paa-para peme epe kogono wanalo epeme sa .
43003022	Orope Yesu nipuna disaipel aanu raapu Judia su robona ru-nane pisimi . Go su-parare Yesu nimu raapu pirua baptais kasa .
43003023	Go rabu Jon-me Ainon su-para ipa adaapu popesa-pulu baptais go-para pua kasa . Haran suri Salim su re-para aasa . Onaanu nipu pirisa-para epenaloa baptais kasa .
43003024	Go raburi Herot-me Jon kalabus ada abi namapaatisa .
43003025	Go rabu Jon-na disaipel aa medalomame Juda aa meda-para ipame radepene rekena agaa madaa ape simi .
43003026	Ape simi rabu nimu Jon piri ipua lalo : Tisaa , aa meda abade ne raapu ipa Jordan-na mone pane pisipide kone niminaate ? Go aa madaa agaa aba lagisi . Go aare abia baptais kane aa ya-pulu onaa rayo nipu piri-para pua baptais meme sa .
43003027	Go rabu Jon-me lalo : Gote-me onaanu oyae nakateare nimumi mada namealimi .
43003028	Nimimi nina agaa aba pagesimi rabu neme agaa gupa sude : Niri ora Gote-na Mea Repae Aa-daa dia yapare Gote-me ni aba mea epenasade .
43003029	Aa medame nipuna ona rumaatalo paliare go ona ora nipuna ore piralia . Go rabu go aa-na adami aanumi pago piralimi . Go adami aame ona rumaatalo aa-na agaa pagalia rabu raaname omalia . Go konere nina raaname omape kone go-rupa ora epeaalia .
43003030	Gore Yesuna biri ora sone minasaamina pare nina biri su amaa pa rabuaniaalimina .
43003031	So yaa-para piruaaya epe aare niaa rayona aa mudu pia . Su amaa madini onaare ora su amaa onaa ya-pulu su amaa agaa madaa laketeme . Goa pea pare so yaa-para pirua none epe i aare oyae rayona aa mudu pia .
43003032	Nipumi adoa pagea yae madaa agaa laketa pare onaanumi nipuna agaa madaa kone narulaeme .
43003033	Goa pea pare onaa rayome nipuna agaa madaa kone rulaeme-pulu Gote-re ora agaa ne aa yaade .
43003034	Gote-me epenasa aare Gote-na Holi Spirit robaa-para marulatabaaya-pulu go aamere Gote-na agaa laketa .
43003035	Gore Aapame nipuna naaki madaa pedo pu raaname omoa nipuna puri kanaloa oyae rayo surubea .
43003036	Goa pea-pulu onaa rayome Gote-na Si madaa kone rulalimi-daare oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi . Yapare onaa rayome Gote-na Sina agaa rasalimiri oro yaalo napiralimi . Dia , pare Gote-na ratu yawe konere go onaanumi oro yaalo mealimi .
43004001	Farisi aanumiri Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa adaapu mua baptais katalo pagesimi . Goa pisa-pulu Yesuna disaipel onaanumiri Jon-na disaipel onaa maoge yaasa-daa pagesimi .
43004002	Yapare Yesumi baptais nakasa pare nipuna disaipel aanumi agu baptais kasimi .
43004003	Yesumi go agaa pagoa Judia su gimoa Galili su-para wala pisa .
43004004	Gore Judia su gimoa Galili su puaa-mama puare Samaria su-para pua opopasa .
43004005	Mo Samaria suna adaarena bi medare Sikar simi . Go adaare-re abade Jekop-me nipuna si Josep rumaa kasade su maapuri go adaare re-para aasa .
43004006	Go su-parare abade Jekop-me ipa nape naaku awesade . Yesu nipu pora pua paalame omesa-pulu mo ipa naaku re-para pua kitu pirisa . Goa pua pirisa naare iniri 12 klok rabu pirisa .
43004007	Go rabu Samaria ona meda ipa nola ipisa rabu Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Ipa meda no gi sa .
43004008	Go raburi nipuna disaipel aanuri aba mo adaare-para eta kabolalo pisimi .
43004009	Goa sa rabu Samaria oname Yesu-para lalo : Nere Juda aa yapare niri Samaria ona ya-pulu akeane ni-para ipa nano gi lae ya ? Gore Juda aanuri Samaria onaa raapu eta medaa-para nanisimi .
43004010	Yesu nipumi mo ona-para agaa gupa lakesa : Neme Gote-me pa giape yae niminaawa go ipa nano gi ta aa-na bi pagola pae-daare gore ni agaa mula pae yaalore ora ipa yokea-rupa epe agaa mada lagula pawa .
43004011	Mo oname lalo : Aa adaaya , nena ipa nape pe nasana . Go ipa naaku ora no-para pia-ga go epe ipa yokea-rupa aa-para meali ya ?
43004012	Niaana akua Jekop-me go ipa nape naaku wari gisa . Gore nipumi page sinumi page mena gawa sipsip-numi page go ipa no aema . Goa pea-ga nere Jekop rabuniaawa pi ya ?
43004013	Yesu nipumi lalo : Onaa rayome go ipa nalimi-daare orope nimuna peto kaapu yaalia rabu wala nolalo epalimi .
43004014	Yapare onaame nina gulalo pi ipa nalimi-daare ora mada teme . Nina ipare onaana robaa-para ipa yokea-rupa mapiraalua-pulu pa ipa meda nane go ipame oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi .
43004015	Goa sa-pulu oname lalo : Aa adaa , go laede ipa giaina ni orope go ipa naaku-para wala nanola epalua .
43004016	Goa sa rabu Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Nena aani aba pua yaaloa one ipulupape .
43004017	Oname lalo : Ni aa meda napia sa . Yesumi lalo : Nena aani napia laere gore ora lae .
43004018	Nere aa supu piside pare go abia ne raapu pipi aare ora nena aani-daa dia . Go nena agaare ora lae .
43004019	Goa sa rabu oname lalo : Aa adaaya , abia neme nere adalo pare ne Gote-na agaa lakene aa yaana .
43004020	Niaana Samaria akuanumi go rudu madaa rumua kiritaawa Gote-na bi minasaasimi . Goa pisimi pare nimi Juda aanumiri no Jerusalem su-para Gote-na bi minasaamina teme sa .
43004021	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Ona , naa agaa waru paga . Orope epaliade yapi di rabu onaanumi go rudu madaa page Jerusalem su-para page Gote-na bi naminasalimi .
43004022	Nimi Samaria onaanuri nimi kone nasua bi minasaaeme pare niaa Juda onaanumiri bi niminaawa minasaaema . Oro yaalo pirape konere Juda aanumi mea ipisimi .
43004023	Pare abia page orope epaliade yapi di rabu page onaanumi Aapana bi padane epe-rupa minasaalimi . Nipuna bi epe-rupa minasaaeme onaanuri Aapame raaname omea .
43004024	Gote-re nipu ora Holi Spirit pia-pulu onaanumi nipuna bi minasaalimi-daare nimuna kone wasupame-para ora agaame lotu loa bi minasaamina .
43004025	Go rabu oname Yesu-para lalo : Gote-na Mea Repae Aa nipuna bi meda Krais-re nipu epalia simi-daa niminaato sa . Go aa epalia rabu niaa oyae rayona re lagialia sa .
43004026	Yesumi lalo : Go aare ni yaade . Abia ne raapu agaa go tapa-daa sa .
43004027	Goa lalaina Yesuna disaipel aanu ipua Yesu pa ona meda raapu agaa lakeloaaya-ga kone adaapu isimi . Pare disaipel aanumi paala omoa nalakesimi : Neme ake pua go ona lakelae pa simi .
43004028	Go rabu go oname nipuna ipa pe gimoa mo adaare-para pua onaanu-para gupa pua lakesa :
43004029	Go aa meda epa adalepa . Nipumi nina pisude-anu rayo epa lagia-pulu nipu Gote-me Mea Repae Aa yapae sa .
43004030	Goa sa rabu nimu su adaare gimoa Yesu piri-para adola ipisimi .
43004031	Go ipisimi raburi mo disaipel aanumi nipu-para lalo : Tisaa , ne eta na simi .
43004032	Pare Yesu nipumi lalo : Nina eta medaloma ina nimimi na-ademe .
43004033	Goa sa-pulu disaipel aanumi nimuna lala pirua gupa simi : Aa medame nipuna eta epa kalame ya ?
43004034	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nipumi ni mea epenasadere nipuna agaa pagoa kogono pu kiritaayo . Go kogonore nina eta yaade .
43004035	Nimina saa pi agaa gupa teme : Akua 12-pela piruare eta nape awalimi . Nina saa agaa pagalepa . Mo maapu-para adalepape . Mo maapu-para pore nape eta adaapu etea-ga keralimina .
43004036	Maapuna eta kiritape aare yoto aba mea-pulu etamere oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama mapuaalia . Goa pea-pulu eta pone onaa-para eta aawae onaa-para nimu raapu raaname omalimina .
43004037	Saa agaa meda gupa teme : Aa padaneme maapu-para eta wai poaaya pare aa medame eta awoa nalia teme .
43004038	Apo saa agaana re gupa sa : Nimi go maapu-para e napoaeme pare awalimina . Onaa medalomame go maapu eta poasimi-pulu nimimi nipuna kogono madaare eta mealimina .
43004039	Gore mo adaare-para Samaria onaa adaapumi mo onana agaa pagesimi-pulu Yesuna agaa madaa kone rulasimi . Mo oname aba gupa sa : Nina abade pisude wae yae rayo lagiaa sa .
43004040	Gore Samaria onaanumi Yesu piri-para ipua lalo : Niaana adaare-para pa piramina . Goa simi rabu Yesu nipu yapi laapome go su-para pirisimi .
43004041	Yesumi epe agaa lakesa-pulu onaa adaapumi nipu madaa kone rulasimi .
43004042	Goa pisimi rabu mo ona-para gupa lakesimi : Abia kone rulatema pare nena agaa agu-daa padane madaa kone narulatema . Dia , pare nipuna agaa pagemade-pulu onaa rayona Raba Meape Aa yaanaloa kone rulaema simi .
43004043	Yesu yapi laapo dia naloa Galili su-para pua pirisa .
43004044	Goa pua Yesumi gupa sa : Gote-na agaa lakene aare nipuna madini su-parare nipuna bi naminasaaeme sa .
43004045	Goa pea-pulu go su-para gimoa Galili su-para pisa raburi onaanumi nipuna ki mua raaname omesimi . Abare nimumi Juda aanuna eta yawe ne adaa yapi di rabu Jerusalem su-para Yesu pisa-daa adesimi .
43004046	Gore Yesu Kana adaare-para wala ipisa . Go adaare Galili su ru-nane aaya pare nipumi go su-para kagaa ipa wain aba warisaaya . Go su-parare gavman surube aa meda pirisa . Nipu Kaperneam su-para piri naakiri yaina omesa .
43004047	Gore go aamere Yesu Judia su gimoa Galili epaade remaa pagesa-pulu Yesu piri ipisa . Pisa rabu nipuna naaki ini adupitalo pisa-pulu Yesu Kaperneam su-para ipua nipuna naakina yaina maepeaainalo agaa misa .
43004048	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Nimumi napiaa kogono rado rado na-adalimi-daare ni madaa kone narulaeme .
43004049	Bosboi-mi Yesu-para lalo : Aa adaa , nina naaki aba ini adupita-ga aipapulu bana sa .
43004050	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Ne pu , nena naakiri aba rekoa pia sa . Goa sa rabu mo aame Yesuna agaa madaa kone rulaawa ada pisa .
43004051	Nipu pora-nia pulaina nipuna kogono naakinumi pora madaawa lalo : Nena naakiri aba rekoa pa pia simi .
43004052	Goa simi raburi nipumi nimu agaa gupa misa : Aa-rabu yaina perekea ya ? Nimumi lalo : Abala aebo bero raburi perekea nipuna kekapu dia yaade simi .
43004053	Goa simi raburi mo naakina aaraame ora go rabu Yesumi nena naaki pa pia lakelaa-daa niminaasa . Go agaa niminaaya-pulu go aame page nipuna ona nogo naakinu page Yesu madaa kone rulasimi .
43004054	Yesumi Judia su gimoa Galili su-para pisa rabu go piane kogonore nipumi napiaa rana laapo pisa .
43005001	Gore apo napiaa kogono dia sa raburi oropere Juda aanuna eta nape olode yapi di rudu sa rabu Yesu Jerusalem su-para pisa .
43005002	So Jerusalem su-para adaarena kepo rikiraana pora gaape meda isa . Go pora gaapena biri sipsip menana pora gaape simi . Go pora gaapena re-parare oge ipa ini meda isa . Go ipa inina repaa-parare pokaalo ada supu aasa . Juda aanuna adaa agaa madaare go ipa ini biri Betesda teme .
43005003	Go pokaalo ada ru-nanere yaina ome onaa adaapu epa pirisimi . Nimuna yainare ini rubu pi onaanu page aa wae onaanu page pora napami onaanu page epa pirisimi . Nimu mo ipame etoto pia-rupa adolalo pirisimi .
43005004	Goa pua Gote-na ensel medame no ipa ini-para pua odobaawa mo ipa maeto eto mapaasa . Goa palia rabu aa padaneme aba no eto piade ipa ini-para odobaliare nipuna yaina dia yalia .
43005005	Gore aa meda mo pokaalo ada-para nipu yaina pa inare maali 38-pela patisa .
43005006	Yesumi mo aa-na yaina maali adaapu patisa adesa-pulu nipu-para lalo : Nena konemere yaina maperekealua kone i ?
43005007	Yaina ome aame lalo : Aa adaa , mogo ipame eto palaina ni no ipa-para maodobape aare meda dia ya . Nina ipa-para odobatalo pe rabu pa aa meda aba ipa-para pua odobaaya sa .
43005008	Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Ne rekoa nena yapara mea rua pora pamua sa .
43005009	Goa sa rabu mo aa-na yaina aipapulu perekea nipuna yapara mea rua pora pamisa . Mo aa-na yaina perekesa raburi Kitu Pirape Yapi di pisa .
43005010	Goa raburi Juda aanumi mo maperekeae aa-para lalo : Abiare Kitu Pirape Yapi di yaade . Nena yapara rini kogonore niaana rekena agaa rasaede simi .
43005011	Go aame lalo : Mo nina yaina maperekeae aame ni-para lalo : Nena yapara mea rua pora pamua lade sa .
43005012	Goa sa rabu nimumi nipu-para lalo : Gore nena yapara mea rua pora pamualore aapimi lagiaa ya ?
43005013	Goa simi pare yaina maperekeae aame Yesu inimi waru na-adesa . Go pokaalo ada ru-nane onaa adaapu aba pirisimi-pulu Yesu pisa rabu mo aame waru na-adesa .
43005014	Orope Yesumi mo aa Juda aanuna lotu ada-para adesa . Go raburi Yesumi lalo : Paga , abia nena yoganere epe-rupa aaya . Goa pea-ga ora adaa waeape meda ne mada epalia-ga nena pupitagi ne kone gimape sa .
43005015	Go rabu mo Juda aa piri-para pua Yesumi ni maperekeaaria lo remaa pua lakesa .
43005016	Goa sa rabu Yesumi Kitu Pirape Yapi di madaa go aa maperekeasa rabu Juda aanumi waea pua Yesu kedaa katalo pirisimi .
43005017	Goa pisa-daa Yesumi nimu lakesa : Nina Aapame oro yaalo kogono pala pia-ga neme page go pora ratua pe .
43005018	Goa sa rabu Juda aanumi nipu ora talima kone isimi . Nimuna konere Yesumi Kitu Pirape Yapi di orona rekena agaa rasa . Go page Yesumi Gote-re nina Aapa sa-pulu nipuri Gote nona piane pia-daa Juda aanumi tu maomaatalo pisimi .
43005019	Go kone isimi rabu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Gore neme ora lagialo . Nina kogono pa amaa nape . Ni Aapana Si ora ria yaalo Aapana kogono pe . Nina Aapame kogono pea-rupa adoa pe . Aapame pea-rupa adoa mogeaayo .
43005020	Goa pea-ga nina Aapame ni nipuna naaki madaa pedo pu raaname omoa nipuna pape kogono ni waatea .
43005021	Goa pea-pulu Aapame ome onaa marekaawa oro yaalo mapiraalia-rupa go kone mogeawa nina kone sua onaanu oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama mapualua .
43005022	Go page Aapame koso lape agaa onaa madaa natea pare ni nipuna naaki go puri gisa-daa neme palua .
43005023	Goa palua-pulu onaanumi Aapana bi minasaaeme-rupa nina bi page minasaalimina . Yapare onaanumi nina bi naminasalimiri ni mea rapaasa Aapana bi page naminasaaeme .
43005024	Neme ora lagialo : Onaa rayome nina agaa pagoa ni mea epenasa aapa madaa kone rulalimiri oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi . Go onaa madaare koso lape agaa natoa pare nimu omape kone aba gimoa oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi .
43005025	Neme ora lagialo sa : Abia go di rabu page orope epaliade di rabu page ome onaanumi Gote-na Si nina agaa pagalimi . Pagalimi-pulu oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi .
43005026	Gore Aapare oro yaalo kagaa pirape konena re pia-pulu nipumi nipuna naaki ni page go mapiraape re gisa .
43005027	Niri Onaanu Raapu Pirape Aana Si ya-pulu Aapame ni koso lape agaana puri gisa .
43005028	Go agaa madaare kone adaapu nasalepape . Gore yapi di meda epalia rabu matmat-para rogaae onaanumi nimu yaatea rabu pagalimi .
43005029	Pagalimi-pulu nimu matmat su gimoa amaa epalimi . Goa pea-ga onaa medaloma epea palimi-nuri marekaawa oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama mapuaalia . Pare onaa medalomame waea palimiri marekaawa koso lape agaa loa wae yoto katoa sa .
43005030	Go yaere neme agu raapo napalua pare Gote-me lagi koso lape agaa toa . Goa pea-ga nina bipa nina kone namogeto pare ni mea rapaasa Aapana kone rate . Goa pea-pulu nina koso lape agaare ora redepone yaade .
43005031	Pare neme nina agaa lagere yaa agaa to kone saleme .
43005032	Yapare aa medame ni madaa agaa laketa rabu ora ta kone salimi .
43005033	Gore nimimi Jon piri aa medaloma agaa mea o taainalo penaasimi rabu nipu ora agaa madaa lakesa .
43005034	Gore neme onaa medana agaa madaa kone namapiraayo pare Gote-me onaa raba minalo go agaa nimi lagialo .
43005035	Jon-re epe paata nona pi ipua nipuna roasa paa onaanu kasa-pulu nimi Juda aanumi nipuna paa adoa pedo pu pirisimi .
43005036	Jon-me ni madaa puri pane agaa lakesa pare nina Aapame gisa kogono pe rabu Jon-na agaa maoge yaato . Go kogono palua rabu Aapame ni mea epenasa-daa madaa adamina .
43005037	Gore Aapame ni mea rapaasa-daa neme lagula ipisu . Nimimi nipuna agaa napagoa nipuna ini agaa na-ademe .
43005038	Nipumi ni mea repaawa nipuna agaa robaa-para naimi-pulu ni madaa kone narulaeme .
43005039	Nimumi oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama polalo kone imi-ga Gote-na buk dipiaeme .
43005040	Goa peme pare nimi ni piri oro yaalo kagaa pirape kone-daa namula epeme .
43005041	Niri onaanu pedo pua agaa pagoa raana omenalo na-aato .
43005042	Goa pea pare nimina kone ade . Nimina robaa-para Gote madaa kone narulaeme .
43005043	Ni ipisude rabu Aapame mea repaawa puri gisa pare nimimi ni ora gimeme . Goa pea pare aa meda nipuna puri mea epalia-daare nimimi nipu madaa epe kone sua mealimi .
43005044	Nimina konere pa pedo pedo pala pimi . Yapare Gote-na pedo pi agaare kone naimi-pulu akeane kone rulalimi ya ?
43005045	Pare nimina koso lape agaa Aapa laketoa kone nasalepape . Dia , nimimi Moses madaa kone rulasimi-pulu nipumi nimi koso lape agaa madaa tea .
43005046	Pare nimimi Moses-na agaa madaa kone waru rulasimi-daare Moses-me ni madaa pepa tisa-ga ni madaa page kone mada rulasimina .
43005047	Pare nipuna tisade agaa madaa kone narulaeme-pulu nina agaa madaa page kone mada narulalimi sa .
43006001	Go agaa lakeloa Yesu nipu Galili ipa ini mone pane wala pisa . Go ipa inina bi medare ipa Taiberias teme .
43006002	Go raburi onaa adaapumi Yesuna puri pane kogonome yaina ome onaa maperekeasa-daa adesimi-pulu nimumi nipu rata mea pisimi .
43006003	Go rabu Yesu-para nipuna disaipel aanu-para nimu rudu meda rumua pisimi .
43006004	Go rabu Juda onaanuna Pasova yawe ne adaa yapi di rudu sa .
43006005	Go rabu Yesumi onaa adaapu nipu piri epenalo adesa-pulu nipumi Filip-para lalo : Gore mo onaa adaapu epa pimi-ga nimuna nape etare aa-para kabalima ya ?
43006006	Nipumi Filip-na kone adolalo go agaa sa pare Yesu nipuna pape kone aba niminaasa .
43006007	Go agaa sa rabu Filip-mi lalo : Go onaa rayome eta ogepusi nalimi sa . Niaame bret kabape mone ora adaapu ruboa kabalimare sa .
43006008	Gore Saimon Pita-na ame Andru-mi lalo :
43006009	Naaki ogesi meda go pia-ga nipuna bret ipa supu-para ena laapo-para saapia . Goa pea pare go onaa adaapu pimi-pulu mada nanalima sa .
43006010	Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para lalo : Go onaanu mapiraatepa sa . Go suna ripu adaapupe aasa . Go ripu aasa-para onaa rayo pirisimi . Goa pua nimu 5,000-rupa pirisimi .
43006011	Go rabu Yesumi bret mua Gote-para ora pi loa ripu madaa piri onaanu ena mea rumaasa . Mo ena oge laapo page goa pinaloa onaanumi mo eta raapu nisimi .
43006012	Eta noa ebo rubisimi rabu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aanu-para lalo : Nimimi eta ebonu rayore makiritaatepa . Medaloma narubalimina dia .
43006013	Goa sa-pulu bret supuna ebore basket 12-pela madu isimi .
43006014	Onaanumiri Yesuna napiaa kogono adesimi-pulu gupa simi : Go aare Gote-na agaa lakene aa su amaa epa yaade aa simi .
43006015	Goa simi rabu mo onaanumi Yesu nipu aa mudu mapiraatalo pisimi . Pare Yesumi go kone adesa-pulu nipu wala so rudu madaa agu raapo pua pisa .
43006016	Ora aebo raburi nipuna disaipel aanu mo ipa ini mone pane Kaperneam su-para polalo ipunu madaa pirua pisimi . Goa pua ribaa yabaasa pare Yesu nimu piri-para abi naipisa .
43006017	
43006018	Go raburi po ripu adaape ipua ipa ini madaare morope morope laama ipisa .
43006019	Gore mo disaipel aanumi ipunu madaa pirua ipa oge-daa adaalu-para modo kepaa nona piane yaeme ipa apeaawa pisimi . Gupa polalo pisimi rabu Yesu ipa masaana pamisa-daa nimumi nipu adoa paalame omesimi .
43006020	Go rabu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Nimimi paala naomalepape . Gore ni yaade .
43006021	Goa sa rabu nimumi nipu ipunu madaa epa pirina kone isimi . Goa pua go ipunu polalo pisimide su-para aipapulu mea pisa .
43006022	Ekeraa-nanere ipa ini mone pane pirisimi onaanumi ipunu padane aba ina adesimi . Gore Yesu nipuna disaipel aanu raapu ipunu madaa napirina disaipel aanu nimuna pisimi-daa onaanumi niminaasimi .
43006023	Goa pea pare ipunu medaloma Taberias su gimoa ipa ini repaa-nane isa . Go ipa repaananere Yesumi abala-rupa bret madaa ora pi loa rumaainaloa onaanu adaapu nisimi .
43006024	Gore onaanumi Yesu-para nipuna disaipel aanu-para nimu raapu napirina adesimi . Goa pua nimimi mo Taiberias su polalo pi ipunu madaa pirua Kaperneam su-para Yesu asapula pisimi .
43006025	Gore onaanumi Yesu ipa ini mone pane pua adoare agaa gupa misimi : Tisaa , go-parare aa-rabu epae ya ?
43006026	Yesumi lalo : Neme nimi ora lagialo . Neme napiaa kogono pawade rabu nimimi ni asapula epame ya ? Dia , pare nimimi bret abala noa robaa rulataba-daa nimimi ni asapula epamena .
43006027	Go etare ramualia-ga nimimi go eta madaa kogono napipape . Dia , pare oro yaalo noa kagaa pirape eta madaa kogono pipape . Eta go-rupare ni Onaanu Raapu Pirape Aana Si yaade pare Gote nina Aapame ni madaa pedo pua mea repasa-pulu neme go eta gialua sa .
43006028	Go rabu nimumi nipu-para agaa gupa misimi : Niaame akea pua Gote-na kogono madaa palima ya ?
43006029	Yesumi agaa gupa abusa : Gote-na kogonore gupa ia sa : Niri nipumi mea epenasa-ga ni madaa kone rulaatepape sa .
43006030	Nimumi lalo : Niaame na-adema yae meda mada pali ya ? Gore ake kogono pali ya ? Niaame nena napiaa kogono adalima-daa ne madaa kone rulalima .
43006031	Niaana akuanumi onaa napiri su-para eta nisimi . Go madaare Gote-na buk madaa agaa gupa ia simi : Nipumi yaa-para isade bret eta kasa-pulu nisimi .
43006032	Yesumi wala lalo . Neme nimi ora lagialo : Moses-na bret nisimidere ora yaa-para i bret-daa dia sa . Dia , nina Aapame ora yaa-para iade bret guaaya .
43006033	Nina Aapame guaaya bret-re neme yaa madaa gimoa su amaa ipua nimi onaanu oro yaalo mapiraape kone raapu gialua .
43006034	Nimumi nipu-para gupa simi : Adaa Aa , go oro yaalo kagaa mapiraape bret niaa ora giape simi .
43006035	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Niri oro yaalo kagaa piruae bret yaade . Onaa rayo ni piri-para epalimiri oro yaalo reaeme naomalimi . Onaa rayome ni madaa kone rulalimiri nimuna robaa-para ipa mada roalia .
43006036	Gore nimi aba lagiawade . Nimimi ni aa ademe pare kone narulaeme .
43006037	Naa Aapame onaa rayo ni gea-pulu ni piri-para epalimi . Goa pua onaa ni piri-para epalimiri nagimalua .
43006038	Naa Aapame ni su amaa mea epenasare nina kogono panolo namea epenasa . Ora dia yapare nipuna gisade kogono palua .
43006039	Nipumi ni kogono gua mea pusa kogono gupa palua . Nipuna giape onaanuri ora na alupalimina pare orope epaliade yapi di rabu nimu rayo matmat-para marekaawa oro yaalo mapiraalua .
43006040	Nina Aapana kone gupa ia . Onaa rayome niri Aapana Si adoare ni madaa kone rulalimiri oro yaalo epe-rupa kagaa piraama laama palimi . Goa pea pare orope porapo yape di madaare neme nimu marekaalua sa .
43006041	Yesu nipu yaa-para i bret epawa sa rabu Juda aanumi mumu agaa loa ape simi .
43006042	Go raburi nimumi lalo : Go aa Yesuri ora Josep-na si yaade . Niaame nipuna agi aaraa lapo page ademade . Gore akeane yaa-para gimoa ipisu laa ya ?
43006043	Yesumi agaa gupa abusa : Nimimi mumu agaa nalala piralepape .
43006044	Onaa meda ni piri-para pa mada naepalimi . Dia , Aapame onaa meda mea epena kone saliare mada epealimi . Go Aapamere ni page epenasa . Goa pea-pulu orope go di epalia raburi neme nimu matmat-para marekaalua .
43006045	Aba Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi buk madaa agaa gupa tisimide : Onaa rayore Gote-me nimu mogeaatalo pea agaa gupa tisimide . Onaa rayore nina Aapana agaa pagoa nipu kone mapiraalimiri ni piri-para mada epalimi .
43006046	Go agaa lagialo pare onaa padaneme page Aapa abi na-ademe . Dia , ni Gote raapu pirua ipisude-pulu neme agu raapo Aapa ade sa .
43006047	Neme nimi ora lagialo . Onaa rayome ni madaa kone rulalimiri oro yaalo epe-rupa kagaa piraama laama palimi .
43006048	Nemere onaanu oro yaalo kagaa mapiraawa nape bret yaade .
43006049	Nimina akuanumi yaa-para i bret eta onaa napiri su-para nisimi pare nimu aba omesimi .
43006050	Pare yaa-para pirua su amaa epaawade bret onaanumi go bret nalimiri nimu naomalimi .
43006051	So yaa-para pirua su amaa epawa bret-re ni ya-pulu ni oro yaalo piritalo nape bret yaade . Onaanumi go bret nalimiri oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi . Gore nina yoganere bret nona piane yae ya-pulu neme go yaogane onaa nimu gialua-pulu go su amaa piri onaanuri oro yaalo piralimi .
43006052	Goa sa-pulu mo Juda aanumi wae ape lo pirua gupa simi : Gore ake pua nipuna yogane niaame namonalo mada gialia ya simi .
43006053	Go rabu Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Neme nimi-para ora ria lagialo . Ni Onaanu Raapu Pirape Aana Si ya-pulu nimimi nina yogane kupa yapi lapo namea nalimiri nimi epe-rupa oro yaalo mada napiralimi .
43006054	Pare onaa rayome nina yogane mea nalimiri nimu epe-rupa oro yaalo yaalo piralimi . Goa pua orope epaliade porapo yapi di rabu neme nimu matmat-para marekalua .
43006055	Goa pea-ga nina yogane-para yaapi laapore ora eta ria yaade .
43006056	Onaa rayome nina yogane-para nina yaapi lapo nalimiri nimu ni raapu piralimi ni page nimuna robaa-para piralua .
43006057	Nina oro yaalo kagaa pirape Aapame ni mea rapaasa . Gore nipuna purimi ni raba minaaba oro yaalo piruaayo . Go-rupare onaa rayome ni nalimiri nimu oro yaalo piralimi .
43006058	Yaa-para sua none epede bret-re abade akuanumi nisimide bret nona piane-daa dia go bret rado yaade . Akuanumi nisimi bret-re noa omesimi pare onaa rayome nina bret nalimiri oro yaalo kagaa piralimi .
43006059	Go agaare Yesumi Kaperneam lotu ada-para aawa lapedepesa .
43006060	Gore nipuna disaipel aa medalomame go agaa pagoa lalo : Go agaare ora kedaa pia . Aapimi go agaa pago ratalia ya ?
43006061	Aa medame Yesu agaa nalakesa pare nipuna disaipel aanumi go agaa madaa mumu agaa simi-daa nipumi nimu-para lalo : Go agaamere nimina kone maoyaawa ni gimalimi ya ?
43006062	Gore ni Onaanu Raapu Pirape Aana Siri nipuna pirua epe-para wala palia rabu nimimi ake teme ya ?
43006063	Holi Spirit-mi oro yaalo kagaa pirape kone wasupa nipumi gupaaya-ga pa yoganeme niaa madaa naraba mealia . Go nimi lagialo agaamere nimi Holi Spirit-para oro yaalo kagaa pirape kone-para mealimi .
43006064	Pare nimuna rikiraanare onaa medalomame kone narulaeme . Gore aba ripia onaa medalomame nipu madaa kone narulatalo pisimi-daa niminaasa . Go page aa medame nipuna kawae madini aa pirisa-daa adesa .
43006065	Nipumi agaa meda gupa sa : Gore neme aba lagiawade . Ni madaa kone narulaliare onaa medame nina Aapame naraba mina ni piri-para mada maepalia .
43006066	Go kedaa pi agaa lakesa-pulu Gote-na disaipel onaa adaapumi Yesu masaa rilaawa nipu raapu wala napamisimi .
43006067	Goa pisimi-pulu Yesumi nipuna disaipel aa 12-pela goa lakesa : Gore nimi page ni gimoa palimi ya ?
43006068	Go sa raburi Saimon Pita-me Yesu-para agaa gupa abusa : Aa Mudu , niaare aapi piri pomonalo lae ya ? Nena agaame niaa oro yaalo kagaa pirape yae guaalia .
43006069	Gore niaame abia ne madaa kone rulaarimaade . Nere Gote-me nipuna epe naaki padane epenasa-daa niminaaema .
43006070	Yesumi agaa gupa lakesa : Gore ake lano ya ? Neme nimi 12-pela aa mada misude pare nimina rikiraana aa padane nipu ora wae remo medana si pisa .
43006071	Nipumi Judas madaa lakesa . Judas-re Saimon Iskariot-na si pirisa . Gore Judas-re nipu disaipel aa ru repona rikiraana pirisa pare orope nipumi Yesu tinalo kawae madu pirisa .
43007001	Yesu nipu Galili su robo ru-nane pamisa . Goa pisa pare Juda aanumi Yesu tulalo pisimi-pulu Yesu Judia su robo ru-para gimoa napamisa .
43007002	Go rabu Juda aanuna olodere pokaalo ada waria eta nape yapi di olode rudu sa .
43007003	Go rabu Yesuna amenumi nipu-para lalo : Nena disaipel aanumiri napiaa kogono adenalo go su gimoa Judia su-para pope simi .
43007004	Aa medame kogono pulalo palia-daare nipumi oyae kudiripu napea . Gore neme go napiaa kogono pe rabu su amaa pima onaa rayome adenalo go kogono mea waate simi .
43007005	Gore nimuna amenu page nipu madaa kone narulasimi-pulu go agaa simi .
43007006	Yesumi nimu-para lalo : Onaa rayome ni adape yapi diri abi naepa pare nimina di oro yaalo pa ia .
43007007	Onaanumi nimi madaa iaa aulape kone naimi pare ni madaa goa peme . Neme nimuna waea madaa agaa laketo-pulu go wae iaa kone imi .
43007008	Nimina apo eta yawe ne adaa yapi di adola pulupa sa pare nina popede yapi diri abia naepaa-daa abi napalua sa .
43007009	Nipumi nimu goa lakeloa Galili su-para pa pirisa .
43007010	Pare nipuna amenu eta yawe ne yapi di adola aba pisimi rabu Yesumi page adola orope pisa . Pisa rabu nipu kaleda-mama pua oge pora-nia pisa .
43007011	Gore Juda aanumi eta yawe ne adaa yapi di rabu su-para pirabaina naadesimi-pulu Yesu nipu aa-para pia pae simi .
43007012	Onaa adaapumi page Yesu madaa mumu agaa lo piruasimi . Goa pua medalomame nipu epe aa yaade loa medalomame dia sa rabu nipumi makirae agaa ta simi .
43007013	Goa simi pare onaanumi Juda onaa madaa paala omoa pa mumu agaa simi .
43007014	Go eta yawe ne adaa yapina di rabu Yesumi lotu ada-para pua odobaawa onaanu-para agaa moge riaasa .
43007015	Mogeasa rabu Juda aanumi kone adaapu sua lalo : Akea pua go aame kone adaapu ia pae loa nipu skul aa-para pua laa ya ?
43007016	Yesumi lalo : Neme mogeaato agaana re-re nina agaa-daa dia . Gote-me ni mea epenasa-pulu nipuna agaa mogeaayo .
43007017	Onaa rayome Gote-na agaa waru pagalimi-daare nina agaa gore ora nina agaa yapalo Gote-na agaa yapalo mada waru niminaalimi .
43007018	Aa medame pa nipuna kone madaa agaa tea-daare gore nipuna bi minasaatalo pea . Pare nina Aapame ni mea epenasa-daa neme ora agaa loa yaa agaa meda na-aato .
43007019	Gore Moses-me rekena agaa gisade pare nimina rikiraana aa padaneme go rekena agaa naratea . Gore akeane nimimi ni tu maomaatalo pimi .
43007020	Goa sa-pulu mo onaa rayome nipu-para goa simi : Wae remo meda nena masaana pia . Nere aapimi tu maomalia ya ?
43007021	Yesumi lalo : Neme abade napiaa kogono pawade rabu nimimi pogolasaasimi .
43007022	Moses-me abade yogane kepeape agaa mana lagisa-pulu nimimi Kitu Pirape Yapi di rabu naakinuna yogane kepeteme . Pare nimina akuanumi go kone aba gisimi-ga Moses-me aba nagisa .
43007023	Gore nimimi Moses-na rekena agaa gimola pisimiri Kitu Pirape Yapi di rabu oge naakinuna yogane kepesimide . Goa pea pare neme Kitu Pirape Yapi di rabu aa medana yaina maperekeaayo rabu nimimi ni ratu akolo yawaleme ya ?
43007024	Nimi koso lape agaa-rupa teme rabu pa kone sua teme . Gupa napipape yapare redepo ne kone sua koso lape agaa-rupa tapape .
43007025	Jerusalem su-para pirisimi onaa medalomame lalo : Go aare nimumi tu maomaatalo pimi ya ?
