Go aa Nataniel nipuri Galili adaa su robo ru-nane Kana adaare-para madini aa pirisa . Gore nipu-para Sebedi-na naakinu-para aa meda laapo-para niaa rayo padane-para pirisima .
43021003	Go rabu Saimon Pita-me niaa-para lalo : Neme ena mula pulu sa . Goa sa rabu neme lalo : Niaa page baina sima . Goa loare niaa ipunu madaa pua pirisima . Goa pirisima pare go ribaa ena padane-daa meda namisima .
43021004	Gore naare opapatalo palaina Yesu nipu no ipa repaa-nane epa reka aasa . Reka aasa pare niaame Yesu kone-daa naisima .
43021005	Go rabu nipumi niaa agaa misa : Nopo naaki-repaaya , nimimi ena medaloma meame ? Niaame lalo : Nameama sima .
43021006	Go rabu nipumi lalo : Nimina ena agona mo ipunu popo ki-nane lopatepa sa . Goa puare go agona-para ena rulataboa enana kedaa pisa rabu ipunu ru-nane mada nayolasaasima .
43021007	Go raburi neme Jon Pita lakesu : Go aare Aa Mudu sude . Gore Saimon Pita-me nipuna mamina kolo ruboa kogono pala aasa . Yapare nina agaa pagoare nipuna mamina maraawa ipa-para pua pogoloa ki sama pua Yesu aasa-para pisa .
43021008	Niaa disaipel aa medalomare ipunu madaa piruare mo ena agona apalae mea pisima . Niaa ipa repaa adaalu pu napirisima-pulu disaipel aanumi mo ena agona ogesi adaalu ( gupa 100 mita ) yolasaasima .
43021009	Niaa ipa repaa-nane ipisima rabu repena meda rala aasa-daa adesima . Go-para ena-para bret-para go repena sulaa-para iraba aasa-daa adesima .
43021010	Go rabu Yesumi niaa-para lalo : Meamede ena medaloma mea ipulupa .
43021011	Goa sa-pulu Saimon Pita nipu mo ipunu madaa pua sana mo ena agona yola ria ipisa . Go ena agona-parare ena ora rulatabesa pare agona narugulatabisa . Gore ena dipisima pare ena 153-pela pirisa-ya .
43021012	Go rabu Yesumi niaa-para lalo : Epa nalepa . Goa sa pare niaame nere aapi yapae lo gupa nasima . Ora Aa Mudu niminaasima-pulu agaa nasima .
43021013	Go rabu Yesumi bret mua niaa gisa . Mo ena page goa pisa-daa mea misima .
43021014	Yesu matmat madaa aba rekoa puare niaa piri-para rana repo ipisa-daa adesima .
43021015	Niaa eta aba noare Yesumi Pita-para lalo : Nere Jon-na si Saimon yaade . Ni madaa pedo pi kone guaayere go konemere disaipel aanuna go kone maoge yaape ? Pita-me lalo : Aa Mudu , neme ne madaa pedo waru pe sa . Yesumi nipu-para wala lakesa : Nina sipsip sinu suruboa eta kalape sa .
43021016	Wala rana laapo Yesumi lalo : Jon-na si Saimon-re neme ni madaa pedo pu kone waru suaaye pae ? Aa Mudu , neme ne madaa pedo ome-daa ade sa . Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Gore neme nina sipsip menanu eta kalape sa .
43021017	Wala rana repo Yesumi Pita-para lalo : Saimon ne Jon-na si nemere ni madaa pedo pu raaname ome ya ? Gore Yesumi rana repo agaa misa-daa Pita-me odome omoa lalo : Aa Mudu , neme oyae rayo ade-ga neme ne madaa pedo pu raaname ome-daa niminaate sa . Yesumi nipu-para lalo : Gore nina sipsip menanu suruboa eta kalape .
43021018	Ne-para ora agaa lagialo . Ne ogege aa pirisi rabu nena kone sua aako aapu lapo yamoa pora pamisi . Pare ne yomagae pirali rabu nena ki ridulainaloa aa medame ki adia nipuna kone sua ne mea palia .
43021019	Yesumi go saa agaa sa-daare orope Pita-na omape di rabu nimumi ki adia tu maomaliminalo pare Gote-na bi minasaalia sa . Go rabu Yesumi Pita-para lalo : Ni rata mea ipu sa .
43021020	Abare ni Yesu re-para pirua eta nisipa rabu Pita-me agaa gupa misa : Aa Mudu , nena kawae madini aare aapi yapae ? Gore abia Pita-me pereke tua ni adesa rabu nipumi lalo : Go aa madaare ake palia ya ?
43021021	
43021022	Yesumi lalo : Gore nipu pa pirina epalua kone sanore nena kogono ya ? Ne-para lawade ni rata mea ipu .
43021023	Yesumi go agaa sa-pulu ni mada naomaluade remaa lakesa pare Yesu gupa nasa . Dia , nipu pirina epalua kone saluare nena kogono yapae lo gupa sa .
43021024	Ni Jon neme go oyaenu madaa remaa lagisude . Neme page pepa madaa tisu . Go agaa madaare Yesu ora agaana re adema .
43021025	Pare Yesumi kogono medaloma adaapu pisa . Go kogono rayo rado rado pepa tulalo palimare go su amaa buk ora rulatabalia kone salo . Ni Jon go buk tisude . Go yaade .
44001001	Yesa Tiofilus : Nina aba pepa padane madaare neme aba Yesuna pisade kogono-para nipuna agaa-para apo pepa madaa tua repaasude .
44001002	Nipuna kogono ripima pa amaa pua so yaa-para penaalo go agaa rayo pepa tua repaasude . Goa pua Yesumi Holi Spirit-na purimi nipuna mapiraasade aposel kogono aanu-para agaa mana lakeloa sone pisa .
44001003	Gore aba omenaloa yapi di 40-pela popenaloa aposel kogono aanu raapu epa kiritaawa pirisa . Nimu raapu pirisa rabu nimumi nipu ora pa pia kone inalo oyae adaapu pisa . Goa pua epe kogono radonu pu Gote-na Surube Su madaa agaa adaapu lakesa .
44001004	Aposel aanu raapu kirita pirisa rabu Yesumi nimu agaa gupa lakesa : Nimimi Jerusalem suri nagimalepape . Nina Aapame gialiade yae mealiminapa ado piralepape . Go yae madaare neme agaa aba lagisude .
44001005	Gore Jon-me onaanu pa ipame baptais meaasa pare wala ogesi-daa pa pirua Holi Spirit-na puri mada baptais mealimina sa .
44001006	Aposel aanumi Yesu raapu kiritasimi rabu nipu agaa gupa misimi : Aa Mudu , niaa Israel onaanuri aa-rabu niaame go su-para suruba piralima yapae ?
44001007	Yesumi lalo : Aapana yapinu nipuna ia-rupa mada na-adema . Aapa nipuna bipa di ia-pulu ni naniminaayo .
44001008	Yapare Holi Spirit nimi madaa epenatea rabu puri mealimi-pulu nina pisude remaa Jerusalem su-nane page Judia Samaria lapona apo ipanu popea-nane su rayona laketa pulupape sa .
44001009	Nipumi go agaa loa nimumi adapaba pirina Yesu yaa-para pua moae yako yaa medame nipu mea pua rigitisa .
44001010	Yesu so yaa-para pisa rabu aposel kogono aanumi adaba pirina aa laapo nipu raapu rekasipi . Go aa laapona mamina-re yaako pi maraasipi .
44001011	Nipu lapome lalo : Galili aanu-ya , akolo yaa-para adaba pimi pae ? Go puade Yesuri wala orope go-rupa wala epalia sipi .
44001012	Goa pua aposel kogono aanu Rudu Oliv kilipia wala Jerusalem su-para pisimi . Rudu Oliv-ri Jerusalem su-para siti re-paraga gupa wan kilomita-rupa adaalupu aasa .
44001013	Jerusalem su-para puare nimuna so ada rum ae-para pua pirisimi . Go pua pirisimi aanuna biri go-rupa : Pita-para Jon-para Jems Andru laapo page Filip Tomas laapo page Bartolomyu Matyu laapo page Jems medare Alfius-na si page Saimon-re nipu Selot-repaa page Juda-re Jems medana si page nimu rayo pirisimi .
44001014	Go aanu rayo nimuna kone padane-para sua beten lala pirisimi . Go ona raapu page Yesuna agi ame baaninu page beten lala pirisimi .
44001015	Goa pua yapi medaloma pisa rabu kone rulae onaanu kiritasimi . Onaare gupa 120-pela kiritasimi . Go rabu Pita-me rekoa agaa gupa sa :
44001016	Ame baaninu , pagalepape . Gote-na pepa madaa Holi Spirit-mi Juda onaanuna kone Devit aba kasa-pulu nipumi pepa madaa tisa . Go Juda-re Yesu gimoa iaanumi tinalo yada robesa .
44001017	Goa pisa pare Judas-re ora niaa raapu pirua niaana kogono raba minalo Yesumi Judas mapiraasa .
44001018	Yapare go aame yada roboa mone misa . Go mone-mere su meda kaboa orope ope noa lopoa robaa rugulataaboa lo koyapape pua omesa .
44001019	Jerusalem su-para piri onaanu pagoa go suna biri Akeldama maasimi . Go bina re aa yaapi i su teme .
44001020	Go madaare Buk Sam-para go aa madaa agaa gupa tisimiya : Nipuna ada pa rai aina . Aa medaloma go ada-para mada napirina sa . Goa page tisa : Aa medame nipuna kogono mina sa .
44001021	Goa pea-ga abiare niaame aa meda meamina . Go aa nipuri niaa raapu oro yaalo Yesumi agaa mogeasa rabu page niaa pamisima rabu page go rayo ado kiriti aa adoa meamina simi .
44001022	Jon-me Yesu baptais mea kasa rabu page Yesu omoa rekoa wala yaa madaa pisa rabu page go rayo ado piri aa meamina simi . Go piane aa mua niaa raapu Yesuna omoa wala rekesa-ga pamu lamina simi .
44001023	Pita goa sa rabu aa laapo mada minalo gupa simi : Medare Josep nipuna bi medare Barsabas page Justus page temede . Aa medare nipuna bi Matias teme .
44001024	Go rabu beten gupa simi : O Aa Mudu , ne onaa rayona kone ade . Go aa laapo niaame makeme tulalo palima aa neme aa padane mea waalape .
44001025	Goa puare go alopatema aame Judas-na kogono mina . Go aa Judas-re nipuna yoto mua ora wae su-para pua simi .
44001026	Goa loa nimumi aa laapo adoa Matias madaa raana omesimi . Go aa kogono aa 11-pela raapu aasimi .
44002001	Yapi di Pentikos rudu sa rabu kone rulae onaanu ada padane-para epa kiritasimi . Kiritasimi onaanuri 120-pela pirisimi .
44002002	Go Pentikos yapi rabu yae medame yaa madaa mu mu loa sana aipapulu adaa po ripu-rupa ipisa . Go rabu nimu piri ada-para epa rulatabesa .
44002003	Goa pisa rabu nimumi repena sulaa-rupa rugula rugula pisa rabu nimumi adesimi . Rugula rugula pua rabu repena sulaa nona piane yaere nimu madaa padane padane lo epa pirisa .
44002004	Goa pisa rabu nimu madaa Holi Spirit-mi epa rulatabesa-pulu adaa agaa rado rado simi . Go agaare Holi Spirit-mi nimu kasa .
44002005	Goa pisa rabu Juda aanu medaloma Jerusalem su-para epa pirisimi . Gote madaa kone rulae aanuri adaare su rayona page gimoa epa pirisimi .
44002006	Gore onaa rayome go po ripu nona piane yae pagesimi rabu nimu rayo adola kiritasimi . Goa pua nimuna adaa agaa pagesimi rabu nimu ora paala omesimi .
44002007	Goa pua nimumi kidipaa ragi tua gupa simi : Go adaa agaa teme aanuri ora Galili su-para piri onaanu yaade simi .
44002008	Goa pea pare nimumi agaa lalaina pagalema rabu niaana adaa agaa pagalima simi .
44002009	Niaana suri Partia-para Midia-para Elam-para Mesopotemia-para Judia-para Kapadosia-para Pontus-para Esia-para
44002010	Frigia-para Pamfilia-para Isip-para mo adaa su Libia-para Sairini su page pirua epa amaa . Gore niaa medalomare Rom page pima simi .
44002011	Niaare ora Juda-para ruru rado onaanu lotu padane tema onaa page pima . Niaa medalomare su Krit Arebia lapo page pima . Goa pea pare kone rulae onaanumi agaa teme rabu nimu rayome niaana adaa agaa pagoa Gote-na epe kogono madaa pagamade simi .
44002012	Goa pisa-pulu aanuri ora pogolasaawa ki wage wage pua agaa gupa lo pirisimi : Go aare ake piane yapae simi .
44002013	Goa lo pirisimi pare pa aa medalomame giri laawa gupa simi : Go aanuri ipa wain ( bia ) noa maeyateme simi .
44002014	Go rabu Pita aposel kogono aanu 11-pela raapu rekaawa onaa rayo-para agaa puri paloa gupa sa : Juda onaa-para , Jerusalem su-para onaanu-ya , nimimi go agaa pagalepa .
44002015	Nimina konere nogo aanu ipa bia noa maeyateme kone saeme pare abia naare pena ipulaina pa 9 klok rabu aema sa .
44002016	Ribaa rabu ipa bia nemede . Go kone madaare Gote-na agaa lakene aa Joel-me Gote-na buk madaa aba agaa gupa tu isaya :
44002017	Gote-me lalo : Orope su yaa dia yaliade rabu neme gupa palua : Nina Holi Spirit onaa rayo madaa mapiraalua . Goa pua nimina nogo naakinu nina agaa laketeme . Goa pua nimina aanumi oyae adalimi .
44002018	Go di rabu neme nina kogono onaanuri Holi Spirit-na puri katoa . Katoa rabu nina epe agaa laketeme .
44002019	Goa pua neme so yaa-para oyae radonu mea salua . Goa pua su amaa oyae radonu mea salua rabu yapi page repena sulaa page wae miru page maopasalua .
44002020	Go Aa Mudu epaliade yapi di madaare naare aba udinina toa sa . Goa pua akuare yaapi pi nona piane ma-alia .
44002021	Go rabu onaa rayome Aa Mudu-na bi madaa agaa lo kone rulalimiri oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama palimi sa .
44002022	Pita-me gupa sa : Israel onaanu-ya , go agaa pagalepape : Neme Nasaret aa Yesu madaa lalo . Yesuri Gote-me nipu mapiraawa puri kasa-pulu kogono waru pisa . Goa pua nipumi puri pane kogono-para ora epe kogono rado rado-para Gote-na puri mea waasa-daa niminaaeme .
44002023	Yesuri Gote-me kone mapiraasa-pulu wae kimisu onaanumi repena polopea madaa tinalo mea rapaasa .
44002024	Goa pisimi pare omape yae esepenalo Gote-me nipu marekaasa . Gore omape yaeme Yesu matmat-para naripinaasa .
44002025	Go madaare Devit-mi Yesu madaa aba gupa sa : Aa Mudu-ri oro yaalo ni raapu pipa-daa ade . Goa pua ni raba mea-ga ni paala naomalua sa .
44002026	Goa pea-pulu epe koneme robaa-para rulatabea-daa pedo pi . Nina yogane matmat-para rogaalimi pare nina kone wasupa oro yaalo kagaa piralia .
44002027	Neme nina kone wasupare omape su-para napenalo surubape . Nina epe kogono aa-na yogane mada naramualia .
44002028	Neme epe pora waaloa go pora oro yaalo kagaa pirape pora ya-pulu ne raapu raana omo piralua sa .
44002029	Ame baaninu-ya , niaana akua Devit-na agaa epe-rupa lagialo . Nipu omenaloa matmat-para rogaasimi . Goa pua nipu rogaae aana apedaa go su-para aaya .
44002030	Nipu Gote-na agaa lakene aa pirua Gote-na ora agaa waru niminaasa . Gote-me yaa madaa makuaa loa sana gupa sa : Devit madini su-para ora aa mudu meda piralia sa .
44002031	Devit-mi Yesuna pape-anu orope epaliade yaenu adesa-pulu nipu rekaluana agaa lakesa . Goa pua Krais ome onaana su-para napirua yogane page naramualua sa .
44002032	Pagalepa . Gote-me go aa Yesu Krais marekaasa-daa niaame inimi adesima .
44002033	Gore Yesu marekaasa rabu Gote-na popo ke-nane pua pirisa . Goa pua Gote-me ora agaa loa Holi Spirit gialua sa . Goa sa-pulu nimimi abia go ademede yaere Holi Spirit nipumi mea epenalade .
44002034	Gore Devit-ri Yesu pisa-rupa so yaa mada napirisa . Devit-mi lalo : Gote-me Aa Mudu Yesu-para . Nina popo ke-nane piraina sa .
44002035	Iaanu nena rolo-para mapiraalua sa .
44002036	Israel su-para piri onaa rayore ora Gote-me go Yesu Aa Mudu mapiraasade kone niminaatepape . Go Yesuri nimi repena polopea madaa tisimi pare Gote-me nipu ora niminaa loa Mea Repae Aa yaade lo lakesa .
44002037	Onaanu go agaa pagesimi rabu nimuna robaa-para kedaa pisa-daa nimumi Pita-para aposel kogono aa medaloma-para gupa simi : Amenu , niaa ake palima ya ?
44002038	Pita-me lakesa : nimi padane padane laatapuri kone perekea Yesu Krais-na bi madaa baptais mealepa . Goa pua nipumi nimina pupitagi marabuaniaawa Holi Spirit nimi pa gialia sa .
44002039	Gote-na ora agaare nimi-para nimina sinu-para su rayona lo kiritasimi . Go onaa rayore niaana Mudu Gote-me nipu raapu mapiraalia sa .
44002040	Go puri pane agaare Pita-me nimu lakesa . Goa pua agaa mana adaapu loa gupa sa : Abiare pupitagi ne onaa adaapu pimi-ga nimiri nimu gimoa wae kone nasalepape sa .
44002041	Goa sa rabu onaa adaapu nipuna agaa madaa raaname omoa pagoa baptais misimi . Go yapi di rabu onaa 3,000-pela disaipel onaa raapu epa pirisimi .
44002042	Nimumi moge riaae aanuna agaa pagoa epe-rupa pirua kone padane sua eta noa beten lo pirisimi .
44002043	Goa pua aposel kogono aanumi napiaa kogono page epe rado kogononu page pisimi-pulu onaa rayome paala omoa pirisimi .
44002044	Goa pua kone rulae onaa rayome kone padane sua nimuna oyaenu kiritaawa rumaa pirisimi .
44002045	Goa pua pa onaanumi mo kone rulae onaanuna oyae kabenalo nimumi mone mua pa piri onaa rumaa kaloa nimu rayo epe-rupa pirisimi .
44002046	Goa pua nimumi kone padane sua yapi padane padane laatapumi lotu ada-para kiritasimi . Go page nimuna ada-para eta noa ora raaname omo pirisimi .
44002047	Goa pua nimumi Gote-na bi minasaa pirua onaa rayome lalo : Nimi epe-rupa pimi onaa . Goa pua oro yaalo Gote-na kone rulae onaa raapu onaa adaapu epa-mama pua nimuna naba adaapu popesa .
44003001	Gore beten lape di rabu Pita-para Jon nipu laapo aebo lotu ada-para pisipi .
44003002	Pisipi rabu go epe lotu adana pora gaape-nane pora napami aa meda pirisa . Go aare agimi aa oyapalae madu isa . Oro yaalo epe pora gaape temede amaa-nane ria ipua mapiraasimi . Go aame lotu ada-para odobalimide onaanu-para mone oyae meda ogenalo mea mapiraasimi .
44003003	Pita Jon laapo lotu ada ru-nane odobatalo pisipi rabu go aame oyae meda gialepa loa ogesa .
44003004	Goa sa rabu mo aa laapome pora napami aa-na ini agaa waru adaba sua Pita-me lalo : Saa adape sa .
44003005	Gore pora napami aa nipumi kone gupa isa : Ora oyae gialipi kone isa-pulu go aame waru adaba isa .
44003006	Go rabu Pita-me nipu goa lakesa : Ni mone oyae nasabaayo-pulu yae meda gialuame pi sa . Nasaret su-para piri Yesuna bina purimi ne marekaluame lalo sa .
44003007	Goa loa go aa-na ki mina marekaasa . Marekaasa rabu go aa-na aa galo puri pasa .
44003008	Go aa raana omoare rekoa pora pamisa . Goa pua nipu page Pita Jon raapu epe lotu ada-para pisimi . Pisimi rabu go aame ora pogolaari pua Gote-na bi minasaasa .
44003009	Nipu pamua Gote-na bi minasaasa rabu onaa adaapumi nipu adesimi .
44003010	Go aa oro yaalo epe pora gaape-nane pirua mone ogesa-pulu onaanumi nimuna ini agaame adesimi . Gore nipu abia pora epe-rupa pamua ru-nane ipisa-daa go onaanumi paala omoa ki wage pisimi .
44003011	Go lotu adana pokaalo ada meda aasa . Gona biri Solomon-na pokaalo ada simi . Mo aame Pita Jon laapo waru upia go pokaalo ada aasa-para onaa adaapu nipumi aipapulu adola pisimi .
44003012	Pita-me onaa rayo adoa agaa gupa lakesa : Israel onaanuri akeane nimimi ki wage pua pimi pae sa . Gore akeane saa adoba imi pae ? Nimi ake kone imi pae ? Saame epe kone sua saana purimi go aa maepeaaripa ya ? Ora saana purimi-daa dia .
44003013	Gore Gote-me paa . Ora niaana akua Abraham-para Aisak-para Jekop-para nimuna Gote-me go aa maepeaaria . Nipumi nipuna raba mi naaki Yesuna bi minasaatalo paa . Go Yesuri nimimi apo kadipi Pailat-na ini agaana yada roboa masaa rilasimide . Pailat-mere Yesu repaalua kone isa pare nimimi go agaa napagesimide .
44003014	Goa pua Yesu ora Gote-na epe redepo ne aa pirisa pare nimimi nipu gimoa Pailat-para onaa tu maomaatalo go aa epenala simide .
44003015	Goa pua nimimi oro yaalo kagaa pirapena re Yesu yapare tisimide . Tisimi pare Gote-me matmat-para marekaasa . Niaame go rayo adema .
44003016	Go Yesu nipuna bimi go pora napami aa maepeaaripa . Nipumi Yesu madaa kone rulaasipi-daa Gote-me nipu puri kasa . E , gore nimimi go aa adaba pimi . Go aame Yesuna agaa robaa-para maodabaria-pulu nipu epe-rupa pia sa .
44003017	Nina ame baaninu , nimi page nimina aa mudunumi page Yesu-para pisimide yaere naniminaawa pisimi yaade .
44003018	Goa pea pare Gote-me nipuna agaa lakene aanu-para gupa lakesa : Krais Mesia radaa noa omalia lakesa . Go aanumi agaa lakenaloa go agaana re maoyaasimi .
44003019	Goa pimi-ga kone perekea Gote-na kone mua nimina pupitagi gimalimina go rabu nipumi mea rubaalia .
44003020	Gote-me kagaa puri ginalo goa pipape . Goa pua Gote-me Yesuri niminaa loa Mea Repae Aa ya-pulu aba mada mua mea repaasa .
44003021	Pare nipu abia yaa-para ora pirua orope su amaa ipua kagaa yaenu masaalia . Go madaare Gote-me nipuna agaa lakene aanu lakenaloa nimumi simi sa .
44003022	Go madaare Moses-me aba gupa sa : Gote-me ni nipuna kogono panolo mapiraasa sa . Go pea-ga nipuna lakene aa-na agaa rayome pagalimina .
44003023	Goa pua onaa rayome nipuna agaa napagalimi-daare Israel su gimoa ora nimu omabalimina . Moses-me agaa gupa tisa .
44003024	Pita-me wala lalo : Gote-me agaa lakene aa Samuel madaa piruaama ipuare agaa lakene aanumi rayo go agaa padane gupa simide . Nimuna agaana re abia adema sa .
44003025	Gote-me akuanu raapu aana oraawa sana agaa lakene aanu agaa lakesa . Go ora agaare ora nimina pagoa meape agaa yaade . Gote-me Abraham-para agaame pogatulalo gupa sa : Nena madiali si akuanumi su amaa piri onaa rayo puri kanalo mapiraalua sa .
44003026	Goa sa-pulu Gote-me niaa raba meape aa Yesu mea epenasa . Gote-me Yesu marekaawa nimi piri-para aba epenasa . Goa pua nimimi pupitagi ne kone masaa rilainalo epe puri mea epenasa .
44004001	Pita-para Jon lapome onaa agaa lakesimi rabu aanumi nipu laapo aditalo ipisimi . Aanu gupa ipisimi : Gote-na miru irae aanu page lotu adana aa mudu polis page Juda aanuna page Sadyusi ruru aanu page aditalo ipisimi .
44004002	Gore Pita Jon laapome onaanu-para Yesu matmat-para rekoa pia sipi . Goa sipi-pulu onaanumi ome onaanu page wala rekoa piralimi . Goa sipi-pulu mo aanumi ratu waru yawoa aditalo ipisimi .
44004003	Goa pua adisimi pare ribaa sa rabu ekeraa koso teme sa . Goa pua koso nalo pi ada-para surubesimi .
44004004	Goa pisimi pare onaa adaapumi nipu laapona agaa pagoa kone rulasimi . Go rabu aa adaapumi gupa 5,000 kone rulasimi .
44004005	Wala ekeraa-nane kaunsil-na aa mudunu page kone makuaae aanu page rekena agaa tisaanu page Jerusalem su-para kiritasimi .
44004006	Gote-na miru irae aanuna mudu Anas-para Kaiafas-para Jon-para Aleksader-para miru irae aa mudu rayo kiritasimi .
44004007	Goa pua nimumi aposel kogono aa laapo agaa misimi . Nipina kogonore aapina bi madaa puri mepe pae simi .
44004008	Goa simi rabu Pita madaare Holi Spirit odobasa-pulu gupa abusa : Onaa rayona mudu yapatu page kone makuaae aanu page nina agaa pagalepape sa .
44004009	Gore nimimi agaa mulalore saame pora napami aa raba mua maepeaaripade agaa meme pae simi .
44004010	Go madaa waru pagalepape . Go rekoa pia aare Nasaret su-para piri Yesu Krais-na purimi nipu ora maepaaripa . Go Yesuri nimimi repena polopea madaa nil-mi tisimide pare Gote-me nipu matmat-para marekaasa . Nipuna purimi pisa .
44004011	Gote-na buk madaa i agaame Yesu madaa saa pi agaa gupa isa : Nimi kamda kogono pulalo meme aana-re gimisimide pare go aana abia ora riri-nane aana sa .
44004012	Gore nipu padaneme oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama pope kone wasupa mada gialia . Su rayo-para pimi onaanumi Yesuna bi padaneme niaa epe-rupa mapiraalia teme sa .
44004013	Goa sa rabu kaunsil piri aanu paala omesimi pare Pita Jon laapome puri pane agaa sipi . Go aa laapore skul nalo agaa mana waru napage aa lapo-ga puri pane agaa sipi-daa adesimi . Nipu Yesu raapu pirisipi-daa adesimi . Goa pua mo aanumi kone adaapu isimi .
44004014	Yapare pora napami aa perekea nimu raapu pirisa-pulu nimumi Pita Jon laapo-para agaa na-abusimi .
44004015	Goa pua nimumi go aa laapo kaunsil gimoa amaa mea pulupa simi . Nimumi nipu laapo madaa koso lape agaa yada robesimi .
44004016	Go aa laapo madaare ake palima ya ? Nipuna puri pane napiaanu kogono Jerusalem su-para onaa rayome pagamede . Goa pea-ga niaame go aa laapome ke wae aa namaepeaaripiri mada natapape sipi .
44004017	Yapare go agaa su payome pua pagena-ga go aa laapo-para Yesuna remaa onaa medaloma nalaketapape simi .
44004018	Goa loa go aa laapo ru-nane mea ipulupa loa sana agaa mana gupa simi : Yesuna agaa-para nipuna bi-para onaa medaloma nalaketapape lamina .
44004019	Goa simi pare Pita Jon laapome agaa gupa abusipi : Nimimi tapape . Nimina agaa pagaleme palo ora Gote-na agaa pagaleme palo tapape . Gote-me sa adea-ga nimimi tapape .
44004020	Gore saame adoa pagesipa-pulu agaa mada tepa kone salepa sipi .
44004021	Goa sipi rabu kaunsil aanumi nipu-para yada malue tape agaa wala loa mea repaasimi . Onaa rayome go aa laapona kogono madaa Gote-na bi minasaasimi rabu kaunsil aanumi nipu laapo natisimi .
44004022	Mo wala yaina perekene aare nipuna madini maaliri 40-pela pirisa .
44004023	Repaasimi rabu Pita Jon laapome adami onaa piri pua Gote-na miru irae aa mudu-para kone makuaae aanu-para nimumi pisimide agaa pua lakesipi .
44004024	Go onaame pagesimi rabu Gote madaa kone padane sua agaa lalo : Aapa , ne ora mudu . Neme su yaa lapo page ipa page yae rayo page warisi .
44004025	Nena Holi Spirit-mi niaana akua Devit agaa lakesa rabu nipumi pepa madaa gupa tisa : Akeane ruru rado onaanu ratu yawoa wae agaa lo pimi ?
44004026	Su rayona aa mudunumi pepena pua mudu yapatu kiritasimi . Nimumi Gote-para nipuna Raba Meape Aa madaa page rabuaniaatalo kirita pirisimi sa .
44004027	Devit-mi gupa tisa-ga abia Herot page Pontius Pailat page go aa mudu ruru rado onaanu page Israel su-para piri onaanu page nimu rayo kiritaawa nena raba mi aa Mesia tulalo pisimi .
44004028	Gote neme aba kone ina go mada palimi-pulu nimu kiritatalo pirisimi .
44004029	Gote abiare neme nimuna yada palimiri waru adobaina . Goa pua niaare nena raba mi onaanumi nena agaa puri paloa lakelamona puri giape .
44004030	Nena koneme onaana yaina maepeaawa epe kogono mapaawa puri pane kogononu rado pamona puri giape simi . Nena epe raba meape si Yesuna bimi giape sa .
44004031	Go beten lo kiritisimi rabu nimu piri-para pururu aasa . Goa pua Holi Spirit-mi nimu rayo rulatabenaloa Gote-na epe agaa puri paloa lakesimi .
44004032	Kone rulae onaanumi kone padane sua nimuna oyaenu rumaatalo padane-rupa pirisimi . Aa medamere nina agu raapo saapiralua kone naia .
44004033	Goa pua aposel kogono aanumi Aa Mudu Yesu matmat-para aba rekesa-daa agaa puri paloa lakesimi . Ora goa pua nimu madaare Gote-na epe raba meape kone mea isa .
44004034	Goa pua kone rulae onaanuna rikiraanare naraa onaa meda ora napirisa . Dia , onaa rayome su ada laapo yoto misimi rabu aposel kogono aanu kasimi .
44004035	Goa pua nimumi oyae dia ne onaanu-para mea rumaasimi .
44004036	Goa pisimi rabu aa medalomame Josep nipuna su kabesimi . Go aare nipu Livai-repaa su Saiprus madini aa pirisa pare aposel kogono aanumi bi Barnabas maasimi . Adaa agaa madaare go biri epe kone sape aa .
44004037	Go aare yoto mua aposel kogono aanu mone pua kasa .
44005001	Kone rulae onaanu oyae gupa rumaasimi pare Ananaias Safaira repaaya pirisipi . Ananaias-me nipuna su meda madaa mone yoto misa .
44005002	Go rabu nipumi medaloma paga sua medalomare aposel kogono aanu kasa . Go konere nipuna oreme kasa .
44005003	Goa pisa rabu Pita-me lalo : Ananaias , akolo Satan-me ne makirae kone mea gia pa . Goa pea-ga neme Holi Spirit-para yaa agaa lae . Kone gupa saere su yoto mone medaloma nena pa pagaa saapi sa .
44005004	Go suri ora nena su yaade . Gore yoto meaede mone page nena yaade . Ora-ga akeane ne kone laapo sua mone pagaa i pae ? Ne pa onaanu-para yaa agaa nalakelae pare neme ora Gote-para yaa agaa lakelaede sa .
44005005	Ananaias-me go agaa pagoa sana nipu lopoa ora ini adupisa . Goa pua onaa medalomame go remaa pagoare paalame omesimi .
44005006	Goa pisa rabu naaki ogege aanu ipua Ananaias-na ro mea rua matmat-para pua rogaasimi .
44005007	Wala orope ogesi-daa pirua Ananaias-na ore Pita piri-para ipua mo pisana remaa napagesa .
44005008	Pita-me mo ona agaa misa : Nena aani laapo mo su madaa mone meapede pare akepu meape pae sa . E , meapade pare medaloma dia yaade sa .
44005009	Goa sa rabu Pita-me lakesa : Akeane nena aani raapu wae kone sua Gote-na Holi Spirit-para yaa agaa lakelape ? Nena aanina ro rogaae aanu pora-nane pimi-ga nena yogane page go onaanumi rogaalimi sa .
44005010	Goa sa rabu go ona Pita-na aa re-para lopoa omesa . Goa pua aanumi ipua go onana ro ria pua aanina matmat re-para pua rogaasimi .
44005011	Gore Yesuna disaipel onaanu page onaa medalomanu page apo remaa pagoa ora paala omesimi .
44005012	Aposel aanumi onaana rikiraana napiaa kogono page epe rado kogononu page pisimi . Oro meda aposel kogono aanu-para onaa medaloma Solomon-na wane ada-para pua kiritasimi .
44005013	Go rabu pa onaa medaloma nimu raapu nakirita pirisimi pare kone rulae onaanu pala omoa nimu raapu nakiratasimi .
44005014	Goa pisa rabu Aa Mudu madaa kone rulae onaa adaapu nimu raapu meda-para pirisimi .
44005015	Aposel aanumi kogono waru pisimi-daa onaanumi yaina ome onaa pora-nia ria pua reke madaa page yapara madaa page mapiraasimi . Goa pua Pita pamisa rabu nipuna wasupame yaina i onaa madaa kabulasa rabu ome onaa maepeaainalo mapiraasimi .
44005016	Goa pua Jerusalem su mone pane piri yaina i onaa page remo pabo piri onaa page maepeaainalo mea ipisimi . Goa pisimi rabu aposel kogono aanumi nimu maperekeasimi .
44005017	Goa pisimi rabu Gote-na miru irae aa mudunumi page Sadyusi aanu page nimumi aposel kogono aanu madaa wae udipa kone isimi . Go rabu nimumi ratu waru yawesimi .
44005018	Nimumi aposel kogono aa mapataatalo wae onaa piri karupusa ada-para mea pisimi .
44005019	Goa pisimi pare go ribaa Gote-na ensel medame kalabus adana pora loboa aposel kogono aa meda amaa-nane mea pua agaa gupa lakesa :
44005020	Epe lotu ada-para pua onaa rayo Yesumi kagaa kone gina laketapape sa .
44005021	Goa sa rabu aposel kogono aanumi ensel-na agaa pagoa yapi lapaasa rabu epe lotu ada-para pua agaa pamu mogeasimi . Gote-na miru irae mudu-para nipuna kogono aanu-para nimumi mo Juda aanuna kaunsil rayo kiritainalo yaasimi . Go rabu kalabus ada-para agaa repaawa disaipel aanu mea epenalo lakesimi .
44005022	Goa pisa pare polis kalabus ada ru-nane pua odobasimi rabu aposel kogono aanu napirisimi . Na-adesimi rabu nimu kaunsil piri-para agaa gupa pua lakesimi :
44005023	Niaa kalabus ada adola puaama pare pora gaape ora loko tua oda polis adaba pirina sima . Goa pua pora gaape loboa ru-nane pua go aanu-daa niaame na-adama simi .
44005024	Epe lotu adana mudu polis page Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu polis page Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu page nimumi go aposel kogono aanu pa puamede remaa pagoare kone adaapu isimi .
44005025	Go kone su pirisimi rabu aa medame ipua lalo : Pagalepa . Apo pateme aanumiri lotu ada-para pirua onaanu agaa mogeaeme sa .
44005026	Goa sa raburi plisman-nu nimuna mudu raapu aposel kogono aanu mula pua wala ipisimi . Goa pisimi pare onaanumi nimu aana-me talima kone sua pawa mea ipisimi .
44005027	Goa pua aposel kogono aanuri ru-nane mea pua kaunsil piri-para ma-ainalo Gote-na miru irae aame agaa mulalo pisa :
44005028	Yesuna bi madaare agaa nalakelape aba lamade . Goa lamade pare nimimi ora pa teme-daa adema . Go Jerusalem su-para rayome nimina lakene agaa pageme . Goa pea-ga tu maomape kone niaa madaa masaatalo peme .
44005029	Goa sa rabu Pita-para aposel kogono aanu medalomame agaa gupa abusimi : Niaa Gote-na agaa mana pagoa makuaaema . Goa pua aa medaloma agaa mana napageme .
44005030	Niaana akuanuna Gote-me matmat-para Yesu marekaasa . Goa pisa pare nimimi aba repena polopea madaa nil-mi tu maomasimide .
44005031	Goa pisimi pare Gote-me Yesu marekaawa ki popo ki-nane pirua ora Aa Mudu page onaa Raba Meape Aa mapiraawsa . Nipumi Israel onaa rayo wae kone perekeamina wae kone rabuaniaamina puri pasa .
44005032	Niaame page go kogono aba adesima . Goa pea-ga Gote-me Holi Spirit-na puriri nipuna agaa pagemede onaanu-para kasa sa .
44005033	Kaunsil aanumi go agaa pagesimi rabu ratu waru yawoa aposel kogono aanu tamona kone isimi .
44005034	Go kone isimi rabu Farisi aa medare nipuna bi Gamliel pirisa . Go aare kaunsil aanu piri-para pua rekasa . Go aare rekena agaa mogeasa-pulu onaa rayome nipuna bi minasaasimi . Nipumi rekoa lalo : Go aposel aanu amaa mea pulupa sa .
44005035	Amaa pisipi rabu kaunsil-nupara gupa lakesa : Israel aanu , nimimi go aa laapore ake palima kone saleme .
44005036	Abadere Theudas ipua ni ora Aa Mudu yaade lakesa . Goa sa-pulu aa adaapu gupa 400-pela nipu raapu pirisimi . Goa pisa pare tu maomasimi rabu nipuna disaipel aa rayo pogola pisimi rabu nipuna kogono dia sade .
44005037	Wala orope nimumi onaanuna bi tulalo ipisimi rabu Galili aa Juda epa pirisa . Goa pua onaa adaapumi nipuna agaa pagesimi . Pagesimi pare omenaloa nipuna disaipel onaa pa gima pisimi .
44005038	Goa pisa-pulu abia neme agaa lagialo . Go aa laapo madaa koso natapape . Go aa laapo gimalepa . Nipuna pulalo pi kogonore go pa su amaa kogono-rupadaa ora dia yalia .
44005039	Yapare go aanumi Gote-na kogono peme-pulu nimimi mada narasalimi . Nimimi ora Gote madaa waea pua kogono maoyalimilo lalo sa . Goa sa rabu kaunsil aanumi Gameliel-na agaa pagesimi .
44005040	Goa pisa rabu aposel kogono aa tinalo ru-nane wala mea ipua agaa mana puri pane gupa lakesimi : Yesuna bi mada agaa natapape loa repaasimi .
44005041	Go rabu aposel kogono aa laapo kaunsil gimoa pisipi . Gimoa pisimi rabu nimumi Yesuna bi madaa kedaa risimi-pulu nimu ora raana omoa pisimi .
44005042	Goa puare yapi rayome aposel kogono aanu lotu ada-para page onaanuna ada-para page Gote-na Mea Repae Aa Yesu madaa Epe Agaa mogeasimi .
44006001	Go raburi disaipel onaana ruru adaa ya-mama pisa . Gore mo disaipel onaa Grik agaa simi repaame mo Hibru agaa ne repaa ratu yawesimi . Goa simi : Nimimi eta wasaa onanu nakateme . Dia pare niaana wasaa ona eta nakateme-pulu epe-rupa nasurubeme simi .
44006002	Goa simi rabu aposel-na 12-pela page disaipel onaa rayo makiritaawa gupa simi : Niaame Gote-na agaa gimoa eta oyaeyae rumaalima-daare go kone ora o yalia .
44006003	Amenu , gupa pamina . Nimina rikiraana aa 7-pela oyaeyae rumaaina mapiraatepape . Go mapiraalimide aanuri epe bi mealimi rabu nimu Holi Spirit waru mu redepo ne kone waru su oyae surubenalo mapiraatepa .
44006004	Go palimiri niaame oro yaalo beten loa Gote-na agaa laketema simi .
44006005	Aposel aa-na agaa pagoa nimumi raana omoa pisimi . Goa pua aa-na bi ma-ae Stiven-re Gote-na agaa page Holi Spirit page nipuna robaa-para rulatabesa . Nipu mapaamisa . Goa pua Filip-para Prokorus-para Nikanor-para Timon-para Parmenas-para Nikolas-para go rayo madaa misa . Nikolas-re Antiok su pirua aba Juda aanu raapu kone rulae aba misa .
44006006	Go kone rulae onaanumi mo aa 7-pela disaipel mea ipisimi . Goa pisimi rabu aposel kogono aanumi beten loa simina go aanu aalu madaa ki isimi .
44006007	Go raburi su rayona onaa adaapumi Gote-na agaa pagoa kone rulasimi . Goa pua Jerusalem su-para kone rulae onaa adaa yoa adaapu pisimi . Go page Gote-na miru irae aa adaapu nimumi Yesuna agaa waru pago kone rulasimi .
44006008	Gore Stiven-re Gote-na raba meape kone page Holi Spirit-na puri page waru misa-pulu nipumi onaa piri-para puri pane kogono-para epe rado kogononu-para pua pisa .
44006009	Goa pisa pare onaa medalomame Stiven raapu agaa arere pula pasimi . Go onaanuri Juda onaanuna lotu ada medana bi Esepena Aanu simi . Go onaanu page lotu adaare Sairini suna Juda onaanu page Aleksandria suna Juda onaanu page Silisia Esia su laapo piri Juda onaanu page Stiven raapu agaame arere pisimi .
44006010	Goa pisimi pare Stiven-re Holi Spirit-na puri-para nipuna makuaae kone page adoa simina nipuna agaa mada narasisimi .
44006011	Mada narasisimi-pulu aa medaloma mone kaloa gupa tapape simi : Stiven-me Moses-para page Gote-para page ero agaa ta-daa pagema tapape simi .
44006012	Goa pua lakenaloa kone makuaae onaanu-para rekena agaa tisaanu-para nimuna kone wae-rupa marekasimi . Goa pua nimumi Stiven piri ipua kaunsil-na ada-para adi ria pisimi .
44006013	Goa pua nimuna yaa agaa ne aanumi ru-nane mea penaaloa yaa agaa gupa simi : Go aare oro yaalo niaana Gote piri lotu ada-para nipumi Moses-na agaa madaa ero agaa loaaya simi .
44006014	Gupa pagesima simi : Go aame lalo : Nasaret su-para piri Yesumi epe lotu ada kilipia Moses-me niaa gisade rekena agaa perekealia laasimi .
44006015	Goa loa makirasimi rabu kaunsil aanumi Stiven-na ini agaare ora ensel-na ini agaa nona piane adesimi .
44007001	Goa simi rabu Gote-na miru irae aa mudunumi Stiven agaa misimi : Nimumi ne-para lamede agaare ora tame pae simi .
44007002	Stiven-me go remaa gupa abusa : Amenu Aapanu , pagalepape . Niaana akua Abraham Haran su-para naepe Mesopotemia su-para pirisa rabu epe paa pi Gote-me opapaawa agaa gupa lakesa :
44007003	Nena su-para piri ruru gimoa su rado-para pope . Go suri neme waatoa .
44007004	Goa sa-pulu Abraham Kaldia su gimoa Haran su-nane pisa . Goa pua nipuna aaraa omenaloa Gote-me nipu go su-para mea epenasa . Nimi abia go pimi su madaa lalo .
44007005	Go rabu Gote-me Abraham nipuna surubape su kasa . Dia nipuna agu raapo pirape oge regepene su-daa nakasa . Yapare Gote-me orope Abraham nipuna sinu-para rurunu-para minalo ora agaa lakesa . Gote-me goa lakesa raburi Abraham-me naaki meda abi namadisa .
44007006	Gote-me gupa wala lakesa : Nena orope madiali naakina rurunuri pa kimisu naakinu ruru pirua nimu ora kogono madaa adini aa-rupa piralimi . Goa pua nimu ora maali 400-pela wae-rupa piralimi sa .
44007007	Gore Gote-me Abraham-para wala lakesa : Apo ada kimisu-para piri gavman-mere nena naakina rurunu kogono madaa adia surubalimi . Goa palimi pare neme wae yoto abulanoloa nena madini rurunu ne piri-para nina bi minasaatalo epalimi sa .
44007008	Goa loa sana Gote-me pogatu pirapena Abraham yogane kepene kone kasa . Goa puare Abraham yogane kepene kone kasa . Goa pisa-pulu Abraham-me Aisak madisa rabu yapi 8-pela pirua go naakina yogane kepeasa . Goa pua orope Aisak Jekop madisa . Jekop-mere niaana akua 12-pela madisa .
44007009	Stiven-me agaa gupa lakesa : Jekop-na sinumi Josep-para wae kone sua Isip yoto mua kimisu kogono aa-rupa mea pua yoto misimi . Yapare Gote-me Josep raapu pirua kedaa epalialo surubisa . Go rabu Fero ora Isip-na aa mudu pirisa . Goa pua Josep kabesimi rabu Gote-me Josep epe makuaae kone kasa .
44007010	Nipumi go kone kasa-pulu Fero-me Josep-para epe kone sua Josep ora Isip su rayona namba wan gavman aa mapiraasa . Goa pua nipuna ada page surubenalo surube aa mapiraasa .
44007011	Goa pisa-ga Isip su-para Kenan su laapo-para reae adaa paboa sapi e poape gimi omesimi . Goa pisimi rabu niaana akuanu eta asapu pirisimi .
44007012	Goa pisa rabu niaana akua Jekop-me Isip su-para eta ialo remaa pagoa nipuna sinu rana padane pora kimisu-para mea rapaasa .
44007013	Rana laapo pisimi rabu Josep-me amelu-para nipuna kone lakesa rabu Fero-me Josep nipuna ruru adesa .
44007014	Goa pisa rabu Josep-me nipuna aaraa Jekop-para agaa repaawa nipuna ruru Isip su-para ipulupape lo lakesa . Goa pisa rabu onaa 75-pela no-para pua pirisimi .
44007015	Go pisa rabu Jekop Isip su-para pua omenaloa niaana akuanu page go su-para pua omesimi .
44007016	Omenaloa nimuna ronu Sikem su-para mea ria pua rogaasimi . Go suri Abraham-me aa rogaape matmat kabenalo Hamo-na naakinu mone kasa .
44007017	Goa pisa pare Gote-me Abraham-para pogatu pirape agaa kanalo di rudu sa rabu niaana ruru onaa adaapu Isip su-para kimisu pua pirisimi .
44007018	Go-para pirisimi pare oropere Isip-na aa mudu meda pirua go aame Josep na-adesa .
44007019	Go aa mudumi niaana ruru yala mapolaawa akuanu radaa mapaawa nimuna nogo naaki pa omenalo su amaa-nane mea mapiraasa .
44007020	Go rabu Moses-na agimi nipu madisa . Go naakiri ini kaapu epe-rupa ae naaki agimi akua repo madu saapirisa . Goa pisa pare orope nipu kalae naaki-rupa pirisa .
44007021	Go rabu aa mudu Fero-na waneme mua ora nipuna si-rupa surubisa .
44007022	Go rabu Isip kone makuaae aanumi nipu mogeasimi . Goa pisa-pulu Moses-ri nipu yada yaba ne aa pirua puri pane agaa-para kogono-para pua aa mudu-rupa pirisa .
44007023	Wala orope Moses-na maali 40-pela patinaloa nipumi Israel su-para piri amenu adalua kone isa .
44007024	Goa pisa rabu Moses-me Isip aa medame ame ratu talaina adesa . Adesa-pulu nipumi ame raba mulalo pua nipumi Isip aa tu maomaawa yano abusa .
44007025	Goa pisa rabu Moses-me kone gupa isa : Gote-me ni puri ginalo neme amenu raba mealua rabu adalimi kone isa . Goa kone isa pare amenumi kone gupa naisimi .
44007026	Wala ekeraa-nanere ame laapome yada pisipi rabu Moses adoa yada napipape lo agaa gupa lakesa : Ame laapo , nipiri ora ameaya-ga nipimi akeane maoyaaripi ya ?
44007027	Goa sa pare mo aame ratu yawoa go Moses orolopaawa lalo : Aapimi ne ora aa mudu-rupa mapiraria ya ?
44007028	Abala go Isip aa meda taede-rupa ni tulalo pi pae ?
44007029	Gupa pagesa rabu Moses paala omoa Midian su-para pogola pua yada taepe aa-rupa pua pirisa . Goa pua oropere nipumi naaki laapo madisa .
44007030	Maali 40-pela patisa rabu Moses onaa napiri su Rudu Sainai re-para pua ensel meda adesa . Adesa rabu repena sulaa ralae-na adesa .
44007031	Moses-me adesa rabu nipumi pala omoa rabu nipu re-para pua adolalo pisa . Go rabu nipumi Aa Mudu-na agaa gupa pagesa :
44007032	Niri nena akuanuna Gote yaade . Niri Abraham-para Aisak-para Jekop-para nimuna Gote yaade sa . Goa sa rabu Moses paala omoa pururu pisa pare Gote piri-para na-adesa .
44007033	Goa pisa rabu Gote-me nipu-para lalo : Nena aariti kolape . Abia ne reka aate suri ora epe su yaade sa .
44007034	Neme nina Isip su-para piri onaanuna wae radaa pi kogono-daa ora ade . Nimuna re pagoa nimu raba mulalo epawa . Goa pea-ga ne rekoa ne Isip su-para painalo pi sa .
44007035	Go Moses padanere Israel su-para piri onaanumi aba gimoa gupa simi : Aapimi ne aa mudu-para koso pagape aa-rupa mapiraria pae ? Goa simi pare Gote-me Moses aa mudu-para raba mi aa-para pirinalo mea rapaasa . Go repena sulaa ralae-para pirisa ensel-me Moses raba minalo Gote-me Moses puri mapabasa .
44007036	Moses-mere Isip su-para napiaa kogono page rado kogononu page pisa . Nipumi onaanu Ipa kane kenaawa onaa napiri su-para maali 40-pela nimu surubisa .
44007037	Moses-miri Israel su-para piri onaa aba gupa lakesa : Gote-me ni mapiraasa-rupa nimina rikiraana agaa lakene aa meda mapiraalia .
44007038	Moses-re Israel su-para piri onaanu kiritasimi rabu nipumi raba misa . Nipumi ensel raapu Rudu Sainai madaa pirua agaa lakesa . Go ensel-me akuanu page agaa lakesa . Apo oro yaalo mapiraape agaa pagesimi rabu nimi page pagaliminalo lagisa .
44007039	Goa pisa pare go Moses-re niaana akuanumi masaa rilasimi . Nimimi nipu gimoa wala Isip su-para palima kone isimi .
44007040	Goa pua nimumi Aron gupa lakesimi : Remo medaloma waria simi . Goa pua nimumi pora wanaloa orope pomona . Moses-re niaa Isip su-para mea epaade pare nipu aa-para pua palo maarea simi .
44007041	Goa simi rabu nimumi remo mena gawa-rupa warisimi . Nimumi pa kimi warini mena gawa madaa gote ma-aulaawa pedo pedo pu pirisimi .
44007042	Go rabu Gote-me nimu yaa-para aatade uba kedonuna bi minasaainalo gimisa . Go madaare Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi buk madaa gupa tu isimi : Nimi Israel su-para piri onaanu-ya . Nimimi maali 40-pela su amaa pirua mena gawanu tua miru irisimide-ga gore ni-para pisimi pae ? Ora dia .
44007043	Nimimi mo remo Molek-na mamina warini aba mea kilipia ria pisimi . Go raapu mo remo Refan-na uba wasupa page minasaasimi . Go remo wasupare nimimi wari kiritisimi . Goa puare neme nimi Babilon su-para mea pua mapiraalua sa . Profet aame buk madaa apo agaa tu isa .
44007044	Stiven-me agaa pena lala sa : Niaana akuanuri onaa napiri su-para pirua lotu ada sel mamina-me warisimi . Go adaare Gote-me Moses-para wariape lo robo isa-rupa warisimi .
44007045	Orope go mamina-me warini adaare akuanumi sinu-para kala-mama pua akuanumi kilipia ru pirisimi . Goa pua Josua-me ruru radonu rata mea pisa rabu akuanu sel ada go-para mea ria pisimi . Goa pulalo pisimi rabu Gote-me iaanu aba ratu rubesa . Go su-parare Devit madisa rabu page sel ada aasa .
44007046	Devit-ri Gote-me epe aa kone isa-pulu nipumi Gote-para ne ora akua Jekop-na Gote ya-pulu nena pirape lotu ada warialuame pi lo beten sa .
44007047	Go beten sa pare Devit-na naaki King Solomon nipumi go lotu ada warisa .
44007048	Yapare so Mudu Gote-re pa kimi warini ada-para napia . Go madaare Gote-na agaa lakene aame gupa sa :
44007049	Aa Mudumi gupa sa : Yaa-parare ora nina pirape siaa yaade . No suri ora nina aa i yae yaade . Goa pe-ga nimimi nina adaare ake piane palimi yapae ? Go page nina kitu pirape su yaade .
44007050	Neme go oyaenuri nina kimi waritu sa .
44007051	Stiven-me kaunsil gupa lakesa : Nimiri pu rero pina raa-para piri onaa pimi . Nimina aane poaawa Gote-na agaa napageme . Nimiri nimina akuanumi Holi Spirit gimisimide-rupa peme .
44007052	Profet ora padane nimina akuanumi radaa nakasimi ya ? Go page nimina akuanumi epe redepo ne aa madaa pora mea waalape aa tu maomasimi . Goa pua abia page nimimi nipu kawae madua tu maomasimi .
44007053	Nimiri ensel-me Gote-na rekena agaa mea lagisa . Goa pisa pare nimimi go agaa rasua napagaeme .
44007054	Kaunsil piri aanumi Stiven-na agaa pagoare ratu waru yawesimi-pulu nimuna abulu regepe no pirisimi .
44007055	Yapare Stiven-re Holi Spirit nipuna robaa-para rulatabesa-pulu nipumi so yaa-para Gote-na epe paa adesa . Yesu Gote-na popo ke-nane pirina adesa .
44007056	Adalepa . So yaa lobapaina Gote-na ki popo ke-nane Onaa Raapu Pirape Aa-na Si so pia-daa lo Stiven-me gupa sa .
44007057	Goa sa rabu nimumi aa-ya loa nimuna aane pora poaawa Stiven aipapulu aditalo pisimi .
44007058	Nimumi nipu adaare amaa-nane rata mea pua aana-me tisimi . Goa pua nipu tu maomape aanumi mamina kaloa ogege aa meda mea kasimi . Go aana biri Sol yaade .
44007059	Nimumi aana-me talaina Stiven-me Gote-para beten gupa sa : Aa Mudu Yesu , nina wasupa mea sa .
44007060	Goa sa rabu rumu koba pua agaa puri paloa sa : Aa Mudu , go aanuna pupitagi wae yoto na-abulape . Goa loa nipu ini adupia u patisa .
44008001	Stiven tisimi go raburi Jerusalem su-para piri kone rulae onaanu madaa wae kedaa di marekaasa . Goa pisa-pulu nimu su rado rado-para yada ta reko pisimi . Nimu Judia Samaria su-para yada ta pisimi pare aposel kogono aanu padane napisimi .
44008002	Go raburi Gote madaa kone waru rulae aa medalomame Stiven ro rogaawa re lo pirisimi .
44008003	Yapare Sol-me Gote-na ruru kedaa katalo maoyasa . Nipu ada padane padane laata pu-para pamua kone rulae onaanu adia kalabus ada-para mapatasa .
44008004	Yadata pisimi kone rulae onaanumi su rayona pua epe agaa lapedepesimi .
44008005	Filip-ri nipu su Samaria adaare-pare pua apo piri onaanu-para Gote-me Mea Repae Aana agaa mogeasa .
44008006	Nipumi napiaa kogono pisa rabu onaa adaapumi nipuna agaa pagoa kone rulasimi .
44008007	Goa pisa rabu Filip-mi remo pabo piri onaa adaapuna remo rakepeaasa . Go rakepeataina agaa puri pane simi . Goa pua pora napami ki wae onaanu page yaina omopa i onaanu page maepeaasa .
44008008	Go rabu Samaria su-parare onaanumi ora raaname omesimi .
44008009	Go adaare-parare aa meda nipuna bi Saimon pirisa . Go aare nipu yaina pia aa ya-pulu Samaria su-para piri onaa rayome nipu paala omesimi . Nipumi ni ora aa mudu sa-pulu onaanumi nipuna puri adoa paala omesimi .
44008010	Samaria su-para piri onaa rayo ora aa mudunu page riabo onaanu page go yaina pi aa-na bi waru minasaasimi . Go aa madaa gupa simi : Nipu Gote-na puri ia-pulu bi Ora Puri lamina simi .
44008011	Ora raana adaapu nipuna yaina pi kone adoa onaanumi nipu waru pagesimi .
44008012	Goa pisimi pare Filip-mi Gote-na Surube Su madaa Yesu Krais-na bi madaa Epe Agaa lakesa rabu Samaria su onaame agaa madaa kone rulaawa baptais misimi .
44008013	Go yaina pia aa Saimon page kone rulaawa baptais mua sana Filip re-para pirisa . Goa pua nipumi puri pane kogono-para kogono radonu-para adesa rabu paala omoa ki maalu tisa .
44008014	Samaria onaa Gote-na agaa robaa-para maodaasimi rabu Jerusalem su-para piri aposel kogono aanumi remaa pagesimi . Goa pua nimumi Samaria su-nane Pita Jon lapo mea penaasimi .
44008015	Go aa laapo ipisipi rabu nipumi kone rulae onaanu Holi Spirit minalo beten sipi .
44008016	Holi Spirit onaame abade namisimi-pulu nipumi goa pisipi . Nimu baptais misimi rabu Yesuna bi padane pagoa misimi .
44008017	Goa pisa-pulu Pita Jon lapome nimuna aalu madaa ki inaloa Holi Spirit misimi .
44008018	Aposel aa laapome aalu madaa ki isipi rabu go yaina pi aa Saimon-me onaanu Holi Spirit misimi rabu adesa . Adesa rabu Pita Jon lapo-para mone-me kabano tapa lo agaa gupa lakesa :
44008019	Go puriri ni gialepa . Nina kimi pa onaanuna aaluna sanoloa Holi Spirit mealimi sa .
44008020	Goa sa pare Pita-me agaa gupa abusa : Nena mone raapu wae repena sulaa-para pope . Neme Gote-na pa ode gea yaere mone-me kabalua kone nasape .
44008021	Nemere kogono pulalo niaa raapu kogono aa mada napirali . Nena robaa-para epe redepo ne kone napia .
44008022	Pare nena robaa-para kone maepeaawa Aa Mudu-para beten lape . Goa pua wae kone marabuaina beten lape .
44008023	Gore nena pu rero pi aa-rupa adalo sa . Go koneme ne kalabus ada mapiraaya .
44008024	Goa sa-pulu Saimon-me Pita Jon lapo-para lalo : Aya , nena lae-rupa ni mada wae yaenu naepena beten tapape sa .
44008025	Goa pua Jon Pita lapome Aa Mudu-na agaa kone rola mogeawa Jerusalem su-para wala pisipi . Pora-nia pisipi rabu Samaria su-para piri onaanu Gote-na Epe Agaa lakesipi .
44008026	Oropere Gote-na ensel medame Filip agaa gupa lakesa : Nena oyae amege pua no-nane puare Jerusalem su-para Gasa su lapone pora pamuape sa . Go porare onaa napiri su-para go popesa .
44008027	Goa sa rabu Filip-mi oyae amege pua pisa . Go pisa rabu Itiopia su-para piri aa meda nipuna ada wala polalo pisa . Go aare naaki namadini abe aa yapare ora aa mudu pirua Kwin ona muduna mone surubisa . Go onana biri Kadasi nipu Itiopia piri onaanu surubisa . Itiopia aame Jerusalem su-para Gote-na bi minasaawa ada wala polalo lotu ta pisa .
44008028	Nipu hos-me yone kaaris madaa pirua popesa . Pira palae pulaawa agaa lakene aa Aisaia-na pepa madaa dipiaama pisa .
44008029	Goa pua Holi Spirit-mi Filip lakesa : Mogo hos-me yone kaarais re-para pua aasa .
44008030	Goa sa rabu Filip go aa piri-para aipapulu pua agaa lakene aa Aisaia-na buk dipialaina pagesa . Pagoa agaa gupa misa : Go dipiae agaana re niminaae pae ?
44008031	Go aame lalo : Aa medame go agaana re nalagialiadere akea pua niminaalua yapae ? Itiopia surube aame Filip gupa loa sana hos-me yone kaaris madaa ni raapu epa pira lo lakesa .
44008032	Mo dipisade agaana re gupa lakesa : Gore nipu tape mena sipsip-rupa nimumi nipu mea pisimi . Oge mena sipsip-ri iri pudiatalo rogaawa pemede-rupa agaa lorainaloa nipu mea pisimi .
44008033	Gore nimumi nipu ora rabuaniaawa nipu mariae koso agaa simi . Gore nipu nogo naakinu page meda ora napiri . Goa pua nimumi nipu tu maomainaloa so yaa-para pisa . Go agaare Aisaia-na buk madaa apo-rupa tu isa .
44008034	Apode aame Aisaia-na buk dipiare Filip-para agaa gupa misa : Go agaa lakene aa-na agaare aapi madaa loaaya pae ? Ora nipu madaa ta pae pa aa meda madaa ta pae ?
44008035	Goa sa rabu Filip-mi Epe Agaa adaapu mogeasa . Go aana aba dipisa agaana re loare Yesuna Epe Agaa mogeaatalo pisa .
44008036	Goa pua pora pulaaware Itiopia surube aame ipa ini meda adesa . Goa pua nipumi lalo : Go ipa ada . Akeane neme baptais namealua yapae sa .
44008037	Filip-mi nipu-para lalo : Nena pu robaame kone waru rulali-daare baptais mada meali sa . Goa sa rabu go aame lalo : Abia Yesu Krais-re ora Gote-na Si yaade kone rulaato sa .
44008038	Go rabu mo aame oseme yone kaaris maloraawa nipu Filip lapo no ipa-para pisipi . Goa pua Filip-mi baptais kasa .
44008039	Ipa masaana gimoa ipisipi rabu Holi Spirit-mi Filip pane mea pisa . Mo aame Filip wala na-adisa pare nipu pora-nia pisa rabu nipuna robaa-para raana ora waru pisa .
44008040	Filip-mi kone mua nipu Asdot su-para pa epa pirisa . Nipumi adaare rayona Epe Agaa lakela-mama puare Sisaria su-para pua pirisa .
44009001	Yapare go rabu Sol-me wae agaa lala pua Gote-na aposel kogono aanu tu maomaatalo pisa . Goa pua nipumi Gote-na miru irae aa mudu piri pua adesa .
44009002	Go aa mudumi pepa tinalo laketa pisa . Goa pua Damaskus su-parare Sol-me Juda aanuna lotu ada ru-nane polalore Gote-na pora raati onaa lotu ada-para madaa asapisa . Goa pua nipumi nimu Jerusalem su-para kalabus ada aditalo mea pisa .
44009003	Gore Sol pua Damaskus adaare resi-para pamisa rabu nipu piri-para so yaa-para i paame nipuna ini agaa-para paa-rupa ipisa .
44009004	Go rabu Sol nipu su amaa lopoa agaa meda gupa pagesa : Sol Sol-ya , neme niri ake pea-daa maoyaaye pae ?
44009005	Gore Sol-me lalo : Aa Mudu , nere aapi ya ? Agaa gupa abusa : Niri Yesu yaade . Nemere ni oro yaalo maoyaaye .
44009006	Yapare ne rekoa so adaare-para pu . Neme orope pali yae aa medame lagialia sa .
44009007	Go agaa sa rabu aa medaloma Sol raapu pisimiri pa rekaawa agaa nasimi . Nimumi go agaa pagesimi pare pa oyae meda na-adesimi .
44009008	Sol su madaa rekesa pare ini-para ribaa pa yabaasa . Goa pisa-pulu nipuna adami aanumi ki mina mua Damaskus su-para mea lamua pisimi .
44009009	Gore yapi repome Sol-na ini-para ribaa pa yabaina eta nanisa .
44009010	Goa pua Damaskus su adaare-para Gote-na agaa lae disaipel aa meda Ananaias pirisa . Nipumi upaa adesa rabu Gote-me agaa gupa lakesa : Ananaias-ya sa . Nipumi lalo : Aa Mudu , ni go pi sa .
44009011	Gote-me nipu-para lalo : Ne rekoa go pora-para pu . Mo porana biri Redepone Pora , go pora-para pope . Ne Juda aanuna ada pua Tasas su-para piri aa Sol asapape . Abia go aa Sol-me beten lala pia .
44009012	Nipuna kone-parare aa meda ne Ananaias nipuna ada-para pua aalu madaa ki epa saina kone saapia . Goa pali rabu nipuna ini wala rupalua kone saapia .
44009013	Ananaias-me gupa sa : Aa Mudu , onaa adaapumi go aa-na wae kone adoa ni lagiame . Jerusalem su-parare nipumi nena epe kone rulae onaa madaa wae kedaa mea kasa .
44009014	Gote-na miru irae aa nimu nipu pepa kasimi-pulu go aa Damaskus su-para ipuare nena bi minasaae onaa aditalo pea .
44009015	Aa Mudumi nipu-para lalo : Abi pu . Neme nipu nina epe raba mi aa mapirayo . Nipumi nina bi su rayona mea pua ruru radonu page nimuna aa mudunu page Israel onaanu page nimumi pagenalo mea palia .
44009016	Nina kogono madaare neme nipuna radaa nape yaenu mea waatoa .
44009017	Goa sa-pulu Ananaias pua go ada ru-nane pua odobaawa Sol-na aaluna nipuna kimi oraasa . Goa pua nipumi lalo : Ame-ya Sol , aba ne pora-nia pamua Aa Mudu Yesu adaede . Nipumi nena ini rupaawa Holi Spirit nena robaa-para rulatabenalo ni mea epenala sa .
44009018	Goa sa rabu Sol-na ini madaa rigitisa yae rakepe pasa rabu ini wala rupasa . Goa pisa rabu nipu rekoa baptais misa .
44009019	Goa pua eta noa yogane-para puri wala misa .
44009020	Nipu Juda aanuna lotu adanu-para pua odobaawa Yesuna bi madaa agaa lakesa . Gore gupa sa : Yesu ora Gote-na Si yaade sa .
44009021	Go onaanumi pagoare kidipaa ragi tu pirua agaa gupa simi : Go aare aba Jerusalem su-para mea pirua Gote-na bi minasaae onaa tu maomasade aa yaade . Go aare go-para ipua nipumi Gote-na pora raati onaa aditalo ipisa . Goa pua Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu piri-para mea polalo pi sa .
44009022	Goa simi pare Sol-me agaa mogeasa rabu puri meaa-mama pu pirisa . Nipumi Damaskus piri Juda aanu-para Yesu ora Gote-na Mea Repae Aa yaade lakenaloa agaa mada na-abusimi .
44009023	Goa pua oro medare Juda aanumi nimu kirita pirua Sol tulalo yada robesimi .
44009024	Pare Sol-me nipu tulalo pisimi remaa aba pagesa . Goa pua Juda aanumi Sol tulalo pisimi rabu ada pora gaapenu ora ribaa page aebo page kaleda pirisimi .
44009025	Goa pisa pare Sol-na disaipel onaanumi nipu lamu mua adaa nu basket-para kaleda mapiraasimi . Goa pua kepo ralu rarane basket-para madua pua mea lopaniaasimi .
44009026	Sol Jerusalem su-para pua disaipel aanu raapu piritalo pisa . Goa pisa pare nimumi nipu Gote-na disaipel aa dia yana kone sua paala omesimi .
44009027	Go rabu Barnabas-me nipu raba mua disaipel aanu piri lamua pisa . Goa pua Barnabas-me Sol pora pamisa rabu Aa Mudu adesade remaa lakesa . Goa pua Barnabas-me Aa Mudu Solo-para agaa lakesade remaa lakesa . Sol Damaskus su-para pirisa rabu Yesuna agaa puri paloa mogeasade page remaa lakesa .
44009028	Goa lakesa-pulu Sol-me disaipel aanu raapu pirua ora paala naomesa pare Jerusalem rayona pua Aa Mudu-na bi madaa puri pane agaa lakesa .
44009029	Goa pua nipumi Grik agaa ne Juda aanu-para arere agaa lo pirisa rabu nimumi nipu tulalo pisimi .
44009030	Go disaipel aanumi go remaa pagoare nimu Sol Sisaria su-nane lamua puare Tasas su-para penaasimi .
44009031	Goa pisa rabu Judia su robo-para Galili su robo-para Samaria su robo-para kone rulae onanu epe-rupa pirisimi . Goa pua Holi Spirit-mi puri kasa-pulu Gote-na ruru adaa yoa puri palo pirisimi . Goa pua Gote-na ruru piri onaanumi nipuna bi waru minasaa pirisimi .
44009032	Pita nipuri su rayona pamua agaa mogeasa rabu oro medare Lida su-para piri kone rulae onaanu adola pisa .
44009033	Go-parare aa meda nipuna bi Ainias-re nipu pora napami aa ya-pulu reke madaa pa pirisa . Go yainare nipu maali 8-pela ru-nane omesa .
44009034	Pita-me nipu-para lalo : Ainias , Yesu Krais-me ne maepeaata-ga rekoa nena yapara ludia maredepoya sa . Goa sa rabu Ainias aipapulu rekesa .
44009035	Nipu rekoa pisa-pulu Lida Saron su lapo piri onanumi nipu adoa nimuna kone perekea Gote-na agaa ratisimi .
44009036	Mo Jopa su-para Gote-na disaipel ona meda pirisa . Nipuna biri Tabita yapare Grik agaa madaa Dorkas simi . Go bina re-re ora aipapulu pope yae-daa teme . Go onare oro yaalo epe kogono pua naraa onaanu oyae kalala pisa .
44009037	Go rabu nipu yaina meda mua ini adupisa . Gore nipuna to radepea ada rum sone mea ria pua isimi .
44009038	Gore adaa kagure Jopare Lida su regepea aasa . Goa pua Jopa su-para piri disaipel aanumi Pita Lida su-para pia remaa pagesimi rabu aa laapo repaawa agaa gupa lakesimi : Niaa piri aipapulu epape lo lakesimi .
44009039	Pita pagoa go su gimoa nimu raapu wala pisa . Opapasa rabu so ada rum ae madaa-nane lamua pisimi . Goa pua ona wasaa rayome Pita kutapu mawabaawa re lo pisimi . Nimumi Dorkas nipuna warini mamina-nu oyaenu Pita mea waasimi .
44009040	Pita-me onaa rayo amaa pulupa loare rumu koba pua beten sa . Beten loare go onaana ro i-para inimi nipu adaniaawa gupa sa : Tabita , nere reka . Goa sa rabu oname nipuna ini rupaawa Pita adoa reka pirisa .
44009041	Go rabu Pita-me nipuna ki mua marekaasa . Go rabu nipumi kone rulae onaa-para ona wasaanu-para yaaloa go ona epa adalepa sa .
44009042	Go remaare Jopa su one mone lakelo kiritisimi-pulu onaa adaapumi Gote-na agaa madaa kone rulasimi .
44009043	Goa pua Pita nipu Jopa su-para yapi adaapu pirua nipu Saimon raapu pirisipi . Go Saimon-re mena gawana yoganeme oyae warini aa .
44010001	Aa meda nipuna bi Kornilius-ri nipu Sisaria su-para pirisa . Nipuri Rom suna aa mudu pirua nipumi soldia aa 100-pela surubisa . Gore nipuna soldia aanuri nimu madini su Itali ya-pulu go bi Itali-repaa simi .
44010002	Go surube aare nipu oro yaalo lotu lo nimu raapu Gote-na bi minasaaeme , Nipumi mone oyaeyae Juda aanuna naraa onaanu kalo oro yaalo Gote-para beten lala pirisa .
44010003	Oro medare naare pereke tula pulaina 3 klok rabu nipumi upaa-rupa pua oyae adesa . Adesa rabu Gote-na ensel meda ipua epa lalo : Kornilius-ya .
44010004	Nipumi mo ensel paala omoa pa adabaawa lalo : Aa Mudu , ake palua ya ? Go rabu ensel-me gupa abusa : Nena beten-para oyaeyae raba mi kone-parare Gote-me adaba pia .
44010005	Abiare neme agaa mea pope naaki medaloma Jopa su-para penaala . Nimumi aa meda lamua ipulupape lo lakelape . Go adola palimide aa-na biri Saimon yapare nipuna bi meda Pita teme .
44010006	Go aare nipuna bi padane-rupa ne aa medana ada-para piralia . Nipuri mena gawana yogane raapu kogono pi aa yaade . Nipuna adaare no ipa solwara repaa-nane aaya-daa sa .
44010007	Ensel-me Kornilius agaa gupa lakeloa pisa . Kornilius-mi nipuna kogono naaki laapo-para soldia aa meda page nimu yaasa . Mo soldia aa medare nipu lotu agaa pagoa nipumi oro yaalo Kornilius raapu pirua raba meape kogono pisa .
44010008	Kornilius-mi go aa repo-para ensel-na remaa lakeloa mo Jopa su-para mea penaasa .
44010009	Nimu pua pora-nia patua yapi lapaasa raburi wala puare Jopa su re-para pua opapasimi . Go rabu naare rikiraana aina Pita-me ada masaana beten ta pisa .
44010010	Go ada masaana pirisa rabu nipu reame omoa eta nolalo pisa . Gore nimumi eta managola kiritisimi rabu Pita-me upaa nona piane yae meda adesa .
44010011	So yaa pora gaape lobenaloa nipumi yae meda adesa . Adaa mamina nona piane yaere nimumi rugi maala ripinaawa lopaniaataina adesa .
44010012	Go mamina-na ru-nanere mena yaa yapa waasa paaka oyaeyae pabo pirisa .
44010013	Go rabu agaa meda gupa pagesa : Pita , ne rekoa mogo yaenu tu nape .
44010014	Pare Pita-me lalo : Aa Mudu , ni mada dia . Niaana rekena agaa ia-pulu neme wae etanu-daa nanalua .
44010015	Gore wala rana lapopa agaa gupa lakesa : Gote-me eta oyae maepeaayare neme go wae etanu-daa nalape .
44010016	Go agaare rana repo loa sana mamina oyae so yaa-para aipapulu mea pisa .
44010017	Gore Pita-me kone adaapu sua apo upaame adalo yaere ake yapae kone isa . Goa kone saapiralaina Kornilius-mi mo mea epenasa aanumi agaa meama meama ipuare Saimon-na ada pora gaape-nane epa rekasimi .
44010018	Nimumi gupa yaasimi : Saimon nipuna bi medare Pita-ya . Go aare go ada-para pia pae napia pae simi .
44010019	Pita-me nipuna upaa pa niminaata pirina Holi Spirit-mi gupa lakesa : Pora gaapenanere aa repome ne go asapeme-daa lo lakesa .
44010020	Goa pea-ga ne rekoa nimu raapu pope . Neme go aanu mea epenalawa-ga kone adaapu nasape pare aipapulu pope sa .
44010021	Goa sa rabu Pita ada-para pua aanu-para lalo : Nimimi asapuaarimide aare ni yaade . Nimi ake pula epame pae sa .
44010022	Nimumi agaa gupa simi : surube aa Kornilius-mi pulupa laa-daa epa amaa . Go aare epe aa pirua Gote-na bi minasaae aa yaade . Juda onaa rayome nipu-para epe kone imi . Go aa-parare Gote-na ensel medame gupa lakesa : Neme Pita-na agaa mea rapape .
44010023	Go agaa pagoare Pita-me nimu ada ru-nane lamua pua eta kalo surubisa . Wala yapipu Pita-me oyae amege pua nimu raapu pisa . Jopa su-para piri kone rulae amenu medaloma page pisimi .
44010024	Nimu puare pora padane kura palae puare Sisaria su-para pua opapasimi . Gore Kornilius-mi nimu adaba pirisa-pulu nipuna ruru-para nipuna adami onaanu-para yaanaloa adola kiritasimi .
44010025	Pita ada ru-nane aba ripia odobasa rabu Kornilius Pita-na kibu re-para pua lopesa .
44010026	Goa pisa pare Pita-me nipu marekaawa lalo : Ne rekaina . Ni page pa nena yago yaade .
44010027	Goa pua Pita Kornilius laapo agaa lama pua ada ru-nane odobasipi . Go ada ru-nanere onaa adaapu kirita pirisimi .
44010028	Pita-me nimu-para lalo : Nimimi ademe . Juda onaanuri pa ruru onaa radonu raapu mada napitimi . Niaa Juda aanuna rekena agaame gupa ta : Neme ruru radonu-para waea pi onaa-rupadaa natoa . Dia-ga Gote-me ni-para go kone gimala .
44010029	Goa pea-ga nimimi ni lamua ipisimide rabu neme agaa narasisude pare agaa pagoa ni epawa . Gore neme nimi abi agaa mealo : Ni akeane yalame pae ?
44010030	Kornilius-mi lalo : Gore numane gupi rabu naare pereke tua aina ada-para pirua beten lala pirisu . Go rabu aa meda nipu epe yaako pi mamina maraawa ni piri-para epa rekaawa lalo :
44010031	Kornilius , Gote-me nena beten-para oyae ode kane kogono-para adoaaya .
44010032	Neme aa meda no Jopa su-para penaaloa aa Saimon Pita lamu mula penaalawa . Go aare bi padane ne yagona ada-para pirina go ada ipa solwara repaa-para aaya . Yagore mena gawa yogane warini aa .
44010033	Goa sa rabu neme aa medaloma aipapulu ne piri epena lawa . Ne waru pagoa epae-ga niaa rayo abia Gote-na ini agaa-para epa pima . Go agaare ake ya ? Gote-me ne lagi agaa manare niaame pagolalo ado pima .
44010034	Pita-me agaa aba gupa lapedepesa : Gote-me ruru rayo madaa kone padane ia-daa niminaato .
44010035	Goa pua onaa rayome Gote-na bi minasaawa nipu madaa epe kone rulaeme-daare Gote-me nimu raaname omea . Su rayona piri onaanu madaa epe kone ia .
44010036	Aba Gote-me niaa Israel su-para piri onaanu-para Yesumi epe-rupa pirape agaa laginalo mea rapaasa . Yesuri onaa rayona Aa Mudu pia .
44010037	Nimimi Jon-me aba Epe Agaa mogeawa baptais kasa-daa pageme kone salo . Orope Yesumi Galili su-para agaa lakeloare Juda su rayona Epe Agaa mogeasa .
44010038	Nimimi Gote-me Yesu Holi Spirit-para puri kasade remaa pageme kone salo . Gote-re Yesu raapu pirisa-pulu nipumi su rayo pamua epe kogono pisa . Goa pua nipumi onaa rayo Satan-na puri gimenalo mea rapaasa .
44010039	Niaame Yesuna kogono rayo adema . Juda su-para Jerusalem su-para page onaanumi Yesuna kogono adema . Go pisa pare nimumi go aa repena polopea madaa tu maomasimi .
44010040	Goa pisimi pare yapi repo matmat-para pirinaloa Gote-me nipu matmat-para wala marekaasa .
44010041	Goa pua niaame adamonalo Gote-me marekaasa . Niaa agu raapo adamonalo namarekaasa pare onaa medalomame page adenalo pisa . Nipu matmat-para rekoa ipisa rabu niaa nipu raapu padane-para eta no pirisima .
44010042	Goa pua Yesumi niaa-para epe agaa pua laketapape sa-pulu go epe agaare onaanu pamu laketema . Gote-me nipu padane koso pagape aa mapiraasa-pulu niaame go agaa laketema . Gore ora pa pitimi onaanu page aba ome onaa page Yesumi nimuna koso pago rumaalia .
44010043	Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi Yesu madaa agaa lakesimi . Onaa rayome Yesu madaa kone rulalimiri Yesuna bina purimi nimina pupitagi raakepe rubalia .
44010044	Pita-me go agaa lalaina Holi Spirit nipuna agaa pago pirisimi aanu rayo madaa ipisa .
44010045	Goa pua kone rulae Juda aanuri Pita raapu pirua paalame omesimi . Gote-me nipuna Holi Spirit ruru rado onaanu-para kasa-pulu Juda aanumi ki ragi tua paalame omesimi .
44010046	Gore ruru rado onaanumi adaa agaa rado rado lo Gote-na bi minasaasimi rabu Juda aanumi paalame omesimi . Goa pua Pita-me adoa lalo :
44010047	Go aanuri Holi Spirit meamedere niaame page go-rupa misima , Goa pea-ga aapimi madaa rekena salia ya ? Baptais mada mealimina sa .
44010048	Goa sa rabu Pita-me agaa mana gupa lakesa : Yesuna bi madaa baptais kalape . Goa pua Pita-me mo aanu nimuna kone mua yapi medaloma nimu raapu pirisa .
44011001	Goa pisa rabu Judia piri disaipel aanu-para kone rulae aanu-para nimumi pa ruru radome page Gote-na epe agaa pageme remaa pagesimi .
44011002	Goa pua Pita Jerusalem su-para wala pisa rabu oge naakina yogane kado talo peme aanumi Pita-para rono omoa ratu yawesimi .
44011003	Nimumi Pita-para lalo : Ne abade ruru radonu yogane nakepene aa raapu eta no pirisimide .
44011004	Goa simi rabu Pita-me go agaana re waru gupa lakesa :
44011005	Niri Jopa adaare-para pirua beten lala pirisu . Go rabu nina kone mea perekea upaa nona piane yae meda adesu . Goa pua ora mamina nona piane oyae meda nipuna rugi ripinaawa yaa-para epa kilipia ni piri epa isa .
44011006	Gore neme mamina ru-nane waru adesu rabu neme uri arinu-para paakanu-para yaa yapanu oyae rayo adesu .
44011007	Go rabu agaa medame ni gupa lagisa : Pita , neme rekoa mo arinu tu nape .
44011008	Pare neme gupa lawa : Aa Mudu , neme madaa dia . Neme abade rekena i arinu madaa eta-rupadaa ora nanisude .
44011009	Pare yaa-para agaa wala lagisa : Gote-me oyaeyae rayo maepeaaya-ga oto pi yae kone nasape .
44011010	Go agaare rana repo paganoloa mo arinu oyae rayo wala so yaa-para yola pua .
44011011	Ora go raburi Sisaria piri aa repo ni lamua polalo nina ada-para epa opapasimi .
44011012	Holi Spirit-mi ne nimi raapu pu lo gupa lagisa-pulu neme kone adaapu naisu . Go aa oraapu ni raapu Sisaria su-para puare Kornilius-na ada-para pisima .
44011013	Gore Kornilius-mi ensel meda nipuna ada-para pirina adesa remaare niaa lagisa . Go ensel-me nipu lakesa : Neme Jopa su-para aa mea rapaawa Saimon lamua ipulupape . Go aa nipuna bi laapopare Saimon Pita teme .
44011014	Go aa nipumi epe agaa lagialia rabu ne-para nena ada-para piri onaanu-para nimi oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama pope remaa lagialia . Go ensel-me gupa sa .
44011015	Gore neme agaa pena lalano Holi Spirit nimu madaa ipisa . Abade niaa madaa ipisade-rupa ipisa .
44011016	Ipisa rabu neme Aa Mudumi agaa lagisade-rupa kone-para wala isu . Nipumi aba gupa sa : Jon-mere onaanu baptais kasa rabu pa ipame kasa pare nimiri Holi Spirit-na baptais mealimina sa .
44011017	Niaame Aa Mudu Yesu Krais madaa kone rulaawa Holi Spirit misima . Goa pua abiare go ruru rado onaanu padane-rupa misimi . Gore padane-rupa misimi-pulu neme Gote-na kogono mada namaoyalua kone isu .
44011018	Gore nimumi Pita-na agaa pagoare nimuna rono agaa gimoa Gote-na bi minasaasimi . Nimumi lalo : Gote-me ruru rado onaanu page oro yaalo kagaa piraama laama paliminalo kone perekeape pora waasa .
44011019	Stiven tisimi rabu adaa kedaa mea kasa-pulu kone rulae onaanu pu pa yabisimi . Goa pua Fonisia su-para Saiprus su-para Antiok su-para page epe agaa lakesimi pare nimumi Juda onaanu agu agaa lakesimi .
44011020	Goa pisimi pare Saiprus Sairini su laapo piri kone rulae aa medaloma Antiok su-para pua ruru rado onaa-para Aa Mudu Yesuna Epe Agaa pua lakesimi .
44011021	Goa pua Aa Mudumi puri kasa-pulu onaa adaapumi Epe Agaa madaa kone rulaawa Gote-para kone perekesimi .
44011022	Goa pisimi rabu apo Jerusalem su-para kone rulae onaanumi remaa pagesimi-pulu Barnabas mo Antiok su-para penaasimi .
44011023	Barnabas nipu pua opapasa rabu nipumi Gote-me go onaanu raba mina adoa raaname omoa agaa gupa lakesa : Go epe agaa nagimoa Aa Mudu raapu puri paloa kogono pu piralepape .
44011024	Barnabas ora epe aa pirua nipumi Gote-na agaa waru pagoa Holi Spirit nipu madaa waru rulatabesa . Go rabu onaa adaapumi Aa Mudu-na agaa madaa kone rulasimi .
44011025	Goa pua Barnabas-me Sol mo Tasas su-para asapula pisa . Nipu aba adasaawa mo Antiok su-para lamua ipisa . Goa pua maali padanemere mo Antiok su-para Gote madaa kone rulae onaa raapu pirua onaa adaapu mogeasipi . Go Antiok su-parare nimumi disaipel onaanu Krais-na bi aba kasimi .
44011026	
44011027	Go rabu Gote-na agaa lakene aa medaloma Jerusalem gimoa Antiok su-para pisimi .
44011028	Pisimi rabu agaa lakene aa meda Agabus page ipisa . Holi Spirit-mi su rayona reae ora adaape pabenalo go aa-na kone-para mea kasa . Goa pua Agabus-me onanu gupa lakesa . Gore orope aa mudu Sisa Klodius pirisa rabu reaeme waru omesimi .
44011029	Go agaa pagesimi rabu disaipel onaanu Judia su-para piri ame baani onaanu-para eta kabape mone mea pena kone isimi . Nimuna kone sua mone padane padane kaloa gupa raba misimi .
44011030	Nimumi goa pua Barnabas Sol lapo mone kanaloa lotu ada surube aanu-para mea pisipi .
44012001	Go rabu aa mudu Herot-me Gote-na ruru medaloma-para kedaa waru mea kasa .
44012002	Nipumi Jon-na ame Jems rai kutumi tu maomasa .
44012003	Goa puare Juda aanumi nipu madaa pedo pisimi . Goa pisa-pulu Herot-me Pita page kalabus mapatasa . Goa pisa yapi diri olode raburi bret ma-adaa yis nasape di rabu pisa .
44012004	Pita adia kalabus ada-para soldia 16-pela nimumi Pita surubisimi . Goa pisimi pare 4-pela surubenaloa 4-pela rado medame surubisimi . Herot-na konere go olode Pasova dia naloa Juda aanu piri-para Pita mea palua kone isa .
44012005	Go pulalo pisa-pulu Pita kalabus ada-para waru surubisimi . Go rabu Gote-na rurumi Pita raba minalo Gote-para beten waru laasimi .
44012006	Go ribaa raburi Herot-me Pita ekeraa-nane koso talo pisa . Goa pua go ribaa rabu Pita nipu soldia aa lapona rikiraana patisa . Nimu hankap adaape laapome adia oda plisman-numi kalabus ada pora gaape-para surubisimi .
44012007	Ora go rabu Aa Mudu-na ensel epa aasa rabu kalabus ada-para nipuna paa ewo aasa . Ensel-me Pita-na pasaa tua marekaasa . Marekaawa gupa sa : Ne aipapulu ipu . Goa sa rabu hankap su amaa kolataboa lopesa .
44012008	Ensel-me lalo : Aako lete yamoa aariti maara sa . Pita-me goa pisa rabu ensel-me lalo : Nena mamina maraawa ni rata mea epape .
44012009	Pita go ensel rata mea pua kalabus ada gimisa pare go ensel-me pisare Pita maaresa . Nipuna konere pa upaa pi kone isa .
44012010	Pare nipu lapo pua oda polis padane pirina popesipi wala laapo pa pora gaape-para pirina popesipi pare puri pane pora gaape-para pisipi . Go pora gaapere nipu pulaina nipuna pa lobesa . Nipu amaa puare pora-nia pisipi rabu ensel-me Pita aipapulu gimoa pisa .
44012011	Go rabu Pita nipuna kone epa lobataboa gupa kone isa . Abiare neme go paede yaere ora neme niminaato . Aa Mudumi nipuna ensel me epenala-pulu go ensel-me Herot-na puri gimanolo epenasa . Goa pea-ga Juda rurumi ni madaa pulalo pamedere mada napalimi sa .
44012012	Nipumi go kone sua Maria-na ada-para pisa . Go onare Jon-na agi pirisa . Jon-na bi medare Mak . Gore onaa adaapu go ada-para pirua beten lala pirisimi .
44012013	Go rabu Pita-me amaa-nane pora gaape tinaloa kogono ona Roda-me pora labolalo ipisa .
44012014	Nipumi Pita-na agaa pagoare robaa-para raana omoa-ga pora gaape nalobisa rabu ru-nane aipapulu wala pisa . Gore Pita ada pora gaape-para epa aaya-ga nimi rekalepa sa .
44012015	Go nogome nimu gupa lakesa rabu nimumi lalo : Nere maeyata pae simi . Pare nogome lalo : Ora lawade sa . Goa pua onaanumi lalo : Gore Pita-daa dia yapare nipuna ensel yaade simi .
44012016	Go agaa simi rabu Pita-me awoa kimi pora gaape tua ado adobasa . Goa pua ru-nane piri onaa ipua pora gaape loboa Pita-na ini agaa adesimi-pulu paalame omesimi .
44012017	Go raburi Pita-me nipuna ki musaawa wa wa loa agaa maloraasa . Goa pua mo kalabus ada-para Aa Mudumi nipu mea repaaria remaa lakesa . Goa pua Pita-me lalo : Nimi Jems-para nipuna amenu-para go remaa laketapape sa . Goa loa ada gimoa wala su rado-para pisa .
44012018	Gore naare rapaasa raburi Pita napirisa-pulu mo soldia aanumi pogolasaawa agaa adaapu simi .
44012019	Gore aa mudu Herot-me puri pane agaa lakenaloa asapisimi pare na-adasasimi . Goa pua aa mudumi mo surube aanu agaa mulalo ipulupa sa . Nimuna agaa pagoare apo surube aanu pua tu maomatepa lo lakesa . Go rabu Herot Judia su gimoa mo Sisaria su-para pua pirisa .
44012020	Gore Herot-me Tair Saidon su lapona piri onaanu-para ratu yawesa . Goa pisa rabu go su lapo piri onaanu nimumi Herot adola pisimi . Nimumi kiritaawa aa Blastus-me nimu raba minalo yaasimi . Go aare nipumi Herot-na adana surube aa pirisa . Goa pisimi rabu Herot piri-para pua niaa epe-rupa piramina pua simi . Herot-na Surube Su rayo madaa nimuna eta misa-pulu go agaa lakesimi .
44012021	Onaanumi gupa lakesimi-pulu Herot-me agaa pagape di raburi nipuna epe pepena pawa nipuna epe pirape siaa madaa pirua onaanu-para remaa lakesa .
44012022	Go agaa sa rabu onaanumi lalaawa gupa yaasimi : Go agaare ora Gote-na agaa nona piane ta-ga ora pa aa medana agaa-daa dia simi .
44012023	Goa simi rabu Herot-me Gote-na bi naminasa-pulu ensel medame Herot tu maomasa . Goa pua ora ini omenalo mena kolaimi nipuna yogane waru nisimi .
44012024	Goa pisa pare Gote-na epe agaa puri paboa su rayona pisa .
44012025	Barnabas Sol laapome kogono pu kiritua Jerusalem gimoa go aa Jon Mak mea pua Antiok su-para pisimi .
44013001	Antiok su-para piri onaanuna lotu ada-parare Gote-na agaa lakene aanu-para tisaanu page pirisimi . Nimuna biri gupa : Barnabas-para Simeon nipuna bi medare Niger-para Sairini su-para piri aa Lusius-para gavman adaa aa Herot-na ame Manain-para Sol-para nimu rayo lotu ada padane-para pirisimi .
44013002	Go aanuri oro meda lotu ada-para kiritaawa Gote-para beten loa eta adoaawa pirisimi . Go rabu Holi Spirit-mi nimu-para lalo : Go aa Barnabas Sol laapore neme kogono madaa mapirayo-pulu go aa laapome kogono palipinalo laketapape sa .
44013003	Goa sa rabu kiritae aanumi eta wala gimo beten medaloma loa nimuna kimi aaluna sua nipu laapo mea penaasimi .
44013004	Holi Spirit-mi Barnabas-para Sol laapo mea penaaloa aa lapo no Selusia su pua Saiprus su polalo ipa sip kaboa pisipi . Go Saiprus suri ipa solwara rikiraana aasa .
44013005	Go Saiprus su opapasipi rabu Salamis adaare-para pirisipi . Go rabu nipu Juda aanuna lotu ada-para pua odobaa-mama pua Gote-na epe agaa lapedepesipi . Mogeasipi rabu Jon Mak-me mo aa laapona kogono raba misa .
44013006	Nimu go ipa solwara rikiraana i su Saiprus pamua lakesimi rabu Pafos su adaare-para pisimi . Go su-para pisimi rabu nimumi yaina pape aa meda adesimi . Go Juda aanuna biri Bar Jisasre nipumi ni agaa lakene aa pi loa onaanu makirasa .
44013007	Go yaina pape aare nipu mo ipa solwara rikiraana i su-para gavman-na mudu aa raapu pirisa . Aa muduri nipuna bi Sergius Paulus loa kone makuaae aa simide . Apo aa mudumi Gote-na epe agaa pagenalo Barnabas-para Sol laapo ipulupape lo lakesa .
44013008	Goa pisa pare yaina pape aame aposel kogono aa laapona kogono maoyaatalo pisa . Go yaina aaraana biri Bar Jisas yapare adaa agaamere Elimas simide . Nipumi gavman-na aa mudumi Aa Muduna epe agaa robaa-para maodobalialo agaa mabebolaasa .
44013009	Goa pisa pare Sol-re nipuna bi meda Pol Holi Spirit-na puri nipu waru rulatabesa-pulu nipumi Elimas-na ini agaa waru adabaawa lalo :
44013010	Nere ora Satan-na si yaade . Nere epe kone rayona iaa . Nere makirae aa pirua neme Gote-na ora redepo ne pora maoyaatalo paena .
44013011	Neme gupa pe-pulu Gote-na kimi ne abia tina . Abia ne ini rubu pi aa pirua naare mada na-adape . Gupa sa rabu Elimas-na ini-para kobere moae nona piane yaeme ini epa rigitisa . Goa pisa-pulu nipumi onaana ki ripinaatalo asapisa .
44013012	Gore gavman-na aa mudumi go yae adesa rabu nipumi epe agaa madaa kone rulasa . Nipumi Aa Mudu-na epe agaa pago pirisa-pulu nipu ora paala omesa .
44013013	Pol nipuna ame raapu ipa sip madaa pua pirua Pafos su gimoa Perga adaare su-para pisimi . Perga adaare-re Pamfilia su robo ru-nane aasa . Goa pisimi pare Jon Mak-me nimu gimoa Jerusalem su-para wala pisa .
44013014	Nimumi su Pega gimoa puare Antiok suri Pisidia su robo ru-nane pua opapasimi . Goa pua oge oro rabu Juda aanuna lotu ada-para pua pirisimi .
44013015	Go Juda aanuna lotu ada-para piri aa mudunumi Moses-na rekena agaa dipiaawa Gote-na agaa lakene aana agaa dipiare nimumi Pol-na amenu piri-para agaa meda gupa penaasimi : Amenu , nimimi onaanuna robaa-para puri mapalaape agaa saliare meda lagialepape simi .
44013016	Goa sa-pulu Pol rekoa ki wakiaawa pagalepa loa sana lalo : Israel onaanu nimimi pagalepape . Gote-na bi minasaaeme ruru rado onaanu nimimi page pagalepape .
44013017	Gore Israel su-para piri onaanuna Gote-me niaana akuanu mapiraawa nimu Isip su-para yadata pe aanu pirisimi rabu nipumi puri kasa .
44013018	Goa pua nimu maali 40-pela onaa napiri su-para pamua kedaa mu pirisimi . Go rabu Gote-me nimu pa adabasa .
44013019	Goa pua Kenan su-para pirisimi rabu Gote-me onaa ruru 7-pela tu bebolasa . Goa pua nipumi nimu go su kanaloa maali adaapu gupa 450 go su-para pirisimi .
44013020	Goa pua oropere nipumi koso pagape aanu mapiraawa piraama puare agaa lakene aa Samuel pirisa rabu diasa .
44013021	Goa pua Israel onaanumi aa mudu meda mulalo pisimi rabu Gote-me Sol mapiraasa . Solo-re nipu Kis-na si ora Benjamin-na ruru ru-para pirisa . Nimuna aa mudu maali 40 pirisa .
44013022	Goa pua Gote-me nipu ratua Devit aa mudu mapiraasa . Go aa madaare Gote-me nipu remaa gupa lakesa : Go aa Jesi-na si Devit-ri nina kone mogeatalo pia-ga nipumi nina kone rayo adoa palia .
44013023	Gote-me aana oraawa lakesa-pulu aa Devit-na madini sinu Israel onaanu raba minalo lakesa . Goa lakesa-pulu Yesu Devit-na ruru raapu pirisa .
44013024	Gore Yesu naipisa rabu Jon aba ipua Yesuna pora amege pisa . Goa pua nipumi Israel su-para piri onaanu-para pupitagi ne kone perekea baptais mealepape lo lakesa sa .
44013025	Jon-na kogono dia talo pisa rabu nipumi onaanu-para lalo : Nimimiri ni aapi kone imi ? Niri mo nimina ada paba pimi aa-daa dia-ga pagalepape . Go aare nina masaa-nane epalia pare ni raba mi aa ya-pulu nipuna aariti esepea kege radepetalo palua .
44013026	Goa loa Sol-me wala lalo : Amenu page Abraham-na madini sinu page ruru rado Gote-na bi minasaaeme onaanu page pagalepape . Gote-na agaa niaa raba minalo nipuna epe agaa niaa re-para epenasa .
44013027	Go Jerusalem su-para piri onaanumi page nimina aa mudunumi page Yesu ora raba mi aa lo na-adesimi . Go page oro yaalo Kitu Pirape Yapi rabu Gote-na agaa lakene aanuna buk dipinaloa gimoa napagesimi . Goa peme pare Yesu madaa koso lape agaa simi rabu nimumi Gote-na agaa lakene aa-na agaa ora yaana lo adesimi .
44013028	Gore nimumi Yesuna wae yaenu page meda na-adesimi pare Pailat-para Yesu tinalo agaa mulalo pisimi .
44013029	Gore nimumi Yesu madaa buk-para isade agaa rayo kuru kiritisimi . Goa pua nipuna ro repena polopea madaa kilipia aana apedaa-para rogaasimi .
44013030	Goa pisimi pare ora omape su-para pirisa rabu Gote-me nipu wala marekaasa .
44013031	Goa pua aba Galili su gimoa Jerusalem su-para nipu raapu pora pamisimide aanumi nipu rana adaapu adesimi . Go adesimide aanumi abia pa pimi Juda onaanu-para agaa laketeme .
44013032	Niaa go-para epa pimare Gote-na Epe Agaa nimi lagula epa amaa . Go Epe Agaare Gote-me aba niaana akuanu lakesa .
44013033	Go lakesade agaare niaana akuanumi Si Yesu matmat-para marekaasa-daa madaa pisa . Go madaare Buk Sam madaa agaa gupa isa : Nere nina si . Abiare neme kogono gialo sa .
44013034	Gote-me Yesu nipu matmat-para marekainaloa nipuna yogane mada naramualia . Go madaare Gote-me buk-para gupa sa : Neme Devit-na epe raba meape puri ora gialua sa .
44013035	Goa pua Buk Sam-na agaa meda gupa tu isa : Nena oro yaalo epe-rupa pirape aa-na yogane mada naramualia sa .
44013036	Go Devit pirua Gote-na kogono pua nipu padaneme onaa raba mulalo pisa . Go pua omesa rabu nipuna ro akuanuna matmat amaa rogaawa yogane ramisa .
44013037	Goa pisa pare Gote-me marekaasade aare nipuna yogane naramisaaya .
44013038	Goa pea-ga amenu pagalepape . Neme go aa Yesuna bi madaa lagialo . Nipumi onaanuna pupitagi nape kone rakepea rubalia .
44013039	Goa pua onaa rayome nipu madaa kone rulaawa pupitagi ne kone madaa gimalimi . Moses-na rekena agaame go pupitagi ne kone mada namarakepeaasa pare Yesumi ora pisa .
44013040	Gore waru pagalepape . Abade Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi lakesimi-daa nimi piri-para epalialo sa . Nimumi gupa simi :
44013041	Nimi ero ne aanuri paalame omoa waru adalepape . Gore nimi abia pimi rabu neme epe kogono pe . Neme go kogono pe pare aa medame go yaena re mea waateare kone mada narulalimi .
44013042	Barnabas Pol lapome go remaa lakeloa Juda aanuna lotu ada amaa pisipi . Goa pua onaa medalomame lalo : Wala Kitu Pirape Yapi rabu niaa kiritamonaloa go agaa medaloma epa lagialepape simi .
